2a1(dkon brtsegs): ar+ya a ko bA s+ya/
2a2(dkon brtsegs): ta tha ga ta s+ya byA ha na nam mo hA ya/
2b1(dkon brtsegs): na sutra/ bod skad du/
2b2(dkon brtsegs): / bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog
2b3(dkon brtsegs): / 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'a/
3a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bkod pa zhes pa pa theg pa chen po'i
3a2(dkon brtsegs): mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
3a3(dkon brtsegs): cad la phag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
3b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ brgod kyis
3b2(dkon brtsegs): phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
3b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa
3b4(dkon brtsegs): zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/
4a1(dkon brtsegs): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin
4a2(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// bya babs pa/ khur bor
4a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/
4a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams/
4b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di ltar slob pa rgyu/
4b2(dkon brtsegs): tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mad
4b3(dkon brtsegs): po dag dang / rgyal po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
4b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag las gzhan gzi brjid che ba/ gzi brjid che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
4b5(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang
5a1(dkon brtsegs): mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos
5a2(dkon brtsegs): ston to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bstan las langs te/ chos gos
5a3(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
5a4(dkon brtsegs): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
5a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang
5b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / cha go cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag thos na de bzhin du slob cing de bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro// de dag de ltar ba slangs shing de
5b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar bsgrubs par// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / yon tan de lta
5b3(dkon brtsegs): bu dag dang ldan par gyur nas kyang / slar shing gong nas gong du yon tan shing tu khyad par can dag kyang thob par 'gyur lagaso//
5b4(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
5b5(dkon brtsegs): legs so legs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su
5b6(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jug pa dang / spyod pa dang / spob
5b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems skyed pa dang / go cha dang / yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag dri ngabar sems dpa' yang khyod leg so leg so//
7a1(dkon brtsegs): byabya/ ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang / 'di lta ste 'das
7a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus btso
7a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka'
7a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten gi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
7a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing bzhes te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
7a6(dkon brtsegs): la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug las brtsams te chos ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
7a7(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga'ang zhes bgyi bde na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
7b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs tas smad med po zhes brtsig byang chub sems dpa' sebs dpa' chen po dpas la 'di ltar pha robal tu phyin pa drug las brtsams te chos spyod pa de phyogs gang na
7b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhags zhes don de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nges par zhu'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha rang
7b3(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtogs thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs
7b4(dkon brtsegs): logs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong zab pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bangon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod do// de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
7b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bya ba zhags shing bzhes te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar
7b6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa drug las brtsa bas te chos ston to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhig stan las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar na/
7b7(dkon brtsegs): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de dag la ba de
7b8(dkon brtsegs): logs su phal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po dol 'di skad ces
8a1(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ci ltar bcas pa 'di la slob par
8a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyad
8a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po des dge slong de la 'di ces bka' stsal to// dge slong byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la deng sang bslab par shin tu dka'o//
8a4(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can thams cad la mi 'khrugs par bya ba dang / gnod sems mi skyed par bya
8a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu la de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po de la dge slong des 'di skad ces
8a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag dang slan cad 'di ltar g.yo ma mchis dang / sgru ba mchis par med pa'i tshig dang gzhan du mi 'gyur ba
8a7(dkon brtsegs): tshig gis// bla na bde ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems tu sems bskyed par bgyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sems gdud
8b1(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi/ yongs su bsngo bar yang bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di skyed de/ de
8b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing / yongs su bsngos la/ 'di nas bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
8b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te sems can 'ga' tsam la khro ba 'am gnod sems sam/ 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par
8b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad
8b5(dkon brtsegs): cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur
8b6(dkon brtsegs): cig tsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
8b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngos shing / yongs su bsngos la 'di nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/
9a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te gom pa 'dor ba re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral bar gyur na/ de bdag gis/
9a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs pa mchis bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs
9a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar 'azhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig
9a4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
9a5(dkon brtsegs): chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du// gal te nyan
9a6(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs pa mchis/
9a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ba mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gshes pa la chos kyang ston pa'i
9b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/
9b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
9b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma
9b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
9b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
9b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
9b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'dod chags dang ldan pa 'am/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa 'am/ gti mug dang ldan pa 'am/
10a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par 'tshe ba dang ldan pa 'am/ gnyid dang ldan pa 'am/ rmugs pa dang ldan pa 'am/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa 'am/ rgod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par
10a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs ba kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad da/ sas rgyas
10a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
10a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che 'di bskyed/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
10a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te the tsom dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
10a6(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
10a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsdus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin
10a8(dkon brtsegs): po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
10b1(dkon brtsegs): par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te srog gcod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyis khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs
10b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs
10b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di skyed de/ de bla ra med pa yang dag bA/
10b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te ma byin par len pa dang ldan pa 'am/
10b5(dkon brtsegs): mi tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa 'am/ rdzun du smra ba dang ldan pa 'am/ phra ma dang ldan pa'am/ ngag rtsub po dang ldan pa 'am/ tshig khyal par smra ba dang ldan pa 'am/ rnang sems dang /
10b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'am/ gnod sems dang ldan pa 'am/ log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/
10b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la tshe
10b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag smras par gyur cig ces byaso/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de nas dge slong zhig 'di snyam du semam te/ kye ma byang chub sres dpa' sebs
10'a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa nyid nas/ sems can thams cad la sems mi 'khrug cing kun tu mi 'khrug
10'a2(dkon brtsegs): pa shin tu ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma dge slong 'di ni mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar gyur te legs so slab mo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar dge slong de'i ming mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa
10'a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des dge slong legs so legs so// dge slong khyod byang chub
10'a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na yang ming de nyid du gyur la/ dge slong khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang /
10'a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'gyur ro zhes de'i ming de la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
10'a6(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang dge slong legs so legs so// dge slong khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ na yang ming de nyid du gyur la/ dge slong khyod
10'a7(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang mtshan 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'gyur
10'a8(dkon brtsegs): ro zhes de'i ming de la rjes su yi rang ba byas so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la/
10'b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa mngon du gyur pa des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhye
10'b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par
10'b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma bgyis na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi
10'b4(dkon brtsegs): khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te
10'b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho zhing ba zhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslas par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
10'b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
10'b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te gom pa 'dor ba re re tsam dag la/ sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed na/
10'b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bco ldan
11a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa ba
11a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems skyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos
11a3(dkon brtsegs): la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs su khyim nas khyim ma mchis par yang dag par rab tu ma byung na/
11a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
11a5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar gang
11a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag
11a7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te tshe rab tshe rab su mngon par rab tu byung nas kyang dgon pa par ma gyur tam/ bsod snyoms par ma
11a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam/ phyag dar khrod par ma gyur tam/ bstan gcig par ma gyur tam/ zas phyis mi len par ma gyur tam/ zas rnyed rnyed len par ma gyur tam/ dur khrod par gyur tam
11b1(dkon brtsegs): bla bag med par ma gyur tam/ shing drang bar ma gyur tam/ cog pu par ma gyur tam/ gzhi ci bzhin par ma gyur tam/ chos gos gsum par ma gyur tam/ phying ba par ma gyur tam/
11b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa chung bar ma gyur tam/ chog shes par ma gyur tam/ chos 'dod par ma gyur tam/ chos la dga' bar ma gyur tam/ chos la gus par ma gyur tam/ chos la rton par
11b3(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur tam/ chos ston par ma gyur pa nas bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bskang ba'i yi dam yang dag par blang ba dag blangs te gnas par ma gyur na/ bdag
11b4(dkon brtsegs): gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom
11b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar/
11b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di skyed de/ de lta bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag
11b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pari sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te tshe rabs nas tshe rabs su rab tu byang nas kyang ston par ma gyur tam/ spobs pa chags pa
11b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang ldan par ma gyur tam/ spobs pa tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par ma gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gis khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma
12a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ bsam gis mi khyadab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing /
12a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhes pa la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed
12a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par
12a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ 'di ltar bgrang ba dang / mchis pa dang / 'chag pa'i spyod lam gsum ma gtogs par gal te nyal bar gyur na/ bdag gi phyogs bcu kun gyi
12a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu med pa'i grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyad/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar
12a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad
12a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla da med pa yang
12a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te sems can 'ga' tsam la rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
12b1(dkon brtsegs): dam/ rtsa ba'i grong ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed dam/ bud med dang ldan pa 'am/ rdzun du smrang dang ldan pa 'am/ de las gzhan smra ba dang brjod pa dang ldan pa 'am/
12b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la gnod cing spa 'gong ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/
12b3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas
12b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ bac+doMn pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyes de/ de ltar bla
12b5(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yo/ ngas su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
12b6(dkon brtsegs): bar du du/ gal te bud med 'di ltar mi rtag pa'i rnam pa'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam par 'am/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag
12b7(dkon brtsegs): gis chos ston pa na/ yan lag las skyes pa'i gzhan dang gzhan dag la bzang ba'i mtshan mar bzung nas/ so'i 'phreng ba ston tam/ rgod par bgyid da /
12b8(dkon brtsegs): lag pa g.yob par bgyid na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyad/ gzhal du mchis
13a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te mtsho zhing bzhes pa chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
13a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di skyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag
13a3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chos
13a4(dkon brtsegs): ston pa na/ gal te lag pa skur cing chos ston par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gis mi
13a5(dkon brtsegs): khyab/ gzhal du mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
13a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag
13a7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te
13a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skrag dang kha spu bregA la/ snod du gyur pa 'am/ snod du ma gyur pa'ang mi jo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan chos gos ngur smrig
13b1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba dag mthong na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi 'du shes ma skyed na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig
13b2(dkon brtsegs): rten gi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar
13b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen
13b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po tshe 'di skyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par
13b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mthong na/ de dag la ston pa'i 'du shes pa skyed na/
13b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gis mi khyab/ gzhan du ma mchis pa thams cad na//
13b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/
13b8(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed par rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
14a1(dkon brtsegs): tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chos 'chad pa na/
14a2(dkon brtsegs): chos bston pa dag la gel te mchis te chos nyan par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis bsam
14a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs
14a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar bams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/
14a5(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma
14a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par 'di las phyi rol tu gyur pa'i dge sbyong dang
14a7(dkon brtsegs): bram ze dang / lha gzhan dag la phyag bgyis par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis
14a8(dkon brtsegs): mi khyad / gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
14b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar na bla na med pa yang
14b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'di la ni sbyin pa
14b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsal bar bgyi'o// 'di la ni bstsal bar mi bgyi'o// zhes sems can la tha dad du bgyi ba'i 'du shes bskyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig
14b4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar/
14b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ chos kyang ston par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag smras par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa/
14b6(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
14b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'di la ni yon dbul bar bgyi'o// 'di la ni yon dbul bar bgyi'o// zhes de lta bu'i 'du
14b8(dkon brtsegs): shes bskyed par gyur na bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa
15a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
15a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par
15a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te 'di la ni dam
15a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa brtsal bar bgyi'o// 'di la ni brtsal bar mi bgyi'o// zhes de lta bu'i sems skyed par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
15a5(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyag gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/
15a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag smras par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
15a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
15a8(dkon brtsegs): chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te dgum par 'os pa'i sems can la la zhig gis khrid de mchis pa mthod na/
15b1(dkon brtsegs): de yongs su thar bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis lus yongasu btang ba ma bgyis na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/
15b2(dkon brtsegs): grangs pa mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i
15b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des gal te dgum par 'os pa'i
15b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can la zhig khrid de mchis pa mthong na/ de yongs su thar par ma bgyis kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes
15b5(dkon brtsegs): smras so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de nas yang dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'dis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
15b6(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad ma du gyur par 'jog pa dang / gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
15b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'jog pa de ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gi dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par
15b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro snyam mo/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des dge slong de'i sems kyis yongs su rtog pa thug
16a1(dkon brtsegs): @#kyis mkhyen nas/ dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong de bzhin no// ji ltar khyod rnam par rtogs pa de bzhin te/ dge slong gang gis de
16a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'jig pa de yang rin po mi thogs par lha dang / mi dang /
16a3(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin du btsas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur par 'gyur ro// dge slong bzhin yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bus bla na med pa
16a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i
16a5(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des 'di skad ces
16a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
16a7(dkon brtsegs): tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
16a8(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la ltung ba'i nongs pa dag mthong na/ khyod la ltung ba'i nyes pa 'di byung ngo zhes ltung ba grangs par gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig
16b1(dkon brtsegs): rjed gi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khrag/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da skar bzhugs
16b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ tshong zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag pa
16b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar de na/ thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams du/ nyan thos rnams kyi lhang
16b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra tsam dag kyang mi grags cing mi 'byung ba de ltar bdag gis rtsal zhing bsgrub par bgyi'o// ji nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
16b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa ji snyed pa dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de ltar bstsal
16b6(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi'o// btsun bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
16b7(dkon brtsegs): tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te tha na ga yar lam tsam du khu ba
16b8(dkon brtsegs): byung bar gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa
17a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
17a2(dkon brtsegs): dag bslus par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
17a3(dkon brtsegs): de na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / ga rigs kyi bu mo gang dag khyim gyi gnas nas nges par byung zhing rab tu byung bar
17a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dag/ tha na g.yar lam na yang khu ba mi 'byin pa de ltar bdag gis brtsal cing bskrang par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i
17a5(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
17a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par se 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas
17a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing du/ da ltar gyi bud med dang bud med kyi skyon gang lags pa de'i bud med dang bud med kyi skyon de lta bu dag byung bar gyur na/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
17a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur zhing // bdag gis phyogs bcu kan gyi 'jig rten gi khams dpag ta ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis
17b1(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom/
17b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag bslas par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa 'di bskyed de/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
17b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongs su bsngos la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ gal te ji ltar bstan pa bzhin
17b4(dkon brtsegs): du ma bgyis na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du mchis pa thams cad
17b5(dkon brtsegs): na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston kyang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/
17b6(dkon brtsegs): sa bon gyi chos 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni/ ji lta ji ltar sems mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba de ltar de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mngon par
17b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grub cing// de lta de ltar chos ston par yang 'gyur ro zhes gsol to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de nas dge slong zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po mi 'khru
17b8(dkon brtsegs): pa de la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dam bcas pa 'di dag gal te yang dag par smon lam yin zhing // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
18a1(dkon brtsegs): chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa yin na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos stong gsum gyi stong chen
18a2(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis chen po 'di g.yo ba dang / rab tu g.yo ba dang / kun tu g.yo ba dang / 'gul ba dang / rab tu 'gul ba dang / kun tu rab tu 'gul
18a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / ldeg pa dang / rab tu ldeg pa dang / kun tu rab ldeg par byos shig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'a'akhrugs pa des
18a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi bden pa'i dam bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa des/ rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
18a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gi khams kyis chen po'i 'di rnam pa drag tu g.yo bar byas te/ g.yos rab tu g.yos// / kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gal/ kun tu rab tu 'gal/
18a6(dkon brtsegs): ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par byas so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni ji ltar smras pa de bzhin du byed
18a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
18a8(dkon brtsegs): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
18b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slo pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de 'dra ba kho na'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'jed cing / myur du bla med pa yang dag par
18b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byed
18b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de dang po sems bskyed lnga yang dag par bzhugs pa na/ lha'i rigs ji snyed cig 'dus par 'gyur/ de skad ces
18b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mi 'khrugs pa
18b5(dkon brtsegs): de dang po sems sked pa la yang dag par zhags pa na/ stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
18b6(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po chang pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa da/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'das nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal/
18b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing tshig 'di skad ces/ kye ma bsngon ma thos pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'dis bsgrags pa las
18b8(dkon brtsegs): thos so zhes smras so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de nas lha'i bu de dag dga' ba dang / yid 'deb skyes nas/ kha mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
19a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
19a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes par 'gyur ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dron ldan pa ma lags so// sems can gang dag gis seng ge'i
19a3(dkon brtsegs): sgra chen po dang / khyu mchog gi mi 'jigs pa chen po dang / smon lam chen po'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dan ngon dang ldan pa ma
19a4(dkon brtsegs): legs so// zhes gsol to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
19a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i go cha chen po ci 'dra ba gang de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su brjod pa'i go cha chen po de lta bu
19a6(dkon brtsegs): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la mchis par bdag gis sngon ma thos lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
19a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra da ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// sha ra da ti'i bu byang chub ses
19a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de go cha chen po gang bgos na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam chen po de
19b1(dkon brtsegs): bgos nas/ bla na med pa yang ye dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' de lta ni byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag
19b2(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po/ dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong phrag mang po byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ma
19b3(dkon brtsegs): po dag gi nang na yang nyung ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de yon tan gang dag dang ldan pa'i yon tan de dag ni bskal pa
19b4(dkon brtsegs): bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/
19b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ong ba'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
19b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
19b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na de bzhin gshegs pa mar med me dzad kyis da da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
19b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub
20a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
20a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byung cing / sa chen po de yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'di ltar g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu ba tu
20a3(dkon brtsegs): g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
20a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par
20a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur cing / sa chen po 'di yang rnam par drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'di ltar rab tu g.yos so// kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gal rab tu 'gul kan tu rab tu 'gul/
20a6(dkon brtsegs): ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/
20a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
20a8(dkon brtsegs): de na/ shing ljon pa dang / rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nag tshal gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
20b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de logs su btud/ rab tu btud/ mngon par rab tu btud par gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
20b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ shing ljon pa de
20b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal grang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ nga ga la ba de logs su btud/ rab tu btud/ mngon par rab tu btud par gyur
20b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
20b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi ston chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang / klu dang / gno
20b6(dkon brtsegs): sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad
20b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par gyur te/ sha ra da ti
20b8(dkon brtsegs): bu dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
21a1(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di na/ lba dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
21a2(dkon brtsegs): po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis nga ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ phyag 'tshal nas 'dug par gyur pa
21a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i byang che bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa'
21a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams de na/
21a5(dkon brtsegs): bud med sbrum mar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / de'i tshe bde zhing bkra shis par btsas par gyur to// sems can gang dag long bar gyur pa de dag kyang mig
21a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs mthong bar gyur to// sems can 'od pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to// sems can spros pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed par gyur to//
21a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can dbang po mi tshangs pa rnams kyang dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur te// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na// ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
21a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyed pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir
21b1(dkon brtsegs): bud med snum mar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i bde zhing bkra shis par btsas par gyur/ sems can long ba rnams kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar
21b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ sems can 'on pa rnams dang rna bas sgra thos par gyur/ sems can myos pa rnams kyang drad pa rnyed par gyur/ sems can dbang po thams cad ma
21b3(dkon brtsegs): tshang ba rnams kyang dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
21b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum
21b5(dkon brtsegs): gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na de'i tshe/ sems can 'ga' tsam yang ga shI ngan du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa med de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ ngas bla
21b6(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
21b7(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khaMs 'di na/ de'i tshe sems can 'ga' yang gshis ngan du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa med pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
21b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyad chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
22a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der lha'i dri gsung yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur te/ shar dwa
22a2(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum
22a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lha'i dri gsung yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur pa bzhin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
22a4(dkon brtsegs): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni da ltar lung bstan pa nyid na yon tan
22a5(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu dag dang ldan par gyur pa lags na/ byang chub sems dpe' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni yon tan gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa lags so// de skad ces gsol/
22a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
22a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs bI raraM sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa na/ yon tan brjod pa de dag nyi tsher yang ma zad de/
22a8(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni yon tan mtha' yas pa gzhan dag gis pha rol tu phyin par yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshes
22b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med yang dag par par rdzogs pa'i
22b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na// lha dang mi mi dang / lha ma yin du byas pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad seMs
22b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / sems kyi nyams bde bar gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ste/ thams
22b4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams
22b5(dkon brtsegs): cad sems dga' ba dang / sems kyi nyams bde bar gyur pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
22b6(dkon brtsegs): spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum
22b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gnod sbyin kyi bdag po lag na rdo rje gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas
22b8(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
23a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'din gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rje gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad nga'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur pa bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i
23a2(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med
23a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
23a4(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la
23a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i med tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su gtor/ rab tu
23a6(dkon brtsegs): gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor bar gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
23a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham
23a8(dkon brtsegs): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ ngal mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / 'dug pa dag
23b1(dkon brtsegs): gis ngal ba de logs su gtor/ rab tu gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor bar gyur bzhin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
23b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sman chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum
23b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na mi bye ba phrag nyi shu dang / lha bye ba phrag sum bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de dag thabs
23b4(dkon brtsegs): cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//
23b5(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzhazhin yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa
23b6(dkon brtsegs): de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad na/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang /
23b7(dkon brtsegs): ku bu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dag gis kun tu khebabs par gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
23b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang pad ma dkar po dag gis byang chub kyi snying po kun tu khebs par gyur pa
24a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no// shar dwa ti'i bu bzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa'
24a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bskrun pa na/ lba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/
24a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sgra'i gos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sas dpa'
24a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa gal ba de logs su bor nas/ tshig 'di skad ces kye ma byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'di sbyar tu bla na med pa par
24a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig ces smras te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma/
24a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ lha bye ba khrag khri ga brgya stong du ma dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/
24a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i gos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dgang ga la ba de logs su bor ba bzhin no// sha dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
24a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsu
24b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga' bar gyur pa tsam du pha ma dag bul dga' ba ma yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper
24b2(dkon brtsegs): nangs bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
24b3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bces pa'i 'jig rten dga' bar gyur pa tsam du pha ma dag bu la dga' bar ma yin pa bzhin no//
24b4(dkon brtsegs): bam po gnyis pa ka
24b5(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/
24b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ lha dang mi gang dag 'khod pa de
24b7(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa thos par gyur to// de la lung bstan pa thos nas kyang / 'dod pa'i khams kyis
24b8(dkon brtsegs): can gang yin pa de dag sbyin pa dag kyang byin te/ bsod nams dag kyang byed de/ 'di lta ste bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba rnam pa mang po sna tshogs dag sbyin pa byin par gyur
25a1(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba bzhi po ston zla nga chungs kyi zla ba zhal ku mu tal+li stodan kyi chen/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can rnam
25a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed de/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi sbyin pa gtong bar byed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin
25a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag
25a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi snying chen po 'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can rnams kyang sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing
25a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams dag byed de/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba rnams pa sna tshogs dag gi sbyin pa byed par gyur to// lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams kyis kyang lha'i
25a6(dkon brtsegs): sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag mngon par rab tu bkrol nas/ a la la zhes ca co dang gau zha dag kyang phyung bar gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems
25a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa na/ de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
25a8(dkon brtsegs): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis de bzhin gshe
25b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mkhyen pa zhib mos/ legs par gsungs pa de dag ni ngo mtshar te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul ni
25b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab lagaso// bsam gtan pa rnams kyis bsam gtan gi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ klu rnams kyi klu yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ las rnams kyi la
25b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des dang po sems bskye
25b4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid nas yon tan gyi khyab par de lta bu dag yongs su zin cing / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan de lta bu dang /
25b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i de'i lung bstan pa de yang bsam gyis mi khyab lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'
25b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji ltar smras pa bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i lung
25b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa sha re dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sem
25b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs tsam zhig mang
26a1(dkon brtsegs): bsdus te gsungs par zad kyi/ rgya cher bstan pa ni ma yin no// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa kun/
26a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi
26a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs tsam zhig bstan pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
26a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan
26a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa kan dga' bo de'i phyir rna ba lhogs te nyon cig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya cher ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
26a6(dkon brtsegs): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po
26a7(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan dang / phan yon mdor bsdus te bka' stsal lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
26a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
26b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag shin tu legs par bstan cing rgya cher gshad du gsol/ de nad ces gsol pa dang //
26b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po
26b3(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab mod kyi/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'on kyang phyogs tsam zhig bstan par byas/ de legs par rab tu
26b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon la yid la zung shig dang / bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
26b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des 'di snyam du
26b6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i khams ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi/ bdag gi dam bcas pa ni gzhan du yang mi 'gyur bar bya'o// zhes sems bskrad de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
26b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni go cha chen po de lta bu'i go cha bgos par gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi
26b8(dkon brtsegs): gzugs pa po che chen po bgos par gyur pa des bu go cha chen po dag bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ ngas bskal pa bzang pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
27a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che tog/
27a2(dkon brtsegs): gi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa'i spyod pa'i char nye bar 'gro te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
27a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des go cha chen po gang dgos par gyur pa'i go cha de ni byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag
27a4(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag la yang med do// sha ra/
27a5(dkon brtsegs): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des/ de ltar brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po yang dag par blangs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag
27a6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa
27a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba na da ltar yang bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas mdon
27a8(dkon brtsegs): par shes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa na//
27b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis lag pa 'am/ rkang pa 'am/ mgo bo 'am/ mig gam/ yan lag dang nying lag gang yang rung ba dag blang ba na ma byin pa gang yang med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
27b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrags pa des/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang
27b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang klad pa na bar ma gyur/ rlung las gyur pa 'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan
27b4(dkon brtsegs): las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis theg par ma gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
27b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems pa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngo mtshar dang smad du byung ba'i chos 'di yang byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das/
27b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems pa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ des tshe rabs thams cad du
27b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas shing / thugs byung bar ma byas so// thams cad du yang tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing / thams cad du yang 'di lta ste/
27b8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi 'gro zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom pa ldan 'das dag mngon gsum
28a1(dkon brtsegs): da bzhugs pa de dang der skyes par gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba khang bzangs
28a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi steng na khang bzangs kyi steng du 'gro yang rkang pa'i mthil gyis sa chen po la 'gro bar mi byed do// de 'ang bzangs mchog de dag gi steng du 'dug nas/ 'dod pa'i
28a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse zhing dga' myugar spyod cing tshe zad par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
28a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang des tshe rab thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas shing
28a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs byung bar ma byas so// thams cad du yang tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing / thams cad du yang 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas/
28a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mngon gsum du bzhugs pa de dang der skyes par gyur kyang rkang
28a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthil gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mi byed do// de chos gang dang gang ston pa de dag thams cad kyang pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston cing //
28a8(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston pa ni nyung ngo // gal te nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston na yang / de thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams
28b1(dkon brtsegs): te chos ston to// gal te rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston na yang / de thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos bston to// de pha rol
28b2(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos bstan pas sems can rnams byang chub la btul zhing btsud de rab tu bkod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
28b3(dkon brtsegs): brtsams nas/ de dag la yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom
28b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems pa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ brtson 'gres brtan pa'i
28b5(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to// de chos kyi sbyin pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos te/ kye ma dge ba'i
28b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' theg
28b7(dkon brtsegs): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos ston pa 'di nyan par gyur cig/ thos nas kyang 'dzin pa
28b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub bar byed par 'gyur zhing gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu ston par gyur cig/ tsher brjes nas kyang chos de dag mi brjed par
29a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/ ji ltar bdag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba bzhin du/ der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang sangs/
29a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gang dag gdang smon par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
29a3(dkon brtsegs): ma rgyas kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ gang dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
29a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po skye ba gcig gi thog pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni chos nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha
29a5(dkon brtsegs): ma pa rnams ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas lus tha mas ma'i glo g.yas pa nas mngal du skye bar 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
29a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma dag skye ba na/ sa chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po srid pa tha ma pa'i
29a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams pa ni 'di dag yin/ rtags ni 'di dag yin/ mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tham pa ni ma'i
29a8(dkon brtsegs): mngal du zhugs pa na/ mi gtsang ba dri nga bas gos par mi 'gyur// der yid du mi 'thad pa'i dri dag kyang tshor bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' mngal na
29b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa na yang nam mkha' la gnas so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ni khang brtsegs pa 'am/ khang pa
29b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsegs pa rgyud mor zhugs nas/ bar snang gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags shing / spyod lam gis gnas par byed kyang / khang partsegs pa de la reg pa med do// shar
29b3(dkon brtsegs): dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma mI mnga' na gnas pa na/ na mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas gnas te/ mngal gi dri ma dang / mi btsang ba'i dring
29b4(dkon brtsegs): bas mi gos par gnas shing / der yid du mi 'thad pa'i dri dag kyang tshor bar mi 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
29b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ sngon byang bla sems dpa'i smad pa sprod pa ni/ 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bdag da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa spod pa ni bdud
29b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis klags ma rnyed par gyur pa de bzhin du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dor byang chub
29b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i thegs pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byung ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ nam bla na med pa
29b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du// bdud dang bdud kyi rogs lha rnams kyis/ thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad du klags
30a1(dkon brtsegs): / mi rnyed par gyur cig/ ci srid du byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis yon tan phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su zin par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag kyang //
30a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyir srod par gyur cig snyam mo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/
30a3(dkon brtsegs): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i skud pa spyod pa na/ chos ston pa 'am/ chos nyan pa'i tshe lan 'ga' yang de'i lus ngal ba 'am/ sems dngal bar gyur pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti/
30a4(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di de bzhin gshegs pa des dang po sems bskyed pa nas gzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod na/ chos kyi sku rab tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang
30a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing / chos nyan pa na 'di
30a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bdag da ltar chos 'dod pa de bzhin du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sems can rnams kyang chos
30a7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod par mi 'gyur zhing chos 'dod par gyur cig slam po// 'phags pa bkod mchog rtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnams grangs le'u stong phrag brgya ba las/ mi 'khrugs pa bsod
30a8(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs su brjod pa zhes bya'i le'u dang po rdzogs smog/
30b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das lnga tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/
30b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des/ sngon byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa spyod pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag ni legs
30b3(dkon brtsegs): par bka' stsal lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de yang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa
30b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i da ltar gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ma mchis pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan tu gsol// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub
30b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa thos na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
30b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la yang blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
30b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'dun pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs pa dag gis kyang sangs rgyas
30b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa thos ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de lta ba dang / mchod pa/
31a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba dang / snyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mnyes par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'dud pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang /
31a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
31a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yod pa 'dri bas sems dpa'
31a4(dkon brtsegs): ni yang khyod legs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid gzung shig dang / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
31a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yod pa bshad par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bus bco
31a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de na stong gsum
31a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyis deng nas zhag bdun na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
31a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes nas/ sems can de dag thams cad kha zas kyi 'du she
31b1(dkon brtsegs): kun tu 'byung bar ma gyur to// bkres pa'i 'du shes ma byung / skom pa'i 'du shes ma byung / mal du nyal ba'i 'du shes ma byung / lus dang sems ngal ba'i 'du shes ma byung gi/
31b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhan du na sems can de dag thams cad bde ba'i 'du shes dang / ldan par gyur te/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i 'du shes dang / sems rang ba dang / sems kyi nyams bde ba dang /
31b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ sngon byang
31b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i smad pa sprod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis de dag thams cad kyis kyang de lha'i bu'i yon tan dag yongs su zin par gyur pa'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzhan yang de'i
31b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na gang dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis deng nas zhag bdun na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin bshegs pa dgra bcom
31b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes nas/ de dag 'khrig pa spod pa'i
31b7(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes kun tu mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
31b8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa de/ sngod byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smod lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
32a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
32a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur
32a3(dkon brtsegs): cing / sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'di ltar g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/
32a4(dkon brtsegs): ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu'ur 'ur/ chem che ma rab tu
32a5(dkon brtsegs): che ma che ma/ kun tu rab tu chem chem par gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/ bla na med
32a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid kyi ye shes brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sangs
32a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gyi yon tan bkod pa yongs su zin par gyur pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
