85b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi kha dog dang dbyings dang gzugs dag gzigs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na dge
85b5(dkon brtsegs): slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sems kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ni thag ring po na gnas kyang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyi sems yang dag par shes so// sha ra dwa
85b6(dkon brtsegs): tI'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yang thag ring po na bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten
85b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems yang dag par mkhyen to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na dge
85b8(dkon brtsegs): slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ni thag ring na gnas kyang rna bas sgra thos so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/
86a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yang thag ring por bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
86a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba der skye bar bya'o zhes smra ba dag gsan cing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das
86a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pra des rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi ming dang rus ci yin pa yang
86a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
86a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sad
86a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des gzigs so// de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des mkhyen
86a7(dkon brtsegs): to// de dag ni nam/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'i bar du yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa
86a8(dkon brtsegs): des rgongs par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom blangs la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
86b1(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shin du yongs su bzung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar
86b2(dkon brtsegs): lags so// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka
86b3(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sa byang chub sems dpa'
86b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams shin tu yongs su gzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shin tu yongs su gzung
86b5(dkon brtsegs): ngas/ sems can thams cad kyang shin tu yongasu gzung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bkur ba zhig
86b6(dkon brtsegs): la 'di lta ste 'bras sa lu 'am/ 'bru'am/ nas sam/ gro 'am/ til lam/ mon sran sre'u 'am/ mon gre'u 'am/ sran chung dam/ 'gro'i rnam pa gzhan gang yang
86b7(dkon brtsegs): rung bas gang bar ba ba gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ gzhi 'am/ lnga'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ rgya'am/
86b8(dkon brtsegs): stong ngam/ 'bum 'am/ shin tu mang po dag cig gdog par gyur pa na/ de 'di snyam du 'di dag ni mu gi 'byung ba'am phongs par gyur pa na 'di dag gis lo legs pa/
87a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro snyam nas shin tu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mu ge 'byung bar gyur pa na/ sems can rnams kyi gsos su gyur pa'i
87a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'das pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
87a3(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
87a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nas kyang / dam pa'i chos kyis mu ger gyur pa'i sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos bshad pas dam pa'i chos kyi lo legs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi
87a5(dkon brtsegs): lo legs par byed par 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
87a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongs su gzung bar yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya
87a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyis rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed de/ klog par byed/ kun chub par
87a8(dkon brtsegs): byed cing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed la/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong drag
87b1(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang / srog rags byed khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god la/ sangs rgyas
87b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir smon lam yang 'debs par bar byed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
87b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i
87b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la
87b5(dkon brtsegs): yang brgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed la/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
87b6(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'god de rab tu 'god na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
87b7(dkon brtsegs): der skye bar bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par
87b8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par rig par bya ste/ de dag ni rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
88a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dgra bcom lda
88a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid thos
88a3(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu ston la/ gzung zhig bcangs la glags shing kun
88a4(dkon brtsegs): chub par byas te/ gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu ston nas/ srog chag brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag
88a5(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god pa la/
88a6(dkon brtsegs): srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed na/ de dag ji ltar ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de lta de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par
88a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang bag par rdzogs pa'i chub mngo
88a8(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya ste/ gzung zhing
88b1(dkon brtsegs): bcangs la/ glags shing kun chub par byas nas/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chag
88b2(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag la yang bshad par bya/ yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
88b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa de lta de ltar shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las nye bar rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de dag shos rab chen por 'gyur
88b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las byas shing bstsags pa des lus de nyid kyis zag pa zad pa rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// sha ra da ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rig
88b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo gang la la dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i
88b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher dag par rab tu ston
88b7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed la/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phra
88b8(dkon brtsegs): mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug cing 'dzud de/ rab tu 'god pa de dag thams cad kyang / lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
89a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum du byed par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de dag lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byed par mi 'gyur
89a2(dkon brtsegs): nA yang / de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis pa las 'da' bar ni mi 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
89a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
89a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya zhing / thos nas kyang gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par
89a5(dkon brtsegs): bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan dag la yang ba rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya zhing / srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /
89a6(dkon brtsegs): srog tshogs stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin tu bzhug par bya/ gzung
89a7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ rab tu dgod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams ni lus de nyid
89a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo gang la la dag yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos
89b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di gzhan dag la dus dus su yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byed par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas
89b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba gnyis pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa tI'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
89b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji lta ji ltar 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
89b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de lta de ltar shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las byed par 'gyur
89b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing stsogs par 'gyur ro// de dag shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing rtsegs pa des lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon su du byed par yang
89b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de ltar lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byed par mi 'gyur na yang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
89b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa las 'da' bar ni mi 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis kyang don gi dbang 'di thos nas/
89b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bya zhing rnal 'byor du bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar bas na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi mo dam pa'i chos
90a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin par 'dod pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/
90a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ 'chang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la yang dag
90a3(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu bstan par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang
90a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'arlang bar bye/ klog par
90a5(dkon brtsegs): byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed la/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang //
90a6(dkon brtsegs): srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug cing 'dzud de
90a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'god la/ de bzhin du rnal 'byor du bsgrub cing rtsol 'bad de/ slob cing mos na sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis
90a8(dkon brtsegs): ni srid pa tha ma la gnas pa 'om/ skye ba gnyis kyis thog pa 'am/ skye ba gsum gis thogs pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis pa las 'da'
90b1(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur ra rigs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon
90b2(dkon brtsegs): tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis thos par mi nus te/ shA ra dwa tI'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus rigs kyi
90b3(dkon brtsegs): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su dag rung ba zhig gis rna lam du grags par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des kyang myur bar gzung bar bya/ bcang bar
90b4(dkon brtsegs): bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing / gzhan dag la yang brgya cher yang dag par rab tu snyan par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gol te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
90b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mo la la zhig gis sems can 'ga' zhig gi don gyi phyir/ kye mas sems can 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
90b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur cig ces 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dbyigs
90b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / gser gyis yongs su bkang ste/ sbyin pa byin zhing yongs su btang bar gyur na/ sha ra dwa tI'i bu sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis ni/ bcom ldan
90b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nuso//
91a1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed cing / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
91a2(dkon brtsegs): dad pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro ba'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
91a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab can rnams kyi lag na/ gnas par mi 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i
91a4(dkon brtsegs): bu gzhan du na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mkhas pa shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa rnams kyi lag tu gnas par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
91a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gi lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa dang / lus la gnas pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po che'i
91a6(dkon brtsegs): rin thang med par rin che ba gang yang rung ba zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas khyer te 'ongs par gyur na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nor bu rin po che de dang po kho nar
91a7(dkon brtsegs): su la 'ong bar 'gyur/ gsol pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rin po che de ni dang po kho nar rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu rnams sam/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po rnams kyi sug
91a8(dkon brtsegs): par mchi bar 'gyur lags so// bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
91b1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i lag tu gnas par 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
91b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod
91b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la brgya cher yang dag par
91b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston pa la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor du bsgrub par byed pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de skad
91b5(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar lagos pas na/ rigs
91b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo phyir mi ldogs pa'i sa la gnas par 'tshal ba rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
91b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ klag par gyi/ zhing gzhan dag la yang dag par
91b8(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam
91b9(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par ba
92a1(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di la zhugs pa ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
92a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis rI dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu me
92a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i
92a4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par b+ha/ kun chub par bya zhing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan
92a5(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya lde rin po che sna bdun po dag ni las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du
92a6(dkon brtsegs): ngas 'khor bzhi po rnams la yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i tshe sa kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa yang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
92a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sngon gi smor
92a8(dkon brtsegs): lam gyis bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
92b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos pa dang / nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/
92b2(dkon brtsegs): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam dang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pas thos shing nyan par 'gyur ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag bskal
92b3(dkon brtsegs): pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas dgu bcu rtsa drag po gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang / dper na ngas da ltar 'khor bzhi
92b4(dkon brtsegs): po dag la bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa bzhin du lhag tshad med par 'khor bzhi po dag la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
92b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// she ra dwa
92b6(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/
92b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tatan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di
92b8(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sos
93a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba la la zhig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
93a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang
93a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la yang ngargya cher yang dag par bstan par byar mi rnyed par gyur la/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba gal
93a4(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig gis 'di skad du gal te rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo khyod khyim gi gnas na gnas shi / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te spyod par byed na/ de ltar na ngas khyod
93a5(dkon brtsegs): la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sbyin par
93a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes zer na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bya ba'i phyir/
93a7(dkon brtsegs): gal te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa 'am/ gzung ba 'am/ bcang ba 'am/ klag pa 'am/ kun chub par bya ba 'am/ gzhan dag la yang ngargya tshor yang dag par rab tu
93a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan par byar rnyed na/ khyim gyi gnas su song ste/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung zhig kun chub par byas te/ yang phyir mngon
93b1(dkon brtsegs): par byung yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba de la ltung ba med par+ya dras rjes su gnang ngo //
93b2(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i gang zag de 'das na yang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
93b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te grong khyer ram thag ring por
93b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa gang zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam
93b5(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di rab tu spyod par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des der yang bgrod par bya zhing / der phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
93b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yod dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par
93b7(dkon brtsegs): bya/ kun chub par bya zhing gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bcom ldan la
93b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya//
94a1(dkon brtsegs): bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing / ge zhan dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o zhes sems bskyed la/ sha ra dwa
94a2(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i
94a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brjod par ni mi nas kyi/ gleg bam du byas pa zhig lag na srol bar gyur na/ des glegs bam de brnyas te phyir los
94a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bdag gis glegs bam bri bar bya'o// gal te glegs bam bkur du mi ster na yang de nyid du bri bar bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de 'di
94a5(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ gal te rigs bu khyod zan bcad de 'dri phod na de ltar na ngas khyod la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
94a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes zer na yang des zan bcad de 'dug la bri bar bya'o// gal te yang 'di skad
94a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'arlag cing bris shig ces zer na yang / des 'arlag cing bri bar bya'o// gal te yang 'di skad du 'greng ste bris shig ces zer na yang des 'greng ste bri bar bya'o// gal te
94a8(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di skad du 'dug ste bris shig ces zer na yang des 'dug ste bri bar bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/
94b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i don gyi phyir
94b2(dkon brtsegs): grong ngam/ grong khyer du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod
94b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma rnyed par gyur na/ de nas rgyal khams gzhan nas ma/ yul gzhan dag tu yang bgrod cing gang tu thos par 'gyur ba der 'gro bar bya'o//
94b4(dkon brtsegs): der phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i
94b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ bcad par bya/ gzung bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya zhing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o// /
94b6(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar gang du thos par 'gyur ba der phyin nas/ gal te ma rnyed na yang des 'di snyam du gang gi phyir bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa dgra
94b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos par gyur pas na/ bdag ni bla na med pa
94b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i 'jigs pa yang med la/ gang gis da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
95a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming bstan par de yang bdag la phan par 'dod pa/
95a2(dkon brtsegs): bde bar 'dod pa/ don du 'dod pa grub pa dang / bde bar 'dod pa yin no snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
95a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
95a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid kyi sngon gi smon lam gyi dbang gis ngas bshad de/ rigs kyi bu ma rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis thos pa
95a5(dkon brtsegs): dang gang dag thos par 'gyur ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
95a6(dkon brtsegs): la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
95a7(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su'i mthus thos par 'gyur/ bcom
95a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bung 'das pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrug
95b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
95b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de nyid kyi mthus thos par gyur zhing / ji ltar dam pa'i chos smra ba dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
95b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di smra bar 'gyur ba/ de ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang spro ba skye bar 'gyur la/
95b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag rten par 'gyur ba de dag gis las kyi rnam par smin pas kyang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya
95b5(dkon brtsegs): byin spro ba skye bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
95b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan gyi
95b7(dkon brtsegs): chos chen po dang ldan pa lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshe dang ldan pa
95b8(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
96a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ yon tan gi chos chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi
96a2(dkon brtsegs): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la kha dag 'jigs pa 'am/ skrag par 'gyur ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
96a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan nas brjod na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / bsgrags pa dag med par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te phyogs
96a4(dkon brtsegs): la la zhig tu 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba 'bab par gyur na/ de 'bab na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
96a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan nas brjod cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
96a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis/ klu brgya phrag meng po dang / klu stong phrag mang po dang / klu brgya stong phrag
96a7(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang / klu bye khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag thar par mdzad cing / thar bar mdzad nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su
96a8(dkon brtsegs): bsngos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang
96b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag tu klu khro ba dag gis 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba 'babs par byed pas/ de na sems can gang dag 'jigs shing skrag pagyur ba de dag bdag gi mtshan nas brjod par
96b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing / der bdag gis mthus 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba de dag nye bar zhi bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngos pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag bcag
96b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba 'bab pa 'di dag nye bar zhi bar gyur cig ces brjod pa tsam gyis na/ klu rnams kyi 'khor lo drag po lta bu ser ba de dag nye bar zhi bar 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa
96b4(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni matogs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag 'jigs pa 'am/ skrag pa 'am/ ya/
96b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi nad dam/ gnod pa 'byung bar gyur pa ra/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de rjes su dran par bya zhing /
96b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i
96b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig gang gis dam bcas pa dang / tshigs brjod pa gang yin pa'i dam bcas pa dang / tshigs rjod pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs por gyur cig dam bcas pa dang / tshig
96b8(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa'i 'den pa dang / bded pa'i tshigs des 'jigs pa dang / sbags pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa 'di dag nub par gyur cig/
97a1(dkon brtsegs): @ces brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa de dag dang / skrag pa de dag dang / yams kyi nad de dag dang / gnod pa de dag nub par 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i
97a2(dkon brtsegs): bu sems can de dag gi sngon gi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bus 'di skad ces
97a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
97a4(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar 'gyur gyi gnyis ni ma lags pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
97a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
97a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
97a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/
97a8(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
97b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas/ bla na med
97b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
97b3(dkon brtsegs): brgya bar bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas/ sangs rgyas
97b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su gzung ba de ltar gang gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spungs pa dang / de ltar sangs rgyas kyi
97b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyung ste/ sha ra da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad
97b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas nyid kyang mtshungs//
97b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtshungs/ kha dog kyang mtshungs/ rtags kyang mtshungs/ rigs kyang mtshungs/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa yang
97b8(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'dus pa yang mtshungs/ de dag gi rnam par grol ba yang 'tshungs/ mod kyi/ gzhan du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
98a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dkod pa tha dad bar gyur pa dang / seng ge'i khri tha dad pa dang / pad ma'i dkyil 'khor tha dad par 'gyur
98a2(dkon brtsegs): ba 'ba' shig du zad do// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams shar phyogs su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
98a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
98a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrug
98a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dir bshad pa'i / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
98a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum du ched
98a7(dkon brtsegs): du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po dang / lha'i spos dag
98a8(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor
98b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog de dag dang / spos de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi nam mkha' la me tog gi gdugs chen por gnas par gyur to//
98b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrug
98b3(dkon brtsegs): ba de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de log su me tog gis gti/
98b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po 'di dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha 'di dag dang /
98b5(dkon brtsegs): tshangs ris kyi lha 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de thong bar 'gyur bar/ de bzhin gshegs
98b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyi yongasu
98b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ bar snang la dkyil mo dgrangs bcas te bzhugs par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus
98b8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bzhi po dag dang / steng gi na mkha' mngon par 'phags nas bar snang la 'khod par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang / tshangs ris
99a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi lha dag kyang steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas bar snang la 'khod par gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
99a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas/ 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / 'dod pa
99a3(dkon brtsegs): na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
99a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mthong /
99a5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// mthong nas kyang de dag thams cad pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga steng gi na mkha' la btsugs ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
99a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
99a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
99a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mi rnams mthong ba dang / 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha'i kha dog dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs dang / bstan
99b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag ji sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha'i ris nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
99b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa la lta ba dang / phyag bya dang / bstan bkur bya dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags pa'i lha rnams yin nam/ 'on te 'di ma yin snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
99b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag ni lha yin te dam pa'i chos nyan pa'i phyir mi'i cha lugs dang / rtags 'dzin cing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
99b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i spyan snga na 'khod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis sngan chad mi rnams la 'di lta bu'i mdzes pa dang / dpal dang skal pa bzang
99b5(dkon brtsegs): po phun sum tshogs pa dag lan 'ga' yang ma mthong ma thos pa'i phyir ro snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de dag slar bsdus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
99b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag the tshom dang bcas/ yid gnyis dang bcas par thugs su chud nas/ lha'i dbang po
99b7(dkon brtsegs): brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shig ka gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
99b8(dkon brtsegs): du skyes pa'i mi 'di dag ni lha'i nye bar spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa dag dang ldan pa yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te// mi gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyang
100a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong la/ lha'i long spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang ldan pa'i mi de dag ni/ lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ste/ 'dod par bya ba yin no// gang dag 'jig rten
100a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams gzhan dag dang / sangs rgyas zhing gzhan dag nas shi 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
100a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur pa'i mi de dag 'dod par bya ba yin no snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras
100a4(dkon brtsegs): so// ko'u shi ka gang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya 'thub pa mthong zhing / bcom ldan 'das
100a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa yang mthong bas na/ ko'u shi ka gal te de tsam gyis kyang khyod kyi lus kyis rnyed pa legs par
100a6(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa yin na/ ko'u shi ka gang khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba'i rnyed pa de lta smos kyang ji dgos// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/
100a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gi rna lam du yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur
100a8(dkon brtsegs): ba lta smos kyang ji dgos snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i gang
100b1(dkon brtsegs): zag gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni rnyed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
100b2(dkon brtsegs): ko'u shi ka srog chags gang dag gis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar sems bskyed na/ de dag ni de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
100b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po phyir mi ldog pa ji lta ba de ltar gzung bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong snga stong tsam ni len pa med par zag pa rnams
100b4(dkon brtsegs): las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong brgya stong gis ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab po// byang chub sems
100b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong lnga stong gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge bsnyen brgyad stong gis
100b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge bstan ma khris kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab
100b7(dkon brtsegs): po// 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab ste/ de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
100b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
101a1(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar lung bstan to// gang dag de las gzhan pa'i sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de nyid du/ bla na
101a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung ston par 'gyur te/ lung bstan nas kyang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyid du skye bar 'gyuraro//
101a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhan yang bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'ang/
101a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg
101a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu 'khrugs/ shu r-i'u ra/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ che ma tshem/ rang tu che ma chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem zhing /
101a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
101a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lha dang / mi dang /
101a8(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon
101b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// / mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa'i la'u ste// 'dus pa lnga pa rdzogs s+ho//
101b2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ran 'dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phang pa/
101b3(dkon brtsegs): @##/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ go cha bgod pa
101b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po// // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
101b5(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka'i gnas 'do ma'i tshal na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
101b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa sha stag dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang po brgya stong tshad
101b7(dkon brtsegs): med pas yongs su bkor cing / gus par rim gro dang bkur sti byas par gyur to// de tshe 'khor 'dus pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha'
101b8(dkon brtsegs): yas zhes bya ba 'dug par gyur pa de 'dug pa'i stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas gtsugs nas/ spyi bo btud
102a1(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tsom chud cig mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs
102a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la zhu rab 'tshal na/ thugs rjes snang bar mdzad cing bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha'
102a3(dkon brtsegs): yas kyis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// dpa' chen skyes bu chen po ste// 'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis// bdag ni sems can dag gi slad// the tsom chung zad
102a4(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba lags// seng ge'i gdan la ma bzhengs par// sku ni phyogs bcu kun tu khyab// tha dad smra ba thams cad gyis// gang yang bskul bar mi 'gyur ba// mkhyen pa'i
102a5(dkon brtsegs): gter ni mtha' mi mnga'/ stobs rnams kyang ni tshad ma mchis/ bcom ldan stobs ni re res kyang / 'jig rten ma lus sgol bar mdzod// thams cad mkhyen la rab gnas
102a6(dkon brtsegs): shing / stobs bcu la ni gang gnas pa/ mi 'jigs seng ge chen po ste// rgyal ba bla na med pa'i gtso// ma 'dres chos ni bcwo brgyad dag/ de bzhin gshegs la mnga' bas na/
102a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rnams ni gsal mdzad cing // mu stegs rnams ni pham par mdzad// chos rnams thams cad rab mkhyen pas// de slad mtha' med mchog ches bgyi//
102a8(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa mi mnga' 'dren pa la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// dri med mkhyen pa mtha' med pa// mkhyen pa mi g.yo rgya mtsho bzhin// mkhyen pa'i yul la thogs
102b1(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// bcom ldan legs par bsgoms pas na// lam la the tsom yod mi mnga'// bder gnas 'dren pa chen po la// bdag ni the tsom
102b2(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba lags// chu bo dag ni rab rgal zhing // mtshams sbyor 'ching ba longs bcad pa// gdug pa'i zug rngu 'byin pa la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// ma rig sgo nga'i
102b3(dkon brtsegs): bslabs bcom zhing // nyon mongs gdang ba nyer zhi ba// shin tu gsil bar rab gnas// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// 'jigs med ye shes bla med dang // ye shes
102b4(dkon brtsegs): chags pa thogs med par// chos kyi mtsho ni mkhyen pa rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon gsum brnyes// sangs rgyas yon tan tshad med pas// mngon gsum mkhyen
102b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su rdzogs// zag bcas thams cad zad 'gyur zhing // nyon mongs lta ba rab 'joms pa// bcom ldan yon tan tshad med pa// mang po dag ni rab tu bstsogs//
102b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab chos rje la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// bcom ldan mchog ni mkhyen pa yis// 'jig rten kun ni gsal bar mdzad// chos kyi snang ba ston mdzad
102b7(dkon brtsegs): pas// yon tan brgya mtsho mtha' mi mnga'// 'dren pa'i chos kyi 'od zer gyis// 'jig rten kun tu gsal bar mdzad// de slad 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyi/ chos kyi 'od
102b8(dkon brtsegs): zer snang ba lags// chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad mkhyen// spobs pa dag ni bla na med// brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab cing // rnam dag lta ba rab spangs pa// sangs
103a1(dkon brtsegs): trAs spyan ni mtha' med pas// mkhyen pa'i yul yang mthar mi mnga'// 'jig rten mtshungs med gtso bol// bdag ni the tsom pa ba lags// chos
103a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal thub pa chen po yis// sems can the tsom gcod par mdzad// 'dren pa la ni bdag zhu na// mos pa ci bzhin bkas bshad gsol// lha dang mi'i 'jig rten kun// thams
103a3(dkon brtsegs): cad bdag gir rab rtags na// de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs med pas// thams cad ma lus gsal bar mdzad// yon tan rnams la rang gnas shing // rgyan dang ldan
103a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye mched lags// bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyal// drang srong nang na gsal ba bo// dper na gang ri chen po ni// rin chen kun gyis bkod pa'i gnas// bcom
103a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan chos gadran bzhugs pa'i// bkod pa dag kyang de bzhin no// rab spangs brtson 'grus chen po yis// yid 'od sgra ni ston mdzad pas// sems cin gang dag thos 'gyur
103a6(dkon brtsegs): na// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam dag 'gyur// bcom ldan mi'i mchog lags pas// chos kyi snang ba ston par mdzad// de na sis can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin blo ni bye bar 'gyur/
103a7(dkon brtsegs): dus dang 'khor ni rang mkhyen cing // gang zag mkhyen pa 'dren pa yis// chos kyi snang bsngon mdzad pas// dus mkhyen pa'i blo ldan lags// tshangs skad 'artson 'grus chen po
103a8(dkon brtsegs): yis// rnam dag gsung ni bkas bshad gsol// char ches la bab ba ltar// chos kyi dzin gyis khyab par mdzod// bcom ldan 'khor 'dus nang bzhugs te// kun tu chos/
103b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi char ba nas// chos 'di la ni gang re ba// sems can rnams ni tshim par mdzod// mchog tu bde ba rang gnas pas// rgyal po ri rab ji lta bzhin// sems can rnams la/
103b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin mdzad cing // mang po rnams ni dga' bar mdzod// dpa' chen rkang gnyis gtso dag ni// spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas// sems can dag ni thams cad kyis/
103b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yang 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro// skyes bu chen po'i tshad ma mchis// 'khor 'dus 'thun par gyur pa dag/ thub pa che la brten nas ni// sangs rgyas spyod yul tshol ba
103b4(dkon brtsegs): lags// bdag ni sangs rgyas spyod yul la// gzhol ba'i slad du 'dir mchis ni// 'dron pa mkhyen pa thogs mi mnga'// ci'i slad du dbye mi mdzad// bdag ni de'i mos
103b5(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin// zhal du lhas twe zhu logs na// bcom ldan thugs rjes rab phye nas// the tsom rnams ni bshad du gsol// bla med chos ni thos 'gyur na// sems ni rab tu
103b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur// lus ni dga' bas khyab 'gyur nas// the tsom dra ba bcad par 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po bla med gtso// thams cad mkhyen pa 'jigs mi mnga'// thams
103b7(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa la// bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags// sangs rgyas chos ni thams cad la// the tsom chung zad yongs mi mnga'// rab btson 'dren pa chen po la// bdag
103b8(dkon brtsegs): ni the tsom zhu ba lags// bla med the tsom chad pa thob// chos la the tshom mi mnga' ba// yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// snang ba chen po dpa' med
104a1(dkon brtsegs): @dang // yon tan chen po dpag med dang // rnam dag mkhyen pa dpag med la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// brtson 'grus mkhyen pa dpag med dang /
104a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul mkhyen pa dpag med dang // phan 'dog mkhyen pa dpag med la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// bcom ldan mkhyen pa mtha' med kyang // mtha' dang mtha' med
104a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu spangs// the tsom thams cad spyod pa la// bdag ni the tsom zhu ba lags// bsam gyis mi khyad chos kyi rgyal// thugs rjes zhu ba gsan du gsol// snang bar mdzad na
104a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag zhu lags// thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol// thams cad mkhyen pa kya gtso// grags chen la ni zhu ba lags// gal te thugs rjes gnang 'gyur na// je tsom dra ba gcad du
104a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa// blo gros mtha' yas dang khyod kyis nga'i zhal du bltas/
104a6(dkon brtsegs): nas// sems rtse gcig tu gsol ba 'debs pa 'dis// de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba ci zhig zhu bar sems// gal te zhu ba yod na yang ngas bshad par bya'o// de skad ces/
104a7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal nas// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// blo gros mtha' yas khyod kyis ni// ngal ci zhig 'dri bar sems// de bzhin du ni zhus
104a8(dkon brtsegs): shig dang // ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya// khyod kyi ji skad dris pa bzhin// re re nas ni gsal phye nas// ji ltar mos dang 'dun pa bzhin// myur tu phye ste rab bshad do// ngas ni
104b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod la rang bshad kyis// thams cad the tsom med par byos// ji ltar khyod kyi 'dod pa bzhin// khyod kyi zhus dang 'tsham par bshad// deng khyod dus bzhin zhu bar gyis/
104b2(dkon brtsegs): dus dang don ni ji lta bzhin// dus bzhin du ni zhus pa'i phyir// ngas ni nges par rang bshad do// ji ltar khyod kyi mos pa bzhin// zhu ba dag ni zhus shig dang // ngas ni tham
104b3(dkon brtsegs): cad rjes mthun par// khyod la rab tu 'ashad par bya// deng khyod dus su zhus shig dang // ngas kyang dus bzhin bshad par bya// the tsom dra ba bcad pas na// the tsom med
104b4(dkon brtsegs): par thob par 'gyur// nga ni chos kyi rjes 'gyur bas// don ni mthar phyin thugs su cud// chos rnams thams cad dag la yang // the tsom med par brnyes pa yin nga ni chos
104b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad las// mngon sangs rgyas pas bsam dka' yin// sems can mos pa ji bzhin du// zhu ba dag ni ston par mdzad// da ni chos rnams thams cad la//
104b6(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa dag ni mi mnga' bas// dus bzhin du ni zhu ba la// myu ra ta bshad par mdzad pa yin// ngas ni dus bzhin rab bshad cing // the tsom dag ni mi mnga' bas// de'i
104b7(dkon brtsegs): mos pa ji lta bar// de'i the tsom gcod par mdzad// nga ni rtag tu dus rnams dang // 'khor 'dus pa'i bsam pa dang // sems can dag ni thams cad kyi// bsam
104b8(dkon brtsegs): pa tha dad mkhyen pa yin// rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi// 'dod pa dang ni 'dod med pa// so sor rab tu brtags nas ni// de dag gsal bar gzigs pa yin//
105a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te blo dang ldan pa rnams// legs pa nyid du smang byed na// nga yi dus dang sbyar nas ni// yang dag chos ston go bar mdzad// blo dang mi ldan de dag
105a2(dkon brtsegs): ni// gti mug dag gis rmongs dkrugs shing // de dag shes rab snang byed pas// yang dag chos la gus mi 'gyur// gal te gus pa med 'gyur na// yang dgra chos ni tshe
105a3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed// chos 'di thos par gyur kyang ni// snang ba chen po'i shes mi skye// gang zhig chos la mkhas gyur pa// chos la mos shing tshol bar byed// gal te chos 'di
105a4(dkon brtsegs): thos 'gyur na// rang snang ye shes thob par 'gyur// theg chen dag la mos pa ni// mi'i gtso bo tshol byed pas// rang snang ye shes thob par 'gyur// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyer
105a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes la// gzhol ba gang yin de dag ni// thos pas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// thogs med ye sa la mos dang // bsam gyis
105a6(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab gnyer ba dag/ des ni chos 'di thos 'gyur na// bla med ye shes thob par 'gyur// sems can dag ni la la shig/ byang chub snying po tshol ba dang // bla med 'khor
105a7(dkon brtsegs): lo bskor 'dod pa/ chos 'di thos nas dga' bar 'gyur// mos shing rab tu brtson pa dang // chos la gtso bor gang 'dzin pa// dri med chos ni thos 'gyur na// mos shing
105a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// gal te sems can la la dag/ legs par bsgrubs par mos 'gyur na// chos kyi 'od gzer snang ba yi// bla me de chos ni bstan par bya//
105b1(dkon brtsegs): khur lci rnams ni khyer ba dang / nan tan sgrub la gad mos pa// de ni chos 'di thos 'gyur na// dga' bas kun tu khyab par 'gyur// gang zhig rab tu mos pa yis// dge ba'i
105b2(dkon brtsegs): chos ni sems byed na// de la snying brtser bsam gzhag nas// rab tu phye nas bstan par bya// khyod las stsogs pa thugs brtse'i phyir// khyod kyis ji skad zhus pa bzhin// ngas
105b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang yang dag nges par ni// khyod kyi the tsom gcad par bya// ngas ni lo mang stong phrag du// thabs mkhas dag ni rab bsgoms shing / the tsom dag ni gsal bas na// khyod
105b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi mos pa rab tu mkhyen// gal te the tsom yod 'gyur na// ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar bgyis/ khyod la rab tu bstan pas na// the tsom rnams ni chad par bya// gal te theg
105b5(dkon brtsegs): tsom yod 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis// ji ltar mos pa bzhin du ni// ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya// gal te the tsom yod 'gyur na// ji ltar 'don
105b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin zhu bar gyis// nga ni chos la rab gnas pas// g.yos pa med par brnyes pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo
105b7(dkon brtsegs): gros mtha' yas kyi 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la// bdag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa las
105b8(dkon brtsegs): the tsom chung zad gcig mchis pa de zhu ba lags na/ ji ltar na skyes bu dam pa 'jigs pa spangs nas// yang dag par sems rtse gcig tu sems can rnams kyi slad du/
105b9(dkon brtsegs): bco ldan 'das
106a1(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po bgos nas go cha chen pos rab tu brgyan pa dang / mos pa chen po bskyed nas gus par bgyid pa dang / bag yod pa dang bcas pas theg pa che
106a2(dkon brtsegs): po 'di la 'tshal nas/ shin tu rnam par dag pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi shul mthon dman dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ba dang / mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
106a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i thibs pa rnams ma mchis par zug rngu sdug pa'i sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs pa'i g.yang sa ma mchis pa/ 'ching ba dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / bar chad
106a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa/ drang zhing gya gyu ma mchis pa/ de kho na nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi shul dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shul du zhugs nas/ lta ba'i thibs po rnams bcad nas
106a5(dkon brtsegs): dra ba thams cad dral ba dang / mun pa rnams bsal ba dang / sred pa'i mngon par zhen pa rnam spangs pa dang / 'du 'phrod rnams spangs pa'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par
106a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag don 'di'i slad du zhu bar
106a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba lags so// skyes bu dam pa ji lta bus go cha chen po ji lta bu bgos na/ go cha chen po bgos pa des theg pa chen po la 'tshal nas/ lam chen po 'dis gzhol zhin yang
106a8(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'jugs par 'gyur lag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi go cha bkod pa gang lags pa dang / lam la gnas pa dang //
106b1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa la gnas pa gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/ chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa la rab tu gnas pas ni/ chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i snang
106b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par 'gyur la/ chos kyi snang ba'i dbang gis ni go cha mi spongs par theg pa chen po la 'tshal nas/ nur ba ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / brjed nges pa ma mchis
106b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dbang po dang / rgyun chad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi stobs kyis myur tu chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la la gsal bar mkhas pa mngon par bsgrubs nas/ byang chub kyi snying
106b4(dkon brtsegs): por bgrod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams la yang dag par chos ston pa'i slad du/ sems can thams cad ji lta mos pa dang / ji ltar gzhol
106b5(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du 'khor ba las rnam par grol bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'dis sems can rnams la sman pa dang / bde bar gyi ba'i slad de//
106b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag don 'di zhu ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa
106b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad gzigs pa lags na/ chos gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par
106b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pa dang / ting 'dzin 'thob pa'i dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
107a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin/
107a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa dang / gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs shing / sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyi sman rab tu mkhyen pa lags pa/
107a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i slad du bdag zhu ba gsol ba lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyi tshigs su bshad de gsol pa/ byang chub
107a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi slad/ sangs rgyas chos don zab pa dag/ thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa po// rkang gnyis gtso la bdag zhu lags/ theg pa chen po
107a5(dkon brtsegs): rnal 'byor pas// ting 'dzin gang gis gzhol gyur pa// sems can rnams la sman slad du// deng bdag zhu ba gsol ba lags// ji ltar skyes bu dam pa yis/
107a6(dkon brtsegs): go cha dpag med dgos par 'gyur// de ltar go cha bgos nas kyang // ji ltar rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dun pa slong bar 'gyur// ji ltar de la sred par 'gyur//
107a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar brtson 'grus chen por 'gyur// ji ltar bag yod ldan par 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// theg chen 'di la gzhol bar bgyid// de la
107a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshal na ci bgyid pa// dngos po 'di yang bkas bshad gsol// ji ltar theg chen bteg nas ni// byang chub lam la gzhol 'gyur ba// 'jig rten 'dren pa'i
107b1(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje yis// myur tu bdag la bkas bshad gsol// ji ltar yang dag mnyam lam gyi// mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bar 'gyur// lta ba rnams kyi thibs po dag/
107b2(dkon brtsegs): gcod par bgyid pa skyo mi 'gyur// spyod yul dag ni thams cad las// ji ltar bgyis na 'da' bar 'gyur// ji ltar mnyam pa nyid dag gis// 'dod chags dra ba dral
107b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// ji ltar mun nag rab gsal nas// ye shes snang chen thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis// ji ltar bgyis na gzhol bar 'gyur// ji ltar
107b4(dkon brtsegs): so sor rang brtags pas// 'ching ba mang po spongs par 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// 'ching ba spangs nas bde bar gnas// ji ltar byang chub sems
107b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams// 'jigs pa che las 'da' bar 'gyur// chos kyi don la mkhas 'gyur nas// bla med la ni gzhol bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu'i// bdag
107b6(dkon brtsegs): med go cha bgo bar 'gyid// go cha de dag bgos nas kyang // theg chen la ni 'tshal bar bgyid// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// mnyam nyid lam la gzhol bar/
107b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// bdag gis deng 'dir zhus pa 'di// lnga bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol// byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur// go cha bkod pa thob 'gyur dang // bla
107b8(dkon brtsegs): med theg pa rab brgyan pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bshad gsol// lam 'di la ni gnas pa dang // lam 'di bkod pa gang lags dang // chos rnams la ni mkhas
108a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rnams dang // chos la mkhas pa'i snang ba dag
108a2(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bur ni rtogs 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// chos kyi snang ba de thob na// chos rnams thams cad
108a3(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// chos kyi snang ba thob 'gyur nas// go cha chen po mi spong zhing //
108a4(dkon brtsegs): de dbang gis gzhol 'gyur lags// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// theg chen 'di la 'tshal nas ni// brtson 'gras ldog par mi 'gyur zhing // de'i dbang gis
108a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhol 'gyur lags// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bsam pa dag ni rab brtan zhing // 'di ltar shes rab stobs dag gis// shin te dul ba thob 'gyur lag/
108a6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams kyis// tshul la mkhas pa po par 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po bsam mi 'khyab// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol// ji ltar
108a7(dkon brtsegs): myur ba kho nar ni// byang chub snying por bgrod 'gyur nas// su yang bkor bar mi 'gyur ba// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor 'gyur lags// ji ltar g.yo ba ma mchis pa// sngon gyi smor
108a8(dkon brtsegs): lam ji lta bzhin// sems can thams cad kun la ni// chos rnams yang dag ston 'gyur lags// chos rnams yang dag bstan pas na// 'khor ba las ni grol 'gyur lags// /
108b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bgyis na sems can rnams// gtan tu bde ba thob 'gyur lags// sems can rnams la sman slad du// 'jig rten 'dren la bdag zhu na// thams cad mkhyen gzigs pa/
108b2(dkon brtsegs): bos// thugs rjes bdag la bkas bshad gsol// chos ni gang dang gang dag gis// byang chub sems dpa' smin bgyid pa// chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad kyis// ting 'dzin phyag
108b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu mdzad du gsol// sangs rgyas chos la rab mos shing // byang chub che la gang lta ba// chos kyi sgra 'di thos 'gyur na// lus kun khyab par dga' bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das
108b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas bka' stsal pa// blo gros mtha' yas khyod sngon sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas pa/
108b5(dkon brtsegs): dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing yon tan gzhal du med pa bsags pas na// chos zab mo 'di la rab tu gdud pas mos par gyur pa dang // bsam pa brgya chen pos
108b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bzhus pa legs so// khyod legs par nyon la shin tu yid la gzung shig dang /
108b7(dkon brtsegs): ngas khyod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan mngon par bsgrungs pa dang // ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol ba/
108b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba yang dag par bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
109a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' chen po chen po gang bla na med pa
109a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/ go cha chen po bgos pa des sems can rnams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can rnams sbyin
109a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par dag pa la dgod go nA chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can rnams tshul khrims rnam par dag po la dgod pa'i phyir/ go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can/
109a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams bzod pa rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can rnams brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir/ go cha chen po bgo
109a5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// sems can rnams bsam gtan rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir// go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems na rnams shes rab rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i
109a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can rnams la phan bdag pa'i dngos po dang
109a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir/ go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug kyi nad kyi bsnyen po bya ba'i
109a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// yon tan chen po mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/ go cha chen po 'go bar bya'o// bla na med pa'i ye shes legs
109b1(dkon brtsegs): par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir// go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// sems can rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyab par bya ba'i phyir// go cha chen po
109b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes legs par yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu bstan par 'dod pa'i phyir// go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen
109b3(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor dang / bdud kyi phonya dang // bdud kyi las la gnas pa dang / lta ba rnams kyi thibs po dang / lam yang bar zhugs
109b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mu stegs can gyi bstan pa las rab tu byung ba thams cad dang / 'jig rten rgyang phan pa dang / mu stegs can dang mthun pa ji snyed pa dag dang / 'thab pa'i phyir go cha
109b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po bgo bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ de ltar go cha chen po 'go zhing / go cha mi spong bar brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas/ sems
109b6(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams thams cad du/ zhags te gzod pa la gnas nas/ 'jigs pa rnams spang te mi skrag mi dngangs mi g.yo mi 'khrugs par byas nas/ go cha dpag tu med
109b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag bgo bar bya'o// de 'di lta ste sems can thams cad yongs su skyo pa'i go cha dang / lta ba'i thibs po thams cad gcad pa'i go cha dang / bdud kyi dpung rnam par
109b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa'i go cha dang / shes rab yang dag par len pa'i go cha dang / tshogs dpag tu med pa las stsogs pa'i go cha dang / khur lci ba rnams sgrol ba'i go cha dang // mngon
110a1(dkon brtsegs): par yid ces pa la 'phel bar byed pa'i go cha dang / tshul khrims la gnas pa'i go cha dang / las kyi kun gzhi yongs su sbyong ba'i go cha dang / thams cad rnam
110a2(dkon brtsegs): par dag par byed pa'i stobs kyi gter gi go cha dang / thabs mkhas pa'i gter gi go cha dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad yongs su spongs pa'i go cha dang / ldog pa dang 'gye
110a3(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'i shes rab kyi go cha gang yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams go cha chen po de lta bu bgos nas/ 'khor ba'i 'tha' ji srid pa de'i
110a4(dkon brtsegs): bar du shin tu brtan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs g.yo ba mi spongs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
110a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis tshigs su gcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams// bsdu phyir go cha 'go bar bya// sems can rnams ni tshad med phyir//
110a6(dkon brtsegs): go cha bgos pa tshad med do// sbyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir// thams cad rab tu dga' byed// sems can kha ni phan gdags phyir// go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya//
110a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rnams par dag pa'i phyir// 'jig rten la ni phan 'dog byed// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// go cha 'di ni glo bar bya// gzod pa rnam par dag
110a8(dkon brtsegs): po'i phyir// dpa' zhing bde la gnas par byed// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya// brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa'i phyir// phyir
110b1(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog par snang bar byed// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// go cha 'di ni 'go bar du// bsam gtan rnam par dag pa'i phyir// spyod yul dag kyang de zhin
110b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya// shes rab rnam par dag pa'i phyir// zag med bla na med pa yin// sems can rnams la phan gdag
110b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir// go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya// sems can dag ni thams cad la// bde ba'i yo byad sbyin dgos pas// don de legs par shes bya'i phyir// go cha 'di ni dgo bar
110b4(dkon brtsegs): bya// byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams// phan pa'i dngos po bya dgos pas// bsdu ba rnam dag bzhi po yis// srid pa kun tu 'jug par byed// 'dod chag
110b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang gti mug nad// gnyen po dag ni bstan pa'i phyir// sems can la ni sman gtong bas// nad rnams rab tu sel bar byed// des na byang chub sems dpa'
110b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams// go cha legs par bgos nas ni// yon tan rnams kyi tshogs dag la// mkhas pa dpag med thob pa yin// sems can 'khor ba bsdug bsngal gyis//
110b7(dkon brtsegs): nyams thag shin tu bde bas// bdag gis yongasu skyabs snyam nas// go cha dpag med bgo bar bya// 'khor ba sdug bsngal tshad med nams// bdag gi rnam par
110b8(dkon brtsegs): grol snyam nas// sred lha'i dra bas klag dag/ thams cad yongs su bcad par bya// gang gis nyon mongs dri ba 'di// thams cad spyod par gang nus pa// brtan
111a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i brtson 'grus stobs dag gis// dpa' bo'i go cha bgos pa yin// sems can dag ni thams cad kun// bde ba'i lam la rab bkod cing //
111a2(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba dang // bla med bde bar dgod par bya// gang zhig brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs// go cha 'di ni bgo byed pa// bdud rnams thams cad
111a3(dkon brtsegs): dag dang ni// rtag tu mtha' kyang ngal mi 'gyur// gang zhig lha la rab gnas nas// thibs po dag tu gang zhugs dang // 'jig rten rgyang phan pa dag la// go cha
111a4(dkon brtsegs): bgos nas pan bdags bya// bzhan yang 'khor ni tshad med pa// lam gol dag tu zhugs pa rnams// de dag la ni phan bdags phyir// go cha dpag med bgo bar
111a5(dkon brtsegs): bya// de ltar go cha bgos nas ni// go cha chen po mi spong bar// brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs bskyed na// go bgos rab brtags khyad par 'phags// sems can
111a6(dkon brtsegs): khams la rab bzhugasA tre// bzod pa ni gnas 'gyur nas// brtan pa'i bzod pa sgrub pa byed pa// go bgos gong na med pa yin// 'jigs pa dag ni rab spangs
111a7(dkon brtsegs): shing // sgrags pa dag ni med par yang // go cha dpag med 'gos nas ni// rngams cad rab brtson 'grub par bya// gang zhig go cha rab gnas pa// rtag tu yang
111a8(dkon brtsegs): dag rtogs 'gyur cing // rang dben g.yo ba pAs na// mi 'khrugs ldogs par mi 'gyur ro// de lha'i go cha rang bgos nas// blo dang ldan pas gzhan yang ni// seMs
111b1(dkon brtsegs): can skyong ba'i go dgos te// bdud kyi go cha bzhom par bya// yon tan dpag med go cha dag/ thams cad rab tu 'go bar bya// dpa' bo shes mchog gang zag gi/
111b2(dkon brtsegs): bgos nas bde ba thob par 'gyur// khur lci rab tu spang pa'i phyir// bla nA med go chu bgos nas ni// sems can thams cad yongs bzlas nas// sdug bsngal
111b3(dkon brtsegs): khur las langs par bya// rnam dag dad pa 'phel byed cing // dbang po drug ni rang bsdom pa// tshul khrims dag dang ldan pa ni// go bgos gong na med pa yin//
111b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo ye shes bsgrub pa la// byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas pas// khyod la tshul khrims ldan pas na// go dgos g.yo ba med pa yin// sngon gyi rgyal ba mang
111b5(dkon brtsegs): po las// rnam dag las ni bsgrub pas na// de phyir go cha rang bgos nas// rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa yin// sems can lnga ni sred pa'i blos// 'jig rten
111b6(dkon brtsegs): la ni phan 'dog pa// thabs ni rib tu rtogs pas nA// go bla gos legs par gnas pa yin// thabs mkhas ye shes gang yin pa// byangang chub sems
111b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rang rtogs pas// de ltar go tshe bgos nas ni// 'ching ba'i mtha' dag gcod par byed// mngon zhen thams cad rab spong zhing // yid ces rgyab la/
111b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi phyogs pa// go bgos blo dang ldan pa ni// bla med byang chub bgrod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' nges par ni// bdag dang bzhin la phan
111b9(dkon brtsegs): 'dog gang // brtson 'grus bstobs la rab gnas pas// brten zhing phyir ldog mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa'
112a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams bskal pa tshad med pa nas khur chen po khyer zhing go cha chen po bgos pa'i go cha de lta bu de ni/ bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor
112a2(dkon brtsegs): ram bdud kyi pho nya'am/ log par lta ba'i thibs po dgon gdung ma rung bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs
112a3(dkon brtsegs): med cing bstan du med pa dang / bldog pa med cing mtshan mo med pa dang / mtshan pa spangs nas mtshan ma dang bral ba dang / ming dang yi ge med pa'i phyir ro// blo gros
112a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas gal te la la zhig/ 'di'i tshad ri rab tsam sha stag 'phangs na yang phog par mi 'gyur la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sems can ji snyed pa thams
112a5(dkon brtsegs): cad bdud kyi rgyal por 'gyur la/ re re la yang bdud kyi dmag rnam pa sna tshogs 'khor dang bcas par gyur pa de dag dus gcig tu mda' rnon po'i tshad ri rab tsam
112a6(dkon brtsegs): sha stag 'phangs na yang nams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i go cha bgos pa la rnam par gzhig pa 'am/ tha na spu nyag ma gcig tsam yang nyam
112a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed mi nus te/ byang chub ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sems kyis kyang tha dad pa'i 'du shes bskyed par mi nus la/ lus kyis gnod par bya ba lta smos
112a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang ci dgos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems rtse gcig tu de dag 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni bdud mang po pham par byed cing / nye ba
112b1(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar yang byed la/ go cha de lta bu na gnas shing g.yo ba med pas sems can thams cad kyis kyang rnam par 'jig par byed mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mtshan ma
112b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir dang / sems can rnams kyi lta bar bya ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi mthong zhing shes par mi nus so// byang chub sems
112b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du go cha chen po bgos pa de dag shes shing mthong ngo // sems
112b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do// sems can rnams le phan gdags pa'i phyir/ chos rnams thams
112b5(dkon brtsegs): cad la yang dmigs par mi byed de/ de lta bas na sems can rnams kyi mthong zhing shes par mi nus so// go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag la ni kha dog gi mtshan ma med cing bstan
112b6(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dang / tshigs gis brjod pa med pa'i phyir gzugs dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang yang
