193a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa des/ chos zab mo 'di la nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya zhing bag yod pa dang ldan par bya'o// gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas ngas mngon par dran te/ sngon 'das pa'i
193a6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
193a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bya kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi 'od las yang dag par 'das
193a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste// bskal po'i ming ni dge ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ni yid dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o// bskal pa de'i
193b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams tshe ring zhing tshe'i tshad med pa dang / rab tu bde zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos lnga rab tu gnas pas de'i phyir bskal pa de'i ming dge ba la gnas
193b2(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yangs shing rgya che ba dang / shin tu mdzes pas mthong ba rnams yid bde zhing dge bar byed pa dang / spos kyi ngad ldang bas kun tu khyad par
193b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyis khabs de yid dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o// de'i tshe gling bzhi pa las gling gsum gyis tshad mnyam ste/ dpag tshad brgyad khri brgyad khri
193b4(dkon brtsegs): yod do// gling ri ri na yang grong khyer nyi khri nyi khri yod do// grong khyer re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad bcu bcu yod do// 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad ni dpag tshad byed pa yod do//
193b5(dkon brtsegs): den grong khyer brgyad khri yod de/ grong khyer re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad nyi shu nyi shu yod de/ de dag kyang gzhal med khang rtse ga ma dang / rabs 'khor bar bskor ba/ gos sna tshogs
193b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dang / ro sna tshogs 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che'i shing ta la dag gis rab tu brgyan pa/ yul bde zhing
193b7(dkon brtsegs): mis rab tu gang bar gyur to// de na grong khyer mchog tu che ba dpag tshad brgyas 'khor ba yod de/ de yang skyed mos tshal nyi khris bskor ba/ skyed mos tshal de kun tu yang 'bab chu dag
193b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'bad cing me tog dang / 'bras bu dag rang tu byas pa/ spos mchog dam pa'i ngad ldang bas yid dga' bar byed pa/ bya dang ri dgas rnams sgra snyan pa 'byin pas
194a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gang 'a gyur to// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de sbed pos tshal de gcig tu bzhugs nas/ 'khor rnams la chos bstan par gyur to//
194a2(dkon brtsegs): blo gros mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi 'od las yang dag par 'das pa'i rgyal po de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa chung ngu bcu thub par gyur to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
194a3(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu yang dag pa'i chos ni bskal pa chung ngu cig gi bar du 'jig rten du gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs des 'khor 'dus pa lan bzhir chos bshad de/ 'khor 'dus pa re re la
194a4(dkon brtsegs): yang nyan thos slob pa'i sa la gnas pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga yod do// dgra bcom pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga bcu lnga bcu yod do// de'i tshe de bzhin
194a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni dpa' bo'i sde zhes bya'o// gcig gi ming ni dpa' bo'i stobs shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis
194a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhin mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos ji lta bu zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'
194a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des tshig gi rnam grang
194a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan pan/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos kyi 'dod 'thob par 'gyur to// byang chung
194b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de gnyis ni chos kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par gyur to// chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams
194b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon tu gyur pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan pa dang / 'od gzer chen po bkye ba dang / tshangs
194b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra shin tu gya nom pa bsgrags nas/ sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i chos ston cing yongs su smin par bya bas srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
194b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skad du khyed bskal pa rgya 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
194b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga brgya la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dus bar mar
194b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i chos yang dag pa gang yin pa dang / dadus tha mar gsungs pa'i chos yang dag par gang yin pa de dag kyang ma lus par yongs su gzung nas sems can rnams la phan
194b7(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro// bskal pa re re la yang sems rtse gcig tu gyur cing / rnam par g.yeng ba med pas skye ba thams cad du yang rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba thams cad
194b8(dkon brtsegs): du yang ting nge 'dzin las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / rdzu 'phrul gyi chos ston pas/ sems can mang po rnams yongs su zlos par 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgya 'das nas gzhan la
195a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes byung la mchod pa dang / rims mgro byas pas ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par bar 'tsha
195a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa rnams la rnam par brtson par 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dang phrad par gyur pa'i tshe/ gcig gi ming ni mya ngan med
195a3(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'o// gcig gi ming ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rjes su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams bdul
195a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ theg pa gsum po dag la rab tu bkod pas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang 'di skad du/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ mya ngan med pa 'di bla na med
195a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs
195a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gnas pa 'di/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te// de bzhin gshegs
195a7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'od gzer khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa re re thub par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang
195a8(dkon brtsegs): yon tan tshad med pa bstsags pa las mngon par grub pa yin no zhes lung bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lngar lung bstan pa thos
195b1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ rims kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po gang chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'dod pas rab tu dga' ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas lus dang srog la 'phangs pa med pa dang /
195b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag yongs pas mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don gyi blo gros ces bya ba 'dus par
195b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de 'dug pa'i bstan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
195b5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi ye shes la thabs mkhas pa thob par bgyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i
195b6(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar che lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob par gyur na/
195b7(dkon brtsegs): gdon mi 'tshal bas chos rnams kyi tshul pa thabs mkhas pa thob nas/ myur du byang chub kyi snying por 'chi bar 'gyur bas/ yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu ma mchis pa
195b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chung la rab tu gzhol bar bgyid pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas rnam pa mthong zhing na tan gyis chos yang dag par bsrub
196a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dge 'dun dang spyod pa mtshungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa chen po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang /
196a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don gyi blo gros la 'di skad ces
196a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du/ don gyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi rgya mtsho'i
196a4(dkon brtsegs): phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par gyur na/ yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa tshad med pa rnams rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting
196a5(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par na/ chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la thabs mkhas pas gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
196a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro// don gyi blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni rin po che sna tshogs las mngon par grub pas rgya mtsho chen po las dpag tshad brgyad khri
196a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi stong gis gyen du 'phags shing mchog tu gsal bar gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du/ ting nge 'dzin 'dis legs par
196a8(dkon brtsegs): gzhol bar byed pa'i phyir/ chos kyi gter gyi rgya mtsho chen po thams cad las mngon par 'phags nas/ lnga dang mir bcas pa'i 'ji tshig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon
196b1(dkon brtsegs): cing bla na med pa'i gnas pas/ mchog tu gsal bar gnas so// gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni skar mi tshogs mang pos yongs su bskor ba yin no//
196b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du lnga dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad du rab tu gsal bar gnas so// don gyi blo gros khyod
196b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos 'di thos par gyur na/ 'di la su 'ang mi dga' zhing mos po mi skye bas/ brtson 'grus mi bskyed pa 'am/ bag yod pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med par blta bar
196b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ sems can bsod nams chung zhing dman pa la mos mi gtogs so// sems can gang shes rab chen po dang ldan pa dag gis ni chos rgya chen po 'di mngon par bslab par
196b5(dkon brtsegs): byed la/ chos rgya chen po mngon par bsgrub pa gang yin pa de dag ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar gyur to// ngas ji skad du gang
196b6(dkon brtsegs): gis chos kyi nor rgya chen po 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni lnga dang mi rnams kyis yongs su gzung zhing / rim mgro byed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang
196b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su dgongs par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa lta bu'o// de nas babacom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rje
196b8(dkon brtsegs): gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros mnga' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyis bslab
197a1(dkon brtsegs): cing slob par byed pa de dag ni sems can rnams la phan pa chen po byed cing / the tsom thams cad rab tu sel ba dang / mdud pa thams cad rab
197a2(dkon brtsegs): tu dgrol ba dang / bag chags rnams spong ba dang / bag la nyal ba rnams gcod pa dang / srid pa'i dga' ba rnams las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho las
197a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rgal ba dang / mun gnag rnams gtan tu bsal ba dang / skags cing 'jigs pa rnams rab tu spong ba dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi
197a4(dkon brtsegs): sems rab tu shes par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'od gzer chen po bkye ba dang / 'od gzer des 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
197a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa bsal bar mdzad cing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od gzer thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan to// 'od gzer bkye nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
197a6(dkon brtsegs): po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di
197a7(dkon brtsegs): nan tan gyis bsgrub par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po rab tu ston cing / 'od gzer chen po 'gyed pa dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags nas/ chos 'di
197a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bstan par byed pas/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das shing snang ba chen po byed par 'gyur te/ de dang ji lta ba bzhin pas bye brag tu gyur pa ci yang
197b1(dkon brtsegs): med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
197b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs nas/ slad ming dus kyi tshe sems can gang dag chos kyi rnams grangs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang
197b3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa thob par brdzi bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ yang 'od gzer chen
197b4(dkon brtsegs): bo rab tu brtse'o// gzhan srung byug sor gcig gis stong gsum gyi spong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams rab tu g.yo bar mdzad pas/ sems can rnams rab tu bde
197b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po thob par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
197b6(dkon brtsegs): la stsogs pa'i 'khor rnams lha'i me tog dam pa dang / lha'i gos dam pa dag gis mngon par gtor nas dus gcig tu lha'i rol mo rnams byas so// lha tshad med pa rnams kyis
197b7(dkon brtsegs): kAng lnga'i gos rgyab nas mngon par gtor bas/ na mkha' kun tu gang bar gyur te/ skad mthun par 'di skad du/ kye ma sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ne bas kyis mi khyab bo// gang
197b8(dkon brtsegs): gis chos zab mo 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni seMs can thams cad kyis gus par mchod cing phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur bar rig par bya'o zhes smras so// de nas
198a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mnga' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros
198a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang bsod nams chung ba'i sems can de dag gis ni go cha bkod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi bkod pa thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ sems can gang
198a3(dkon brtsegs): thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa tshogs chen po yongs su bsdud pa gang yin pa de dag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ chos 'di thos par 'gyur ro// chos 'di la gang gis nan tan
198a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par byed pa de dag ni/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// blo gros mtha' yas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jigs
198a5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe/ nga yis chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di khyod la stsogs pa la yongs su gtad do// ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa nas/ bla na med
198a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos kyi gter rab tu bstsags pas/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i bde ba thob pa gang yin pa de dag khyod kyis kyang thob par 'gyur gyis/ sdug
198a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal gyi phung po thams cad khyod kyis rab tu spangs te/ yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu med pas/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o//
198a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang // khyim bdag ma smad pa dang / tshong dpon bzang
198b1(dkon brtsegs): skyongs la stsogs pas gtso bor gyur pa rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams mthu ci mchis
198b2(dkon brtsegs): pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub chen po'i chos yongs su gzungs nas slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can rnams la phan gdags par bgyi'o zhes gsol to// de nas
198b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dug pa'i bstan las langs te/ me tog rnams pa sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas/
198b4(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi gos mchog dam pa phud de/ mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di ni sems can thams cad la yongs su
198b5(dkon brtsegs): sngo ste/ sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub
198b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba smon lam 'debs pa lags so// de skad/
198b7(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol ba dang / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal
198b8(dkon brtsegs): pa// sems can thams cad kun la ni// phan pa chen po bya ba'i phyir// nga'i byang chub chos bzung nas// chos rgyal seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing // ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe//
199a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig 'di yongs su tshol ba// rgya chen chos 'di thos gyur na// thams cad bde ba thob par 'gyur// ngas ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin// gang /
199a2(dkon brtsegs): gis theg pa 'di mthong zhing // mdo sde chos 'di thos gyur na// ji ltar mos pa'i bde ba thob/ blo dang ldan pa gang zhig gis// thabs mkhas dag ni rab bsgoms te// chos
199a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog 'di ni thos gyur na// lus dang sems ni rab bder 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor 'dir 'dus 'gyur ba// gang yis mngon sum bshad mthong dang // chos 'di thos par
199a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas ni// rab tu dga' ba gang bskyed pa// ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// khyod kyis bsod namos tshad med pa'i// phung po dag ni rab bskyed cing // 'khor ba dpag med
199a5(dkon brtsegs): lA sgrol bar 'gyur// ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe// chos rje rab tu gsungs pa yi// chos 'di gang zhig 'dzin byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsung bar 'gyur// ma 'ongs
199a6(dkon brtsegs): tha ma dus kyi tshe// nga yi byang chub chos 'dzin pa// de ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i// tha ma dus kyi chos 'dzin 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'di bstan na// byang chu
199a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed mi skye ba'i chos kyi gzod pa thob par gyur to// sems can tshad med pa snyed ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
199a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
199b1(dkon brtsegs): lga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa pa mngon par bstod do//
199b2(dkon brtsegs): pags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// go cha bkod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa bdun pa rdzogs
199b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya d+harma du pra ki ti a sam b+he da ni/ ra de sha na ma ma hA yA na su tra// bod skad du// 'phags pa dkon
199b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs lo'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sang
199b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
199b6(dkon brtsegs): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sos dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/
199b7(dkon brtsegs): dri nyis stong dang / lha'i bu thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sum khri nyid stong dang thams gcig tu bzhug so//
200a1(dkon brtsegs): @de'i tshe na lajas dpal bzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya ba yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de nas
200a2(dkon brtsegs): wa'i bu rin cen mchog 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos bstan par bskul ba mdzad do// bskul nas kyang bshad
200a3(dkon brtsegs): kha ci nas kyang bdud kyi gnas thams cad sba bkong bar 'gyung dang / bdud sdig can yi chad par 'gyur ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ba
200a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can thams cad nga rgyal med cing shes pa brda' spyod par 'gyur ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dag 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'bras bu thob pa
200a5(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ skye bo mang po dag kyang byang chub sems bskyed par
200a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs med par bsgrub pa'i byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhug
200a7(dkon brtsegs): sam/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ chos bstan pa de gang dag gis thos par gyur pa de dag theg pa gang la mos pas myur du yongs su bya ngan las
200a8(dkon brtsegs): 'da' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston na ci ma rubs mo/ de se bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu ring cin mchog gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa tsugs kyis mkhyen nas/ 'jam/
200b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon dur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jab dpal 'khor 'di khyod las chos mnyan pa thos par 'dod kyis 'khor 'di la gtam gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig la khyod spobs par gyis
200b2(dkon brtsegs): shig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci las brtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
200b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las rtsoms la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
200b4(dkon brtsegs): lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni brjod pa 'ang/ mnyan par chung zad kyang rngo mi thog lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
200b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin las brtsams te/ bstan par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstan pa 'di thos na/ gang zag mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dag
200b6(dkon brtsegs): ni skrag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag skrag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can lags pas na/
200b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni skrag par mi 'gyur lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan par sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
200b8(dkon brtsegs): dpal gal sde chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun nis nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med la/ rnam
201a1(dkon brtsegs): par byang bar 'gyur ba yang med na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba ci las 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam
201a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so sor skye bo 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i phyin ci log gis bslad cing / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yi 'dzin pa gnas pa
201a3(dkon brtsegs): la ni/ bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes 'byung ngo // bdag dang gzhan du 'dus shes pa la gnas pa de dag la ni/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag
201a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos de dag gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag mngon par 'du byed cing / de dag la rgyu de dang rkyen de dag
201a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / ngo bo nyid de'i rnam par smin pa nyid mngon par grub par 'gyur ro// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag gis ci tsam du srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba yongs su bzung ba de tsam du kun na
201a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pas/ kun naso// stongs pa nyid chos kyi dbyings
201a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin du yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba zhes bya ste/ don dam par ni de la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ gang kun nas
201a8(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ci yang med do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can
201b1(dkon brtsegs): brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
201b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jab dpal khyod kyis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i ngargyal can brgya len po med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol te/ 'jab dpal
201b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings ni khyod las byed par 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji mchos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin sngon bcings par gyur la dgrob
201b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhig yin sgyum 'am/ smras pa 'jam rnapal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni sngon bcings par gyur pa yang ma yin la/ dkrol ba yang ma yin no// smras pa btsun pa/
201b5(dkon brtsegs): ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na dge slong de dag gi sems ci zhig las rnam par grol// smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos mang po btul te// de dag gi sems ni len pa
201b6(dkon brtsegs): me par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// 'jam dpal gyi smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos yin nam// smras pa 'jam
201b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal de de bzhin te/ khro bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyen thos yin no// smras pa btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci khyod kyi sems len pa med par dag pa rnams las rnam par grol sam/
201b8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa 'jab dpas rnam par thol lo// sbas pa btsun pa shar dwa ti'i bu ci khyod kyi sems 'das pa rnam par grol lam/ 'od the ba 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rngam par thos
202a1(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems 'das pa ni/ zad pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/ sems ma 'ongs pa ni/ ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ sems da ltar byung
202a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal sems 'das
202a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang rnam par grol ba ma yin la/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de gang
202a4(dkon brtsegs): yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pas sems rnam par grol bar bstan pa zad kyi/ don dam par ni 'di la gang bcings pa 'am/ grol ba'i sems dmig
202a5(dkon brtsegs): su med do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la kun rdzob dang / don dam pa yod par 'dod dam/ smras pa 'jam dpal chos
202a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings kyi rang la ni kun rdzob dang / don dam pa dmigs su med do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra da ti'i bu 'o na// ji ltar kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pas sems
202a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol bar ston spras pa 'jab dpal napa yang sems rnam par dgrol ba ci yang med dem// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te/ sems shig nang
202a8(dkon brtsegs): dam phyi rol lam/ gnyis gi bar na dmigs su yod na ni/ sems rnam par grol bar yang 'gyur ba zhig na/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems ni dang ngam phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga med/
202b1(dkon brtsegs): bar dmigs su med pas de la bcings pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba ci yang med do// de nas 'khor de las dge slong nyis rgyas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos pa dang /
202b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan las langs te/ dor dang tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ gal te 'di la su yang rnam par grol ba med cing / su yang rnam par mi grol na/ 'u bu cag gi rab tu 'byung zhing
202b3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po la don ci yod/ gal te nges par 'byung ba ci yang med na/ lam bsgom pa la don ci yod/ ces da ltar dge slong de dag smod cing yid
202b4(dkon brtsegs): chad das 'khor de nas dong ngo // de nas 'jam dpal bzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag 'dul ba'i dbang rig nas/ lam gang nas dge slong de dag dong ba'i lam de'i mdun tu sprul
202b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dge slong zhig sprul to// de nas dge slong de dag sprul pa'i dge slong de ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas sprul pa'i dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa
202b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod ga las 'ongs/ de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la 'di skad smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa'i chos ston pa la ma zhugs/
202b7(dkon brtsegs): ma shes ma mos yid ma ches nas kho bo 'khor de nas song ngo // de nas dge slong nyis brgya po de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo cag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho
202b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la ma zhugs/ ma shes ma mo sa yid pa ches nas kho bo cag 'khor de nas dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong nyis brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe
203a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dag gis 'jam dpal bzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la mi mthun pa ci zhig thos na/ khyed cag 'khor de nas dong / de dag
203a2(dkon brtsegs): gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'jam dpal bzhon nur gyur pa ni 'di la su la'ang thob pa med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam par grol ba med par ston pas/ kho bo cag 'di snyam
203a3(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/ gal te 'di la su yang thob pa med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam par grol ba med na/ 'ubru cag gi rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po la
203a4(dkon brtsegs): don ci yod/ 'u bu cag gi tshangs par spyod pa la gnas la ba don ci yod/ gal te 'di la nges par 'byung ba ci yang med na/ lam bsgoms pa la don ci yod snyam du bsam nas kho
203a5(dkon brtsegs): bo cag 'khor de nas dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed cag ma mos nas dong bar zad dam/ 'on te spang
203a6(dkon brtsegs): shing mi snyan pa brjod nas dong / de dag gis smras pa kho bo cag ni ma mos nas dong bar zad kyi/ kho bo cag gis spangs pa yang med la/ mi snyan par brjod pa yang med do// de nas
203a7(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la legs so// zhes bya ba byin nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag brtsod pa med pa ni/ dge sbyong gi chos kyi mchog yin/
203a8(dkon brtsegs): bas/ mi snyan par brjod pa mi bya/ brtsad par mi bya ba'i ri shig rje 'gro bar bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci sems 'di sngon po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ ser po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ dpar
203b1(dkon brtsegs): kho zhes bya ba zhig gam/ dkar po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ btsod ka zhes bya ba zhig gam/ shel gyi kha dog lta bu zhes bya ba zhig gam/ yang dag pa zhes bya zhig gam/ yang dag ma yin/
203b2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ rtag pa zhes bya ba zhig gapa/ mi rtag ces bya ba zhig gam/ gzugs can zhes bya ba zhig gam/ gzugs can ma yin pa zhes bya ba zhig gapa zhes rtogs shig/
203b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sems ni gzugs can pa yin pa bstan tu med pa snang ba med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ gnas med pa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o// de nas
203b4(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci gzugs can ma yin pa bstan tu med pa/ bsdang ba med pa/ thog pa med pa/ gnas med
203b5(dkon brtsegs): ga rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i sems de nang na gnas so zhes bya ba'am// phyi rol na gnas so zhes bya ba'am/ gnyi ga'i bar na gnas so zhes bya bar dmigs su yod snyam
203b6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te sems te gzugs can ma yin bstan tu med snang ba med/ thogs pa med gnas med/ rnam par rig byed
203b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyi ga med par yang dmigs su med na/ ci de la yang dag par yongs su grub pa yod snyam 'am/ de dag gis smras pa/
203b8(dkon brtsegs): de ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag gang yang dag pa ma yin zhing / yongs su grub pa ma yin pa de la ni ci rnam par grol ba yod snyam 'am/ de dag gis smras pa de ni sa
204a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag des bsams nas 'das dpas bzhodan dur gyur pas 'di skad du/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun nas/
204a2(dkon brtsegs): nyod mongs par 'gyur ba yang med la/ rnam par byed bar 'gyur ba yang med do zhes bskrad do// tshe dang ldan pa dag yang byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci logs gris smad pa rnams la ni
204a3(dkon brtsegs): ngar 'dzid pa dang / nga'ir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzid pa 'byung ngo // ngar 'dzin pang yir 'dzin pa la gnas te/ rtag tu yul rnams la spyod cing gnas pa de dag la ni dmigs pa
204a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i sems 'byung ste/ dmigs pa zad na zad par 'gyur la/ byang nas zhig cing zhu ste gnas pa med do// sems kyi dmigs pa gang gis rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par
204a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ba dang / lam bsgom par byed pa'i sems de ni rang bzhin byed pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / byung ba ma yin pa'o// med
204a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang yang dag par ma yin pa dang / byung ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de la ni skye ba yang med 'jigs pa yang med/ gnas pa yang med do// gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'jig
204a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa de la ni bcings pa yang med/ rnam par grol ba yang med do// de la ni thob pa yang med do// mngon par rtogs pa yang med de/ tshe dang
204a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag de las bsams nas/ 'jam dpal bzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad du chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med/
204b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang med de/ 'di la ni su la yang thob pa med mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam par grol ba med do zhes smras so// de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des
204b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa rA/ dge slong de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de dag sems rnam par grol nas/ 'jam dpal bzhon nur gyur
204b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / rang rang gi blagos 'jab dpal bzhon nur gyur pa la mngon par bka' nas/ tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so// 'jab dpal khyod kyis
204b4(dkon brtsegs): ni kho cag yongs su bskyabs so// 'di ltar kho bo cag kyang dram pa'i chos spongs par ma zhugs pas/ da phyin cad chos 'dul ba zab po la 'jug pa las phyi rol du gyur pa
204b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig thob cing ci zhig mngon par rtogs na/ rang rang
204b6(dkon brtsegs): gi bla gros 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon par bkab/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo cag gis ni ci yang thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pa
204b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir kho bo cag gis rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon par bkar po// btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe kho bo chag la thob pa'i 'du shes yod par
204b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba de'i tshe ni 'obo cag sman las sangs te 'khor de nas dong ngo // gang gi che kho bo tshag pob pa'i 'du shes de dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ slar lpags so// rang 'byor
205a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyod ci las bsam te de skad smra/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor thob pa zhes bya ba de ni g.yo
205a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de ni rlob sems yin te/ gang la g.yo ba yod pa dang / rlom sems yod pa de la ni// thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med do// btsud pa rab 'byor gang la
205a3(dkon brtsegs): thob pa med pa de ni/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed bcas sus btul/ de dag gis smras
205a4(dkon brtsegs): cing mngon pa
205a5(dkon brtsegs): ga btsun pa rab 'byor gang thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa dang / gang skye ba med pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa dang / gang mnyam par bzhag
205a6(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa dang / sems par g.yongs pa med pa des btul to// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed cag btul ba yin nam/ de dag gis smras pa 'jam dpal bzhon nur gyur pa
205a7(dkon brtsegs): pe la dris shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'jam dpal bzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag su sa btul/ 'jam dpal gyis
205a8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang la phung po rnams med pa dang / khams rnams med pa dang / skye mched rnams med pa dang / gang so so'i skye bo ma yin pa dang / slob
205a9(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin pa dang / mi slob pa ma yin pa dang / nyan thos ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang / gang lus dang ldan pa ma
205b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / ngag dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa dang / bral ba ma yin pa des btul to// smras pa 'jam dpa
205b2(dkon brtsegs): de ston pa de su/ 'jab dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo ji skam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa zhig sprul na/ de mtshungs par ldan pa yin snyam
205b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ smras pa de ni 'jam dpal de ni chos gang dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin no// 'jab dpal gyis sbas pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo ci chos par
205b4(dkon brtsegs): cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid yin nas/ smras pa 'jam dpal/ de de bzhin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' 'o// dge slong 'di dag ni sprul pas btul ba yin/
205b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ sprul pa'i 'dul ba ci 'dra bar nyan thos thams cad kyi 'dul ba yang de 'dra'o// btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag de ltar btul ba de dag ni/ yang dag par btul ba yi no//
205b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag chos 'dul ba 'di la mos par mi byed pa de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'jam dpal bzhon nur gyur pa la 'di
205b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di la tshul khrims kyi phung po
205b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pas/ yongs su dag par brlom sems su byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin dang kau shes rab dang / rnam par spong ba dang /
206a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par rlom sems su byed pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can da shes par bya'o// /
206a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thob bo// bdag gis mngon sum du byas so snyam du sems shing rlob sems su byed pa dang / yongs su rtog par byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o//
206a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig tshogs la lta bas skrag cing bgrod pa cig pa'i lam gyi ro myang bar byed pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid gang gis 'jig tshogs
206a4(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba stong pa nyid des bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam yang stong pa'i phyir te/ stong pa de lta bu la stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par mi 'jug pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o//
206a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang de slong gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid de la stong pa
206a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis mnyam par byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang
206a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ma yin te/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba nyid stong pa nyid yin pa dang / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ lam yang gzhan pa yin te/ lam nyid stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyiraro//
206a8(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong gang ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i srid pas 'jigs shing ma rig pa las rnam par grol ba'i ro myang bar byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can
206b1(dkon brtsegs): du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir she na/ gang la gnyis su 'du shes 'jug pa de ni rnam grol ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong gang 'dod chags
206b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis skrag cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag gi ro byang bar byed pa dang / phyir ci log bzhis skrag cing / 'du shes bzhi'i ro byang
206b3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed byed pa dang / sgrib pa lngas skrag cing dbang po lnga'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / skye mched drug gis skrag cing mngon par shes pa drug gi ro myang bar byed pa dang / rnam par shes
206b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas bdun gyis skrag cing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ro byang bar byed pa dang / log pa nyid brgyad kyis skrag cing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ro byang ba
206b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / 'dus byas kyi dngos po dgus skrag cing mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis skrag
206b6(dkon brtsegs): cing mi slob pa'i chos bcu'i ro byang bar byed pa dang / 'dus byas kyi khams kyis skrag cing / 'dus ma byas kyi khams dag gi ro myang bar byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can
206b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo de dag thabs cad ni g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / smre spros pa yin te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo ji tsa
206b8(dkon brtsegs): du g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / spros pa dang / sems mtho ba dang / dma' ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / spong ba dang / yongs su rtogs pa dang / rtend pa dang / lhag par zhen pa dang
207a1(dkon brtsegs): sgro 'dogs pa yod pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yin pa'i phyir te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo de lta bu'i dge slong ni lhag pa'i nga
207a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal tu shes par bya'o/ de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'dus byas kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang
207a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i stong pa dang stong pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid de mi 'jug pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'jam dpa
207a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang gi tshe
207a5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong nang nye bar zhi bas yul thams cad kyang nye bar zhi bar mthong zhing / mnyam zhes bya ba 'am/ mi mnyam zhes bya 'am/ rig pa zhes bya ba 'am/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'am/
207a6(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas shes bya ba 'am/ 'das ma byas shes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par
207a7(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/ gnyis su 'byed par mi byed/ gcig tu sdud par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ 'dor bar mi byed/ 'phro bar mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed cing / chos thams
207a8(dkon brtsegs): cad yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong la/ mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pas mnam par bya ba 'am/
207b1(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam par bya ba'i chos gang yang med de/ mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing rlom sems su mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog
207b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed/ mngon par zhen par yang mi byed na/ thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtog pa 'am/ mngon par du bya bas rlom sems su bya ba lnga ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do//
207b3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa kun dga' bo de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing gnyen po med pa dang / phyogs med pa dang / rang gi phyogs dang / gzhan gyi phyogs dang bral ba dang / tshor
207b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rgyan gcad pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor ba med pa thams cad dang / dmigs pa dang / rnam par rtogs pa dang / yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /
207b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba med pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin te/ de ni ngar 'dzin pa dang bral bas chos gang la spangs pa dang / mngon par rtog
207b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ mngon gsum dbya ba yod pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar bzhugs pa'i dge slong ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// des ni na mkha'i khams
207b7(dkon brtsegs): mam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas na/ chos gang la yang dge ba zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dge ba zhes bya ba 'am/ khan ma thob bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/
207b8(dkon brtsegs): nam tho ba med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/
208a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas zhes bya ba 'am/ 'das ma byas zhes bya bar sgro 'dog par byed do// de ni sgro 'dog pa med pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed//
208a2(dkon brtsegs): rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ni chos thams cad sgro 'dog pa med par mnyam pa med par mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam
208a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing na mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid du rtog pa yin no// btsun pa kun dga' bo gang de ltar mos pa'i dge slong ni yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/ de ltar na lhag
208a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// de la dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du ji ltar na mkha' lag 'thil mi chags pa ltar/ dge slong gi chos kyang de bzhin no// /
208a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsungs so// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis/ 'jam
208a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal bzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yang dag pa'i shes pa brda' sprod par shes pa yin/
208a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems 'jig rten gsum po thams cad
208a8(dkon brtsegs): las khyad par 'phags pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems de nang na gnas pa yang mi mthong / phyi rol na yang ma yin/
208b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyis ka med par yang ma yin/ phyi rol kyi yul la rgyu zhing gnas par yang mi mthong la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsegs par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dang
208b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir yang rgyu zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sems de yang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la brjod par byed la/ sems
208b3(dkon brtsegs): de yang yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par 'gyur te dris nas/ sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyis ngo bo nyid rtogs la/ chos
208b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis ngo bo nyid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
208b5(dkon brtsegs): brda' sprod par byed pa de ni/ lha'i bya byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda' sprod pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gis tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin
208b6(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ gang gtong bar byed pa dang / gang gis gtong bar byed pa dang / gang la gtong bar byed pa dang / gang du gtong bar byed pa dang / gang du yongs su bsngo bar byed pa de dag shin tu
208b7(dkon brtsegs): gtod pas gtong bar byed cing rten par mi byed gnas par mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed/ re bar mi byed/ dmigs par mi byed la/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas/
208b8(dkon brtsegs): dris nas shin tu stong pa nyid dang / shin tu mi dmigs pa nyid dang / shin tu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag nyid gtong ba'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs shing / gtong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag pa'i
209a1(dkon brtsegs): / mnga'i ngo bo nyid rtogs la/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs te/ chos thams cad kyis ngo bo nyid kyis sems can thams
209a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi ngo bo nyid du rdzogs shing / sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis/ byang chub sems pa'i ngo bo nyid brdar sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes
209a3(dkon brtsegs): pa brda' sprod pa'i sbyin pas yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' lus nye bar zhi bas/ tshul khrims nye bar zhi bar rtogs te/ ngag nye
209a4(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi ba dang / sems nye bar zhi bar tshul khrims nye bar zhi bar rtogs shing / lus dang / ngag dang / sems nye bar zhi bas byang chub nye bar rtogs la/ byang chub nye bar zhi bas//
209a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can nye bar zhi bar rtogs te/ sems can nye bar zhi bas chos thams cad nye bar zhi bas rtogs shing / chos thams cad nye bar zhi bas/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
209a6(dkon brtsegs): bar zhi zhes bya bar rtogs te/ de yang dag pa'i mtha' nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi bya dang / nye ba zhi bar gyur pas/ dris nas chos thams cad nye bar zhi bar nyid du
209a7(dkon brtsegs): brda' sdod par byed cing / spu'i bu da ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brdar sprod pa/ tshul khrims kyis yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang
209a8(dkon brtsegs): nA gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu zab pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu skad cig pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu ya ma rA'i chos nyid du rig nas/ sems can thams cad kyi nyes par
209b1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa gang gzod cing / gang gi phyir nang gi sems kun nas mi spong bar bzod pa dang / gang gi khong khro bar 'gyur ba'i yid la byed pa phyi rol tu mi gtong zhing sems cad thams
209b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis nyes par byas pa bzod pa dang / sems can de dag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa dang / gzod pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub
209b3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin par rtogs shing / chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha
209b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid du rtogs te/ dris na shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu skad cig pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu ya ma rA'i chos nyid du rtogs pa'i/ rgyu ba med pa nyid kyis bzod
209b5(dkon brtsegs): pa brda' sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pad spyod pa/ bzod pas yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi
209b6(dkon brtsegs): che byang chub sems dpa' yid la byed pa thams cad kyis/ dben pa'i chos rtogs shing sgro 'dog pa med la btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas
209b7(dkon brtsegs): brtsams pa gang brtsom pa de dben pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang / de nang dben pa'i phyi rol tu rgyu ba med par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
209b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu zhing brtson 'grus dben pas sems can dben par rtogs pa dang / sems can dben pas byang chub dben par rtogs pa dang / byang chub dben pas chos thams cad
210a1(dkon brtsegs): dben par rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad dben par yang dag pa'i mtha' dben par rtogs pas dris nas/ brtson 'grus de dag nyid kyis rang
210a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du dben par brda' spyod par byed de// lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda' sprod pa brtson 'grus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu
210a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang gang gis tshe/ byang chub sems pas chos thams cad mnyam shing byed brag med par 'gyur par bsam gtan byed de/ bsam gtan de la sems gnas par
210a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug cing / gnas de la yang rnam par shes pa gnas par mi byed pa dang / des rnam par shes pa mi gnas shing sems mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid du
210a5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dang / bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rtog pa dang / byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtog par/
210a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rjes su rtogs pas/ de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa zhes bya bar rig la/ dris na rang bzhin
210a7(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin du/ mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du brda' sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes pa brda' sprod pa
210a8(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan gyis yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi mig gis rnam par sbyangs pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams
210b1(dkon brtsegs): cad mthong ste/ ji ltar chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar mthong zhing / gang gi tshe chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/ ci yang ma yin par
210b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de ci yang ma yin pa'i shes pa thob pas mi rgyu/ rab tu mi rgyu rnam par mi rgyu'o// des rgyu ba dang rab tu rgyu ba dang rnam par rgyub thams cad yang dag par rgyud bcad pas
210b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khor ro// rnab par mi 'khor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des gang gis 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i rab du rgyu ba de 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dang chags pa dang smod pa'i rgyud bcad pa'i phyir
210b4(dkon brtsegs): te/ de 'dod pa don du gnyer ba thams cad med par sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsdu ba dang / dpe chos yongs su
210b5(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ bsapa bzhin du skye ba rnams su rgyu bar byed de/ de ni rgyu ba med pa nyid kyis rgyu bar byed cing / chos rnams
210b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do// de ni de'i shes rab yin pas/ de shes rab gyi rang bzhin gyi byang chub ra' du shes pa dang / byang
210b7(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi rang bzhin dang / sems cadan gyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs shing / chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'
210b8(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin du rab tu shes te/ dris nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa de nyid brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa'i
211a1(dkon brtsegs): brda' sprod pa/ shes rab kyi mig gis yongs su dag pa yin no// lnga'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su
211a2(dkon brtsegs): lta zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas pa na/ de sngon gyi mtha'i lus ni ma skyes par rab tu shes so// phyi mi'i mtha'i lus la ni 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so// da ltar byu
211a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lus la ni rtsa dang shing dang rtsig pa dang bod pa dang mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid lta bur so sor rtog par byed de/ de de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas lus kyis ra/
211a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin skye ba med par rig nas/ lus kyi rnam par rig pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa kun nas slong bar mi byed do// yid la byed pa kun nas slong bar mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni/
211a5(dkon brtsegs): lhag par byed pa la mi gnas pa yin te// de lhag par byed pa dang bral zhing / rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom
211a6(dkon brtsegs): yang chos gang la yang bsgom par mi byed/ rnam par 'jig par mi byed do// des chos thams cad dngos po med par rig nas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ se
211a7(dkon brtsegs): can gang gis de ltar lus la lus gi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i sems de yang sgyu ma'i chos nyid dang brag cha'i chos nyid lta bur rab tu shes so// de ltar rab tu shes pas/ bde ba'i cho ga
211a8(dkon brtsegs): pa la yang rjes su chags pa med la/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la yang khong khro ba med cing sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la yang rmongs pa med pas/ ma rig
211b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bag la nyal bar mi 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe tshor ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa de ni/ de'i tshor ba rnam la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no// de de ltar tshor ba'i rjes su lta
211b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing gnas pa dang / chos thams cad la tshor ba'i rgyu dag gi sems kyi rgyu bas de chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi sems kyang spong bar mi byed/
211b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dor bar mi byed/ yongs su gtong bar mi byed de/ de ni de'i sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no// de chos shes pa mngon sum du gyur pas/ chos rnams la
211b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pas chos nyid la 'jug par byed cing / lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos rnams la 'du shes pa
211b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid la byed pa dang / lta ba dang / kun nas dkris pa dag gis gnas par mi byed de/ de ni de'i chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no// des chos
211b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma byung zhing / dngos po med pa dang / nam ka'i ngo bo nyid lta bur rtogs pas dris na/ dran pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pas/ dran pa nye
211b7(dkon brtsegs): ngar bzhag pa brdar sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda' sprod pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang
211b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa ni/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de la/ kun shes par byed/ rnam par rigs par byed/ gnas par byed/ mi spod par/
212a1(dkon brtsegs): byed/ rnam par mi g.yengs par byed/ mi brjed par byed/ dang por dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bog par 'gro ba dang / ser sna'i sems pa mi 'dus
212a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems spong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa med pa dang /
212a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing / brtsod pa med pa dang / lus dang ngag dang sems kyis rma mi 'byin pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus
212a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rtsom pa dang / theg pa chen po'i brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams yid la mi byed cing / mi dran pa dang / bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad
212a5(dkon brtsegs): kha mi gnas par sgoms pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad la mi rgyu ba dang / chos thams cad 'phro bar mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad la rnam pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems
212a6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi bsam pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa dang / yul rnams la mi ts+tsha ba dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa pa yin pa'i skye bo rnams dang
212a7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dres pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ma smad pa dang / bag yod pa lhur le cing sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang / bzang ba dadagos par dgos pa dngas
212a8(dkon brtsegs): cad nyams 'om du drud par byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / sdang dang gti sus spangs pas rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrim la spyod med pa'i phyir/ yongs su gdung ba med pa /
212b1(dkon brtsegs): log par zhugs pa rnams dang / ma 'brel ba dang / nang shin tu dag pas tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pas// khags ga med pa dang / rang ma
212b2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pas chog shes pas tshol ba med pa dang / 'tsho ba ngan pa rnam par spangs pas/ thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang / ngan don byam gyis chog shes pas rnam par g.yo ba med pa
212b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / khams gsum la 'dun pa bral bas/ 'dod pa chung ba dang / sdig pa 'dod pa dang bral bas chog shes pa dang / chos thams cad dben par mos pas dben pa dang /
212b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa spangs pas don nyud ba dang / spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcad pas spros pa med pa dang / 'dun pa dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti
212b5(dkon brtsegs): mug dang bral bas/ 'gro ba med pa dang / nga rgyal nges par bcom pas chos la dga' ba dang / sems shin tu dul bas cang shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po kun tu
212b6(dkon brtsegs): bsrung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung pos sems gnas pa med pa dang / shes rab kyis phung pos sems rnam par grol ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs mi 'dor ba dang /
212b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems la dam bcas pa mnyams pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur ki thams cad don tu mi gnyer ba dang / sems can pha rol dag gi ngor byed pa med pa dang /
212b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan kun tu bsrungs pa'i phyir bdag rjes su bsrung ba dang / rang gi sems la nges par sems pa dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa rnams mi tshol ba dang / tshul khrims
213a1(dkon brtsegs): / legs par bsdam pas 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pas chos kyi 'go ba shad byed pa dang /
213a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyis sems kyi spyod pa rnams rjes su bsrungs pa dang / dang por dge ba'i chos thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pas/
213a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa tha dad pa med pa dang / rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pas/ rlob sems med pa dang / skye ba med par yang so sor rtog la/ sems can yongs
213a4(dkon brtsegs): su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam bzhin du skye ba yang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas stong pa nyid du yang so sor rtog la/ lta ba thams cad gdul
213a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ sems can yongs su smin par yang byed pa dang / mtshan ma med pa yongs su 'dris par yang byed la// mtshan pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la yang //
213a6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / smon pa'i shes pa yang med la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir/ smon lam thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par 'du
213a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med par yang so sor rtog la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya bas kyang ngoms mi myong ba dang / dngos po ni dngos po med par snang bas dngos po dang dngos po med pa
213a8(dkon brtsegs): la rtog pa dang / lhag par byed pa dang dpral ba'i phyir/ yid la byed pa med pa dang / sems can bdag med pa la sbyor bas bdag la bdag med pa dang / nyon mongs pa yongasu
213b1(dkon brtsegs): btang ba dang / sems can yongs su ma gtang ba dang / ma gtang ba dang thabs dang shes rab bsgom pas ma zhi zhing zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
213b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ma 'dres pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'grong dang / bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pas/ lam ma yin pa'i lam dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad
213b3(dkon brtsegs): dang pa 'dres pas/ spyod pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa dang / chos thams cad la rtog pas gdeg pa med cing gzhag pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhan la lhag par rlom sems
213b4(dkon brtsegs): su mi byed pas/ bdag mi sgrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pas shes pa mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang /
213b5(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gags par bzod pas mi skye ba'i chos la gzod pa thob ste/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub seMs dpa'i shes pa yin no// lha'i bu mi skye ba dang mi 'byung ba ni// byang chub sems dpa'i
213b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba'i 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// skye zhing 'dod chags
213b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par rig par bya ba la dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba ni byang chub sems
213b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes pa yin no// mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye bar mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no//
214a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chags pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// dge ba'i rtsa
214a2(dkon brtsegs): bdang zhe 'gras pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa bas ngoms mi myong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// khams gsum du mtshams sbyor
214a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ byang chub sems pa'i
214a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yin no// rang gi nyon mongs pa spong ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir brtson pa ni byang chub sem
214a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes pa yin no// bdag gi phyir byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir byed pa ni/ byang chub sems
214a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes pa ma yin no// yal bar dor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sbyor ba ni/ byang chu sems dpa'i shes pa yin//
214a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang kon
214a8(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa yongs su shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// 'gog pa'i chos mngon gsum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ 'gog pa yongs
214b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dres par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// dag pa zad par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa bas zag pa 'bri bar byed pa ni/ byang chub
214b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// rnam par thar pa gsum mngon sum du byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa gsum la yongs su 'dris par byed pa
214b3(dkon brtsegs): ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// phung ba lnga'i khur 'dor ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi khur 'dor bar byed pa ni/ byang chub
214b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// dbang po drug 'gog par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin
214b5(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// skye zad par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin gyi/ skye ba'i mtshams sbyor bar byed pa ni byang chub seMs
214b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes pa yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi snying po rnam par grol
214b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'bras bu sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// yang dag pa'i shes pa brda' sprod pa'i le'u bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'kho
214b8(dkon brtsegs): de las srog chags khris blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ngu sems skyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
215a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyi byang chub sems dpal rnams kyis shes pa brda' spyod pa de legs par spros so// 'jab dpal
215a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes pa brda' sprod pa bstan pa 'di thos na mos par 'gyur zhing mi skrag mi dngangs la/ dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par
215a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i shes pa brda' sprod par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu rin cen mchog
215a4(dkon brtsegs): gis 'jam dpal bzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ci khyod shes pa brda' sprod par byed dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te kho bos
215a5(dkon brtsegs): chos 'ga' zhig thob bam/ spangs par gyur na ni/ kho bos shes pa brda' sprod par yang 'gyur ba zhig na/ lha'i bu kho bos ni chos 'ga' yang thob pa med cing spangs pa
215a6(dkon brtsegs): med pas na/ kho bos ci zhig shes pa brda' sprod par bya/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag las
215a7(dkon brtsegs): thob pa dang mngon par rtog pa med dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thob pa 'am mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir chos ston par
215a8(dkon brtsegs): mi mdzad do// smras pa 'jam dpal 'o na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar chos ston par mdzad/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
215b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa nyid kyis chos ston par mdzad kyi/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / bdeg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa dang /
215b2(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can dang bral ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / yongs su
215b3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad de/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar chos ston par mdzad do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal
215b4(dkon brtsegs): te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad na/ 'o na gang gi don du sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis
215b5(dkon brtsegs): spras ga lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid rtogs par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred rang bzhin
215b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid rtog par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo // khwa'i
215b7(dkon brtsegs): bu sangs rgyas ni phyin ci log gi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rtog par bya ba'i don du 'byung ngo // lnga'i
215b8(dkon brtsegs): du sangs rgyas ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes
216a1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba de ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin te// gang la chos gang yang skye ba med pa la de ni 'khor ba yang med la yongs su mya ngan
216a2(dkon brtsegs): las 'da' ba yang med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jab dpal de ltar na/ sems can gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir go cha bgos pa de dag
216a3(dkon brtsegs): ni/ go cha ni bgos pa med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan pa med pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ji snyad du sems/ dran bya
216a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis rab tu phye ba yin snyam/ smras pa 'jam dpal phan pa ni mngon par 'du byed pas rab tu phye ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs
216a5(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par 'du mdzad pa yod par 'dod dam/ smras pa 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' ba yin pas/ de ni 'dus ma
216a6(dkon brtsegs): ma byas pa rnyes pa dang / 'dus ma byas shing mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod kyis dam bcas pa de nyid kyis na mngon pa
216a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas pa la ni phan pa dang / gnod pa dmigs su med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstan pa'i 'di ni las dang bor ba rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bya'o//
216a8(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thos na skrag par 'gyur zhing skrag nas kyang phyir ldog par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
216b1(dkon brtsegs): skrag pa dang / phyir ldog pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsam te de skad smra/ 'jab dpal
216b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis spras pa/ lha'i du las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa sa skrag cing ser sna dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / gnod sems dang /
216b3(dkon brtsegs): le lo dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab dag las phyir ldog pa ni/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid la lo yang dag par gnas pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar gnas
216b4(dkon brtsegs): na yang dag par gnas pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu mnyam par gnas shing / mi mnyam par gnas pa ma yin na/ de'i phyir yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal
216b5(dkon brtsegs): las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar gnas pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i
216b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa/ de lta bu ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' las dang
216b7(dkon brtsegs): po pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid na/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa be pa dang // smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i chos
216b8(dkon brtsegs): la mos pa de'i phyir las dang po pa zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas spyad pa yin/ smras pa lnga'i bu byis so sor skye po
217a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni/ sun ring po nas spyad pa yin te/ de dag gi 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa'i phyir ro// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
217a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyad pa bsrung ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags la spyod pa yongs su smin par bye ba'i phyir/ 'dod chags kyi spyad pa la
217a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod kyang / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang ldan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsrung ba yin no// zhe sdang la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i
217a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ zhe sdang gi spyad pa la spyod kyang / zhe sdang gi spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / gti mug la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ gti mug gi spyod pa /
217a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod kyang / gti mug gi spyod pa dang lhan gcig mi gnas pa dang / cha mnyam pa la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ cha snyam pa'i spyad pa la spyod kyang / nyon mongs
217a6(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad dang / lhan gcig mi gnas pa de lta bu de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa srung ba yin no// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can yongs su
217a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'jug kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyang rnam par mkhrugs par
217a8(dkon brtsegs): mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa srung ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin/ langs dang
217b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang yang 'jig par mi byed/ 'chags par mi byed la/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa
217b2(dkon brtsegs): med cing / 'chags pa med par rtogs pa de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa
217b3(dkon brtsegs): dang 'jug par byed de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams su yang ldog la/ bsam gtan rnams la yang 'jug par
217b4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas ma rtogs pa rtogs shing mi rtsod pa lhur len pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa pa yin no//
217b5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des sems can gyis khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / bdag gis khams ma rtogs pa de mngon sum du gyur pas chos thams cad la yang phyir ldog
217b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ste/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing / nem nur med la/ the tsom med cing som nyi dad bral ba'i phyir//
217b7(dkon brtsegs): gzod ma nas dag cing dri ma med la/ nyon mongs pa med cing / shes rab kyi snang ba gsal bar gyur pas/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyis thams cad mdze
217b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum du gyur pas/ de'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin/ 'jab dpal gyi spras
218a1(dkon brtsegs): pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad skye ba med par shes shing / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yang rab
218a2(dkon brtsegs): tu shes la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ skye ba thams cad du skye ba ston cing / len pa med par skye ba yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / skye ba dang tshe rab thams cad du len
218a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bral bas 'chi ba dang / skye ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' zhing yang dag par mi 'da' ba dang / rgyu dang rkyen tshogs
218a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don rtog pa dang / sems can thams cad dang lus mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang sems mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang ngag mnyam pa dang //
218a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad dang yul mnyam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul rtog pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam
218a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i bya ba shes pa dang / dus la lta ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa de ni/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa zhes bya ste/ lha'i bu de ni ltar na
218a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jab dpal ji lta
218a8(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med cing / thams cad du dpyas med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyis byas pa'i
218b1(dkon brtsegs): las rnam byed pa dang / nga rgyal gyis byas pa dag mi byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med cing thams cad du dpyas med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang
218b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas/ gdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang ser sna dang lhan cig mi gnas
218b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe spung ba'i yon tan dang / bslab pa dang / tshul khrims dang yi dam thams cad dang ldan pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang
218b4(dkon brtsegs): yang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la khro ba'i sems med pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa
218b5(dkon brtsegs): yin no// gang yang rnab sems dang gnod sems kyi bag la nyal dang / lhan gcig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par
218b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus la yang dag par snang ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang le lo dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas pa med pa yin no// gang gi tshe bsam
218b7(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa la/ snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang bas ma gzhan gyi bde ba'i ro myang bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa
218b8(dkon brtsegs): yin no// gang gi tshe shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i jog pa yongs su rol ba la/ brtson pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang 'chal pa'i shes rab dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de
219a1(dkon brtsegs): sta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe rma byung yang rma mi 'byin pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang rma byung yang rnga mi 'byin pa de lta bu ni dpyab med/
219a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// gang gi tshe ji lta ba bzhin du smra ba de ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang de bzhin du byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe nang nye bar zhi ba de lta bu ni/ kha na//
219a3(dkon brtsegs): ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang phyi rol gyi yul rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la bsam pa tha dad pa med pa de
219a4(dkon brtsegs): bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang rdeg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe bdud kyi las rnams rtogs pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yino//
219a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yang bdud kyi las rnams zlog pa de lta bu ni/ dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe 'jig rten na snang ba thob pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams
219a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe bya ba dang 'gal bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang bya ba ma yin par mi lhung ba de lta bu ni dpyas
