271a7(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs te/ yi ge gcig tsam yang mi brjod par sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang nyan thos kyi sgra dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa
271a8(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra thos par byed do// 'jam dpal gzugs thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de thob na byang chub sems dpa'i gzug
271b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa la 'jug pa khong du chud par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de// ting nge 'dzin de thob na byang chub sems dpa'i yi ge thams cad la
271b2(dkon brtsegs): spobs shing sgra skad thams cad dang brjod pa thams cad la yang spobs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag chos kyi rnam grangs
271b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i yon tan brjod pa'i khyad par la spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal khyod spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
271b4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag nem nur ma mchis pa dang / the tsom mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ston pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par
271b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pade/ tshe 'di nyid la gdon mi 'tshal bar spobs pa thob par re bar bgyi ste/ spobs pa myur ba dang / zab mo la spobs pa dang / mi brjod pa'i spobs pa dang / spobs pa sna tshogs thob par re bar gyi'o//
271b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis pa'i sebs su 'gyur bar re bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang ci rtsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsgrub ben+de sprod pa 'di nyid dang / rjes su 'brel ba lags
271b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jab dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs segs so// khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras so// 'jam dpal
271b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste dper na sbyin pa ni longs spyod chen po thob par sgrub med do// tshul khrims ni mthe ris su skyed par srub med do// thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur bar slub med do// sgom pas re 'bras bur 'gyur bas
272a1(dkon brtsegs): / med do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang che 'di nyid la spobs pa skye bar slub med do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma shar pas ni mun pa mun dag thams cad
272a2(dkon brtsegs): sel bar byed do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bstan ma thag du spobs pa skye bar bya'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nges
272a3(dkon brtsegs): par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu
272a4(dkon brtsegs): 'don pa de yang the tsom med par nges par tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'dzam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thob par 'dod pas nem
272a5(dkon brtsegs): nur med ro dang the tsom med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzub bar bya/ bcang bar bya// kha ton du bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya// gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pang
272a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kying bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las
272a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ne sa nur ma mchis pa dang / the tsom mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya che
272a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba de la spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyid par bgyi'o// de nas bdud sdig cad du zhing smre sngags 'don bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ byin nas bcom ldan
272b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thugs rje dang ldan zhing / sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la bde ba rab tu
272b2(dkon brtsegs): stsol ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis yid mi bde ba de legs par bstsal ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di slar zhing byin gyis mi brlab par gsel/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bcom
272b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa dang / da ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ bdag 'dir shin du cher sdug sngal zhing yid mi bde ba dang / mya ngan gyi zug rngur gzir bar gyur lags so//
272b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das tha na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur lags na/ gang
272b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis thos nas 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klogs pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par bgyid pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
272b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ sems can de dag thams cad ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag
272b7(dkon brtsegs): gi bdud kyi gnas spong bar 'gyur lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thugs rje dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal ba rnams bde ba la stsol ba lags na/ bcom lda
272b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag dbugs dbyung du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bdag dbugs dpung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sdig can ma 'jigs shig/ sems can
273a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur la/ sdig can nga yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par mi byed kyis/ sdig can ma 'jigs shig/ de nas
273a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi dbyags dbyung ba mdzad pas/ bdud sdig can tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom
273a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci la dgongs ste 'di skad du/ ngas chosnyarnam grangs 'di la byin gyis rlob par mi byed do zhes bdud sdig can
273a4(dkon brtsegs): la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni byin gyi rlabs med pas/ byin gyi rlabs pa yin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang byin gyi rlabs med pas/
273a5(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlabs pa yin pas/ 'jam dpal de'i phyir ngas bdud sdig can la 'di skad du chos kyi rnam grang 'di la byin gyi rlob par mi byed do zhes smras so// 'jam dpal bden pa dang bden pa'i
273a6(dkon brtsegs): tshig gang gis chos thams cad byin gyi rlabs med pas/ byin gyis brlabs pas dang / tha dad du dbyer med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / bskad du bde pa dang / gnyis su
273a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / gnyis dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mnyam pa dang / de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i 'den pa dang / 'der pa'i tshogs des chos
273a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na rab tu spod par gyur cig/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs te mdzad nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' tshe
273b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi phung po brgyad khri ba'i stong gang yid pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang yin pa de dag ni mnyam pa'i phyir// khyod kyis kun nas sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chos shig/ ljobs
273b2(dkon brtsegs): shig/ dkan chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni kun nas skye'i chos kyi dbyings 'di legs pa
273b3(dkon brtsegs): thugasu chud nas/ sems can rnams la chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na ches kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bsrung ba dang / legs
273b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bzung ba dang / legs par kun chub par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / 'ja
273b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dpa' bo dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung la mngon par bston do//
273b6(dkon brtsegs): rabags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong 'phrag brgya pa las/ kun nas ske'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ 'dus pa bcu pa rdzogs sde
273b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / su ran tra bo de dang / zhu can gyi lo tsa kha ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
273b8(dkon brtsegs): grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'od zer kun tu skye ba zhes pa theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
274a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang rang dbang chen thob pa lnga
274a2(dkon brtsegs): brgya dang / gzhan yang ci gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byam pa las snyegs pa khrag khrig phrag bcu dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
274a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la stsogs pa khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu dang thabs gcig tu gzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug par
274a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de/ bdug pa'i stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar te/ spus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gus pas thal
274a5(dkon brtsegs): me sbar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sngon 'brin las ci zhig mdzad na/ 'di ltar rnam par nges pa'i 'od zer dang / kun
274a6(dkon brtsegs): spang ba'i 'od zer dang / rab tu ston pa'i 'od zer dang / kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer dang / kha dog 'dres pa ma mchis pa'i 'od zed dang / rgya chu du'i 'od zer dang / yongs srud pa'i 'od zer dang /
274a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen po'i 'od zer dang / rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer dang / dri ma ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu dri ba mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od
274a8(dkon brtsegs): zer dang / rims kyi 'brel ba'i 'od zer dang / gsal ba'i 'od zer dang / shin tu gsal ba'i 'od zer dang / mtha' ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu mtha' ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang /
274b1(dkon brtsegs): tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shun tu tshad pa mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / grangs kyi tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu brad kyi tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang // myur ba'i 'od zer dang /
274b2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu myur ba'i 'od zer dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / shin tu gnas pa ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od zer dang / snang bar bgyid pa'i 'od zer dang / mos par
274b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa'i 'od zer dang / pha rol tu phyin par bgyid pa'i 'od zer dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / drag po'i 'od zer dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa la
274b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i 'od zer dang / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang / gzugs kyi mnyan nyid sna tshogs kyi 'od zer dang / gzugs kyi mtshan tshad ma mchis pa'i 'od zer dang / kha dog sngon po dang /
274b5(dkon brtsegs): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang / kha dog le badrar gyi mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang / chu shel gyi kha dog gi mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang / na mkha'i kha dog ni
274b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer dang / 'di lta bu las skyegs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od zer re re kun kyang / kho dog rnam pa lnga'i 'od zer 'dres par 'gyur ba ston par mdzad pa nas/ kha dog sngon po dang ser po dang /
274b7(dkon brtsegs): dmar po dang / dkar po'i dngos po re re kun kyang / 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa dag dang 'dres par gyur pa rab tu ston par mdzad pa'i bar du brnyes par
274b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la tshig su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ nga ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ dge ba'i las kyi rgyu rkyen gyis/ rmongs pa rnams ni
275a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ rab spangs pas// 'od zer sna tshogs grub pa yin/ gzhan yang spyod pa sna tshogs kyis/ sangs rgyas lam la rab gnas shing // stong pa byed med shes par gyis// 'dren pa'i
275a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer bstan pa yin// ji ltar phyi rol chos dag la/ mtshan nyid bye brab sna tshogs snang // de ni stong zhing bdag kyang med/ gzhan yang ji ltar nang gi lus/ stong zhing bdag med byed med kyang / de las rnam
275a3(dkon brtsegs): pasna tshogs kyis// sgra skad dag ni rab tu ston/ de ltar byed med dbang gis ni// kha dog dpag med 'od bstan nas// mos pa dag ni ci bzhin du// re ba dag ni skong bar mdzad// res 'ba' 'od zer gcig
275a4(dkon brtsegs): las ni// kha dog rnam pa gnyis bskyed nas// so so rab 'bring tha ma'i// bye brag yod par rab du ston// res 'ga' 'od zer gcig las ni// khe dog rnam pa gsum bskyed nas// so so rab 'bring tha ma'i
275a5(dkon brtsegs): bye brag yod par rab du bston// res 'ga' 'od zer gcig las ni// kha dog rnam pa bzhi bskyed nas// so so rab 'bring tha mi'i// bye brag yod par rab tu bstan// res 'ga' 'od zer gcig la ni/
275a6(dkon brtsegs): kha dog rnam pa lnga byung ba/ so so rab 'bring tha ma yang // las gtsang las ni skyes pa yin// res 'ga' 'od zer gcig las ni// kha dog rnam pa drub byang ba// so so rab 'bring tha ma yang / thang
275a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas las ni skyes pa yin// res 'ba' 'od zer gcig las ni// kha dog rnam pa bdur byung ba// so so rab 'bring tha ma yang // las dge la ni skyes pa yin// res 'ba' 'od zer gcig las ni//

275b8(dkon brtsegs): kha dog stong ni gang byung ba// so so rab 'bring tha ma yang // yon tan stong las skyes pa yin// res 'tha' dngos po gcig las ni/ kha dog khri ni gang byung ba// so so rab 'bring tha ma yang // bsod nams
276a1(dkon brtsegs): / tshogs las skyes pa yin// res 'ga' dngos po gcig las ni// kha dog bye ba gang ston pa// so so rab 'bring tha ma yang // yid ches pa las skyes pa yin// res 'ga' dngos po gcig las ni//

280b8(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa med pa yod// gang gis ming 'dzin brjod dang bral bar 'gyur// nga la 'od zer 'gra med ces bya yod// gang gis ming 'dzin ma 'ongs shes par 'gyur// nga la 'od zer kun mtha' zhes bya yod/
281a1(dkon brtsegs): rjen zag med
281a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis ming 'dzin 'das pa shes par 'gyur// nga la 'od zer mtshungs med ces bya yod// gang gis ming rtogs par 'gyur// nga la 'od zer 'phags thob zhes bya yod// gang gis
281a3(dkon brtsegs): ming 'dzin mchog shes par 'gyur// nga la 'od zer dri ma med pa yod// gang gis ming 'dzin mngon par zhes pa spod// nga la 'od zer rdul spong zhes bya yod// gang gis ming 'dzin mun pa
281a4(dkon brtsegs): med par 'gyur// nga la 'od zer srid pa med pa yod// gang gis ming 'dzin rten dag spong bar 'gyur// nga la 'od zer mchog rgyal zhes pa yod// gang gis ming 'dzin pha rol smra ba gnod//
281a5(dkon brtsegs): nga la 'od zer dar la bab pa yod// gang gis mir 'dzin spod pa drug 'brub 'gyur// nga la 'od zer mchog btsun zhes bya yod// gang gis ming 'dzin shes pa thog med 'gyur// nga la 'od zer
281a6(dkon brtsegs): myur ba zhes pa yod// gang gis ming 'dzin dge slong mchog 'grub 'gyur// nga la 'od zer mtshan ldan zhes bya yod// gang gis ming 'dzin chos zab rtogs par 'gyur// nga la 'od zer
281a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med pa yod// gang gis ming 'dzin nga rgyal spong bar 'gyur// nga lo 'od zer skyes med ces bya yod// gang gis ming 'dzin thob pa rnyed par 'gyur// nga la 'od zer sangs
281a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dran pa yod// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags// sangs rgyas mang la spyod pa rnam bsgrubs pas// ji lta burjod zer grub pa yin// sangs rgyas skulas/
281a9(dkon brtsegs): byang ba'i 'od zer rnams/ rdul phran grangs ni brgya stong bye snyed mnga'// de bzhin zhing ni tshad med pa snyed mang // de'i grangs ni rgya mtsho bye ma snyed// rdul re snyed kyi 'od zer rnams dang ni//
281b1(dkon brtsegs): so so la yang 'khor ni mang po yod// 'od zer des ni sangs rgyas med zhing du// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo dag skur sprul nas// shin tu zab mo chos ni ston mdzad pas sems can
281b2(dkon brtsegs): bzod la rab tu dgod par mdzad// nga la 'od zer sangs rgyas zhes bya yod// sems can sangs rgyas las la gnas par mdzad// nga la 'od ther chos zhes bya ba ba yod// shin tu rnam dang /
281b3(dkon brtsegs): gsal byed dri ma med// nga la 'od zer dge 'dun zhes bya yod// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags// nga la 'od zer rnam dag zhes bya yod// 'od zer de ni khyad 'dag
281b4(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pA dka'// nga la 'od zer pad pa ces bya yod// sems can phan 'dogs yo su smin par byed// nga la 'od zer tshangs pa zhes bya zhes// kha cig brgya byin yang na lha zhes bya// zla ba klu da
281b5(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin zhes kyang bya// lha ma yin dang mkha' lding zhes kyang bya// kha cig rgyal po'i bud med ces bya// kha cig bu mo kha cig khyi'u zhes bya// de ltar 'od zer sna chog mang po rnam// so so dge
281b6(dkon brtsegs): chos dag gis skal mtshungs 'dul// 'khor ni tshad med bye ba snyed dag dang // thams cad byang chub yongasu smin par byed// nga la 'od zer shes rab ces bya yod// kha cig tshul khrims la
281b7(dkon brtsegs): cig ming byams pas// kha cig snying rje sgra dang sgron zhes bya// kha cig byug spos kha cig rol mo sgra// 'di lta bu la stsogs pa'i 'od zer rnams// sngon gyi spod pa'i rje su mthun pa ni// skye dgu rnam pa
281b8(dkon brtsegs): tshad med yongasu sdud pas// des na 'od zer 'di dag rdzog pa yin// nga la 'od zer gtso bo zhes bya yod// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags// sangs rgyas bstan pa rnams
282a1(dkon brtsegs): ta gzhus pa// de na 'ong zer 'di rdzogs pa yin// sangs rgyas spyar gyis samatshan grangs gzig nas// sku lung kun nas 'od zer su chog gtong // 'od zer bang po
282a2(dkon brtsegs): dag rang yang // so so 'khor mang dag gis rab tu bskor// sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas 'od zer gtong zhing smin par mdzad// gang gis 'od zer bstan pa 'di thos na/
282a3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' zhing mos par gang byed pa// nga sngon sangs rgyas mang po dag la ni/ mdo sde 'di ni thos par gyur pa yin/ ngas 'od zer khyad par 'bags pa yod/ 'bor ni bye ba btucu grangs steng 'od/
282a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag la tshig bshad gcig/ bsngags pas de phyir 'od zer 'di grub bo// nga la 'od zer mya ngan med na med pa yod// 'khor na khrag khrig brgya cu snyed yod do// de bzhin gshegs
282a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa gcig bzung bas// de phyir 'od zer 'di ni grub pa yin// ngal 'od zer rnam dag mchog yod de// 'khor ni bye ba brgya blangs snyed yod// ting 'dzin mchog ni yongasu bzung bas na// de
282a6(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer 'di ni grub pa yin// 'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas mtshan// khyad par 'phags zhes bya ba byung // sangs rgyas de ni 'jig rten na// sku che tshad ni med par bzhugs// dang po mngon pa
282a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs rgyas so// chos bstan 'a'od du 'dus ni// grangs ni zag jis bcu cu byed// da cing 'dres par 'gyur// 'i chen 'jam bu'i phreng / glong can dag ni 'di dag du// yul gyi rnam tho
282a8(dkon brtsegs): meng // sgral mos zhes bya ba byung // rgyal po chen po de la ni// bu mo dag ni lnga brgya yod// byang bzhin dag ni sdug mdzes pas// mthong ba thag ni dga' bar 'gyur// de'i tshe na rgyal po'i yab// gci
282b1(dkon brtsegs): byin rang dbang rab ldan zhing // bkon mchog dag ni gsum po la// shin tu dad pa skyes par gyur// rgyal po de la skyed mos chal mchog dgyur pa ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad gus pas ni/
282b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan de la rab tu gul// skyed mos tshal ni de dag du// 'chags dag ni ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad kun tu ni// ljon shing tsam pa ka dag dang // ljon shing ta gro ta dag dang // ljon shin
282b3(dkon brtsegs): ka zhu ka dang ni// ljon shing u du 'ba' ra dang // ljon shing pa las tra dang // ljon shin shi ri sha dag dang // ljon shing mya ngan sangs las stsogs// de dag grangs ni so sor yod // bye ba phrag ni
282b4(dkon brtsegs): brgya cu yod// ljin shing blo de dag kyang // dbyar dang rkun na 'dra bar yang // me tog 'bras su yal ga dang / kha dog dag ni gsal zhing rgyas/ dri mchog dam par ba 'byung zhing // de bzhin pa se
282b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skul 'bul// dge slong dag ni ji snyed pa// lus kyis kha dog gser dang 'dra// de dag thams cad kun kyang ni// ldan shing dag ni drang du// 'dug nas rab tu brtson pas na// gzugs ni ra
282b6(dkon brtsegs): tu thob par 'gyur// de tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de// rgyal po yang dang sras rnams dang // gzhan yang 'khor ni mang po la// shin tu thug ni brtse ba'i phyir// rnam par nges pa'i 'od
282b7(dkon brtsegs): zer ma // de dag la ni rab tu bstan// rgyal po des ni thos gyur nas// sems ni rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// tshig su bcad pa tshad med pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags
282b8(dkon brtsegs): pa brjod// gzhan yang rgyal po des// rin po che'i gdugs dam pa// bye ba phrag ni brgya cus snyed// bcom ldan de la rab tu phul// rin ce gdugs ni re re la// yid bzhin no
283a1(dkon brtsegs): / dra bdag/ tha' pa 'khor ba rab tu brgyan// yid bzhi nor bu rin po che// de dag rin dang yang // 'jam du'i gas ni bcom dag/ sra ni bye ba brgyad cuba'i sa gangs
283a2(dkon brtsegs): ni re re yang // yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu snyed// 'phreng ba dag du byas par gyur// yid bzhin rin cen de dag kyang // kha dog dag ni rab gsal bas// nyen mtshan dag ni med
283a3(dkon brtsegs): bar yang // rtag tu 'od zer rab tu gtong // 'od zer de dag re res kyang // dpag tshad brgya ni snang bar byed// 'od zer de dag rab gsal bas// nyi zla dag ni zil gyis gnon// gzhan yang rin
283a4(dkon brtsegs): chen gdugs de dag/ seng ge rin cen chun 'phyang ni// bye ba phrag ni brgya cu dang // gser skang rin cen 'bring ba yang // bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu dag/ ngos bzhi dag ni rab tu brgyan/ gzhan yang rin
283a5(dkon brtsegs): can dam pa yin// 'di ltar rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// pu tig rin cen dra ba dag/ spel ba dag gis rnam par brgyan// 'di lta bu'i bdugs dag gis// skyed mos tshal ni kun tu g.yogs// de'i
283a6(dkon brtsegs): sted tu gzhan yang ni// pad ma mus na dang ni// pad ma a ti mu ga ta dang // btang bzungs zhes ri bya ba dang // pad ma u dum 'ba'ar dang // pad pa sngon po las stsogs pa// de gzhin rnam pas tsha
283a7(dkon brtsegs): kyig khang pa'i gdugs ni cad meng pa// re re thams cad kun kyang ni// ri ci drab mtshan par byas// gzhan yang gser gyi srung pa las// byas pa'i sadag gis kyang ni// bla ni dag du 'a bus pa// dege
283a8(dkon brtsegs): steng du khya bar g.yogs/ gas yang bas dan rin ce bri// gseng dgas las ni rkang byas pas// de'i grangs kyang bye 'brag brgyad cu snyed ni rab tu bshams// rin cen khrin de dag la khrab dang
283b1(dkon brtsegs): dgapas byas pa'i// skad de bye brab brtan// de'i sring du rab brgyan to// de'i tsha sems can me// rnam padag dzirnyed pa// sri pa rtse mo ban kyang // thams cad da 'dus kya pa/
283b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rji de la ni// mdo sde 'di ni rab tu can// lha dang klu dang gnor sbyin dang // dri zi'i ni rgyal po dang // lto 'phro chen po lha ma yin// de dag mdo sde 'di thos nas// rab tu dpa'
283b3(dkon brtsegs): sengs bskyed nas// tshig su bcud pa brgya stong gis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsdogs brjod pas// de dag thams cad kun gyis kyang // byang chub chen por smon lam btab/ lnga dang gu dang
283b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin// des las stsogs pa thams cad kyang // yongs su dang ba'i sems kyis ni// me tog man ngar ba dang // mu gi rin cen las stsogs pa'i// chang bab mchod pa rab tu byas// de'i chen gzhan
283b5(dkon brtsegs): yang na// lha chen mthu dang gzi ldan pa'i// bye ba phrag ni brgya cu snyed/ mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na// rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyed nas// byang chub chen por smon lam btab// ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis te/
283b6(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer 'di 'dra thob par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa des tshe/ de'i bas ma thugs chud pas// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur zhes// byang chub du ni lung yang bstan/ des tshe na gzhan yang ni/ brgya byin
283b7(dkon brtsegs): spyi dbang po dang / tshangs 'khor dang bcas pa yang bye ba phrag ni brgya cu snyed// 'od zer rab tu ston pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni thos pas// rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ byang chub ngu ni sems
283b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang bskyed// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'azu 'gyur shes// byang chub ngu ni lung yang bsam de'i tshen gzhan yang ni/ ku na bye ba khrag khrib zag/ brgyan med ni sa pa na rje
284a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub du ni sems skyed pas// lung bstan pa yang thob par gyur/ de'i tshe na gzhan yang ni/ gser 'dab rgyal po bye ba phrag/ brgya cu snyed ni 'dus pa dag/ mdo sde 'di ni tha
284a2(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ sdom pa lnga ni rab bsrungs te// lung bstan pa yang thob par gyur/ de'i tshe na gzhan yang ni/ dri zi'i pe rgyal po bye ba phrag/ brgyad cu snyed ni 'dus pa dag/ mdo sde 'di ni thos pa na/ rol mo
284a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong rnam byas te// sgra snyan dag ni rab phyung nas/ bcom ldan de la mchod byas pas/ lung bstan pa yang thob par gyur/ de'i tshe na gzhan yang ni/ gnod srin rgyal po khrag khrig snyed/ mdo sde 'di/
284a4(dkon brtsegs): thos pas na/ sangs rgyas ye shes dag ni/ shin tu dang ba skyes par gyur// de dag thams cad kun gyis kyang / byang chub lung bstan thob par gyur/ zla 'od de ltar shes par gyis/ de tshe rgyal po sgra mos
284a5(dkon brtsegs): pas/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// bcom ldan de la mchod byas pa/ gzhan yin snyam du mi blta ste// de ni khyod dag nyid yin no// khyod ni sngon 'das dus kyi tshe/ mdo sde 'di ni thos
284a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyus// de lta bas ni ding 'dir yang / 'di nyid slar yang zhus pa yin// nga ni mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og/ gang yang rung ba su zhig gis/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ rnam par 'jigs
284a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus kyi tshe/ chos kyi bstan pa 'di dag la/ dang ba'i sems kyis rab ba skyes pa/ 'di ltar bu'i mdo sde dag/ rgya cher yang dag ston par nus/ ma 'ongs mdo sde sa 'di ni gang ston pa/
284a8(dkon brtsegs): de ni nga'i chos 'dzin srungs par byed// de ni 'bron mang de dpa'i ded dpon 'dra'/ rin cen gter 'dzin srang ba zhes kyang bya/ ma 'ongs dus tshe mdo 'di gang thos nas/ skad cig tsam
284b1(dkon brtsegs): du mos pa skyed byed pa/ de ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ 'jam dpal byin gyis brlabs par rig par bya/ des ni sangs rgyas mang po mthong 'gyur bas/ gsang ba'i chos gtang
284b2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab rno bar 'gyur/ gabadab sems drang mnyen la rab nges shing / rtag tu sangs rgyas rim mgro byed la brtson/ bdag med sgom zhing byams dang bzod skyed pa/ des ni mdo sde 'di
284b3(dkon brtsegs): la mos par 'gyur/ gang zhig rtag tu mi dge yi sems 'chang zhing / snyed la gdu zhing chos mi shes pa dang / rab dben rnams la mos 'gyur ba/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos 'gyur/
284b4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod dang / dam chos zab mo legs par rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas yang dag shes shing yid ched pa/ de ni mdo sde lha mos par 'gyur/ gang gis sems
284b5(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng dang ba'i seMs mid cing / rtag tu srog gcod 'dul bar rab dka' dang / 'dod pa'i yul rnam kyis ni bran byed pa/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig rtag tu dgon
284b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas rab mos shing / gcig pu dben rab 'dug cing sems zhi dang / rnyed dang gnyen la mngon par zhen med/ de ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ gang zhig grogs ngan dag gis rjes 'brang zhib
284b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang gzhan gyi dge ba 'jig byed dang / tshul khrim ting 'dzin dag ni cher nyams pa/ des ni mdo sde 'di la pos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig yid mos shin tu rnam dag cing / rtag tu shes rab chos nam
284b8(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byed dang / dge ba'i bshes nyin dag gis rab bsrungs pa/ de ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ gang zhig gnyen gyi khyim la rab chags shing / me togs 'bras bu byin nas dga' byed de/
285a1(dkon brtsegs): @sems la drang po med cing sgyu 'chang ga des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas drin dran zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog la mos pa dang / byang chub sde zhing g.yo sgyu med rgya
285a2(dkon brtsegs): des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ gang zhi'i chung ma bu mo srid chags shing / gos mchog sna tshogs dag gis rab brgyan nas/ rtag tu de dang lhan cig rtse smon pa/ des ni mdo sde 'di la pos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig sas
285a3(dkon brtsegs): zab gnas pa med 'gyu zhing / 'dod pa'i yul gyis gos pa med pa dang / zas skom dag gis g.yo sgyur mi bskyed pa// de ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig skye dgu rnam la 'di skad du/ 'dod ched
285a4(dkon brtsegs): sprad kyang nyes med gang zer ba/ dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams la skur ba yin/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig yid ces rtag tu rab bstan zhing / nan tan bskyed nas chos rnams tshol bag/
285a5(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba med cing brnyas par mi byed pa// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig chung ma bu mo mngon zhen cis/ rtag tu 'dod pa'i yul ni rjes dran dang / shes rab mi sgom rgya cher 'phel
285a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dogs// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig ri dang nags khrod rab gnas shing / shes rab bsgo ba nas shin tu dag gyur dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dag la 'dod med pa/ des ni ma
285a7(dkon brtsegs): sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ gang zhig mig gi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha'/ rtag tu rmongs nas mi tog gang yin pa/ de ni gti mug gdud kyis bcings pa na/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ gang ni/
285a8(dkon brtsegs): mig gi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha'/ rtag tu rtogs shing rmongs pa med gyur pa/ de ni bdud kyis bcings las grol bas na/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ gang zhig mig mtha' yad
285b1(dkon brtsegs): dang med pa la// rtag tu rmongs nas khong du chud pa de ni gti mug bdud kyis bcings pas na/ de ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig ming mtha' yod dang med pa dag/ rtag tu rtog
285b2(dkon brtsegs): shing rmongs pa med 'gyur/ des ni bdud kyis bcings las grol bas na/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ gang gi mig gnas 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid la/ rtag tu rmongs shing khong du chu dag
285b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni gti mug bdud kyis bcings pas na/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig mig gnas 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rtag tu chud cing rmongs med pa/ da ni bdud kyis bcings nas/
285b4(dkon brtsegs): grol bas na/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ rna ba sna dang lce lus yid dag dang / gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos rnams dang / sa chu me rlung ngo bo nyid dag dang / rdos po sems can sdug
285b5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal phung po dang / khams dang 'jig rten skye skra ming bden dang / 'dod chag zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal sred/ 'chab rgyags ser sna phra dog g.yo sgyu dang / khro skyogs par yang de bzhin rig par
285b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ gang zhig mig me bzang mtha' ni de dag la/ rtag tu rmongs shing khong du mi chud pa/ de ni skye bo sprod par ltung bas na/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mes mi gyur/ gang zhig mig zang mtha' ni de dgag
285b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med/ de ni skye bo spyod dang bral bas na/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ gang gis mig gi 'jigs pa de dag la rtag tu rmongs shing khong du chung ga da ni
285b8(dkon brtsegs): skye bo spong par ltung bas na/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig mig gi 'jigs pa de dag la/ rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/ des ni skye bo spyod pa dang bral bsan/
286a1(dkon brtsegs): / des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ gang zhig mig gi rab dben de dag la/ rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa/ de ni skye bo spyod par ldang ba na/ des ni mdo sde 'di la
286a2(dkon brtsegs): mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi rab dben de dag la/ rtag par khong du chud cing rdzongs pa med/ de ni skye bo spyod dang bral bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ gang zhig mig ni
286a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bre 'ong med pa la/ rtag tu rmong shing khong du ma chud pa/ de ni skye bo sprod par ltung bas na/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig mig gi 'gro 'ong med pa dag/ rtag par khong du chud cing
286a4(dkon brtsegs): rmongs med pa/ de ni skye bo spod dang bral bas/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ gang zhig mig la bdag med ma rtogs nas/ mig zad ngo bo nyid la rtag rmod pas/ des ni skyes po sprod par ldang bas na/
286a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni mdo sde 'di lta mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig mig la bdag med par rtogs nas/ mig zang ngo bo rtag tu rtogs gyur pas/ de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na/ de ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/
286a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig la bdag med ma rtogs nas/ bzod pa'i gnas la rtag tu rmongs gyur pa/ de ni skye bo'i spyod par ldang bas na/ des ni mdo sde 'di lta mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig mig la bdag med
286a7(dkon brtsegs): rab rtogs nas/ bzod pa'i gnas nis rab tu rtogs gyur/ de ni skye bo'i spong dang bral bas ni/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ gang zhig mig zang de bo rab rtogs la/ de ni mi gnas chu
286a8(dkon brtsegs): khrim grub mi nus/ mi gnas tshul khrims mngon par mi sgrub pas/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig mi gzang nge bor rab rtog pa/ des ni mi gnas tshul khrims sgrub par nus/
286b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas tshul khrims mngon par grub pas na/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/ gang zhig mi zang ngo bo ma rtogs pa// des ni zag med tshul khrim 'grub mi nus/ zag medade tshul khrims mngon par mi
286b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grub pas/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pas/ des ni zad med tshul khrims 'grub par nus/ zab med tshul khrims mngon par bsgrub sAn+ta/ des ni mdo sde
286b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lnga mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad de bo ma rtogs pa/ des ni zad med shes rab sgrub mi nus/ zag med shes rab mngon par mi sgrub pas/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/ gang zhig mig
286b4(dkon brtsegs): zad ngo bo rab rtogs pas/ des ni zag med shes rab bsgrub par nus/ zag med shes rab mngon par bsgrubs pas na/ des ni mdo sde 'di la mos pas 'gyur/ gang zhig mig zad de bo ma rtogs pa
286b5(dkon brtsegs): mig stong nyid la rtag tu rmongs par 'gyur/ des ni kun 'dzin ye shes mi skyed pa/ mdo sde 'di la rab tu myi 'gyur/ gang zhig mig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/ mig stong nyid ni rtag par rtogs pa
286b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ des ni kun 'dzin ye shes rab bskyed pas/ mdo sde 'di la mos par rab tu 'gyur/ gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa/ des ni kun 'dzin ye shes 'grub pa na/ bla med ma chags ye shes rab
286b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub pas/ mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur/ gang zhig mdo sde 'di lam mos pa/ mig thed ngo bo nyid la rtag du rmongs/ des ni ting 'dzin rnams las nyams pas na/ bla med ye shes thob par shi
286b8(dkon brtsegs): tu dka'/ gang zhig mdo sde 'di la rab mos shing / mig zang ngo bo nyid ni mngon rtogs pa/ de ni ting 'dzin mngon par 'grub pas na/ bla med ye shes mngon byed dka' ba med/ gang zhig mi zad ngo ma
287a1(dkon brtsegs): / nid rtogs shing / bdag rnyed pa ci btu shes pas te/ de'i rtag tu chos 'di thos pas na/ mngon par yang ces btsam mang ba thog ga zhig ma
287a2(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid sems shing / nyin mtshan rab brtson le lo med pa na/ des ni ting 'dzin spobs pa mngon bslabs nas/ mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu ston par 'gyur/ gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems
287a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa 'od zer 'byin pa'i ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur/ des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rab ston cing / mig stong nyid ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyu ba gang gis mchod rten brgya stong rab
287a4(dkon brtsegs): byas shing / sangs rgyas thams cad la ni mchod pa bas/ gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems byed na/ 'di'i yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags/ ging gis rol mo brgya stong rab byas nas/
287a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel mchod pa bas/ gang gis mdo sde 'dri thos byung na/ 'di'i yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags/ sangs rgyas spyan gyis pa'i sems can rnams// bskal
287a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni bye ba tshad med par/ de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs par mchod pa bas/ mdo sde 'di gzung bsod nas khyad par 'phags/ gang gis mdo sde 'di la tshig bzhi pa'i/ tshigs
287a7(dkon brtsegs): bshang gcig na ma 'dzin cing son byed na/ de la rgyal ba thugs rje chen po'i// mchol dgus pas rab tu bskyed par dbye/ nga ni 'das pa'i 'askal ba brgyad stong du/ srid pa gsum du 'khor
287a8(dkon brtsegs): ba gyur pa'i tshe/ sems rgyas dag ni tshad med pa rnams la/ mdo sde 'di'i phyir ni rim mamo byes/ res 'ga' mar me 'argya stong tshad med pa/ snying po ri'i ched kyang dpag ched cag/ srang nas ngan
287b1(dkon brtsegs): sde 'di lar da dbang dag/ thob par bya phyir 'dren pa rnams la mchod/ res 'ga' me tog tsam pa ka dang ni// sum na dang mya ngan med pa'i/ 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan gdugs ni sna tshogs kyis/ de bzhin
287b2(dkon brtsegs): gsheg pa'i mchod rten mchod pa byas/ nga sngon 'khor ba'i 'khor bar gyur pa'i tshe/ slong du 'ong ba dag la sprin btang ste/ res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag kyang btang / res 'ga' tham pa chu
287b3(dkon brtsegs): rig dag kyang btang / res 'ba' glang po che dang gzhon pa dang / res 'ga' rin cen rta dang chung ma btang / res 'ga' gser/ gyi khri dang ren cen gur/ res 'ga' se me to 'ang 'phreng ba btang /
287b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin skal pa brgya stong rdzogs par ni/ mdo sde 'di phyir sems la ser sna med/ bam po gnyis pa'o// / nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir// tshul khrib
287b5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag pa bsrungs/ ting 'dzin shes rab rtag tu bsgoms/ sems can rnams la sbyin pa btang / nga sngon me sde 'di'i phyir/ gtum po dag gis brgyad bkag kyang / de tshing ni snying brtsebs/ de la gnod pa yong
287b6(dkon brtsegs): ma byas/ nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir/ slong du 'ong ba dag la ni/ ji ltar mos bzhin rab btang bas/ thams cad rab tu dga' bar byas/ nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyib gzhal ba khang chen rnams la ni/ ri
287b7(dkon brtsegs): can dra bas pas rab brgyan nas/ sangs rgyas rnams pa rab tu phul/ nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir/ rin cen rnam pa sna tshogs dang / yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas/
287b8(dkon brtsegs): sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir/ dran yong rnams ni/ rtag dran pas/ tha na cig bshad gcig can pa/ de la yang ni bkur sti bya/ nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir/ tshul khrim ldan la rab bkur bas/ ngar 'as
288a1(dkon brtsegs): rgya/ tshe na yang / de la rtag tu gus pa byed/ nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ 'khor ba dag na 'khor ba'i tshe/ drin ni cung zad yod la yang / de la rtag tu drin du gzos/ nga sngon mdo sde
288a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di yi phyir/ rnyed pa ma btsal chos ma bkur/ nye bshes sems can rnams la ni/ snying brtse dag ni rab tu bskyed/ nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ mang thos legs bshad ldan pas na/ chos la mngon par
288a3(dkon brtsegs): zhen med cing / bshes pa'i khyim la ser sna med/ nga sngon sde 'di yi phyir/ mi dge'i sems ni skyes 'gyur na/ myur ba nyid du rab shes pas/ 'phel bar yang ni yod ma bas/ nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i pi
288a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i bur ni gyur pa na/ rin po che dang bya ga spos dang / spos kyi phyi ma ci snyed pa/ dang pa'i sems ni nges bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas rnams la bsngos shing phul/ nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ khri mun pa
288a5(dkon brtsegs): la snying brtse bas/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang mong ba/ lus kyi sbyin par dang du blangs/ nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs nas/ rtag tu dus drug dag pa'i tshe/ sdom pa dag ni rab tu blangs/
288a6(dkon brtsegs): nga sngon bdo sde 'di'i phyir/ rtag tu bzod pa rab bsgoms pas/ tha na chung ma dag la yang / 'dod pa'i ser sna yongs ma bskyed/ nga sngon mdo sde 'di'i phyir/ dbul phongs dag ni thams cad kun/ bde ba dag ni tho
288a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'i phyir/ nor dag gis ni phyag por byas/ nga sngon mdo 'di'i phyir/ dge slong dang nga ni bram ze dang / skye dgu rnam pa sna tshogs kun/ thams cad dag ni rab du bsdus/ nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ thams cad tu/
288a8(dkon brtsegs): la phan bdags byed/ rtag tu sprin bdag cher byas nas/ slong ba dag la yongasu btang / res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag/ gzhan dag gcod du mi gzhugs par/ sems can rnams la yengs btang zhing / yi
288b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ni tshim par byas/ nga sngon smin pa btang ba'i tshe/ sems ni rtag tu snyoms pas na/ tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'tshal dang don med/ rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pa nas/ so so bskye bo
288b2(dkon brtsegs): bar dag la/ ngo mtshar mnyam pa'i sems skyed nas/ gus par kun la sbyin pa btang / nga sngon sbyin pa btang ba'i tshe/ sem la mthon dman med pas na/ sdug bsngal 'gro ba mi tshol zhing / mdo sde 'di la rtse gcig
288b3(dkon brtsegs): mos// res dga' yul khams dag du ni/ phyir rgol thams cad med byas shing / ku nams kun ni rab btul nas/ dus bzhin char ni rab du phab/ zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis/ ngas ni tshe rab dpag
288b4(dkon brtsegs): med nas/ mdo sde 'di ni gnyer ba'i phyir/ dka' ba rnam ni rab tu spang / skal pa brgya stong snyed du ni/ brjod dang mthar thug mi 'gyur ro// yid ches pa la khyod gnas nas/ ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe/ yang
288b5(dkon brtsegs): dag dran pa sems bskyed la/ mdo sde 'di ni bshad par gyis/ nga ni sangs rgyas skran dag gis/ ma 'ongs su dus ni gsal gzigs pa/ spod pa snga tshogs ji lta ba/ thams cad rab du mkhyen pa yin/ dge
288b6(dkon brtsegs): slong dag ni gang zhig gis/ bla med ye shes btsal ba'i phyir/ shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ mdo sde 'di ni gang ston pa/ gang zag de dag phyogs rnams dang / thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/
288b7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe/ mdo 'di thos nas gang mos pa/ bsam pa dang ni thabs rnams dang / thams cad ma lus thug su chud/ dman pa dag ni gang zhig gis/ mdo sde 'di ni ma thos pas/
288b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la skar 'debs pas/ thams cad ma lus thug su chung / dge slong rnams ni gang zhig dang / dge slong ma ni gang zhig gis/ mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur na/ shin tu gdungs pas du byed pa/
289a1(dkon brtsegs): @de kun ngas ni lung bstan nas/ rgyal ba gtso bo mthong bar 'gyur/ zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ gang dag yid ni dag pa dang / gang /
289a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag yid ni ma dag dang / tha na mos pa gang yin pa/ thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/ sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/ rab zhi dben pa rtag mos shing / ting 'dzin rnams la rab gnas nas/
289a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba dag la ma chags par/ tha na bag chags rnam kyang ni/ gtan nas rab tu gang spangs dang / de las stsogs pa'i yon tan rnams/ thams cad ma lus thugasu chud/ sems can dag
289a4(dkon brtsegs): ni bang zhig gis/ mi bden chos la zhen pa dang / sem can dag ni gang zhig gis/ sangs rgyas la ni rab mos po/ ma 'ongs dngos po 'di lta bu/ thams cad ma lus thugasu chud/ sems can dag ni gang
289a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis/ 'jig rten pade la rab chags pas/ sangs rgyas byang chub sa bon dag/ legs pa nyid du mi bskyed pa/ rgya dang rkyen ni de'i phyir/ sbyor ba rnams ni nyams par 'gyur/ su yang byang ba gang zhig
289a6(dkon brtsegs): gis byang chub sa bon rtogs 'gyur na/ gang zag de'i nges par ni/ rnam dag 'od zer dpag med tho'o// zla 'ong khyed kyis 'di lta bur/ 'od zer 'di las stsogs pa le d+hu dang rkyen ni re kun sob dang
289a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid du ltos/ khyod kyi shes rab stobs kyis ni// thams cad de ltar rig par gyis/ gang zhig mi dge grogs spongs te/ dge ba'i bshes nyen la bsten nas/ tshul khrims rnams dag gang srung ba
289a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'od zer grub par 'gyur// khyod kyis dbang po rab bsrungs la/ ngo tsha khrel med rab tu spongs/ dge ba'i chos ni rab bsgoms la/ seMs can rnams ni bsrung bar gyis/ khyod kyis rtsod pa
289b1(dkon brtsegs): rab spongs la/ stong nyid dag ni rtogs par gyis/ rnyed pa dag la ma gdung bar/ mang thos legs bshad ldan par gyis/ khyod kyis rnyed pa dag la ni/ mi gtsang bar ni blta bar gyis/ rnyed pa'i
289b2(dkon brtsegs): dri ma dag gis ni/ rnam dag sems ni spags ma byed/ rnam par grol la bsal bar byos/ bla med rnyed pa thob par 'gyur/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas lam bsgrubs la/ sangs rgyas chos nyid 'dra
289b3(dkon brtsegs): ber ltos/ chos kyi sgron cen rtag spar la/ 'jig rten kun ni snang bar gyis/ khyod kyi sems ni ri rgyal ltar/ mi g.yo nyid du rab tu byos/ kha don dang ni brdegs pa dang / thams cad bzod
289b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang du long / khyod ni sems can rnams kyi phyir/ dge bshes yang dag rab tu byos/ dman pa'i sems ni yongs spongs la/ rnam dag las ni rtag tu bsgrubs/ khyod kyi sems ni brtan
289b5(dkon brtsegs): byos la/ bla med chos ni rab tu ston/ mdo sde dam pa 'di lta bu/ brtse ba can la sbyin par gyis/ blo med ye shes gang tshel ba/ 'khor ba dag las 'jigs pa med/ des ni sdig pa rnam spang na/
289b6(dkon brtsegs): phan yon mchog ni thob par 'gyur// de per na blo dang ldan pa dang / me la spyod par mkhas pa gang / ro rnams sna tshogs sbyin byed kyang / me ni sreg par yong mi 'gyur/ gang zhig blo dang mi ldan pa/
289b7(dkon brtsegs): thabs dag la ni mi mkhas pas/ me khyer lag mthil gang gzhag pa/ mas ni rab tu bsreg par 'gyur/ ji ltar mi zhig dus ngag gis/ sems ni 'khrugs nas mos pa gang / me lar
289b8(dkon brtsegs): du bsros na ni/ de'i rgyu'i sos par 'gyur/ zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis/ blo dang ldan pa'ang de bzhin du/ yid brtan yi ni stong par rig/ de phyir 'khor bar gnas dang ni/ mig rten mig
290a1(dkon brtsegs): ka/ stong rig pas/ mig la mngon par zhed pa med/ gal te de ltar rangab shes na/ mig la gnas kyang nyon mongs med/ gal te mig ni stong rigs na/ yang dag ye shes 'grub par 'gyur/ yang dag
290a2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes thob pa'i phyir/ 'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ gal te mig nyid stong rig na/ 'dod chags dag ni gtan nas spongs/ 'dod chags dag ni med pa'i phyir/ 'od zer dag ni 'byung ba byur/
290a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang / ngar 'dzin 'cha ba dang khro ba dang / ser sna phrag dog ngo tsha med/ mi bzod sems ma tho ba dang / rgyags dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / g.yo sgyu dang ni bag mod dang /
290a4(dkon brtsegs): gya gyu las stsogs bar du yang / thams cad 'dod chags bzhin du bshad/ yang dag ye shes thob 'gyur/ mig ni zhi ba nyid du rtogs/ zhi ba nyid du rtogs rtag pa'i phyir/ 'od zer dag ni 'byung ba
290a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ yang dag yeshes thob gyur na/ sangs rgyas tshul la rab tu gnas/ tshul la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir/ 'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ yang dag ye shes thob gyur na/ sasa? rgyas thabs la
290a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur/ thabs la rab tu rmas pa'i phyir/ 'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ yang dag ye shes ma bsgrubs par/ sgrib pa dag ni gtan spongs zhing / 'od zer 'byung bar grub pa//
290a7(dkon brtsegs): nga sngon mthos ma mthong ngo // yang dag ye shes rab bsgrubs nas // sgrib pa'i gnod pa gtan spongs zhing / spod pa 'di rjes gang 'brang ba/ 'od zer 'byed pa thob par 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i spyod
290a8(dkon brtsegs): ba yongs tshol zhing / mdo sde 'di la bslab byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs la gang mchod pa/ yang dag ye shes thos thob 'gyur/ yang dag ye shes gang grub/ sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa gyes/
290b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer 'gyed pa rdzogs par 'gyur/ lag 'thil 'bras bu ci bzhin no// mig la bdag med gang rmongs pa/ dge sbyong chos ni nyams par 'gyur/ gang zab de'i sa de lta bu'i/ 'od zer
290b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byeng ba thob mi 'gyur/ mig la bdag med gang rtogs pa/ dge sbyong chos ni 'grub par 'gyur/ gang zab 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/ mig ni mtha' zang gang stogs par rna ba skye ba'i ma
290b3(dkon brtsegs): yang rtogs/ rna ba skye ba'i mtha' rtogs pa/ dge sbyong chen po mchog ces bya/ gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ mtha' ni yongasu ma shes na/ mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag dang / yongasu shes par
290b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur bas/ gang zag de'i sa de lta bu'i/ 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/ gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ mtha' ni yongasu shes gyur na/ mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang / yongasu shes
290b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du 'gyur/ gang zag de'i de lta bu'i/ 'od zer 'gyel ba thob par 'gyur/ gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ mtha' ni legs par ma shes na/ mig ni skyed pa'i mtha' dag kyang / legs pa nyid
290b6(dkon brtsegs): du mig shes pas/ gang zag de'i sa de lta bu'i/ 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/ gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ mtha' ni legs par shes gyur na/ mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la/ leg pa nyid
290b7(dkon brtsegs): du shes 'gyur bas/ gang zag de'i sa de lta bu'i/ 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/ gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ mtha' ni mngon sum gyur mi shes na/ mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag lta/ mngon
290b8(dkon brtsegs): sum nyid du mi shes pa/ gang zag de'i sa de lta bu'i/ 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/ lta te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ mtha'i na mngon sum shes 'gyur na/ mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag dang / mngon
291a1(dkon brtsegs): sum nyid du rab shes pas/ gang zag de'i sa de lta bu'i/ 'od zer 'byed pa thob par 'gyur/ gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ mtha' ni leg par shes na/ mig ni skye ba'i
291a2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag kyang / yongs su shes par mi 'gyur bas/ gang zag de 'is de lta bu'i/ 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/ galta te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ mtha' ni legs pa sheswA ni/ mig ni skye ba
291a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag dang / mngon sum du ni shes 'gyur bas/ gang zag de'i sa de lta bu'i/ 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/ gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/ nam dag legs par ma shes na/ rna ba'i ngo //
291a4(dkon brtsegs): bo rnam dag la/ legs pa nyid du mi shes pas/ gang zag de'i sa de lta bu'i/ 'od zer bgyed pa thob mir 'gyur/ gal te mig gi blo nyid/ rnam dag legs par shes gyur na/ rna ba'i ngo bo rnan
291a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa/ legs pa nyid du rtogs 'gyur bas/ gang zag de des de lta bu'i/ 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/ 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin sna dang lce dang lus/ yid dang /
291a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sgra dri ro dang / reg bya chos dang sa chu dang / me rlung dag gi rdos po dang / 'jig rten sdug bsngal phu po dang / khams dang 'jig rten skyes mched dang / sgra dang ming la stsogs pa yang /
291a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de bzhin rig par gyis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol
291a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing / 'od zer 'gyed pa de lta bu yong su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa nges/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnam pa brgyad cu po 'di dag mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di ste
291b1(dkon brtsegs): ste sems can yongs su gzung zhing rjes su dran pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / tshul khrims yongasu dag par srung zhing / nyams par mi byed pa dang / sems shin tu mnyam pa dang / g.yo sgyu med pa dang /
291b2(dkon brtsegs): sar sna med pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / 'dod chags kyi bum pa med pa dang / bslab pa'i bsam pa med pa dang / theg pa chen po mdo sde dam pa dag la mngon par yid ches pa dang / dbang phyug dang
291b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyags pa la zhen cing sring ba med pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang / smon lam phyir mi ldog pa dang / bams pa shin du rnam par dag par gyur pa dang / dgon pa la gnas pa dang / 'khor
291b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mi rten pa dang / rnyed la mi rten pa dang / grags pa la mi rten pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la rab du gnas pa dang / 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin rab tu ston pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa
291b5(dkon brtsegs): dag la sgyu med par rim 'gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa chungs par spyong ba dag la mchog gis bsam pa skyed pa dang / chos la gus pa'i phyir mkhan po dang sngo dpon la shin du bkur ba dang / mdo sde'i don rab
291b6(dkon brtsegs): tu rtog pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa l+la du mkhas pa dang / tshig smra ba rnams la mi bden pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bskyed pa la brtso/
291b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rtag tu sbyin pa gnong pa dang / bdud kyi las rab tu rtogs pa dang / dbang po rnams dam du srung ba dang / migs rab tu brtags pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa
291b8(dkon brtsegs): sa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang / gzugs zad mi shes pa la yongs su chog pa dang / lus dang srog la phangs pa med pa dang / 'khor bzhi po dag la rje su
292a1(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed pa dang / 'dzin rten pa'i bsam pa yongs su bcud pa dang / 'jig rten phyi ma'i chos med de zhes zer ba'i log
292a2(dkon brtsegs): par lta ba rnams spangs pa dang / da drung ma bslab pa dgal gya rgyu mtshan ma mi ston pa dang / gang bslab par gyur pa dag la ni ci nus kyis rnam par phye nas/ rab tu ston pa dang / ku dang
292a3(dkon brtsegs): rol me'i sgra dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / rgyan dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / bden pa rnams yang dag par zhugs pa dang / mang du thos pa'i
292a4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa dang / gnyid rab tu spangs pa dang / yang dag pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa dang / sangs rgyas lags pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed
292a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'jig rten gyi las yongs su spangs pa dang / bslab pa'i gnas rnams la yang dag par brtson pa dang / chos la srod pa'i phyir/ grogs khyad par can la bston par byed pa dang /
292a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su tshol ba la skyo ba med pa dang / rab tu byung ba la shin tu mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos srung zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / sdig pa'i las mi
292a7(dkon brtsegs): slong ba dang / bstan pa rnams pa the tsom med pa dang / dpes ston pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang / gsang ba rnam par phye nas ston pa byed pa dang / byang chub chen po yongs su tshol ba la
292a8(dkon brtsegs): ngal ba med pa dang / mdo sde yang dag par bzung ba rnams brjod par byed pa dge/ rang gi bslab pa pi spongs pa dang / pha rol gyi smra ba rnams tshang gcod pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam
292b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshol ba dang / spyod pa tshad med pa rnams mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / chos kyis ye shes de dag la sems nges par gyur pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu gsal bar mthong
292b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa dang / srid pa gsum po dag la chags pa med nga pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal spangs pa dang / mngon par yid ches pa dag la gnyen po rnam
292b3(dkon brtsegs): par bzhag nas sten par byed pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i bye brag rtogs par khong du chung ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' legs par shes pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi
292b4(dkon brtsegs): bltos pa dang / yongasu spong ba'i spyod pa dag la brtson 'grus kyis bsgrub par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byed kyi bkod pa dag pum sum tshogs par byed pa gang yin
292b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ni/ rnam pa brgyad cu zhes bya'o// gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos brgyad cu po 'di dag ni/ chos lnga'i nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste 'khor ba shes
292b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad pa shes pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa shes pa dang / bsod nams kyi 'bras bu shes pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang zla 'od
292b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu chos lnga po de dag ni/ chos gnyis kyi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro// gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste sems yongasu dag pas rab tu brgyan pa dang / gzugs yongasu dag pas rab tu brgyan
292b8(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon chos gnyis po de dag ni/ chos gcig gi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro// gcig gang zhe na 'di lta ste de bzhin pashes pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam
293a1(dkon brtsegs): n+ya/ par grol ba mngon par grub pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon chos rnam brgyad cu yod de/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thogs pa mi
293a2(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba'i rnam par 'grol ba legs par yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i chos dang / shes rab rgya chen por gyur pa dang / tshul khrim/
293a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa/ yongasu grub pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba dang bral ba dang / nga rgyal rab tu bcom pa dang / tshi ga mnyen pa dang / dngos po sna tshogs rab tu shes pa dang / dge ba'i
293a4(dkon brtsegs): grogs po yongs su shes pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi go che bgos dang / sprod lam gyis sems can 'dul ba dang / nyon mongs par lhung ba
293a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi the tsom rab du gcod pa dang / mi dge ba rnams la slong cing / chos dkar po rnams mngon par 'grub pa dang / mi dge ba'i grogs po dang / mi 'grogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
293a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams bskyed pa la yongasu skyo ba med pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / brtson 'bras rab tu rtsob pa dang / bdud kyi dngos po rab tu rtogs pa dang / bden parnabs mngon duH
293a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / yang dag pa kho nas mchod pa byed pa dang / the tshom yongasu gcod pa dang / sems kyis rtag tu sems can yongs su bzla bar sems pa dang / srid pa rnams la mngon par zhen
293a8(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / sems rgya chen po yongasasu bskyed pa dang / sems can mi dge ba rnams la nyes dmigs yang dag par ston pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rab du spong ba dang /
293b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i phan pa yongs su mi tshol ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'chos pa dang / 'phags pa rnams la gus pa skyed pa dang / theg pa chen/
293b2(dkon brtsegs): po la gnas pa dag la rten cing rim mgro byed pa dang / theg pa dman pa dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dag thag ring du spong ba dang / phyir rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang /
293b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po bshams nas/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems kyis dbul bar byed pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa dang / spobs pa phun
293b4(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa dang / dpe sna tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i chos rab tu ston par byed pa dang / stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang 'ga' bar mi byed pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba la le lo med pa dang / don zab
293b5(dkon brtsegs): mo yang dag par ston pa dang / bzungs chen po dang ldan pa dang / chos yang dag par ston par byed kyang / mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / chos rgya cher spel bar byed pa dang / yongs
293b6(dkon brtsegs): su 'dren pa la cho ga shes pa med pa dang / spyod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa
293b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi dge ba rnams kyis bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang / dge ba'i las yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / phung po rnams khong du chud par dang / lta ba rnams rab tu spongs pa dang / rgyu'i
293b8(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang / spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa dang / spyod yul ma yin pa yongs su spangs pa dang / yongs su dang ba bskyed pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la gang
294a1(dkon brtsegs): cubya/ pa dang / theg pa chen po la rab tu dga' ba dang / mnyam pa nyid du yongs su sdud par bde pa dang / bdag med pa la mngon par ma chags pa dang /
294a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba yongs su skye ba med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su tshol ba la mos dang / 'dod pa chung ba'i phyir dgon pa la gnas pa dang / rta tu bsod snyoms slong zhing le lo
294a3(dkon brtsegs): med par gyur pa dang / ji tsam snyed pa de nyid kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / khrel med pa spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par byed pa dang / dge ba'i
294a4(dkon brtsegs): thogs po dang lhan cig gnas pa dang / bdag gi zla ma yin pa rnams tu spongs pa dang / so so skye bo rnams la snyed brtse ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa dang mthun par byed pa dang /
294a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la shin tu dad pa dang / snod ma yin pa yongs su spong ba dang / mi mthun pa rnams la tshig sbyin par mi byed pa dang / gsol ba mi 'debs pa dag la yang dag par
294a6(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed pa dang / gsol ba 'debs pa zhig 'ongs na ci rigs par ston par byed pa dang / zas la sdom par byed pa dang / rtag tu gtong zhing mnyam pa nyid du gtong ba dang / sgro
294a7(dkon brtsegs): bo phye nas gtong bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di dag ni/ zla 'od gzhon nu chos rnam pa brgyang cu zhes bya ste/ 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thobs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par
294a8(dkon brtsegs): grol ba thob par byed do/ de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa chos de lta bu thob pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/
294b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas mi gzad mtha' mkhyen pas/ de slang rnamangag ye shes ston mdzad lags/ rnam dag ye shes ston par mdzad pas na/ rnam dag 'od zer phun sum tshogs pa lags/
294b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas mig bdag med mkhyen pas/ de slang rnam dag dbyangs ni ston mdzad lags/ rnam dag dbyangs ni ston par mdzad pa lags/ rnam dag ye shes ston par
294b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pas na/ rnam dag 'od zer phun sum tshogs pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas mig bdag med mkhyen pas/ de slang rnams dab dbyangs ni ston mdzad lags/ rnam dang /
294b4(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs ni ston par mdzad pas na// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi mtshan nyid phun tshogs lags/ bcom ldan 'dang sngon ni sems can pan gdags pas/ de slad rnam dag gsung ni rdzogs pags/
294b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag gsung ni yongs su rdzogs pas na/ 'jig rten chad med rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid stong mkhyen pas/ de slad kun 'dzin mkhyen pa
294b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa lags/ kun 'dzin mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpab med ston/ de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khyad par mkhyen/ mig
294b7(dkon brtsegs): gi khyad par dag ni mtha' ma mchis/ mkhyen snying ni dpag tu ma mchis pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dbab med ston/ sangs rgyas yi ge khyad par sgom mkhyen pas/
294b8(dkon brtsegs): mig stong yi ge bral bar rab tu mkhyen/ mig stong yi ge bral bar mkhyen pasam de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dbag med stong / gang zhig mig la bdag med rab
295a1(dkon brtsegs): sems pa/ mjug med par sems pa/ sangs rgyas gsung ni bden pa nyid du rtogs/ sangs rgyas gsung ni bden par rtod/
295a2(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer nges par sten/ bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul mchog ni yongs su rdzogs pas/ mig gi 'jig pa dpag med thugs su chud/ mig gi 'dzag
295a3(dkon brtsegs): ba rab tu mkhyen pas na/ 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ mig gi skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen/ ji ltar bcom ldan mi/
295a4(dkon brtsegs): gi skye mkhyen pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ de bzhin rna ba rna dang lce lus yid/ gzugs snga dri ro reg bya dag dang chos/ 'jig rten skye dang 'gag dang ming las
295a5(dkon brtsegs): stsogs/ thams cad la yang de bzhin rab du mkhyen/ thugs rje chen po rkang nyis mchog 'gyur ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa phun sum tshogs/ ji ltar bcom ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol byed
295a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog 'gyur ba/ tshul khrims rnams dag pha rol byon dang ldan/ ji ltar bcom ldan tshul khrims pha rol byon/
295a7(dkon brtsegs): bdab kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog 'gyur ba/ bzod pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ ji ltar bcom ldan bzod pa'i pha rol byo/ bang
295a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang ring por thobs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog 'gyur ba/ brtson 'grus pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ ji ltar bcom ldan brtson 'grus pha rol byon/
295b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ bsam gtan pha rol byon pa phun sum chog/ ji ltar bcom ldan pa sam gtan pha rol byon/
295b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ shes rab pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ ji ltar bcom ldan shes rab pha rol byon/
295b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen por rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ chos sku pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ ji ltar bcom ldan chos sku pha rol byon
295b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ rnam dag gzugs ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag
295b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ldan pa/ ba ba kyang ring por mi tho bas de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur/ rnam dag yid ni dpag med phun sum tshogs// ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag
295b6(dkon brtsegs): yid ldan pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur ba/ yon tan mchog ni dpag med phun sum tshog/ ji ltar bcom ldan rnamadag
295b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mchog ldan pa/ bdab kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin sheg/ thugs rje chen po dang gnyis mchog byung ba/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dpag med phur sum tshogs/ ji ltar bcom
295b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan bzugs kyi mtshan ldan pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin sho ba/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur ba/ rnam dag sgra ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/ ji ltar bcom lda
296a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag sgra ldan pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thob de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang nyis gyur pa/ rdzu 'phrul chen po dpag med phun sum tshogs/ ji ltar
296a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul che ldan pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi 'ogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang nyis mchog byung ba/ sems can 'dul slang srid pa gsum na bzhugs/ ji
296a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar bcom ldan sems can 'dul mdzad pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thob de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang zhes mtshogs gyur/ 'khor ba'i spyod pa dpag med dag las
296a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'khor ba'i spyod 'das pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin sho ga/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ 'dod chags spyong
296a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dpag med dag las 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod chags spyod pA/ bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen dang gnyis mchogs gyur pa//
296a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan zhe sdang slod 'das pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mcheg gyur
296a7(dkon brtsegs): gti mu go sbyong pa dpag med dag las 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan ci mug spyod 'ongs pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa
296a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod tshogs zhe sdang sprod pa dpag med 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod chags spyod 'das pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis
296b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog gyur pa/ zhe sdang gti mug spong ba dpag med pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan zhe sdang rmongs spyod 'das/ bdag kyang ring por mi thob de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis
296b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog gyur pa/ 'dod chags gti mug sprod pa dpag med pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod rmongs spod 'das pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ thugs rje chen po rkang
296b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mchog byung ba/ cha mnyam spyod pa dpag med yang dag 'das/ ji ltar bcom ldan tshe mnyam spyod 'das pa/ bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/ 'dron pa
296b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dag las yongs 'das pa/ 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/ bdag kyang ring 'dra'i ye shes grub par
296b5(dkon brtsegs): shog// 'dren pa zhe sdangs dag la yongs 'das pa// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pa na 'dogs pa// bdag kyang 'dren pa'i ye
296b6(dkon brtsegs): shes grub pa ra shog// 'dren pa gti mug spyod pa yongs 'das pa// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad// ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pa na 'dogs pa// bdag
296b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'dren pa'i ye shes grub par shog// 'dren pas 'dod chags zhe sdang spyod 'das/ 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dog mdzad/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pan
296b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs mdzad// bdag kyang 'dren pa'i ye shes grub par shogs/ 'dren pa zhe sdang gti mug spyod 'das pa// 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/ ji ltar
297a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang 'dren pa'i ye shes grub par shogs/ 'dren pas 'dod chags gti mug spyod 'das pa/
297a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dog mdzad/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pan 'dogs pa/ bdag kyang 'dren pa'i ye shes grub par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa
297a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pa/ lha nogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/ bdag kyang 'dren pa'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ lha mi kha le sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin bshegs pa'i
297a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa mchog ldan pa/ klu tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gsheg
297a5(dkon brtsegs): ba mkhyen pa mchog ldan pa/ gnod sbyin mang po thams cad 'dul bar gyur/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ lha mi khe lo sbyar ba'i ston par shog/ de
297a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pa/ dri za thams cupA 'dul mdzad cing / de bzhin grul bum dpag du ma mchis pa/ 'khor bcas ji snyed rab du 'dul
297a7(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad/ bdag kyang 'dren pa'i ye shes grub byur nas/ lce mi 'khor lo sbyar ba'i ston par shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ chos
297a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang dag don ni rab du mkhyed/ bdag kyang de 'dri'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ yang dag de la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sdug bsngal
297b1(dkon brtsegs): zad mtha' mkhyim skye dgu thams cad la ni pan 'dogs marjed/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes zu gyur nas/ sdug bsngal zad la the tsom ma chis shog/ de bzhin gshegs
297b2(dkon brtsegs): bas rgya zad mtha' mkhyen pas/ skye dgu thams cad la ni ngani 'dogs mdzad/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'brub 'gyur nas/ rgyu zad del the tsom ma mchis shog/ dmas
297b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ 'jig rten spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grur 'gyur nas/ 'jig rten spyod pa the tsom ma mchos
297b4(dkon brtsegs): shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/ 'jig rten gnas dang gnas med rab tu mkhyen/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas/ 'jig rten
297b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la ni phar bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pa/ 'jig rten las dang 'bras bu du mkhyen/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/
297b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rte/ thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pa/ 'jig rten rang bzhin sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen
297b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes thob 'gyur nas/ 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid sho/ de bzhin gshegs nga mkhyen pa
297b8(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pas/ thams cang kun tu 'gro ba'i spyod pa mkhyen/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/ 'jig rten thams cad la ni ban bgyid
298a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten mos pa sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
298a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen// de dag kyang
298a3(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// bsam gtan spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/
298a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// rnam par thar pa'i spyod pa rab tu mkhyen
298a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// cha mnyam sprod pa dag ni rab tu
298a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// snyoms 'jug spyod pa dam/
298a7(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba rab mkhyen nas// 'khor ba nyon mongs rgyu las/
298a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes par mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab mkhyen pas// 'jig rten pan
298b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs dpe' zla yongs ma mchis// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa tig 'dzin rab gnas pas/
298b2(dkon brtsegs): khyad par thabs kyi ye shes bskyed par mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa
298b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pas// sngon gyi gnas ni spyod pa dpag med mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs
298b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'chi 'pho skye ba bdag med rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin
298b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// nyon mong zad pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog
298b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// bla med byang chub yang dag sangs rgyas mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan
298b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// nyon mongs pag chags dag ni rab tu spangs// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad
298b8(dkon brtsegs): ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas// 'khor ba'i nges 'byung chos ni rab tu ston// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la
299a1(dkon brtsegs): ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos don rab mkhyen pas// sems can dpag med dag ni go bar mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub
299a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur nas/ 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos nyid sgyu ma dang / rmi lam smig rgyu lta bur rab tu mkhyen/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub 'gyur
299a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad kyis// yi ge dag kyang brjod par rab tu mkhyen// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes
299a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mchog ldan pa// dam chos zab mo dag ni ston par mdzad// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye she
299a5(dkon brtsegs): 'grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsung thugs 'dul bas// thams cad ye shes rjesu 'brang bar mdzad// bdag kyang
299a6(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// 'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum rab mkhyen nas// 'dzin dang chags pa mi mnga' thogs
299a7(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang // shes rab grub pas do las ldog mi 'gyur// bdag kyang de la
299a8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam grol rab bsgrubs pas// rnam grol mkhyen dang gzigs pa ltos
299b1(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga' bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgrubs/
299b2(dkon brtsegs): lha mi 'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen/
299b3(dkon brtsegs): ba mchog ldan pas// 'jig rten chos rnams la ni zhen mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grob 'gyur nas// khams gsum thugs rje chen po gtsor gyur cig/ de bzhin
299b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas 'jig rten rab mkhyen pas// 'gro ba sna tshogs dag ni gas bar gzigs// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// 'gro ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog
299b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas// de slad de la rmongs pa yongs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// skye zad nyid la the tsom ma mchis shog/
299b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rab zhi mtha' mkhyen pas// de slad de la rmongs pa yongs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// 'khor ba de la the tsom ma mchis shog
299b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor ba'i mtha' mkhyen pas// de slad de la rmongs pa yongs mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// 'khor ba de la the tsom ma mchis
299b8(dkon brtsegs): shog/ de bzhin gsheg pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen// de slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// snga phyi mtha' la the tsom ma
300a1(dkon brtsegs): @/ mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye bzlog mtha' rab mkhyen// de slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur na//
300a2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba zlog la the tshom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen// mig gi rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas/
300a3(dkon brtsegs): snga phyi mtha' la the tsom ma mchis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen lnga// mig gi rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mngag/ bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 'grub 'gyur nas// skye
300a4(dkon brtsegs): zad nyid la the tsom ma mchis shog/ gang zhig sngon dang phyi mtha' ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed// de bzhin gshegs de ni rab mkhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi
300a5(dkon brtsegs): mnga'// gang zhig yong med mtha' ni ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig
300a6(dkon brtsegs): yod med mtha' ni ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig zad dang ma zad ma
300a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas// de slang 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// gang zhig 'jug ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod
300a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dag la zhen pa bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas// de slang 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags khong khro 'chab// g.yo sgyu phrag dog pa
300a9(dkon brtsegs): 'jug dang
300b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal khengs pa dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhonur gyu
300b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyi rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu rab tu bkye'o// 'od zer des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med dpag tu med pa
300b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag du phan pa dag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nyid du thim
300b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dug pa'i stan las blangs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig du gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom
300b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus// 'brag dang
300b6(dkon brtsegs): seng ge sgra sgrogs shing // ka la ping ka'i sgra phyung nas// chos rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin pa/ ci'i slad du 'dzum pa mdzad// nyi ma stong pas khyad par 'phags/ rnam dag sgra rab dag dang ldan/ yon
300b7(dkon brtsegs): tan ngo mcher rab tu mngal// ci slad 'od zer 'byed par mdzad// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab rang brgyan pas// thams cad dag ni yongs rdzogs pa/
300b8(dkon brtsegs): ci slad 'od zer 'gyed par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mnyan pas// ngag rtsub rnams ni rab tu spangs// sems can nad ni legs gso ba// ci slad 'od zer
301a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyed par mdzad// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso// mig ni rtag tu stong dben mkhyen// rnam dag tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bas// sems can rnam
301a2(dkon brtsegs): la chos ston mdzad// rna ba sna lce lus dad yid// sgra dang ming las stsogs pas na// kun 'byung 'gog pa'i lam dag dang // ye shes bzod pa rab de bzhin// thugs rje chen po
301a3(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis gtso// mig zad skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang // rab zhi dang ni 'khor ba dag/ thams cad stong dben nyid du mkhyen// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas//
301a4(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang ming las stsogs pa'i bar// thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no// gzhan yang rten cing 'brel 'byung chos// chad dang rtag pa yongs bral dang // bdag dang gzhan gyis byas min
