301a5(dkon brtsegs): pas rkyen mang las byang nyid du gsungs// res 'ga' rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis// sdug bsngal bzhi ni ston par mdzad// res 'ga' don ni sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas 'od
301a6(dkon brtsegs): zer bsngags par mdzad// res 'ga' tshig ni tshad med kyis// rab dben chos ni ston mdzad cing // gang zag srog dang dag med dang // sems can med pa nyid du ston// 'das pa'i sangs
301a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas tshad med kyang // bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis// tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis// de 'dra'i chos ni ston par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog/ yang dag nyid
301a8(dkon brtsegs): ni ston mdzad kyang // brjod dang brjod bya mi mnga' bas// brjod mdzad chos kyang yongs mi mnga'// bcom ldan yang dag chos gsung zhing // skye dag rnams ni go mdzad pas// lha rnams
301b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni gnod sbyin dang // gang thos de dag rtogs par 'gyur// lha ma yin ni thams cad kyang // mos pa dag ni rnam par dag/ mi ni mang po tshad med kyang // the tsom dra ba bcad par 'gyur//
301b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags rang bzhin rab tu rtogs// zhe sdang gti mug rnam par bshig/ sred dang nga rgyal ma rig dang // g.yo sgyu phrag dog spros nas// sdug bsngal phung po la stsogs par// thams
301b3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang ni yongs su spangs// 'di la stsogs pa cig gi don// mthar ni kun kyang rnam par dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig la// sna tshogs ming ni rab mkhyen pas// grang
301b4(dkon brtsegs): ni brgya stong mang po nas// bsam gyi mi khyab bar du ston// sangs rgyas tshad med mang po las// de 'dra'i chos ni legs bslabs pa ni// chos kyi dngos po gcig la yang // brjod pa thug
301b5(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa ston// de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams kyi// rnam grangs sna tshogs rab mkhyen pas// ming tshig dang po bar ma dang // tha ma rnams 'byed rab tu mkhyen// tha dad tshig ni sna
301b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dag/ thams cad rab tu bslab pas ni// don mchog dag ni gya nom pa// ston pa dag la rab tu mkhyen// de 'dra'i dbyangs ni rnam dag pa// rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung bas// lce
301b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ba' shig la brten pa nas// lus sems rab la brten pa min// sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos// phyogs bcu'i 'khor ni yongs 'dus nas// thal sbyar bcom ldan zhal lta na// the tsom
301b8(dkon brtsegs): dag ni bsal du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pas mi zad dang // skye mtha' dag ni rang bzhin gyis// rtag tu stong zhing dben pa dang // 'gro 'ong med par rab tu mkhyen// bzhugs dang gnas ni mi
302a1(dkon brtsegs): @#mnga' bas// yang dag mtha' la rab tu bzhugs// bcom ldan spyan ni thogs mi mnga'// de slad deng bdag zhu ba lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mi nyid kyi//
302a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag kyang // zad dang ma zad 'khor ba ni// rang bzhin stong dben rab mkhyen pas// chos kyi don rnams rab phye nas// 'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar mdzad// thub
302a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dbyangs snyan rab mnga' ba// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan sngon dang phyi mtha' dang // mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen cing // rnam rtog tshig dang bral lags na// ci
302a4(dkon brtsegs): slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan mig ni dpag med dang // brjod pa sna tshogs rang bzhin gyis// rtag tu stong dben mkhyen lags na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston pa mdzad//
302a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan zad dang skye mtha' dang // mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen cing // nyon mongs rnams ni yongs spangs nas// sangs rgyas byang chub mkhyen pa brnyes// bgrags pa mchog ni phun
302a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan yun rings bsgoms bslab pas// bsam gyis mi khyab ston par mdzad// mig nyid stong pa nyid du mkhyen// dri bral rtog
302a7(dkon brtsegs): nas rnam par dag/ sems kyi spyod pa tshad med rnams// dgongs pa gcig gi thams cad mkhyen// 'od zer 'jig rten snang mdzad pa// 'di ni gang gi snga rtags lags// drang
302a8(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po mngon sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyad par 'phags// nyon mongs dag ni rab bsal bas// thugs ni rtag tu zhi zhing dben// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen mchog
302b1(dkon brtsegs): gis// mig zad mtha' ni rab tu rtogs// rgyu dang rkyen ni gang gi slad// deng 'dir 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi// sgra
302b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ming la stsogs pa'i bar// thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no// bcom ldan mig las bdag med mkhyen// rna ba mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sna nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum
302b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan lce la bdag med mkhyen// lus kyang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sems nyid stob par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom
302b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan gzugs la bdag med mkhyen// sgra yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// dri nyid steng par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan ro la bdag med mkhyen/
302b5(dkon brtsegs): reg bya mi rtag nyid du rtogs// chos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad mdzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan sa la bdag med mkhyen// chu yang mi rtag nyid du mkhyen// me nyid
302b6(dkon brtsegs): stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan rlung lta bdag med mkhyen// ngo bo mi rtag nyid du rtogs// dongos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad
302b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum par ston par mdzad// bcom ldan 'jig rten bdag med mkhyen// sdug bsngal mi rtag nyid du rtogs// phung po stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//
302b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan khams la bdag med mkhyen// 'jig rten mi rtag nyid du rtogs// skye nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan sgral badrag med mkhyen//
303a1(dkon brtsegs): ming yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// lam nyid stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan ye shes bdag med mkhyen// rab dben
303a2(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag nyid du rtogs// sems can stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med// bdag kyang bdag med pa yang med// mos pa
303a3(dkon brtsegs): stong par rab mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// 'khor ba bdag med nyid du gzigs// rtag dang mi rtag pa yang mkhyen// mya ngan 'das pa stong mkhyen no// ci slad 'dzum pa
303a4(dkon brtsegs): ston par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnam grol// grags pa khams gsum kun tu gang // brgya byin mi g.yo dbang po dang // klu las stsogs pa kun gyis mchod// de bzhin gshes
303a5(dkon brtsegs): ba mig zad dang // skye mtha' rab dben mkhyen lags na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// sangs rgyas sras ni tshad med pa// 'khor 'dir thams cad rab tu 'dus// sangs rgyas
303a6(dkon brtsegs): gsung las skyes pa dang // chos las sprul te gang byung ba// thams cad bcom ldan spyan dar mchis// gus par thal mo rab sbyar lags// 'khor 'dus de dag slad du ni// 'od zer
303a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu rkyen 'di zhu lags// de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid ni// stong zhing bdag med mkhyen pas na// khyims na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// thams cad las ni yang dag 'das//
303a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnam ni// bye brag med cing mnyam mkhyen pa// bcom ldan dgongs pas rab mkhyen gyi// rdzu 'phrul dag gi gzigs ma yin// bcom ldan mig la bdag
303b1(dkon brtsegs): med mkhyen// ngo bo nyid stong 'gro 'od med// rnam dag mkhyen pa tshad ma mchis// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//
303b2(dkon brtsegs): bam po gsum pa'o// / de bzhin gshegs pa skye mtha' rab zad pa// thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten kun skyong mdzad// chos rje mchog gyur mi'i gtsor gyur pa//
303b3(dkon brtsegs): ci slad 'dzum pas bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshad ma mchis// gzhan yang lha tshogs gzi byin che ba rnams// mkha' la gdugs ni dam pa kun
303b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang thogs// sa chen 'di ni rab tu g.yos par 'gyur// gang zhig sngon ni de bzhin gshegs pa las// yun ring dge ba'i chos ni gang bsgrubs pa// mnyam par dga' bar mdzad
303b5(dkon brtsegs): par thugs rje'i gtso// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshed du gsol// gang zhig sngon ni sangs rgyas rab mchod nas// chos 'di thos na dga' ba rab skyed pas// 'dren pa rab
303b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog mi'i gtsor gyur pa// de slad 'dzum pa ston par bshad du gsol// bcom ldan gsung ni mang po dga' mdzad pas// bya rgyal ngang pa bzhin du dbyangs rab snyan// sgra
303b7(dkon brtsegs): snyan tshad med rang gi ngang las byung // ci slad 'od zer 'di bkye bshad du gsol// tshig bshad bye ba tshad ma mchis pa yis// rje mthun gsung gi bsngags pa brjod 'gyur cing //
303b8(dkon brtsegs): kun ci ra'i sgra skad mchog ldan pas// ci smad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol// 'brug sgra zab mo mchog ni bstan pa'i sgras// 'jig rten brgya stong dpag med grags 'gyur ba/
304a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje tshigs rtsu ba yang na 'jam ston pa// ci srad 'od zer gser gyi rnyog bkye// skye dang mi skye zad mi zad mkhyen// mig nyid bral zhing 'gro 'ong med
304a2(dkon brtsegs): pa rtogs// 'jig rten snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i 'go gyur pa// ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye// ming gi 'byung ba rtag tu stong dben dang // 'gro 'ong ma mchis gnas pa ma mchi
304a3(dkon brtsegs): dang smig rgyu chu bur lta bur rab mkhyen pa// rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan lags// de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos rnams nas// sgra dang ming la stsog
304a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// rdo rje rtag pa'i sku dang mi 'jigs sku// mtshan mchog brgya stong dag ni phun sum tshogs// ska la 'khrul 'khor mi mnga' g.yo
304a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa// rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// byin pa zlum zhing zhabs kyi rting pa ring // phyal gyi mtshan ma mi mnga' seng ge 'dra// lte ba shin du zab cing skra rgyas pa/
304a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// gser ska rnam dag rdal dang dri ma spangs// ba spu re re kha dog mthon mthing ldan// g.yas su 'khyil cing spos kyi ngad ldan pa// rgyu
304a7(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol// sku mchog dam pa yongs rdzogs rtag gnas pa// dpe n+ya gro ta'i shing rgyal bzhin// yon tan thams cad kyis ni rab tu brgyan//
304a8(dkon brtsegs): gsung dbyangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad// dpung pa zlum zhing phrag pa sdug la mdzes// gtsug gtor yongs rdzogs g.yas su 'khyil par gda'// zhing ni brgya stong dpag
304b1(dkon brtsegs): me nga // sems na yo dang yang dgas sa stong ba dag/ mas dgar rnaMmasapa dung da nga// sngags can gyi na bu \u0f7f/
304b2(dkon brtsegs): seng ge 'dra zhing shangs kyang mgo// thams cad thabs dang rnam gzugs las skyes// ud pa la'i gsung ni zhal nas 'byung // can dang dri dag sgra ni kun tu khyag/ gi sngon gyi byas
304b3(dkon brtsegs): brgya chen bsgoms pas na// rnam dag mos pa rtag tu rgyur mi 'chad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mthil shin du mnyam// sa la reg kyang rdul no gos mi 'gyur// gom paseng ge
304b4(dkon brtsegs): glang po chen 'dra bas// 'jig rten thams cad las ni yang dag 'das// 'khor lo rtsibs stong mtshan gyis mdzes par brgyan// khyad 'phags 'od zer dag ni rtag du gsal//
304b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba dag gi skye dgu phan 'dogs pas// gang gis mthong ba dang ba rang du skyed// sor cig 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye na// sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag med snang bar mdzad// sngon gyi
304b6(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong mang po rab bsgrubs pas// mtshan gyi bkod pa sna tshogs 'di brnyes las// gzugs sgras yongs rdzogs dpe zla yongs ma mchis// zhal mtshan rab mdzes shin tu khyad
304b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags// rdzu 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// byin pa ri dgas e ne ya dang 'dra// ska dbyings mi dgu
304b8(dkon brtsegs): seng ge ci lta bzhin// 'jig rten 'byung nas 'jig rten snang mdzad pa// ji ltar 'dzum pa bstan pa bshad du gsol// cang shes bzhin du mtshan sbas rdul mi mnga'// phyag mthil
305a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam rgyas phyag ni pus mo 'das// mi'i seng ge ngo mtshar khyad par 'phags// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// skal 'od zer dpag med
305a2(dkon brtsegs): rab bkye zhing // kha dog gya nom rab zhi rtag gsal ba// rnam dag thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad// mdo sde tshad med pa dag ston par mdzad// rtag dang chad pa dag las gnas pa yin//
305a3(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i chos ni bsgrubs par 'gyur ma lags// bdag gis mtha' lha rnams ni rab spangs na// bcom ldan rnam dag sku ni myur thob 'gyur// lha rnga 'brug sgra gsung ni kun grag shing //
305a4(dkon brtsegs): ku lan tra ka'i dbyangs snyan rab tu gsal// lha'i glu sgra brgya stong mang ldan pa// ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol// 'dren pas gsung cig du ni chos bstan pas// 'chal
305a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshul khrims can dag rgyun ya 'chad// de bzhin gshegs pas dbyangs rab gang gsungs pa// de kun zab cing ngo mtshar mos lags so// khyu mchog smin mtshams 'od zer
305a6(dkon brtsegs): rab bkye bas// sangs rgyas zhing ni brgya stong gsal bas mdzad// sbyin mchog dag ni kha dog mthon mthing 'dra'o// gtsug tor mtshan ni na mkha'i lhas mi mthong // tshoms
305a7(dkon brtsegs): dkar gtams pa bzhi bcu dag dang ldan// dper na rin chen chu shel dag dang mtshungs// dge ba'i 'phrin las tshad med dag las skyes// ci slang 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad
305a8(dkon brtsegs): du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku// kha dog dam pa dpag med phun tshogs shing // 'od zer rnam dag ngo mtshar rab bkye bas// ci slad 'dzum pa
305b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan mdzad pa shad du gsol// thugs rje chen po mchog rgyal rkang gnyis gtso// sems can dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud// thogs pa ma mchis spobs pa mchog brnyes/
305b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ci smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol rab byon pas// rig pa gsum dang mngon shes drug phun tshogs// rnam dag 'od zer
305b3(dkon brtsegs): dpag med ston mdzad pa// ci smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan sngon gyi skal pa dpag med snyed// bcom ldan brgya stong snyed la mchod pa mdzad// de 'dra'i
305b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu 'bras chab ni mi 'tshal pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan sngon ni skal ba dpag med snyed// ting 'dzin mchog rnams la ni rab zhugs pa// mig
305b5(dkon brtsegs): gi skye mtha' zab pa'i mtha' mkhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar dus// 'dren pas de dag kun ni rab tu mkhyen// rnam
305b6(dkon brtsegs): dag mkhyen pa thogs med bsam mi khyab// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i mdun du// phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu
305b7(dkon brtsegs): brkyang ste// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo la bzhag nas// tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu shin tu lags par nyon// ngas ni ding 'dir byang chub chos// 'od zer
305b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston pa'i mdo// khyod la shin tu yongs gtad kyis// ma 'ongs tha ma dus ngan tshe// chos 'di rnam par 'jig pa na// khyod kyis sems can rnams la ni// rab tu phye nas
306a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gas la du / ma rgyunam / rjengs pa 'di dag las/
306a2(dkon brtsegs): mos gang ni mi mos pa// thams cad kun kyang mkhyen cing gzigs// sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// byang chub las ni rab tshol ba// rtag tu sangs rgyas rje dran zhing // mdo sde
306a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni gzung bar gyis// gang zhig dad pa rang 'jug cing // 'du 'dzi la ni mos 'gyur dang // nyin mtshan gnyis la gang dga' ba// mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// nga'i bstan
306a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dag la ni// rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i mchog dag la// mos pa dag ni mi skye ba// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// dad pas byin pa chud gson 'gyur// 'dus
306a5(dkon brtsegs): byas rnams kyi chos dag las// nyes migs mang bar thos kyang ni// 'jig rten dag ni mi skyob// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// mkhas pa rnams kyis smod par 'gyur// chos gos dag ni
306a6(dkon brtsegs): bgos gyur kyang // de la shes rab ci yang med// thugs las legs par gsungs pa yi// yang dag bka' ni gang yin pa// shes pa med pas thos gyur na// yid ches len par mi
306a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te// skyes bu blun po de dag dang // lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag/ gal te thos par gyur nas kyang // rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi/
306a8(dkon brtsegs): sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gang zag dag la ni// ngas ni rab tu smod par byed// mi lus thob par gyur mod kyi// de ni don chen chud zos yin// gal te shin tu zab pa'i
306b1(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di dag thos par gyur nas ni// rab tu dga' zhing mos pa'i// sems ni rab tu skye 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gang zag de dag ni// sngon cad sangs rgyas phrad pas na// gdon mi/
306b2(dkon brtsegs): za ba kho nar ni// bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// skyes bu blun po gang dag cig/ lta ba ngan pas rab smras nas// shes rab srog ni gcod byed pa// byang chub yongs su spong bar
306b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// de lta bas na mi dge ba'i// gshes nyen dag ni rab spangs nas// blo ldan mkhas pa dag la ni// bsten cing gus pa bskyed par bya// 'jig rten dag ni
306b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni// nyes migs tshad med gang yod dang // sems can ngan song gsum por ni// rtag du bying bar gang byed pa// thams cad gti mug rmongs pa'i// rgyu dang rkyen
306b5(dkon brtsegs): las byung bas na// 'ongs mongs rjes su 'jug byed cing // rang dbang dag ni thob mi 'gyur// yang dag chos ni spong byed cing // chos ma yin pa spyod par byed// de lta bas na rmongs
306b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i// skye bu dman pa spang bar bya// ci ltar kha lo sgyur ba'i// rang gi srog shing bcag pa bzhin// mi dge las ni byas na// sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// kha nas
306b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig ngan byung nas ni// rtag tu bdag la gnod byed pa// ji ltar sta re rnon thogs nas// rang gi lus ni gcod byed 'dra'// chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen dag gis// byas pa'i las kyi
306b8(dkon brtsegs): rjes su ni// rnam smin myong bas skyabs med par// de ltar khong du ma chud pas// 'jig rten drang srong la bsten nas// dge ba'i grogs po yin snyam sems// de nas
307a1(dkon brtsegs): rang nyid 'di snyam du// stong pa nyid ni gang sgom pa// 'dus ma byas ni rtogs snyam nas// chad par lta ba bskyed par byed// lus ni snod chags
307a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang 'dra'o// sems kyang rjes su 'gag 'gyur nas// phal cher khyal ba'i tshig dag la// mos pa nyid du rab 'gyur zhing // 'di la mngon par zhen pas na// phan pa'i don ni ci
307a3(dkon brtsegs): yang med// gal te sbrul ni gdug pa yis// gnod pa dag ni rab byas dang // nam yang skye dgu mang po rnams// ngan 'gro dag du ltung mi byed// blun po gang zhig chos ston pa//
307a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig byis pas// skye dgu mang po tshad med snyed// sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed// khyed las stsogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pas// 'di lta bur ni blta
307a5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyis// deng 'dir spun sngar ni// zla 'od gzhon na gang 'dus pa// 'di ni sngon cad 'das pa'i// sangs rgyas dag ni bcom ldan 'das// tshad med gang ga'i/
307a6(dkon brtsegs): klung bye snyed// mchod pa rim 'gro rab byas shing // shin tu bstan par yongs sgoms nas// zla med ye shes btsal bas na// srid pa dag ni thams cad la// sems kyis
307a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ci yang med// mig gi skye mtha' gtan tu ni// rnam par dag par shes pas na// spros pa dag ni yongs spangs nas// mngon par zhen pa ci yang med// sems can dang /
307a8(dkon brtsegs): ni tshad med la// phan pa dag ni byas pa'i phyir// bla med zla 'od gser ston pa'i// mdo sde dag ni ston par byed// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// chos 'di slob par mi nus pas//
307b1(dkon brtsegs): rnal 'byor sgom pa dag la ni// skyon nyid du ni blta bar byed// de lta bas na blun po dag/ thag ring por ni yongs spangs nas// de dag la ni sten mi bya// de'i chos kyang mi slong po//
307b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// rtsod pa'i sprul mos pas na// rtsod smra med pa'i spyod pa la// nan tan grub par mi nus pas// skyes bu de dag rnams la ni// tshul bzhin sems
307b3(dkon brtsegs): ni ci yang med// de lta bas na de dag la// bsnyen bkur mi bya ba sngags mi brjod// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// li lo snyoms las la gnas pas// rtag tu lus dang ngag yid
307b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ mi dge las ni spyad pas na// de la tshul khrims dag pa dang // shes rab mang thos ci yang med// rtag tu 'dod pa'i yul sems shing // 'du 'dzi dag la mos par
307b5(dkon brtsegs): byedakhyod kyis 'di ltar blun po de'i// rigs dang rus dang lus dang ni// dman pa yin par rab tu ltos/ bong khro bka' blo mi bde zhing // byang bzhin dag ni mi sdug la//
307b6(dkon brtsegs): gal te dge ba'i gnas bskyed kyang // lus ni rtag tu ma rabs 'gyur// bdag du 'du shes la zhen pas// yang dag don la rmongs par gyur// blo gros dgra dang mi ldan pas// /
307b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig gi bye brag dbye mi nus// rang bzhin stong pa'i chos thos kyang // de las mos pa skye mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// yun ring po nas 'jig rten
307b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshig ni spros pa gang yin pa// thams cad rab du spangs pa yin// so so skye bos 'di dag la// shin tu zhen cing chags pas na// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du yang // rtogs
308a1(dkon brtsegs): shing khong du chud mi 'gyur// tshul khrims bsngags pa brjod byed kyang // tshangs pa spyod pa grub mi byed// kha nas chos ni ston byed kyang // lus kyis chos
308a2(dkon brtsegs): min spyod par byed// rang gis 'dul ba ston byed kyang / rtag tu 'dul min spyod par byed// sangs rgyas slob ma dag la ni/ kha dog sgyur ba'i gos gyon gsungs// 'chal pa'i tshul
308a3(dkon brtsegs): khrims can dag gis// gos 'di rab du bgos gyur yang // nga rgyal dag ni dpag med pa'i// sems ni rab tu 'phel bar byed// dad pas byin pa ci zos pa// thu lum 'bar
308a4(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa 'dra// de ltar khyims kyi gnas spangs nas// 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba'ang med// gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos dag la// mchog gi bden pa ma thob nas// spyod pa 'dren
308a5(dkon brtsegs): ba mos byed pas// mtha' gnyis dag ni spong mi 'gyur// yid kyi mos pa ci snyed pa// thams cad kyang ni dag mi 'gyur// de 'dra'i gang zag blun po ni// 'khor mang nang du gnas
308a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang // dper na ji ltar wa skyes dag/ seng ge khyur ni zhugs pa bzhin// de ltar rab du zhi ba'i// chos 'di yang dag bstan byas kyang // de kho na nyid stong pa'i dod// brtag
308a7(dkon brtsegs): shing khong du ma chud pas// 'khor mang dag la bstan bsngags kyang / khengs pa'i sems ni bskyed par byed// ston pa chen po mi dran pas// ngo tsha dman pa'i sems kyang med// mi
308a8(dkon brtsegs): gtsang dpon po len byed kyang // yid bzhin nor bu thob pa bzhin// shin tu dga' bas 'dzin byed pas// sems kyis cung zad gtong mi byed// 'di lta bu'i ma rabs dag
308b1(dkon brtsegs): khyim nas rab tu byung nas ni// spyod lam dag kyang bsrung ba dag/ chos gos lhung bzed 'dzin byed cing // cha byad tsam dang ldan pas na// yang dag shes rab ci yang med//
308b2(dkon brtsegs): kha spu dag ni bregs gyur kyang // sdig pa'i sems ni mi spongs zhing // dge ba ma yin pa'i chos// log lha dag tu lhung gyur na// rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i lam// de dag rab
308b3(dkon brtsegs): tu nyams par 'gyur// dge sbyong mngon du bya ba'i// 'bras bu dag kyang thob mi 'gyur// ma rig nyon mongs rnams kyang ni// rdul tsam nyams par mi 'gyur ro// grong khyer
308b4(dkon brtsegs): dag du rnam rgyu zhing // rang bzhin dben pa'i sdug brjod kyang // skyes bu blun po blo med pas// yang dag bgrod pa shis mi 'gyur// sems kyi 'dun pa ci yod pa// de dag
308b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mi dge yin// rnyed pa 'dod pa rgyu'i phyir// dgon pa dag na gnas byed kyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag rgyu// bsgrub pa'i phyir ni ma yin no// rmugs dang gnyis
308b6(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu dga'// lus ni ji ltar bde snyam nas// rtag tu de lha'i dngos po dag/ 'grub pa la ni mos par byed// dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag du// lo ni mang por gnas byed kyang /
308b7(dkon brtsegs): phyin log lta bar gyur pa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das las stor pas na// nams kyang dge sbyong lam dag gi/ 'bras bu dag ni thob mi 'gyur// yang dag lta ba rab nyams
308b8(dkon brtsegs): shing / tshul khrims dag dang 'gal byas pas// gos bzang dag gis lus brgyan pa// de la shin tu rnyed par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i bde ba rnams la ni// rtag tu sred pa
309a1(dkon brtsegs): skyed par byed// gal te grong khyer zhugs pa na// nga rgyal mtshan ma ston byed cing // lus kyi las ni mi srung bas// spyod lam dag la gnas
309a2(dkon brtsegs): mi byed// res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs nas ni// rgya tshe rang nyid 'di skad du// dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag du// ri phug dag ni gang yod pa// khyed rnams 'di ltar shes
309a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyis// de ni bdag gi gnas yin te// mthon dman ran par blta ba dang // 'gro gom tshul la gnas so zhes// tha dad mtshan ma'i tshig brjod de// dgra bcom pa'i bstag
309a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas/ khyims pa dag ni ji snyed pa// phan tshun du ni 'di skad du// dgon pa'i dge gang yin pa// yang dag 'phags pa yin zhes zer// res 'ga' dgon pa de dag la/
309a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe// gal te gzhan dag 'ongs gyur na// 'di lta bur ni ston par byed// bdag ni dgon gnas 'di dag du// nyin mtshan 'chag par byed zhes 'am// yang
309a6(dkon brtsegs): na rtsa 'jam bting nas ni// 'dir ni 'dug par byed ces zer// res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs gyur nas// khyim pa'i der ni phyin pa'i tshe// g.yo smras nan tan 'di skad du// bde
309a7(dkon brtsegs): ngam zhes ni dri bar byed// 'jig rten po'i 'du 'jig tam// rgyal po'i chom rkun la sgrogs pa'i// sna tshogs dag ni brjod par byed// res 'ga' chags pa'i sems
309a8(dkon brtsegs): dag gis// bud med rnams kyi mdun dag du// thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rang gi yon tan brjod par byed// bdag ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi// bsod nams zhing
309b1(dkon brtsegs): ni chen po byed// bdag ni rgyal thabs rab spangs nas// rab du byung nas lam bsgoms yin// btsun mo dang ni slas rnams dang // mtho ris skye bar 'gyur zhes zer// de dang
309b2(dkon brtsegs): de skad thos nas ni// shin tu gus pa rab bskyed de// gos zas dag ni btang ba dag/ sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par byed// btsun pas thugs rje rab dgongs shing // /
309b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag thad du yang gshegs zer// ro zhim dag la zhin chags shing // nyes mig rnams ni mi shes pas// bdud kyis glags kyang rnyed 'gyur te// rus sbal rgya mos
309b4(dkon brtsegs): zin pa 'dra// dgon par gnas par dag la yang // rnyed pa dag gis bsnyams par byed// dge slong brtson 'grus can dag la// brnyas te skur pa 'debs par byed// rnyed
309b5(dkon brtsegs): dang grags pas sems rmongs pas// yang nas yang du zhen pa bskyed// lus ni yongs su gso ba'i phyir// rtag tu g.yo sgyu sprod pas na// lus dang ngag gi mi dge'i
309b6(dkon brtsegs): las/ yang dang yang du 'phel bar byed// gal te sbyin bdag dad pa yi// dang ba'i sems kyis chos na yang // le lo snyom las dbang gis na// de'i bsod nams bri
309b7(dkon brtsegs): bar byed// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// rtag tu mi dge 'dod bskyed pas// stong pa nyid kyi chos 'di la// rjes mthun bzod sems thob mi 'gyur// gang dag nga'i bstan pa
309b8(dkon brtsegs): las/ nyes mig de dag rab spangs na// nan tan bag yod bsgrub byed na// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// rnyed pa dang ni mi rnyed dang // stod smad sdug bsngal bde
310a1(dkon brtsegs): las stsogs// 'jig rten chos kyis mi g.yos pas// chos 'di thob par dga' mi 'gyur// lus la mi gtsang 'du shes dang // phung po rma'i 'du shes
310a2(dkon brtsegs): dang // zas ni rma bskus 'du shes pa// chos 'di thob par bka' mi 'gyur// gos bzangs dag ni thob gyur kyang // dregs pa dag ni mi bskyed cing // ngo tsha dga' phyir
310a3(dkon brtsegs): go gyon pa// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// gzugs dang stob ni mi bsnyems shing // zas la chags pa med pa dang // srog gnas phyir ni gang zab// chos 'di
310a4(dkon brtsegs): thob par bka' mi 'gyur// srid pa rnams ni stong shes nas// 'dod pa dag la blang dor med// rtag tu stong dben gang spyod pa// chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur// dpag
310a5(dkon brtsegs): tshad gcig 'das ri khrod du// gcig pu 'dug nas mnyam bzhag cing // 'dus byas bdag med gang rtogs pa// chos 'ad thob par bka' mi 'gyur// mig zad skye ba'i mtha'
310a6(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang // mig 'dzam mtshan nyid rtogs byed cing // mi gtsang lam ni rab bsgrubs pa// chos 'di thob par bka' mi 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro
310a7(dkon brtsegs): res bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no// de bzhin ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// dge slong dag ni tshad med skyed// brtson pa dang ni le lo n+dan/
310a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de bzhin gyi shegs par gyis// dge dang mi dge grogs po dag/ bsgrub pa dang ni mi bsgrub pa// yid ches pa dang yid mi ches// thams cad de bzhin shes par
310b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis dge dang mi dge grogs po dag/ mig zad lam ni gang yin pa// sgrub pa deng ni mi sgrub pa// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// gang zhig byang chub rab mos shing //
310b2(dkon brtsegs): zla gcig gnyis sum 'das ni sa ni// dus bzhan phyir ni gang ldong pa// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas// mos pa'i sems
310b3(dkon brtsegs): ni gang skyed pa// gal te nyams par gyur na yang // slar ni dang ba thob par 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di thob gyur nas// bag med spong bar mi byed pa// mdo 'di//
310b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bka' ma yin// de snyam du ni sems par 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas// bdud kyis yongs su gang gzung ba// dang po dad pa bskyed gyur
310b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur// gang zhig chos la ma mos pa// mi dben grags dang rnyed pa tshol// grong khyer grong rda la rab rgyu zhing // gzungs rnams dang ni//
310b6(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin dang // kun 'dzin 'od zer bsngags brjod kyang // de'is yang dag rtogs mi 'gyur// 'dod pa lnga pos bcings pa dang // 'jig rten las ni 'dod tshol ba// /
310b7(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa dag ni rtogs byed pas// stong nyid sgom la skur pa 'debs// dran dang shes rab sems med pas// tshe zad rab tu don med 'das// blun pos stong pa'i chos spro/
310b8(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni tshul khrims dgegs byas pas// gnar med dag tu ltung bar 'gyur// nams kyang mtho ris yongs mi skye// gang gis skad cig gcig la ni// mchod rten stong na
311a1(dkon brtsegs): byas pa bas// gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas// tshig bzhi tshig bshad gcig 'dzin 'phags// me tog 'phreng ba brgya stong dag/ sangs rgyas
311a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten mchod pa pas// gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas// tshig bzhi tshig bshad sems pa 'phags// gang gis rin cen mchod rten dag/ gang 'ga'i bye snyed byas pa
311a3(dkon brtsegs): bas gang gis tha na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas zhing ni 'bum phrag brgya// me tog gtor nas mchod pa bas// gang gis tha
311a4(dkon brtsegs): na skad gcig tsam// mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// chos gos 'bum phrag brgya mang po// sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba bas// gang gis tha na skad cig tsam//
311a5(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas spun ni rnam dag 'phags// mi mkhyen mi gzigs gang yang med// gang gis mdo sde 'di mos na// sangs rgyas spun
311a6(dkon brtsegs): ni thob par 'gyur// 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs mod che// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa byung // nga ni bram ze khye'u gyur tshe// me tog rdzogs nas mchod pa byas// shag
311a7(dkon brtsegs): thub pa zhes bya ga/ byang chub snying po la 'dug nas// mdo sde 'di ni ston 'gyur zhes// nga la byang chub lung yang bstan// khyod ni de tshe gzhon nur gyur// nga la lung bstan thob
311a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// dga' zhing dang ba'i sems bskyed de// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad du// gal te bram ze khye'u 'di ni// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas che// bdag ni 'di'i
311b1(dkon brtsegs): grogs gyur nas// mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu yang // chos kyi sde snod rab mdzin cing // srung bar shod ces smon lam btab// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de sa// 'od
311b2(dkon brtsegs): zer ston pa mdo 'di ni// 'di skad gsung bzhin de'i tshe// bram zer khye'u dang gzhon nu gnyis// legs par mnyan cing yongs su gzung // nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe//
311b3(dkon brtsegs): me tog ud pa la dag gis// sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas// de tshe khyod dang der 'dus te// 'di skad du ni smon lam btab// nga'i bstan pa tha ma la// mdo sde 'di ni
311b4(dkon brtsegs): rab bzung nas// rgya chen ston par shog cis smras// gang gis chos 'di thos gyur nas// zhe sdang sems ni mi bskyed par// gzungs 'dzin klog cing gang 'don pa//
311b5(dkon brtsegs): de ni skyes bu dam pa yin// khyod ni ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// thos dka'i chos ni rab bzung nas// sems can dag la don gyi tshul// rgya cher 'phel zhing bstan par bya// ngas
311b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe// yang dag chos ni nub pa na// 'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni// sems can dag la rgya cher bstan// blun pos nan tan mi bsgrubs pas// 'di
311b7(dkon brtsegs): la skur pa 'debs par byed// ngas ni de skad thos gyur kyang // zhe sdang dag ni bskyed mi byed// nga ni rtag tu bzod bsgoms nas// 'jig rten rnams la phan 'degs byed//
311b8(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pas na// mtshan dang dpe' byad dag gis brgyan// gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas sku// gya nom yongs su rdzogs gyur cig/ gser gyi
312a1(dkon brtsegs): kha dog rnam dga' phags// bzod pa'i stobs las byung bar stos// nga'i zhabs ni ma reg nas// zhing ni tshad med g.yo byed kyang // sems can rnam
312a2(dkon brtsegs): ni mi ltung ba/ thams cad bzod pa'i stos las skyes// nga'i spu khung gcig nas ni// 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas// thams cad gsal bar gang byed pa// thams
312a3(dkon brtsegs): cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // srin po shin tu 'jig pa'i gzugs// srog chags gzi byin 'phrog byed pa// nga la rtag tu gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog
312a4(dkon brtsegs): stobs las byung // nga'i 'khor ni ji snyed pa// sems ni rab du dul gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs la gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //
312a5(dkon brtsegs): rol mo'i sgra ni brgya stong dag/ 'khor 'dus chen po'i nang dag du// sangs rgyas yon tan bsngag rjod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // klu'i
312a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po brgya stong dag/ rab tu gdug cing 'jigs rung ba// sangs rgyas mthong na dga' ba yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // srin po gnod sbyin la
312a7(dkon brtsegs): stsogs pas// me tog 'grer ba brgya stong thogs// 'ongs nas ngal mchod byed pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // zhing ni brgya stong tshad med par//
312a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// nga'i yon tan bsngags pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lto phye dang ni lus srul po// brgya stong dag
312b1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dus gyur nas// me tog gtor nas nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gnod sbyin rgyal po la stsogs pa// bye ba brgya phrag drug cu rnams// 'ongs
312b2(dkon brtsegs): nas nga la gang mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po ni// ma na ba ga la sgrogs pas// mu tig dpar pos nga mchod pa// tham
312b3(dkon brtsegs): cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // du mu ru dang shi khyi ba'i// brgya stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas// rol mo dag gis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //
312b4(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po// brgya stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas// me tog spos kyis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // sa chen 'dzin pa klu'i rgyal//
312b5(dkon brtsegs): lus phyed dag ni rab bstan nas// thal sbyar nga la gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lus phyed sgra gcan 'dzin las stsogs// bye ba phrag ni brgya
312b6(dkon brtsegs): stong snyed// dad pa'i sems kyi sa nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gzhon nu khyod kyis 'di ltar ltos// sangs rgyas 'od zer gang reg pa// sdug
312b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bral nas bde thob pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // sa mu tu dang rlung gi lha// brgya stong nam ka gang bar ni// spos kyi char phabang mchod pa/
312b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // lha mi 'khor ni brgya stong snyed// lha'i me tog gtor mchod de// sred spangs sangs rgyas ston byed pa// thams cad bzod
313a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog stobs las byung // khyod kyis sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims sgra bsgrags nas// thams cad kun tu thos mdzad pa//
313a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod mchog stobs las byung bar ltos// phung po khams kyi sgra dag dang // bden pa bzhi'i sgra dag gis// thams cad kun ta go mdzad pa// thams cad bzod mchog
313a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs las byung // nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' la mig zad mtha' dag dang // rab zhi sgra ni thos gyur te// skye ba'i mtha' yang de bzhin no// nga'i rdzu 'phrul
313a4(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig gi rgyu dang rkyen// de las skye'ang 'gro 'ong med// de skad du ni thos par gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig ni
313a5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyang de las skyes// de skad du ni blar gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig zad mtha' zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni
313a6(dkon brtsegs): de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig mtha' rab zhi pas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos
313a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mtha' las mig skye mtha' zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs
313a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni// mkha' la mig 'jug ra bzhi ni// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig ni skye ni
313b1(dkon brtsegs): bas bsangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig bden rab zhibs// sangs
313b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig dben rab zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/
313b3(dkon brtsegs): de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// rnaM sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming las stsogs pa'i bar// thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no// 'dod
313b4(dkon brtsegs): sdang gti mug khong khro dang // 'chab dang phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang // khengs dang nga rgyal la stsogs pa// rgya cher bshad kyang de bzhin no// de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa de
313b5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i chos khyad par du 'phags pa thob pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas// thal mo sbyar te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang gi
313b6(dkon brtsegs): gdugs la// bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang // 'khor mang po dang bcas par gdugs tshod la sman 'dren na/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te// bdag gis slu ba'i gdugs
313b7(dkon brtsegs): tshod gsol bar ci gnang // de skad ces gsol pa dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu de'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams la
313b8(dkon brtsegs): yang phan mdzad par 'gyur bar thugs kyis mkhyen nas// thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ cang ming gsung bar gnang ngo // de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs
314a1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ rab tu dga' bas rang gi khyim du song te/ rang gi 'khor
314a2(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang lto 'phye la stsogs pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor// dar gyi ldeng khang bres te/ lding
314a3(dkon brtsegs): khang de yang shin tu mtho zhing rgya che la/ thams cad kun tu khyab pa gser gyi tshong tshong dra bas bres pa// nor bu rin po che'i 'phreng bas dbyangs pa/ seng ge'i gdan dang / bser
314a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'phreng ba lu gu rgyud can// 'bum phrag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzhan yang rin po che'i kha dog khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'phreng ba phung po dang gcal du bkram
314a5(dkon brtsegs): mo me tog tsam pa ka dang / a ti mug ta la stsogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'phreng ba tshad med grangs med pa yang / rin po che lding khang gi nang thams cad dang / 'khor
314a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa chen po thams cad kun tu khyad par spags shing // rgyan du bres so// gzhan yang de'i nang du khri stan rnams bshams nas/ rin po che spos phyi la ka dang / tu ma tsa dang /
314a7(dkon brtsegs): tsan dan dang / gur gum rnams dag cing / yid dga' bar byed pa sna tshogs bsregs so// de bzhin du spos mchog rnam pa sna tshogs kyang / mchod pa'i yo byad du sbyar ro// gzhan
314a8(dkon brtsegs): yang spos kyi chus lam srang rnams kun tu khyab par chag chag btab pa/ sa gzhi kun tu me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram mo/ de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang /
314b1(dkon brtsegs): skad can gyi bu mo grangs me tshad med pa yang rab du dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi rgyu mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir/ der 'ongs par rig nas// bcom
314b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus sems can rnams la sbran par mdzad pa'i slad du/ grong khyer chen por gshegs su gsol/ de nas bcom
314b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig du grong khyer du gshegs nas/ sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag ma dag da/ grong khyer chen po de'i sa chen po yang rab du g.yos
314b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa yang rab du g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe long ba rnams ni gzugs mthong bar gyur/ sdug bsngal
314b5(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams ni bde ba thob par gyur/ 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos par gyur/ byang bzhin mi sdug pa rnams ni byad bzhin bzang po thob par gyur/ nor med pa rnams ni nor dang ldan par
314b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur/ bu med pa rnams ni bu yod par gyur/ gos med pa rnams ni gos thob par gyur/ rin po che med pa rnams ni rin po che thob par gyur/ nye bshes med pa rnams ni nye ba shes
314b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur/ lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyis 'phongs pa rnams ni lus kyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// gzhan yang ngang pa dang krung krung dang / ne tse dang rma
314b8(dkon brtsegs): bya dang / sha ri ka la stsogs pa bya'i tshogs mang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i mchog dam
315a1(dkon brtsegs): @pa phyung ste/ gang gis sgra de dag thos pa dang / yid shin du bde bar gyur to// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsam pa
315a2(dkon brtsegs): ka'i ljon shing tshad med pa snyed mngon par sprul nas/ sems can brgya stong mang po rnams me tog yongs su dag pa de dag dang / gzhan yang spos mchog dam pa thogs nas/
315a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byas so// gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi bu po dbang phyug thob pa brgya stong du ma mu tidamar po dang tsan dan gyi phye ma thogs nas/
315a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' bas mngon par gtor to// lha ma yin mang po dang gzhan yang lha mang po rnams rin po che'i gdugs gser dang dngul gyis rab
315a5(dkon brtsegs): tu brgyan pa thogs nas bar snang la 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du khebs par g.yogs so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
315a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis tsan dan gyi ljon shing dang / gser gyi ljon shing dang / rin po che'i snod dang / gos la stsogs pa'i ljon shing brgya stong tshad med dpag du med pa/ rin po che rnam
315a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis brgyan pa/ me tog dang lo ma phun sum tshogs shing rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bus thun mong du mngon par grub
315a8(dkon brtsegs): pa rlung gi ngad langs pa tsam gyis spos mchog dam pa'i dris sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams kun du khyab par gang ba mngon par sprul to/ sems can
315b1(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang dus gcig du me tog thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// de bzhin du sems can dang sems can ma yin
315b2(dkon brtsegs): ba tshad med pa rnams kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mngon par sprul pa sha stag go/ gang dag ci dang ci smon pa de dag kyang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang
315b3(dkon brtsegs): gis de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe/ 'khor 'dus pa thams cad nam mkha'
315b4(dkon brtsegs): las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par ston pa'i sgra thos par gyur kyang / de gang nas byung ba shes par yang ma gyur la// tshigs su bcad pa
315b5(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong du mas kyang chos rnams yang dag par bstan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer bzhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grag par gyur// 'dod
315b6(dkon brtsegs): chags zad mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhags pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad
315b7(dkon brtsegs): grag par gyur// 'dod chags skye mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha'
315b8(dkon brtsegs): las sgra ni 'di skad grag par gyur// 'dod chags mtha' ni stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhug pa'i
316a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grag par 'gyur// 'dod chags rab zhi stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom
316a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ni grong khyer bzhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grag par gyur// 'dod chags 'jug stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par
316a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer bzhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grag par gyur// 'dod chags med cing stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtog
316a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chu thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer bzhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grag par gyur// 'dod chags skye med stong dben gang rtogs pa//
316a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer bzhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grag par gyur/ 'dod chags rab 'gog stong dben
316a6(dkon brtsegs): gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab ser sna// g.yo sgra khengs dang nga rgyal mya ngan dang // sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog
316a7(dkon brtsegs): pa lam sems can// khye'u dang bu mo bud med dag dang ni// skyes pa gso ba dag dang dbang po drug/ yul drug 'byung chen bzhi'i dngos po dang // 'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po
316a8(dkon brtsegs): khams rnams dang // 'jig rten skye sgra ming stsogs de bzhin te// chos rje dam pa'i chos ni bstan pas ni// sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha'i 'jig rten
316b1(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang thos gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg la gnas par mos// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer bzhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grag par 'gyur//
316b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan sbyin stobs dag la rab mos pas// sbyin pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer gzhags pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grag
316b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur// bcom ldan tshul khrims rnam dag rab mos pas// tshul khrims rnam dag stobs kyis byang chub brnyes// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer bzhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las
316b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// bcom ldan bzod pa'i stobs la rab mos pas// bzod pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer bzhugs pa
316b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag la rab mos pas// brtson 'grus stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni
316b6(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer bzhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// bcom ldan bsam gtan dag la rab mos pas// bsam gtan stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/
316b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer bzhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grag par gyur// bcom ldan shes rab dag la rab mos pas// shes rab stobs kyis byang chub brnye/
316b8(dkon brtsegs): par gyur// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mngon shes yon tan gnas// thabs dang gzugs kyi stobs dang grags pa'i stobs// las dang rten byung yang dag dad pa thos// gtong dang
317a1(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'i stobs dang rab zhi pa// rang dul yang dag mtha' dang bden mkhas stobs// 'jigs dang dga' dang phan 'dogs la mos dang // byams dang sgra
317a2(dkon brtsegs): rje dga' snyoms bzod che med// stobs dang mtshan ma med bstsogs kyang de bzhin// stobs bcu 'phags pa'i mnga' bdag lha'i// yon tan grags pa dpe' zla ma mchis
317a3(dkon brtsegs): pa grong khyer mchog gshegs zhabs ni bzhag pa'i tshe// sems can rnams la rgya cher phan pa mdzad// sngon cad srid gsum las dge rab bsgrubs pas// lha'i dge ba sna
317a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs 'phel bar mdzad// 'jig rten thams cad kun ni rab tu bkur// nga'i bstan pa 'di thos thams cad dga'// bcom ldan grong khyer sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos/
317a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan rnam dag 'od zer mthong ba na// ngo mtshar mi 'dzin mi dga' gang yang med// bcom ldan grong gshegs phan pa cher mdzad pas// lha'i 'khor rnams sems ni
317a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar gyur// sa dang mkha' 'gro dag gis srid sum ni// bcom ldan shin du bde zhes bsngags par gyur// bcom ldan zhabs kyi 'khor lo sa bzhag ste// rnam dag
317a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer kun gsal ngo mtshar gyur// rta ni cang shes grong khyer sgra snyan byung // bya tshogs dag kyang mkha' las rab tu dga'// gzhan yang rab dang bud med mang po'i// lag
317a8(dkon brtsegs): rkang gi gdub 'khor 'phreng ba dang // de bzhin rin cen rgyan ni sna tshogs las// ma dkrol bar yang rang nyid sgra snyan byung // so sor phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam brjod cing //
317b1(dkon brtsegs): skad mthun bkra shis mchog gi bsngags pa brjod// 'on long dbang po ma tshang dbang po thob// thams cad bcom ldan khyad 'phags 'bras bu'i dbang // bcom ldan grong
317b2(dkon brtsegs): khyer gshegs tshe kun dga' bas// lha mis me tog mngon gtor bla byas// mkha' las kun tu sgra snyan byung bas na// lha tshogs tshad med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//
317b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang sems can dran pa nyams pa dag/ mos 'khrugs rab zhi phan tshun gtam snyan brjod// bud med gang sbrum mya ngan 'jigs gyur pa// 'od zer gyi/
317b4(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis bde ba thob par gyur// skyes pa bud med ngo tsha khrel bcas pa// dri ma spangs shing chos dag rab bshad pas// thams cad dga' nas dag pa'i sems bskyed de/
317b5(dkon brtsegs): thub mchog zhabs la spyi btud phyag byas nas// kha cig bcom ldan bla med lham rab tshol// kha cig byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos tshol// bcom ldan grong khyer mchog
317b6(dkon brtsegs): du gshegs pas na// bcom ldan zhal du lta zhing rang nyid dga'// bcom ldan mkhyen pas sa'i spyod rtogs pas// 'jig rten rje mthun phan pa rab tu mdzad// chos kyi
317b7(dkon brtsegs): nor mchog byang chub sems dpa' byin// rin cen mchog ni sems can rnams la btang // bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung // ga
317b8(dkon brtsegs): zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung // gang zhig mig skye mtha' srid pa//
318a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pas// sangs rgyas yid ches mi 'jig thob// mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// shin
318a2(dkon brtsegs): tu dang brgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// chos la yid ches mi 'jigs thob// mig zad mthar ni lta bas na// shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig
318a3(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' sred pa// dge 'dun yid ches mi 'jigs thob// mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// shin tu dad pa rgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// tshul
318a4(dkon brtsegs): drims 'dzin med thob par 'gyur// mig zad mthar ni lta bas na// shin tu dang da rgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro 'dod chags spongs par 'gyur//
318a5(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// 'dod chags rgyu ni spong bar byed// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro zhe sdang spong bar 'gyur// mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na//
318a6(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro gti mug spong bar 'gyur// mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// gti mug rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang
318a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig mig zad mthar sred pa// byang chub ye shes dag la gnas// mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// byang chub ye shes rgyun mi 'chad// mig skye mtha' dang mig gi mtha'// 'jug
318a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ni rab dben dang // yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur dang // mi skye rab du zhi ba dang // 'di las stsogs pa'i sgo rnams dang // thams cad mig zad 'dra bar bstan// gang zhig
318b1(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom med// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa// de ni rtag tu the
318b2(dkon brtsegs): tso ba med// de ltar the tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi mtha' sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom med// de ltar the tsom med
318b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi 'jug sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom med// de ltar the tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
318b4(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig dben rab sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tshom med// de ltar the tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig
318b5(dkon brtsegs): gi skye sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom med// de ltar the tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig med la sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom
318b6(dkon brtsegs): med de ltar the tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig zhi la sred pa// de ni rtag tu the tsom med// de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir//
318b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// mig skye
318b8(dkon brtsegs): dpag med gang skyes pa// ye shes dpag med skyes par byed// ye shes dpag med pa'i phyir// chos 'di bstan pa'ang de bzhin no// mig zad dpag med gang skyes pa/
319a1(dkon brtsegs): mig la sgrib pa med par 'gyur// de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thob par byed// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra
319a2(dkon brtsegs): dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// bcom ldan grong khyer bzhugs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mkha'
319a3(dkon brtsegs): las chos bshad sgra thos pas// sangs rgyas yon tan the tsom med// kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang // sangs rgyas ye shes 'jigs mi byed// kha cig 'dod chag
319a4(dkon brtsegs): sems byung yang // sangs rgyas ye shes stor ma 'gyur// kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang // bla med ye shes tshol byed cing // ma 'dres chos ni bsgrub pa dang // nyan
319a5(dkon brtsegs): thos theg pa mos mi byed// byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang // bsam gtan de la mos pas na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab bskyed nas// dge slong 'bras bu thob snyam
319a6(dkon brtsegs): sems// byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang // mig zad mtha' shes 'gyur na// bskal pa brgya stong sgom byed kyang // de la rnam grol ci yang med// skye ba len pa tham
319a7(dkon brtsegs): cad ni// de la zhen chags skyed par byed// gal te skye nyid stong rig na// mthong ba rnams ni rnam dag 'gyur// gang zhig bsam gtan zhi ba sgrubs kyang // mig zad
319a8(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ni med 'gyur na// bskal pa brgya stong lon kyang ni// bsam gtan yongs su dag mi 'gyur// gang zhig nyer bsdogs thob 'gyur kyang // zad pa thob pa
319b1(dkon brtsegs): ma shes phyir// zad pa thob pa rtag tu spyod// gang zhig 'du shes zhen med pa// 'du shes zad mtha'i shes pa med// 'du shes zad pa ma shes phyir// drug/
319b2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'du shes zad pa spyod// gang zhig 'jig rten zhen chags pa// 'jig rten zad mtha' shes pa med// 'jig rten zad pa ma shes phyir// rtag tu 'jig rten
319b3(dkon brtsegs): zad la spyod// gang zhig 'jig bcas sems sems zad mtha' ni shes pa med// sems zad pa ni ma shes phyir// rtag tu sems ni zad la spyod// gang zhig zad
319b4(dkon brtsegs): bcas chos la gnas// chos zad mtha' ni shes pa med// chos zad mtha' ni ma shes phyir// rtag tu zag bcas chos la spyod// spangs pa'i chos la gnas gyur kyang // mig
319b5(dkon brtsegs): zad mtha' ni shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// yang dag spangs la gnas pa min// kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos gyon kyang // mig zad ma yin shes med na// mig zad
319b6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni mi shes phyir// yang dag chos gos bgos ma yin// ya rabs rigs skyes gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' ni shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// de ni dga' ba'i
319b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs ma yin// 'khor mang dag ni bdog gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' ni shes med na// myur du ngan 'gror ltung 'gyur te// 'khor dag gis ni skyob mi nus// sgra'i rig pa
319b8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' ni shes med na// mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir// sgra'i rim pa rtogs ma yin// bzo' rnams la ni mkhas gyur kyang // mig zad mtha'
320a1(dkon brtsegs): @ni shes med na// mig zad mtha' ni ma shes phyir// de ni bzo la mkhas pa min// 'dri ba mang la mkhas gyur cing // yi ge gcig gis
320a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam 'byed kyang // mig zad mtha' ni shes med na// de'i don mthun bshad ma yin// mkhas pa'i rjes su slob byed kyang // gsang dang gsang min mi shes shing //
320a3(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' ni shes med na// chos 'di rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// brjod pa sna tshogs rgyang pan dang // chos rnams rab tu shes 'gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' ni
320a4(dkon brtsegs): shes med na/ khri shing stug por lhung ba 'dra// sgra'i rim pa mkhas gyur kyang // dge dang mi dge rtag ston dang // tshig 'bru yi ge sgra skad dang // klog dang 'don pa'i mthar
320a5(dkon brtsegs): thug kyang // mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// de dag rnams ni shes med yin// bud med dag gi mtshan ma dang // tshig mkhas rmongs par byed pa dang // lus mnyes ngal
320a6(dkon brtsegs): bsos chos rnams dang // 'khyud dpyad dag la mkhas gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// de dag rnams ni shes med yin// gzhung lugs brgya mang ston byed
320a7(dkon brtsegs): cing / yi ge 'bru cig mi brjed dang // mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// bshad pa de ni don med yin// de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag dang // mige mtha' dang ni 'jug pa nas
320a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// rna ba sna lce lus dang // gzugs sgra dri re reg bya nas// sgra dang tshig gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin
320b1(dkon brtsegs): spyad par bya// sgra'i rim pa klog 'don cing // de'i don ni rtogs gyur yang // mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// de ni nams kyang dman pa yin// slang bzhi dag ni
320b2(dkon brtsegs): 'don byed cing // gsang sngags dag ni rtogs gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// de ni napas yang dman pa yin// de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag kyang //
320b3(dkon brtsegs): mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang
320b4(dkon brtsegs): ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin spyad par bya// / bam po bzhi pa'o// /
320b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni tshe med snyed// mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas// mig zad mtha'i shes pa thob// bcom
320b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas// mig gi rang bzhin rtogs par gyur// stong dang
320b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag med rab rtogs pas// thams cad rnam dag mig du gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri re reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang //
320b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// 'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dag// nga rgyal khengs dang g.yo sgyu nas// bag med pa'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni reg par gyis// /
321a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe She/ sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// steng gi nam mkha' dag la ni// sangs rgyas mtshan ni sna tshogs thos//
321a2(dkon brtsegs): kha cig 'dod tshags 'jig pa'o// dpe zla med pa'i ming yang thos// kha cig zhe sdang 'jig byed cing // 'jig rten pa na 'dogs ming dag thos// kha cig gti
321a3(dkon brtsegs): mug rab rtogs shing // nga rgyal 'dul ba'i ming dag thos// kha cig 'jig rten lha ni// rab zhi ston pa'i 'dren mi thos// kha cig shes rab dag bstan nas//
321a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten phan 'dogs ming gang thos// kha cig thabs dag rab bstan nas// sems can phan 'dogs ming dag thos// kha cig bdud ni rab btul kyang //
321a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhon 'dzin med pa'i ming dag thos/ kha cig gsung rab mchog dag gis// rnam grol bstan pa'i ming dag thos/ kha cig sems can sdug bsngal ba// rgya cher
321a6(dkon brtsegs): sgrol ba'i ngag thos/ kha cig mi'i gtso bo yid// 'jig rten sgrol ba'i ming dag thos// ming ni de dag thos gyur nas// thams cad rnam dag ming thob gyur//
321a7(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' dag dang rgya mtsho'i chu// ri rab lhun po'i bar du yang // thams cad gzhal du rung srid kyi// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thug mi 'gyur// gang zhig ming zad nges pa
321a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur na// chos sku mngon par grub pa rke mi 'gyur// gang zhig chos ska mchog ni grub 'gyur na// kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob par 'gyur// gang zhig
321b1(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob gyur na// des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur// gang zhig mdo dpag med go 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dka' mi
321b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// gang zhig mig skye nges par thob 'gyur na// chos sku mngon par grub pa dka' mi 'gyur// gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na// kun 'dzin ye shes dpag
321b3(dkon brtsegs): med thob par 'gyur// gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob// des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur// gong zhig mdo sde dpag med gau gyur pa// sangs rgyas
321b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul thob par dka' mi 'gyur// de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri re reg bya chos dag nas// sgra rnams dang ni ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de
321b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ni sbar bar bya// de tshes chen dag ni rab tu g.yos// rgya mtsho re rnams dang ni de bzhin no// lha ma yin dang lha ni mang po rnams// thams cad rab tu dga'
321b6(dkon brtsegs): ba bskyed par gyur// bdud dpung g.yo sgyur ba bcom nas// thams cad sangs rgyas mdzad pa grub par mos// lha rnams so so gzhal med khang bzhugs nas//
321b7(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam ni 'di skad smras// 'dren pas deng ni 'jig rten byung bas na// lha mi thams cad lha ni phan pa mdzad// sa bla'i lha 'khor gzhal med khang gan
321b8(dkon brtsegs): nas dang ba'i sems kyis dga' nas 'di skad du// 'dren pa 'jig rten de byung shin tu legs// 'jig rten kun bde rgyu ni rab tu mdzad// mkha' la spyod pa'i lha rnam
322a1(dkon brtsegs): @#de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung nas 'jig rten
322a2(dkon brtsegs): phan mdzad zer// rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha ni de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang bskyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren
322a3(dkon brtsegs): pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// sum cu rtsa gsum lha ni de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas sngags brjod na
322a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// 'thab 'bral lha dag de skad thos nas ni// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang bskyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas sngag
322a5(dkon brtsegs): brjod nas// 'dren pa byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// bdag kyang byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas// bcom ldan bla med mkhyen pa gnyer bar bgyid// lha mig tso
322a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog la ni brten nas su// sems can thams cad sgrol bar bgyid ces zer// dga' ldan lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang // thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes//
322a7(dkon brtsegs): khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod pas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// bcom ldan 'das pa'i skal pa bye bar ni// spyod mchog khyad 'phags
322a8(dkon brtsegs): dpag med mngon bsgrubs nas// sems can sdug bsngal ba la bde lam bstan// 'khor ba bsgral nas mya ngan 'das la bkod// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams de skad thos nas ni/
322b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dga' nas shin tu dad pa skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas sngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// gzhan 'phrul dbang
322b2(dkon brtsegs): byed lha ni de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas sngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer//
322b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa skye shi 'das pas na// bdud dang mu stegs mang pham par mdzad// bla med byang chub dag ni yongs rdzogs nas// skye dgu drangs nas pha rol mchod
322b4(dkon brtsegs): ces zer// tshangs ris lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang // thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes// khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren
322b5(dkon brtsegs): pa byang bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer// de bzhin cig nas cig du sgra thos pas// tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' nas 'di skad du// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan pa mdzad//
322b6(dkon brtsegs): bdud dpung 'jig skrag mya ngan byed ces zer// srid pa'i rtse mo lha'i bar du yang // sangs rgyas byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad thos// de bzhin sgra ni kun tu grags pa na// lha
322b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin dag 'grib shing lha rnams 'phel// bdud kyi khang pa dag ni yongs stongs shing // lha rnams 'khor ni rab tu rgyas par 'gyur// mi 'jig stobs kyis log tshogs
322b8(dkon brtsegs): rab btul nas// byang chub chen po mchog ni myur du bsnyes// de bzhin skad cig yud tsam lha rnams kyis// bcom ldan byung nas phan mdzad thob 'gyur bas// 'jig rten 'dren
323a1(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad pa shin tu legs// rnams dag mig ni sems can byin zhes zer// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// 'dod chags yongs su
323a2(dkon brtsegs): gdungs pa'i rnams// mi gtsang bsgoms pa bshad thos nas// 'dod chags zhe sdang ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// zhe sdang dag gis gdud
323a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnams// byams pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas// zhe sdang zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// gti mug dag gis gdungs pa'i rnams//
323a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab chos ni bstan thob pas// gti mug zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// nga rgyal dag gis gdungs pa'i rnams// nga rgyal spangs
323a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos thos pas// nga rgyal zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// phrag dog dag gis gdungs pa'i rnams// phrag dog spangs pa'i chos thos
323a6(dkon brtsegs): pas// phrag dogazhi nas ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// khong khro dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ khong khro spangs pa'i chos thos pas// khong wa
323a7(dkon brtsegs): zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// ser sna dag gis gdungs pa rnams// ser sna spangs pa'i chos thos pas// ser sna zhi ste ma lus spang //
323a8(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig dul ba'i spyod grub pa// dpag med chos ni 'di thos pas// yang du thos pa'i gtsor zhugs nas// kun 'dzin sgo ni sgrub par byed// gzhan yang mkha'
323b1(dkon brtsegs): las sgra thos pas// me tog dag gis sangs rgyas mchod// yon tan khyad par 'phags sgrub cing // snying rje chen po rdzu 'phrul ston// gzhan yang mkha' las
323b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra thos pas// bcom ldan skra dang skye gnas dang // gdungs rgyud dang ni gsung sgra rnams/ khyed 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod// sems can 'gro ba ji lta
323b3(dkon brtsegs): bar/ rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci rigs bshad// mig dang rna ba sna le lus// gzugs dang sgra la spogs pa dang // bskam pa dang ni brkyang ba dang // ston par
323b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa khyad par 'phags// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das pas na// 'jig rteran smon ma rab mdzad cing // gzugs ni mang por ston pa yang // thams cad sangs
323b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rdzu 'phral yin// snod dang snod med de rjes su// mi mthun chos ni ston mdzad pas// sems can tshe rab tshad med nas// sangs rgyas mchod par ma byas shing //
323b6(dkon brtsegs): dmu rgod 'dul bar dka' ba la// sems can dmyal ba bshad par mdzad// gang zhig las lam rmongs 'gyur zhing // lha la bsten nas spros dga' ba// bcom ldan
323b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag lta ba dang // spros pa zhi ba'i sgra thos mdzad// gzhan yang mkha' las ngo bo nyid// nges pa nyid du stong pa dang // 'gro 'od med cing mtshan med dang // ji yang med pa'i
323b8(dkon brtsegs): sgra yang thos// gzhan yang sems can brgya stong dag/ mkha' las sha dang shes rab spun// de bzhin chos kyi spyan bar du// yang dag ston pa'i sgra yang thos// bcom
324a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab sla// rnam grol rnam grol mthong sgra// ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur/
324a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni ji snyed pa// ci gzhin rdzu 'phrul rab bstan nas// 'di ltar rjes mthun sgra skad kyis// yang dag chos ni ston par mdzad// sems can la la gang zhig gis//
324a3(dkon brtsegs): sprin dang tshul khrims bzod bsgrubs mos// rdzu 'phrul mos pa ji lha bzhin// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sgra ston// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// sems
324a4(dkon brtsegs): can dbang po ji lta bzhin// rgya char yang dag 'byed mdzad pas// len 'dzin stan la dgod par mdzad// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// phung po khams rnam skye mched
324a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bcings dang grol dang nyi ring dang // sa'i gnas skabs bye brag gis// mtshan nyid ston pa thos par gyur// gzhan yang sa dang ye shes kyi// 'od zer tshad med ston pa
324a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / ba nyon mongs bag chags spangs pa dang // spang min ston pa thob par gyur// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// lha dang mi'i ngo bo nyid// las dang 'bras bu mi mtshur/
324a7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ skye len tha dad thob par 'gyur// res 'ga' bud med mdun dag du// bud med brgyan pa'i lus sprul nis// mkha' las skye ston sgra thos pas// gang thos 'dzi
324a8(dkon brtsegs): chags sel mdzad pas// sha ri'i bu ni ji lta bzhin// shin tu dang bskes par 'gyur// thugs rjes mos pa ci bzhin du// bla med chos ni ston par mdzad// me'u 'ag/
324b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni 'od srungs dang // ka phyin dang kun dga' dang // 'od srungs chen po dag dang ni// kun shes ku nin la stsogs// de dag mos pa ci bzhin du// nyen thos chos ston
324b2(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// lha rnams dang ni lha ma yin// gnod sbyin dag ni mang po dang // po ro ka ni 'khor bcas dang // grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams// bcom ldan rdza
324b3(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul stobs kyis ni// gzungs bsngags sgra ni thos par 'gyur// a ti si/ bi ti si/ a ra su/ i ra o na si/ ma na si/ u khyi a no kyi/ a khi tsa la/ mang na ye/ da ra ni/
324b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ni mi/ ta ka ni/ i mi nan tra/ ni ha ra/ a pra re bud de/ ni ra kha chi/ bi ya khi ra yi te/ a Shi tsher bar myi ti/ ka la ba hi ni/ sa to bi sha nir te/ po na prad sha sad te sha sad ta/ bad sha
324b5(dkon brtsegs): sa da ta/ ta ra sad ta/ pu mA ya ba ra/ yam ba ra li/ la ba na/ shi tsa tsing ta/ bi bA myi ta/ tsid a nan tA/ yo be ra ha/ ba mI ta/ bu mI/ na ma ma kA ni/ a ka ni/ bi bA mid tra/ shi ri bi sA
324b6(dkon brtsegs): a ma lIm la bu li ti na/ ra sha tsa hA hA ri/ ma mA li bar ni ti sh+ma/ tsa sha ni ra ha ra/ u ti ri ta ba tsi/ an ta ri/ ku ta ri/ ku du/ su ke du/ su pa ra ni/ ka ri ni/ ku su ma ti ye/
324b7(dkon brtsegs): ka sh+tsa ri/ ka khri ri/ ud pa la/ mu ti sta/ da ra ni/ na ga nri ga te/ ba ra la ti/ ya te/ ba ra la ti an 'da' ra ba te/ on da da ra ba ti shi tsi/ ha si ri/ ma kha li/ id de sa ma ba
324b8(dkon brtsegs): ri/ tista si da ra ni/ ku b+ha lo tsa te/ gzhan yang rgyal po rnam thos bu// yul 'khor srung ni la stsogs pas// khyad 'phags sgra ni grangs med kyis// 'dren pa'i
325a1(dkon brtsegs): sngags tshig rab tu smras// tshad med sgra ni de dag dang // bder gshegs rdzu 'phrul dbang gis byung // rdzu 'phrul dag ni tshad
325a2(dkon brtsegs): med pas// bstan pa dag kyang tshad med do// res 'ga' sangs rgyas med zhing du// rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i stobs dag gis// 'khor bskor sangs rgyas
325a3(dkon brtsegs): skur ston pas// da ltar thong ba ci bzhin no// bsam gyis mi khyab zhing dag du// sprul pa tshad med ston mdzad pas// bltam nas gom pa bdun gshegs dang /
325a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal srid spangs nas rang byung dang // byang chub snying po'i sangs rgyas nas// brnyes pa'i chos dag rab dgongs te// chos kyis 'khor lo bskor mdzad dang /
325a5(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das pa ston par mdzad// rdzu 'phrul dag gi stobs dag gis// sna tshogs dag ni sngon mdzad pas// sems can dag ni tshad med rnams// khyad 'phags ye
325a6(dkon brtsegs): shes grub par mdzad// de'i tshe thugs rje chen po'i sa// tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// byams chos bsgoms pa bshad bstan pas// byams pa'i
325a7(dkon brtsegs): sems ni 'phel bar mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lha rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas// bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi bshad bstan pas// bsdu ba'i spyod bzhi 'phel
325a8(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po'is// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas// zhe sdang nyes mig be shad bstan pas// zhe sdang sems ni spangs par 'gyur// de tshe
325b1(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po'i si// gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor nas// rnam 'tshe nyes mig bshad bstan pas// rnam tshe sems ni spangs par 'gyur// de tshe thugs rje chen
325b2(dkon brtsegs): po'i sa// lha ma yin gyis yongs bskor nas// 'brab pa'i nyes mig bshad bstan te// bzod pa bsgom pa'i sngags pa brjod// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis//
325b3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding gis yongs bskor nas// 'gal byas nyes mig bshad bstan te// 'dam pa'i sems kyis bsngags pa mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/
325b4(dkon brtsegs): dri za'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// dga' ba'i tshig ni dpag med kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags brjod bstan// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lto 'phye la khro/
325b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs bskor nas// mu stegs chos la smong mdzad cing // bcom ldan gsung rab sngags brjod bstan// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// 'dre srin 'khor gyis yongs bskor
325b6(dkon brtsegs): nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mchog/ rgya cher sngags pa bstan par mdzad// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig zad mtha'
325b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan thos pas na// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig ske mtha' ni bstan thos pas//
325b8(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig gi mthar ni bstan thos pas// mthar phyin don ni//
326a1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mi 'jigs bstan pa thos 'gyur nas/
326a2(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig dben bstan pa thos pas na// mthar phyin
326a3(dkon brtsegs): don ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la skye med bstan thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs
326a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig med bstan pa thos na// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur//
326a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po 'bral bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig ni nyer ni bstan thos pas// mthor phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen
326a6(dkon brtsegs): po 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la bdag med bstan thos pas// mthar byin don ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po 'phrul
326a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la gang zag med thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas/
326a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni brgya snyed// mig la sems can med thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag
326b1(dkon brtsegs): ni brgya stong snyed// mig la srog med thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed//
326b2(dkon brtsegs): mig la gos pa med thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'jig rten shes
326b3(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam smad de// zhen pa mi skyed nyid du mdzad// thugs rjen chen po 'phral bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'jig rten rnyed pa rab smad de//
326b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas kyi sngags brjod mdzad// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// zag bcas shes pa rab sprad de// zag med shes
326b5(dkon brtsegs): rab bsngags par mdzad// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'jig rten bsam gtan rab smad de// 'jig rten 'das
326b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ting 'dzin bsngags// brags rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// zag bcas tshul khrims rab sma de// zag med bslab
326b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas bsngags par mdzad// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// sems rgya chud du skyon brjod de// sems rgyas
326b8(dkon brtsegs): chen po yon tan bsngags// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan pas// lus ni tshul khrims sems shes rab// zag med brten pa med pa'i// bsngag
327a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ni brjod par mdzad// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas// sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i lam bsngags shing // spros pa dga'/
327a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing zhan la dga'// sangs rgyas sman pa de rab tu mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// mig chad skyon ni rab 'byed
327a3(dkon brtsegs): cing / rab zhi mtshan nyid bstan par mdzad// rnab sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri re reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar
327a4(dkon brtsegs): bya/ thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// dar la bab cing gzhol ba la// nyis mig dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen
327a5(dkon brtsegs): po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// chos rigs dag ni bsnyems pa la// nyes mig dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen po 'phral bstan/
327a6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// longs spyod dpag med gyur pa la// nyes mig dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen por 'phrul bstan nas// sem
327a7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la rgya cher ni// rab dbang bag med gyur la// nyes mig dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la cher ni//
327a8(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi ngag med gyur pa la// nyes mig dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen po/ phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// bud med bag
327b1(dkon brtsegs): med gyur rnams la// nyis mig dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// chos kyi bag med gyur//
327b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la// nyes mig dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// chang gi bag med gyur pa la// nyes mig
327b3(dkon brtsegs): dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// rgyal po bag med gyur pa la// nyes mig dpag yod par bstan//
327b4(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// tshul khrims bsnyems par gyur pa la// nyes mig dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje che
327b5(dkon brtsegs): po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// shes rab bsnyems par gyur pa la// nyes mig dpag med yod par bstan// de bzhin rtogs dang rdza
327b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dang // bsam gtan mkhas pa'i nga rgyal dang // nor dang bshad dang rigs dang 'khor// rol mo glu dang lce rgyang dang // grags pa phun tshogs bsngags pa dang //
327b7(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti dang ni rnyed pa dang // mdzes dang g.yo sgra nga rgyal dang // ngo tsha byed dang dril med dang / khengs dang phun tshogs nga rgyal dang // bag med 'dod chags de bzhin no//
327b8(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can gang zhig sems dang yid// dngan par gyur pa de dag la// khyad par 'phags pa'i 'du shes bstan// thugs rje chen
328a1(dkon brtsegs): pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can gang zhig rang zhum zhing // rtsol bar mi byed de dag la// brtson 'grus stobs ni ston par mdzad// thugs rje
328a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'phrul bstan nas// sems can gang zhig nor rnams la// chags par byed pa de dag la// chos shes chos ni ston par mdzad// gzhan yang spos kyi dri gtsang khang /
328a3(dkon brtsegs): me tog dag gi gzhal med khang // khang pa brtsegs pa mchog sprul nas// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs par bstan// gzhan yang lha'i bu mo rnams// me tog tsam pa khang pa dang /
328a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas la lus phyed bstan sprul nas// me tog phreng thogs mchod byed bstan// gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag/ me tog ma li'i khang pa la// gnas pa lus byed bstan sprul nas// me
328a5(dkon brtsegs): tog phreng thogs mchod byed bstan// gzhan yang lha'i bu mo rnams// pad mo sngon po khang pa na// gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas// sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags pa bstan//
