356b4(dkon brtsegs): snga lta bur gya gyur 'khyil bar gyur tam/ mngal gyi nang nas kyi gra ma lta bu skyes par gyur tam/ khu chu dang khrag mngal du 'dzag cing / skad cig yud tsam yang 'dug du mi btab par gyur tam/
356b5(dkon brtsegs): thur du 'dzag par gyur tam/ mngal gyi lam rtsub par gyur tam/ steng du yangs par gyur pa 'am/ 'og tu yangs par 'am/ yo ba 'am/ zab pa yin pa'am/ rdol nas zag pa'am/
356b6(dkon brtsegs): mtho ba 'am/ dma' ba'am/ thung zhing dog pa'am/ nad sna tshogs dang bcas par gyur na/ yang mngal du 'dug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te pha mtsho rigs btsun zhing bsod nams chen po dang
356b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur la// bar mdo'i phung po bsod nams chung ba'am/ bar ma to'i srid pa'i tshe rigs btsun zhing bsod nams chen po dang ldan par gyur la/ pham bsod nams chung bar gyur
356b8(dkon brtsegs): tam gnyi ga bsod nams dang ldan yang phan tshun phrad par gyur pa'i las bstsags par ma gyur na yang / mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bar ma to'i phun po de mngal
357a1(dkon brtsegs): tsuH/ du 'jug par gyur pa nA// thog ma kho nar phyin ci log gi sems rnam pa gnyis 'byung bar gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha ma gnyis phrad/
357a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa'i tshe/ gal te phor gyur pa zhig yin na ni/ ma la ni chags pa skye bar 'gyur/ pha la ni zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur/ pha'i khu ba byu ngan 'di ni bdag yin no snyam du sem/
357a3(dkon brtsegs): so// gal te mor gyur pa zhig yin na ni// pha la ni chags pa skye bar 'gyur lo/ ma la ni zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur te/ pha ma'i khu ba byung ba ni/ 'di ni bdag yin no snyam du sems pa'i tshe/
357a4(dkon brtsegs): gal te 'di lta bu'i zhe sdang dang / chags pa'i sems skyes par ma gyur na/ mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dga' bo ji ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur zhe na/
357a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ ma yang chags pa'i sems skyes par 'gyur/ dus kyi zla mtshan yang rjes su 'thun par gyur/ bar ngo'i phung po yang mngon du gyur la/ gong ma lta bu'i skyon chen po yang med
357a6(dkon brtsegs): cing las kyi rkyen dang yang ldan par gyur na/ mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bar ma te'i phung po de mngal du 'jug par 'dod pa ni/ de yang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ gnyis
357a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ bsod nams dang mi ldan pa dang / bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa'o// bsod nams dang mi ldan pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par rtogs pa'i sems byung nas/ yul
357a8(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar gyur pa na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ deng bdag ni rlung dang / grang ba dang / gnam rmugs pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / skye bo mang po'i cha co dang / mang po'i mthu stobs kyis gnod par
357b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa dang / phrad par gyur to zhes 'jigs shing skrag pa skyes nas/ deng bdag rtsa'i khyim dang / lo ma'i khyim dang / rtsig drung dben par 'jug par bya'o// yang na ri dang nags stug po dang / brag
357b2(dkon brtsegs): phug dag du 'jug par bya'o snyam du sems te/ gzhan yang 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs bsnyed nas/ ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par byed do// gang bsod nams chen po dang /
357b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa de yang 'di snyam du/ deng bdag ni rlung dang / grang ba dang / gan ma rmugs pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / skye bo mang po'i ca tshe dang / mang po'i mthu stobs kyis gnod par byed pa dang / phrad par
357b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur to zhes 'jigs shing skrag pa skyes nas/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du 'dzegs pa 'am/ yang thog mthon po'i steng du 'dzeg pa 'am/ gzhal med khang gi nang du 'jug pa 'am/ khri la
357b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par bya'o snyam du sems te/ gzhan yang 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed nas/ ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
357b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo 'di ltar bar ma to'i phung po de thog ma kho nar mngal du 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni/ mer mer po zhes bya ste/ pha'i mi gtsang ba dang / 'das pa'i las la bstan nas/ lus len par byed
357b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'di ltar las de dang / pha ma'i rkyen rnams kyis so so nas rang skyed par mi byed kyi/ 'dus pa'i mthu stobs kyis lus len par byed pas 'di lta ste/ dper na snod kyi nang du zhos bkang nas
357b8(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang / thag pa la stsogs pa la brten ste/ mar 'byung ba yang rkyen rnams las dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dus pa'i mthu las mar 'byung ba de bzhin du/ mer mer/
358a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i lus kyang de bzhin te/ 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen gyi mthus mngal du lus mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na rtswa sngon po dang /
358a2(dkon brtsegs): ba glang gi lci ba dang / rgya shag dang / zho la brten nas so so'i zer na srin bu skye bar 'gyur ba re re'i nang du/ srin bu mi dmigs kyang / rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis srin bu skye bar 'gyur te/ srin bu de
358a3(dkon brtsegs): dag skyes pa na/ so so nas rten cing lta ba bzhin du/ kha dog sngon po dang / sor po dang / rnamar po dang / dkar por 'gyur ro// de bzhin du pha ma'i mi gtsang ba las lus 'di skye ba yang / rkyen rnam
358a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang du btsal na dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang rkyen 'dus pa'i mthu dang ma bral bar yang lus yang dag par len par 'gyur ro// lus 'di skyes pa na pa mo'i 'byung ba chen po/
358a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang / ngo bo nyid tha mi dad par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams kyis ni sra ba'i bya ba byed do// chu'i khams kyis ni gsher ba'i bya ba byed do// me'i khams kyis ni dro ba'i bya ba byed do// rlub
358a6(dkon brtsegs): gi khams kyis ni yang zhing g.yo ba'i bya ba byed do// mer mer po'i lus de zhal te sa'i khams 'ba' shig dang ldan la/ chu'i khams med par gyur na ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na phye dang / thal ba
358a7(dkon brtsegs): skam po bcangs pa bzhin du 'dur mi 'thub par 'gyur ro// gal te chu'i khams 'ba' shig ldan la/ sa'i khams med par gyur na ni 'di lta ste/ dper na 'bru mar ram/ chu'i rang bzhin snum
358a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing bsher bas sra ba med pa bzhin du bo zhing 'gyes par 'gyur ro// gal te sa dang / chu'i khams 'ba' shig dang ldan la/ me'i khams med par gyur na ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na dbyar tsha ba'i
358b1(dkon brtsegs): / dus du shi gong bu zingam la bzhag pa nyisa'i 'od kyis phog pa bzhin du 'dul zhing mig par 'gyur ro// gal tes dang / chu dang / me'i khams dang ldan la/ rlung gi khams med par gyur na ni/
358b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ de per na khrur ba mkhan nam/ de'i slob ma mkhas pas khur ba bcos nas dbugs kyis bus te/ ci dang ri byeb rnams mngon par 'dus byas nas/ der/
358b3(dkon brtsegs): nang khong stod du byed pa/ gal te rlung gi stobs med par gyur na/ mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag kyang / phan tshun gcig la gcig brten cing yod/
358b4(dkon brtsegs): su bzung nas/ rnam par bzhag pa yin pas/ de'i phyir mer mer po'i lus pa ma'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang / las kyi rlung gi rgyus skye bar 'gyur ba yang / de bzhin du rkyen mang po rnams kyi nang na/
358b5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs par mi 'gyur yang 'dus pa'i stobs kyis lus yang dag par len par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper nas bon sar pa yongs su gtsang gA len
358b6(dkon brtsegs): par sbas pa/ srin bus ma zos pa/ ma rul cing tshig pa dang / gas pa dang / bu ga med pa zhig gang la la zhig gis/ zhing bzang zhing gshin pa btsal te/ sa bon de btang na/ ci nyin zhag gis myu gu/
358b7(dkon brtsegs): dang sdong bu dang / yal ga dang / lo mo dang grib ma dang / bcas pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rgyas shing phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mi 'gyur legs so//
358b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo mer mer po'i lus kyang de bzhin du/ rgyu dang rkyen las rims kyis skye bar 'gyur gyi/ dus gcig du dbang po rnams phrin sum tshogs par ma 'gyur/
359a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ de lta bas na pha ma las byung bar gyur pa'i lus 'di/ rkyen rnams kyis nang nas btsal na yang dmigs par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang tshogs pa'i stobs kyis/
359a2(dkon brtsegs): skye ba len par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pas/ me shel gyi nor bu blangs nas nyi ma la gzhag ste/ lci bskam po nor bu dang mi ring /
359a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bsnyen pa las mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ lci ba dang nyi ma'i 'od so so nas me 'byin par mi nus kyang / phan tshun mi 'bral bas rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis me 'byung bar 'gyur ro// pa ma las/
359a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i lus kyang de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ mer mer po'i lus gang yin pa de ni gzugs shes bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ming zhes
359a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi phung po lnga pos skad cig ma gcig la lus blangs nas/ sdug bsngal myongs byar byed pa la yang ngas bsdogs pa brjod par mi byed na/ yun ring po srid pa
359a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams su 'khor bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste dper na mi gtsang ba ni nyung na yang man ma na mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas na mer mer po'i lus nye bar
359a7(dkon brtsegs): len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la su zhig sred cing chags par byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ltar lus de ma'i mngal nas gnas pa na yang zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad lon nas gdod 'byungad
359a8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ zhag bdun phrag dang po la ma'i mngal na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mer mer po zhes bya ste/ lus kyis mtshan ma dang por snang bas/ 'di lta ste dper na nom chags pa dang 'dra bas
359b1(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun gyi bar du nang du btsos/ rab tu btsos nas 'byung ba chen po bzhi mthar gyis mngon par 'grub par byed do// zhag bdun phrag gnyis pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe/ lus kyi rlung mngon par
359b2(dkon brtsegs): grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ kun sdud ces bya ste/ rlung shin tu phra mo des mi rtsi ba logs g.yon pa dang g.yas pa bus te mer mer po'i lus kyi mtshan ma rims kyis snang bar byed pas/ de'i dbyibs
359b3(dkon brtsegs): ni zho ska ba 'am/ mar 'khyags pa 'dra ba'am/ nang du btsos rab tu bcos pas/ nur nur po'i lus su gyur nas/ 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag mthar kyis mngon par 'grub par byed
359b4(dkon brtsegs): do zhag bdun phrag gsum pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni mdzod ces bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis nar nur po gang yin pa de/ mthar gyis
359b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khyams shing ltar ltar por byed pas/ de'i dbyibs ni sman brdungs pa'i gtan bu 'dra la thung zhing chung ste/ mngal gyi nang du bcos rab tu btsos pas/ 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag mthar gyis
359b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar byedado// zhag bdun phrag bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni nang rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis ltar ltar po gang yin
359b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de mkhregs par byed pas/ de'i dbyibs ni mchig gu 'dra ste/ nang du bcos rab tu btsos pas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag mthar kyis 'phel bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag lnga pa la mi'i
359b8(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mkhrang bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rka lag 'gyus
360a1(dkon brtsegs): pas sbyar bar byed pas/ gor gor po gang yin pa de ni rnam par phye nas/ brla gnyis dang / dpung pa gnyis dang / mgo'i mtshan ma mngon du byung bar byed do// 'di lta
360a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na dbyar gyi dus su char 'bab pa'i tshe/ ljong shing rnams yal ga dang / 'dab ma skye bar byed pa de bzhin te/ las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang lus kyi mtshan ma rnams snang
360a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni zas shes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma bzhi 'byung bar byed do//
360a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste/ pus mo gnyis dang / dpung pa gnyis gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o// zhag bdun phrag bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung
360a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'khyil par byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi 'byung bar byed do// 'di lta ste/ lag pa gnyis dang / rkang mthil gnyis ste/ de'i mtshan ma
360a6(dkon brtsegs): ni shin tu mnyen pas dbu ba 'dus pa 'dra'o// zhag bdun phrag brgyad pa la mi'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe// yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ bzlog cing bsgyur bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i
360a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis mtshan ma nyi shu 'byung bar byed do// de 'di lta ste/ lag pa dang / rkang pa'i sor me'i mtshan ma nyi shu 'byung bar byed pa gang yin pa'o// de ni 'di lta ste/ dper na dbyar char pa bab pa'i tshe ljon she
360a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi yal ga dang / 'dab ma mthar gyis skye zhing 'byung bar byed pa de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang mtshan ma rnams mngon du snang bar byed do// zhag bdun phrag dgu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas/
360b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma rnam pa dgu 'byung bar byed do// dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
360b2(dkon brtsegs): mig gnyis dang / rna ba gnyis dang / sna gnyis dang / kha dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba'i gnas gang yin pa de dag ni mtshan ma'i rnam pa dgu zhes bya'o// zhag bdun phrag bcu pa la ma'i
360b3(dkon brtsegs): ma ngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ sra bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis sra zhing brtan par byed do// yang de'i tshe kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung
360b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ des mngal na gnas pa'i lus bus pas kun tu rgyas shing gang bar byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper na rkyal pa gang ba ji lta ba bzhin no// zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/
360b5(dkon brtsegs): yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de steng dang 'og gi phyogs su 'gro zhing lus kyi bu ga rnams 'byed par byed do// gzhan yang
360b6(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i stobs kyis ma de res dga' ba dang / mi dga' bar yang byed/ 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba na yang de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur zhing / rka lag bskyod par byed pas/ mngal
360b7(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa'i bu gu rnams mthar kyis skye zhing 'phel bar yang byed la/ de'i kha nas khrag nag po yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ sna nas kyang chu mi gtsang ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rlung des dbang po rnams
360b8(dkon brtsegs): bzlog nas/ de nas zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ yon po'i sgo zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs
361a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis rtsibs logs g.yas g.yon gyi nang grol gyi rgyu ma tsho chung rnams skyed par byed de/ de ni 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma'i rtsa ba shad shad po'am/ skud pa grims
361a2(dkon brtsegs): pas la bzhag pa lta bur lan bco brgyad 'khor bar lus brten te gnas so// de'i tshe gzhan yang spu brgyas pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung de'i dbang gis tshigs kyi yan la gsum pa rgya nyi shu dang /
361a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas brgya rtsa gcig lus la gnas par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ bkres shing skom par byed pa
361a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal gyi lus de nyam chung zhing bkres pa dang / skom pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas/ de'i mas zos shing 'thungs pa'i ro ji snyed pa dag lus kyi gnad dang / lte ba'i
361a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor yongs su 'dzin cing / phan 'dogs par byed do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// bu ni mngal na gnas pa na// mngal ga nas de la phan 'dogs pas/
361a6(dkon brtsegs): des na sa lus srog rab gnas shing // rims kyis skye dang 'phel bar byed// mas ni zos shing 'thungs pa dag/ mngal na gnas la phan 'dogs pas// rims kyis skye dang 'phel bar byed// zhag bdun
361a7(dkon brtsegs): phrag bcu bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ skud pa'i sgo zhes bya ste/ rlung de yi stobs kyis rtsa rgyus chu brgya bskyed nas lus kyi 'dun dang rgya ba dang /
361a8(dkon brtsegs): g.yas g.yon snol mar g.yog par byed do// zhag bdun phrag bco lnga la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ pad ma zhes bya ste/ rlung de yi stobs kyis
361b1(dkon brtsegs): rtsa rgyu ba nyi shu bskyed nas/ bza' ba dang / btung ba yi ro gang yin partsa 'dir zhugs nas lus la phan 'dogs par byed do// nyi shu gang zhe na/ lus kyi mdan dang rgyab dang / g.yas g.yos re re la yang rtsa lnga lnga
361b2(dkon brtsegs): yod do// rtsa 'di dag re re la yang rtsa phra mo yan lag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod do// rtsa de dag re re la yan lag brgya yod de/ lus kyi mdun na yod pa nyi khri nis ka zhes bya'o// lus kyi rgyab na yod pa nyi khri ni
361b3(dkon brtsegs): stobs shes bya'o// lus kyi g.yon phyogs na yod pa nyi khri ni brtan pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi g.yas phyogs na yod pa nyi khri ni mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na rtsa yi yan lag che bra brgyad khri lus de la
361b4(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur ro// rtsa de dag kyang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan ste/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / mar dang / zho dang / 'bru mar gyi kha dog go
361b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa brgyad khri po de dag re re la yang rtsa ba re re yod do// rtsa ba re re la yang bu ga sna tshogs yod de/ bug gcig pa dang / bu ga gnyis nas bug bdun pa'i bar dang ldan te/ re re yang spu yi bug dang phan sum 'brel
361b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ de ni dper na pad ma'i rtsa ba la bug mang po yod pa ji lta ba bzhin no// zhag bdun phrag bcu drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni bdud rtsa zhes bya ste/
361b7(dkon brtsegs): rlung de'i stobs kyis mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / kha yi sgo dang / mid pa dang / snying gi snying po yi kho ra khor yug gi bug chu bo dag rnam par bya nas/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba ste nga dang 'og du rgyu zhing thogs pa med pa dang /
361b8(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang / btung ba zos shing 'thungs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang / lus la phan 'dogs shing ba stsags pa'i gnas yod pa dang / legs par bzhus nas 'og gi phyogs su 'byung
361'a1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rdza mkhan nas rdza mkhan gyi slob mas 'jim pa legs par sbyar te/ 'khor lo'i steng du bzhag nas
361'a2(dkon brtsegs): 'og pa dang steng du bsgyur zhing snod kyi rnam po mngon par 'dus byas na/ mngon par grub pa de bzhin du/ 'di yang rlung gi stobs dang / dge bo dang mi dge ba'i las kyis mig dang /
361'a3(dkon brtsegs): rna ba la stsogs pa rims kyis yongs su rdzogs byed do// zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de
361'a4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'bri gdong zhes bya ba ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i mig gnyis kun tu dang ba dang / rna ba dang sna'i dbang po la stsogs pa yang rims kyis yongs su smin par byed de/
361'a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor rdal gyis g.yogs pa sa'i phye ma dang / 'bru mar dang thal ba blangs te/ byi dor byas na yongs su gsal ba 'gyur ba de bzhin du/
361'a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rlung gi stobs kyis mig la stsogs pa bus nas/ mig la stsogs pa kun tu dang bar byed pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// zhag bdun phrag bcwo brgyad la ma'i mngal
361'a7(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni cher bstan par gyur pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i dbang po rnams mthar gyis yongasu smin cing
361'a8(dkon brtsegs): gsal ba ba dang / mthar gyis yongasu dag par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil sprin dang khug rnas bsgribs shing khebs par gyur pa glo bur du rlung drag pa
361'b1(dkon brtsegs): langs te/ bus nas phyog bzhir gtor bar gyur na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de yongs su gsal bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ 'di ltar las kyi rlung gi dbang po rnams bus pa
361'b2(dkon brtsegs): ches shin tu gsal zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ snga ma'i rlung gi stobs kyis mig
361'b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lce'i dbang po bzhi po dag kyang yongs su smin par byed do// dang po mngal du 'jug pa'i tshe ni dbang po gsum dang ldan te/ lus kyi dbang po dang / srog gi dbang
361'b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang / yid kyi dbang po ste/ de ltar dbang po rnam yongasu rdzogs par byed do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang
361'b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni/ shin tu sra ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis lus las rus pa sna tshogs bskyed par byed de/ rkang pa g.yon pa la brten te/ rus pa nyid shu bskyed do// rkang pa
361'b6(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa la brten te rus pa nyi shu bskyed do// gzhan yang rkang pa'i rus pa bzhi dang / rje dang gyi rus pa gnyis dang / lha nga'i rus pa gnyis dang / brla ba'i rus pa gnyis dang /
361'b7(dkon brtsegs): rkeng pa dang / dbyi'i rus pa gsum dang / sgal tshigs kyi rus pa bcwo brgyad dang / rtsib ma'i rus pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / brang gi rus pa bcu gsum dang / lag pa g.yas g.yon re re
361'b8(dkon brtsegs): la rus pa nyi shu nyi shu dang / lag ngar gyi rus pa bzhi dang / dpung pa'i rus pa gnyis dang / 'gram pa'i rus pa gnyis dang / mgo'i rus pa bzhi dang / so'i rus pa bzhi dang /
362a1(dkon brtsegs): so'i rtsa ba'i rus pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyang bskyed par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs mkhan nam/ gzugs mkhan gyi spobs
362a2(dkon brtsegs): mas mkhas pas sngar shing sra ba blangs ste/ phyis srad bus bcings nas/ gzugs rnam byas pa 'jim pa ma bskus mod kyi/ 'on kyang de'i rus pa'i mtshan nyid ces
362a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis rus rnams bskyed pa'i dus kyi tshe yang de bzhin te/ de lta bas na zhag bdun po de dag rus pa phra mo ma brtogs par
362a4(dkon brtsegs): rus pa chen po skye ba'i grangs ning nyis brgya yod par rig par bya'o// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gcig pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par
362a5(dkon brtsegs): grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de yi lus kyi sha skyed par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
362a6(dkon brtsegs): zhal zhal mkhan nam zhal zhal mkhan gyi slob mas/ 'jim pa legs par spangs nas/ rtsig pa rnams li zhal zhal byed pa de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gi dbang gi lus
362a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sha skyed pa yang bzhin du rig par bya'o// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ kun tu
362a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis lus kyi khrag bskyed par byed do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gsum pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon
362b1(dkon brtsegs): par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ yongasu dag par 'dzin pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis lus kyi lpags pa skyed par byed do// zhag bdun phrag nyid shu bzhi pa la
362b2(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ sprin 'dzin zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i lus kyi lpags pa rkyong zhing / mdog
362b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par byed pa'o// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu lnga pa la/ ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ grong khyer 'dzin ces
362b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i lus la sha dang khrag 'phel zhing / rims kyis rab tu 'dang bar byed de// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu drug pa la ma'i
362b5(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba mngon par grub pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i sku dang / spu dang sen mo
362b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams bskyed nas/ thams cad rtsa rgyus rnams dang 'brel ba byed do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par
362b7(dkon brtsegs): grub pa gang yin pa de ni sman yon pa zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyi lus kyi mtshan ma rnams mthar gyi mngon par grub par byed de/ gal te tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa
362b8(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas shing / ye byad rnams la ster skas phangs shing sbyin pa gtong bar mi byed pa dang / pha ma dang mkhan po dang / bla ma'i gnas
362'a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa nyan par mi byed pa zhig yin na ni/ las de'i dbang gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams pa sna tshogs thob
362'a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur bas/ gal te lus ring zhing sbom pa dang / tsho zhing dkar ba dang / mnyen pa gang yin pa des mdzes par gyur na ni/ lus thung zhing phra ba dang / ring cing gnag
362'a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rtsub pa dag thob par byed do/ gal te lu sa thung zhing phra ba dang / ring cing gnag pa dang / nub pa gang yin pa des mdzes par gyur nas ni/ lus ring zhing
362'a4(dkon brtsegs): sbom pa dang / cho zhing dkar ba dang / shin tu mnyen pa dag thob par byed do// gal te lus kyi yan lag mtho ba dang / dma' ba dang / thags bzang ba dang / thags
362'a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa dang mi ldan pa'i lus yang dag par len par byed do// gzhan yang 'on pa dang / long ba dang / lkugs sa pa dang / rka lag 'phye zhing 'gro ba dang / dbang po rnams
362'a6(dkon brtsegs): ma tshang ba dang / tshig smra ba pa rnams gzhan gyis nyan par mi 'dod pa dang / lus mi sdug cing yi dgas 'dra bar yang dag par len por 'gyur te/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las
362'a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang gis/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i lus rnams pa sna tshogs len par gyur pas/ pha ma dang nyeng shes rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 'dod na/ gzhan lta mos kyang
362'a8(dkon brtsegs): dgos/ gal te tshe rab snga ma la dge ba bcu'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing / sbyin pa legs par btang ba dang / ser sna dang g.yo sgyu yi bsag pa med pa dang
362'b1(dkon brtsegs): pha ma dang mkhan po dang / bla ma'i gnas rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag la mngon par yid ches shing / yang dag par blangs pa zhig yin na ni/ rgyu dang rkyen des gal
362'b2(dkon brtsegs): te mi yi lus thob par gyur na yang / gong du bstan pa lta bu'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyis mngon par sgrub pa'i lus len par mi 'gyur zhing / gya nom pa rnam pa sna
362'b3(dkon brtsegs): cho gas dang ldan pa'i lus thob par 'gyur bas/ bya bzhin mdzes pa dang / mtshan rnams dang ldan zhing rko sla ba rnams mang po kun gyis mnyan par 'dod pa'i 'os su
362'b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de lta bas na dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de 'dra ba thob par 'gyur ra bar rig par bya'o// dga' bo de lta bu'i lus
362'b5(dkon brtsegs): de yang gal te pho yin na ni/ ma'i mngal na g.yas phyogs su chog pur 'dug la/ lag pa gnyis kyis g.yog nas ma'i skal tshigs logs su bltas te 'dug go
362'b6(dkon brtsegs): gal te mo yin na ni rtsib logs g.yon phyogs su cog pur 'dug la lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs te/ ma'i lto ba la kha bltas nas ma zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni
362'b7(dkon brtsegs): 'og/ zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni steng nang du btsos rab tu btsos shing / gnas sngar kun tu bcings pas/ 'di lta ste/ dben na/ rkyal pa'i nang na 'dug pa dang 'dra'o// gal
362'b8(dkon brtsegs): te de'i mas shin tu mang du zos sam/ shin tu nyung ngu zos sam/ gal te zas shin tu mdor ba 'am/ shin tu rtsub pa 'am/ shin tu skam pa 'am/ shin tu snum 'am/
362''a1(dkon brtsegs): / shi tu lan cha bro ba 'am/ shin tu kha ba 'am/ shin tu sgyur ba 'am/ shin tu grang ba'am/ shin tu tsha ba dag zos par gyur tam/ gzhan yang 'dod chags
362''a2(dkon brtsegs): spyad par gyur tam/ drag du song dam/ mchongs pa byas sam/ yun ring du nyal lam/ yun ring du 'dug par gyur na yang / mngal na gnas pa de sdug bsngal myong bar gyur te/
362''a3(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na ma yi mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ sdug bsngal mang po dgis rab tu gzir bar rig par bya'o// ngas mir gyur pa'i sdug bsngal yang mdo tsam du bstan na yang / de 'dra na sem
362''a4(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal dper bya ba dag lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lus 'di lta bu la rab tu mos par byed/ zhag bdun
362''a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag nyi shu brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ phyin ci log gi 'du shes rnam pa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzhon pa'i 'du shes dang / khang bu brtseg
362''a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes dang khri star gyi 'du shes dang / chu mig gi 'du shes dang / rdzing gi 'du shes dang / chu bo'i 'du shes dang / kun dga' ra ba'i 'du shes dang / skyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes
362''a7(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'di ni 'du shes rnam pa brgyad pa'o// zhag 'dur phrag nyi shu dgu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ me tog 'am
362''a8(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa'i de'i lus kyi lpags pa'i mdog kun tu bzang zhing mtshan ma rnams rab tu gsal bar byed do/ thams cad kyang
362''b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dus su las rnams mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bye brag ma mtshungs pas/ rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog rnam pa rtogs dang ldan par 'gyur bas/
362''b2(dkon brtsegs): kha cig ni kha dog dkar por 'gyur/ kha cig ni kha dog dkar po yang ma yin/ gnag pa yang ma yin par 'gyur ro// kha cig ni kha dog sngon por 'gyur/ kha cig na
362''b3(dkon brtsegs): kha dog rtsub cing skam par 'gyur/ kha cig ni kha dog snum par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i kha dang mtshan nyid ldan par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag sum bcu pa la ma'i mngal
362''b4(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ lcags kyi sgo zhes bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i skra dang spu dang / sen mo rnams
362''b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'phel ba dang / kha dog dkar gnag rnams rab tu gsal bar byed do// las kyi rkyen gyis mtshan ma 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag sa
362''b6(dkon brtsegs): cu gcig pa nas/ zhag bdun phrag sum cu lnga pa'i bar du ma'i mngal gnas pa'i tshe/ lus kyi mtshan ma rnams cher skye bar 'gyur bas/ mthar gyis lus kyi
362''b7(dkon brtsegs): yan lag phun gsum tshogs shing yangs par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag sum cu drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ 'byung ba'i sam pa skye bas/
362''b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun zag sum cu bdun pa la/ ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ phyin ci log du ma gyur pa'i 'du shes rnams ba
363a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang / dri mi zhim pa'i 'du shes dang / btson ra'i 'du shes dang / mun nag
363a2(dkon brtsegs): gi 'du shes dang / yongs su skyo nas phyir 'byung ba'i 'du shes skye ba gang yin pa ste/ mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yongasu skyo ba'i bsam pa dag skye bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun
363a3(dkon brtsegs): phrag sum cu brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/ yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ thogs pa'i rkyen ces bya'o// rlung de'i stobs kyis de rab
363a4(dkon brtsegs): tu sbyar bar byed do// rlung gzhan yang kha thur du lta ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ de'i 'go thur da lta zhing lag pa gnyis brkyang ste/ mthar gyis 'byung 'dod par 'gyur//
363a5(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa de gal te tshe rabs snga ma la mngal du 'chi ba'i las brtsegs pa yin na ni/ lag po dang rkang pa snol mar gyur nas/ bsgyur mi nus pas/ sdig pa mi
363a6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las kyi rkyen gyis/ ma'i mngal nyid du 'chi ba'i des byed par 'gyur te/ de'i ma yang de'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po myong ba 'am/ yang na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur
363a7(dkon brtsegs): ro// gal te tshe rabs snga ma la dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas shing tshe ring por 'gyur ba'i rgyu bstsags pa shig yin na ni/ btsas su nye ba'i tshe ma dang bug tu
363a8(dkon brtsegs): ga rab tu bde zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gong ma lta bur med do// zhag bdun phrag sum cu brgyad 'das nas/ mngal nas 'byung bar 'dod pa'i tshe/ sdug
363b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal sna tshogs myong nas gdod 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir lus 'di lta bu len pa 'di ni yang dag par sdug bsngal chen po yin par rig par bya'o// dang po
363b2(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas 'byung ba'i che/ khye'u 'am bu mo yang rung ste/ sa la lhung ma thag tu lag pas bzung ngam/ gos kyis blangs sam/ khri la bzhag gam/ khang pa'i nang du gzhag
363b3(dkon brtsegs): gram/ sa la bzhag gam/ bla gab med par bzhag gam/ nyi ma la bzhag gam/ dgun nas dbyar gyi dus su grang ba dang tshwa ba'i rlung gis btsas ma thag pa'i lus de la
363b4(dkon brtsegs): reg par gyur na yang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na ba lang gson por bshus pa rtsigs pa la reg gam/ bla gab med pa'i thad la lhung bar
363b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ srog chags dag gis bza' bar gyur pa 'am/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig la sbrang bu mchu rings rnams kyis za ba la yang lcag gis bzhus pa de bzhin
363b6(dkon brtsegs): du/ dang po mngal nas 'byung ba'i tshe/ chu ngon po dag gis lus bkrus pas reg pa'i sdug bsngal myong ba yang de dang 'dra'o// bcas nas mthar gyis cher ba dang ma'i
363b7(dkon brtsegs): lus las khrag dang 'dres pa'i na zho byung nas gso bar byed de/ ngas sngar mdo sde gzhan las rgya cher bstan pa yin no// de lta bas na lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba dang /
363b8(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mang po las mngon par grub pa yin pas/ mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba na 'di 'dra ba'i lus la rje su chags par byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo dang po
364a1(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas byang nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / srog chags srin bu'i rigs brgyad bcu lus las skyes nas de la za bar byed do//
364a2(dkon brtsegs): skra la za bar zhes bya ba'i srin bu'i rigs gnyis yod do// skra la gnas nas skra la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs gnyis ni mig la gnas nas mig la za bar byed
364a3(dkon brtsegs): do// srin bu'i rigs pa ha na dang / dkar ldan dang / nad slong dang / yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ glad pa la gnas nas glad pa la bza' bar byed do// srin
364a4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rigs lus gnag po'i lo ma zhes bye ba gcig yod de/ rna ba la gnas nas rna ba la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mdzod sgo zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ sna la
364a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas sna la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs 'phen pa dang / kun tu 'phen zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ mchu la gnas nas mchu la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rig
364a6(dkon brtsegs): kha mchu zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce la gnas nas lce la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rig rigs kha rno zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce'i drung la gnas nas lce'i drung la
364a7(dkon brtsegs): za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs yan lag rdzogs zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ dkan la gnas nas dkan la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs lag pa dra ba can dang
364a8(dkon brtsegs): phyed skur zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ lag mthil la gnas nas lag mthil la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpung ba dang nye ba'i dpung pa zhes bya ba gnyis
364b1(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ dpung pa la gnas nas dpung ba la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs lcags can dang / nye ba'i lcags can zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ mid pa la gnas
364b2(dkon brtsegs): nas mid pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs rdo rje rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ snying la gnas nas snying la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs naman pa dang /
364b3(dkon brtsegs): dman pa'i kha zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ sha la gnas nas sha la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha dog ldan dang / grag ldan zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ khrag la
364b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas khrag la 'thung bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang / dri gtong ba zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ chub la gnas nas chu ba la za bar byed do// srin
364b5(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rigs mi mtho ba dang / khas bub ces bya ba gnyis yod de/ rgyab kyi skal tshigs la gnas nas/ rgyab kyi skal tshigs la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs
364b6(dkon brtsegs): tshil gyi kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de/ tshil la gnas nas tshil la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mkhris pa'i kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de/ mkhris
364b7(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas nas mkhris pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mu tig ces bya ba gcig yod de/ mchin pa la gnas nas mchin pa la za bar byed do// srin
364b8(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rigs 'dam bu zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ mcher pa la gnas nas mcher ba lo pa za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs lnga brgya yod de/ rigs brgya ni zla ba zhes
365a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// rigs brgya ni zla ba'i kha zhes bya'o// rigs brgya ni bsil byed ces bya'o// rigs brgya ni bsil byed gdong zhes
365a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// rigs brgyan yangs pa zhes bya ste/ rtsib logs g.yon pa la gnas nas rtsib logs g.yon pa la za ba byed// gzhan yang srin bu rigs lnga brgya
365a3(dkon brtsegs): yod pa yang ming gong ma dang mthun te/ rtsib logs g.yas pa la gnas nas rtsib logs g.yas pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs cung zad 'bigs
365a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / cher 'bigs pa dang / rus pa 'bigs pa dang / rus pa'i gdong zhes bya ba bzhi yad de/ rus pa la gnas nas rus pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i
365a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs cher dkar dang / cung zad dkar ba dang / snom pa'i stobs dang / stag lam zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ rtsa rgyus la gnas nas rtsa rgyus la za bar byed do//
365a6(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs mos pa'i yid dang / seng dge'i stobs dang / ri bong lto dang / 'dod pa la mngon du zhen pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ ma zhu ba'i gnas la gan
365a7(dkon brtsegs): nas ma zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang / dpa' bo'i bdag po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ zhu ba'i gnas la gnas nas/
365a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnas la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mu kha na dang / tra kha dang // phung po'i kha dang / bye'u kha zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ gci ba'i lam la gnas nas
365b1(dkon brtsegs): gci ba'i lam la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs byed pa dang / byed pa chen po dang / phye ba dang / po ta ra ka zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ bshang ba'i lam la gnas
365b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bshang ba'i lam la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs gdong gnag dang / 'jigs su rung ba'i gdong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ brla la gnas nas brla la
365b3(dkon brtsegs): za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mdze can dang / mji can chu du zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ pras mo la gnas nas pus mo la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mos
365b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rtse ba zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ byin pa la gnas nas byin pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mgo gnag ces bya ba gcig yod de/ rkang pa la gnas nas
365b5(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa la za bar byed do// dga' bo ngas deng khyod la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu lus 'di la gnas nas/ nyin tshan du za bar byed pas/ nyams stobs chung
365b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing mdog ngan par byed pa dang / nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs lus 'di la 'dus nas/ gzhan yang de'i sems bdung ba dang / rab tu gdung ba dang / yongasu
365b7(dkon brtsegs): bdung bar byed pas/ sman pa mkhas pa yod kyang de la rmongs pas sman gang gis nad 'di dag gso bar nus pa shes par mi 'gyur ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ mkhas pa su zhig
365b8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i brgya mtsho 'di 'dra ba'i lus la rjes su chags par byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo dang po bcas pa nas cher skyes par 'gyur gyi bar du gos dang / rdzas kyi gsos nas/ lus
366a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di mngon par grub par gyur kyang de'i tshe'i lo brgya thub pa yang yod de/ de bas thung ba yang yod do// lo brgya po de yang dus sum brgyar 'gyur ro//
366a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dpyid dang / dbyar dang / dgun gyi dus gang yin pa'o// de la dpyid gang yin pa de ni che ba'i dus su/ dbyar gang yin pa de ni char pa'i dus so// dgun gang yin pa de ni
366a3(dkon brtsegs): brang ba'i dus so// dus gsum po de dag la yang zla ba bzhi bzhi yod pas/ lo gcig la zla ba bcu gnyis yod par 'gyur la/ lo brgya la zla ba sto nyis brgya yod par 'gyur bas/
366a4(dkon brtsegs): zla ba ya ra kyi ngo dkar po dang / zla mar dro nag pos phye na nyis stong bzhi brgyar 'gyur te/ de la nyin mtshan ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug yod do// nyin gcig la lan gnyis za bas/
366a5(dkon brtsegs): zas ni lan stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis za bar 'gyur bas/ res 'ga' mi za ba yang grangs der gtogs so// de ni 'di lta ste/ na ba dang / ra ro ba dang / ched du zas bca
366a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gnyin log pa dang / rtsed mo rtses pa dang / las bzhan gyis brel pa dang / ma'i nu zho 'thungs pa'i rgyu dang / rkyen gyis ma zos pa gang yin pa 'di ni ma zos pa zhes bya
366a7(dkon brtsegs): 2/ 'di la bu'i lus 'di ni lol rgyagrub par gyur kyang mthar 'jig par gyur bas/ mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i rgyamatsho 'di de la rjes su chags par byed/ sa
366a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dga' nga lus 'di yang dag par blang ba la sdug bsngal rnam pa gnyisu yod de/ gnyis gang na no/ nad mang po rnams lus la 'dus pa gang yin pa den ning gi sras
366b1(dkon brtsegs): lto ba dang / lag pa dang /
366b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngal zhes bya'o// mi dang mi mi yin pas rnam par 'tshe ba gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi sdug bsngal zhes bya'o// de la nad mang po lus la 'dus pa zhes bya ba ji lta
366b3(dkon brtsegs): bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / skag dang / so dang / brang dang rkang pa rnams na bar gyur pa dang / gzhan yang rlung nad dang mchil skabs dang /
366b4(dkon brtsegs): spros pa dang / khong rje ba dang / dbugs ma bde ba dang / blo na pa dang / gci ba'i lam rtsub pa dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / mthor bu dang / shu ba dang /
366b5(dkon brtsegs): 'brum bu dang / rkang bam dang / gzhan yang nad rnam pa sna tshogs lus la 'dus pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang mkhris pas nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / rlung nad
366b6(dkon brtsegs): brgya rtsa gcig dang / bad kan gyi nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'dus pa las byung ba'i nad brgya rtsa gcig ste/ de ltar nud bzhi brgya rtsa ba
366b7(dkon brtsegs): po dag gis lus nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi sngag bsngal zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phyi rol gyi sdug bsngal gyis lus 'di la gnod par byed pa 'di lta ste/
366b8(dkon brtsegs): brtson ra dam po bcug pa dang / lcags gis gzhas pa dang / brtson rar bcug pa dang / bcings pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang rna ba bcad pa dang /
366b9(dkon brtsegs): sna bcad pa dang / lag pa dang rkang pa btubs pa dang / 'gro bcad pa dang / lha rnams kyis ma bsrungs pas/ mi ma yin pa'i gdon ma rungs pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang
367a1(dkon brtsegs): srin po rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sha sbrang la stsogs pa srin bu gdug pa rnam
367a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis zos pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / rlung dang / char nye bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus nyon mongs par byed
367a3(dkon brtsegs): mir gyur pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal yang de 'dra na/ ngan 'gro rnams kyi sdug bsngal lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni shin tu brjod par bka' 'o// de lta bas na 'di dag tha
367a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang / 'das pa'i dus su sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'das byed pa'i dbang gis 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gang gi
367a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshon cha dag gis gnod par byas pa yongasu bsrung ba'i phyir/ grong khyer brtsibs te 'obs kyis bskor nas lus 'di yongs su bsrungs kyang / rlung dang / char dang / sbrang bu
367a6(dkon brtsegs): mchu rings dang / sha sbrang la stsogs pa khang khyim dag tu 'ongs nas/ gnod pa byed par gyur la/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis kyang nang dang phyi rol nyon mongs par byed do// bza' ba
367a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / btung ba dang / mal dang na ba'i gsos sman dang / zhing dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gang khyim dang / gser dang / dngul la stsogs pa rin po che sna bdun dang / bran dang /
367a8(dkon brtsegs): bran mo dang / shing rta dang / bzhon pa dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams yongasu tshol ba na/ gal te yid dang mthun par ma gyur na yang sdug bsngal bskyed par byed la/ gal
367b1(dkon brtsegs): te longs spyod thob par gyur na yang / ser snas pangs shing rtag tu bsrung ba dang / gal te stor zhing chud zos par gyur na yang / sdug bsngal chen po bskyed par byed do//
367b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i lus 'di ni 'gro ba dang / sdod pa dang / 'dug pa dang nyal ba'i spyod lam thams cad sdug bsngal mo yin pa gang yang
367b3(dkon brtsegs): med pas/ gal te yun ring du 'gro zhing skad cig tsam du yang ngal bsol med par gyur na yang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la/ sdod pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba de dag
367b4(dkon brtsegs): so so nas yun ring bar gyur na yang / thams cad sdug bsngal bar 'gyur bas/ gal te yun ring du song pa las/ skad cig tsam du 'dug du yod par gyur na yang khade
367b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'du shes bskyed par byed kyang de yang dag par bde ba ma yin no// gal te yun ring du 'greng ba las skad cig tsam du 'dug pa dang / gal te yun ring du 'dug pa
367b6(dkon brtsegs): las skad cig tsam du nyal bar gyur pa las yang dag pa ma yin pas/ bde ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed kyang / de yang dag par bde ba ma yin pas/ de'i phyir nye bar len
367b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phung po lnga'i lus 'di ni/ thams cad kyang sdug bsngal yin par rig par bya'o// gang la la zhig bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi don
367b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnams la yongasu skyo ba skyed nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ yang dag par slob par byed na/ mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par
368a1(dkon brtsegs): grol pa'i thos las sangs byams par ma 'gyur ba/ gang la la zhig gos dang sal dang / rnapa'ag pos pa dang / ye byad rnams
368a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de lta ma tho da pa dag kyang / rnam par srin pa chen po'i mthu grags pa thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' ba 'dir
368a3(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems/ gzugs gang yin pa de rtag pa zhig yin nas/ 'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom
368a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das gzugs de ni mi rtag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi rtag pa yin na/ de sdug bsngal ba zhig yin nam/ 'on te sdug
368a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal med pa zhig yin/ dga' bos gsol pa/ gzugs gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang mi rtag
368a6(dkon brtsegs): cing sdug bsngal ba de ni/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin na/ 'phags pa'i nyan thos pang du thos pa dang ldan pa gang de lta bu'i bstan pa thos par 'gyur na yang /
368a7(dkon brtsegs): khrin da di sa pa gzugs san zhes 'dzi cing / de la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin par byed da/ bcom ldan de ni ma lags te/ gzugs la bdag ces
368a8(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba yang sa mchis la/ bdag gi zhes bgyi ba yam mchis pasas// gzhan yang dga' ba 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dubyed
368b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin 'de dag ci rtag pa zhig yon nas/ 'on ma ga pazhig yin/ bcom ldan 'das la che dang ldan pa dga' bos gsol pa/ bcog
368b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de dag thams ca ma rnag pa lags sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te mi rtag pa yin na sdug bsngal bzhig yin nas/ 'o// sdug bsngam
368b3(dkon brtsegs): med bzhi // dag thos gsal pa/ 'di ltar bung badzin pa de dag ni/ sdug pasngal bzhes kyi lags pa// com ldan 'das kyi bag yul pa gang mim
368b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin la/ 'phags pa nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa gang de lta bu'i bstan pa thos par gyur na yang / lus 'di'i phung po bzhi
368b5(dkon brtsegs): po dag la kha dag dang bdag gir 'dzin par byed dam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ phung po bzhi po de dag la yang dag par bdag ces bgyi ba yang ma mchis la/ bdag
368b6(dkon brtsegs): gi zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis pas so// gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ltar bdag ces bgyi ba 'di ni 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / nang dang pha rol na yang yod pa/
368b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin la/ rags pa dang / phra ba dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa dang / nye ba dang / ring ba yang ma yin pas/ chos de dag thams cad ni bdag dang bdag gi ma yin no// de lta bas
368b8(dkon brtsegs): na dga' bo 'di ltar yang dag pa'i shes pas chos rnams la bdag med par so sor brtag par rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa gang de ltar
369a1(dkon brtsegs): so sor brtags nas/ yongs su skyo ba bskyed par byed na/ rnam par grol zhing mthar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur te/
369a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar yang dag par bslabs nas/ chos 'di mngon du gyur pa'i tshe/ skye ba'i cha ni zad cing tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par sprad pas/ bya ba byas nas yang srid pa phyi ma len
369a3(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo ni/ rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral bas/ chos kyi mig rnam par
369a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa thob par gyur to// dge slong lnga brgya po de dag ni chos rnams la len pa med par zag pa zad nas sems rnam par grol bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
369a5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal nas/ 'khor mang po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo/
369a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnams grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo mngal du 'jug pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa bcu gsum pa/ rdzogs s+ho/
369a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo mang lan gnas pa bstan pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo//
369a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das khrong khyer ser spyan shing na grong 'i kun
369b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med pa rnams dang thabs gcig du bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba de'i lus gser
369b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi kha dog can/ mtshan sum bcu dang ldan zhing / tshad bcom ldan 'das las sor bzhis thung ba cig yod de// de'i chung ma sun da ri ka zhes bya ba/ bzang mo blta na sdug
369b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ byad bzhin mdzes shing 'jig rten na dkon pa/ kha dog khyad par du 'phags shing / mang po kun gyis bltar 'dod pa cig yod pas/ dga' bo de la chags shing zhes
369b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pas/ skad cig tsam du yang ma 'bral zhing / 'dod pa'i sems kyis shin tu chags par gyur te/ srog gis 'jal bar byed pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
369b5(dkon brtsegs): de gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ snga dro dus kyi tshe na bza' ba rnams te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ zha 'bring ba che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang grong khyer du bsod snyoms
369b6(dkon brtsegs): la gshegs te/ mthar kyis dga' bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs nas/ de'i sgor gshegs te bzhugs so// de nas thugs rje chen po'i mthus 'od zer gse
369b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi kha don lta bu btang bas/ dga' bo'i khyim gyi nang kun tu yang gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bur gyur pa dang / de'i tshe dga' bo 'di snyam du 'ad gnor kun tu snang bar gyur pa
369b8(dkon brtsegs): gdon mi za bar 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin no snyam du bsams nas/ mi zhig mngags te/ kye song la su yin pa ltos shig ces bsgo ba dang / des kyang bcom
370a1(dkon brtsegs): / ldan 'das mthong ba dang / myur zhing rings par slar log nas/ dga' bo la bcom ldan 'das sgo na bzhugs so zhes smras
370a2(dkon brtsegs): so// des skad smras pa thos nas/ myur du pyir byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la bsus te phyag bya bar byas pa las/ de'i tshe sun da ri ka 'di snyam du bdag gis gal te
370a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di btang bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ gos kyi mtha' ma nas bzung ste ma btang ba dang / dga' bos
370a4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ deng re shig thong shi ga dang / bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas bdag slar 'ong ngo // sun da ri kas smras pa/ bdag cag dam bcas nas gdod de bzhin du
370a5(dkon brtsegs): gtang ngo zhes/ de'i bral bar thig le gsher ba'i mtshan mas btab nas/ 'di skad du thig le 'di ma skams par slar gshegs su gsol/ gal te thogs par
370a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ gser gyi kar sha ba na lnga brgyas mchad pas gcad do zhes smras pa dang / dga' bos kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes sgor byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs ka
370a7(dkon brtsegs): phyag byas na ste/ de bzhin gshegs lhung bzed blangs nas slar khyim du zhugs te bza' ba dang bca' ba'i gsol pa dag lhung bzed bkang nas slar sgor byung ba
370a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos la byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed ma len cig par mtshan ma bstan
370b1(dkon brtsegs): to// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po ni shin tu gzi byin che bas bzhes su gsal// bzhes su gsol ba'i thugs kyang ma thub nas/ yang kun dga' bo la
370b2(dkon brtsegs): byin pa dang / kun dga' bos smras pa/ khyod kyis lhung bzed 'di su las blangs/ smras pa bcom ldan 'das las blangs so// kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'o na bcom
370b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la phul cig ces smras pa dang / bdage ston pa chen po la gsol ba'i thugs kyang mi thub bo zhes/ cang mi smra bar zha 'bring du song ngo // bcom ldan 'ad
370b4(dkon brtsegs): sba la gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas/ phyag bcabs zhal bsil te/ gdan la bzhugs pa dang / dga' bos lhung zed thogs pa de bcom ldan 'das la phulo//
370b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas/ dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod nga'i lhung bzed kyi lhag ma za 'am/ bdag 'tshal lo ces gsol pa dang /
370b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis kyang de la byin no// dga' bos zos zin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci khyod rab tu 'byung 'am/ des kyang rab tu 'byung ngo
370b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsol te/ de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub du skyed pa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ yab yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma
370b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas gzhan rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag dang / nam yang 'gal bar ma mdzad pa'i phyir/ da ltar gang yang bka' las 'gal bar mi byed pa brnyes par
371a1(dkon brtsegs): @gyur na pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis dga' bo'i sgra dang kha spu bregs shig
371a2(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes 'breg mkhan btsal nas/ de'i skra bregs par bsams pa dang / dga' bos 'dreg mkhan
371a3(dkon brtsegs): de la bsgo ba/ kwa'i khyod mi shes sam/ nga ni ring por mi thogs par stobs kyi 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur bas/ khyod kyis gal te nga'i skra bregs par gyur na
371a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi lag pa gnyis kyi khrig ma man cad gcad do zhes bsdigs pas/ de shin tu sgeg par gyur nas/ spu gri bsdus te phyir 'gro bar bsams pa dang / de nas tshe dang
371a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nyid dga' bo ga la bar gshegs ste/ dga' bo la ci khyod rab tu mi 'byung ngam/ des kyang
371a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyang ril ba bsnams te/ de'i 'go la chu blugs nas/ madreg mkhan gyis skra dang kha spu bregs pa
371a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / de 'di snyam du bdag la rigs shig/ bcom ldan 'das la bsri gzha byas te/ rab tu byung mod kyis/ 'on kyang slar dgongs ka khyim du 'gro'o snyam du
371a8(dkon brtsegs): des dgodra ka slar lam da zhugs te song ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'gro ba'i lam du ga yang sa chen po cig sprul pa de mthong nas 'di snyam du/ su na da
371b1(dkon brtsegs): ri ka dang dus byas pa ni thag ring du gyur pas 'gro ba'i rkyen dang ldan par ma gyur te/ deng bdag gis de bsams pa nyid kyis/ gal te 'chi ba'i dus byed par
371b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yang srid na/ gal te shi bar ma gyur na nas nangs te 'gro zhes sun da ri ka dran pa'i mya ngan dang sdug bsngal gyis mtshan mo 'das par gyur te/
371b3(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la dga' bo de khang skyong byos
371b4(dkon brtsegs): shig par sgo shig/ des kyang de bzhin du de'i thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod khang skyong byos shig ces bka' stsal pa to zhes bsgo ba dang / des kyang khang
371b5(dkon brtsegs): skyong zhes bya ba ni ji lta bu/ des bya ba ni ci zhig byed ces dris so// des smras pa/ gtsug lag khang du dge 'dun gyi zhal ta ba dag bya dgos so// smras pa tshul ji lta bus
371b6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba'i rigs/ smras pa khang skyong ces bya ba ni/ gal te dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la dong na/ gtsug lag khang gi nang gi sa rnams phyag nas chag gda' bar bya'o//
371b7(dkon brtsegs): bo lang gi lci bsar ba blangs nas go roms bzhin du 'jam por bslu bar byar// legs par yid la bya ste/ bsrungs zhing skor lag med par bya'o// gos su
371b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba yod na dge 'dun la gsol bar bya'o// dri dang me tog yod na dge 'dun la brim par bya'o// mtshan ma sgo gcad cing na ma nangs na dbye bar bya'o// snam phyi ba
372a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / chab khungs rtag tu bkru zhing pi dor bya dgos so// gal te gtsug lag khang zhig cing rul ba yod na/ bcos legs bya'o zhes de
372a2(dkon brtsegs): skad bstan pa thos pa dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal ba/ bzhin du thams cad bdag gis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes khas blangs so// de na
372a3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rnams snga dro dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / dga' bos gtsug lag
372a4(dkon brtsegs): khang na su yang med par mthong nas/ bdag gis phyeg dar byas zin pa dang / slar khyim du 'gro'o zhes phyag dar byed byed pa la zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
372a5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs shing mkhyen pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis phyag zin pa'i sa gtsang ma rnams slar phyag dar gyis gang bar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / des yang 'di snyam du
372a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis phyag dar bor te slar khyim du 'gro'o// snyam du bsams nas/ phyags ma slar bsdus nas/ phyag dar zad par ma gyur pas/ gnas khang gi sgo gcad de 'gro
372a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du bsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo gcig bcad zin nas sgo gzhan bcad tsam na/ sgo gzhan yang phye bar byin gyis brlabs pas/ nyon mong
372a8(dkon brtsegs): pa skyes nas gzhan yang 'di snyam du gal te rkun pos gtsug lag khang 'di nyams par byas kyang 'di la gnod pa ci yod de/ bdag rgyal por gyur pa na/ 'di bas lhas
372b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gtsug lag khang bzang po brgya stong yang brtsigs par zad pas/ bdag ni slab khyim du 'gro ba rigs so zhes/ gal te lam po cher zhugs te 'gron bcom ldan 'das
372b2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'phrad du dogos pas/ gseb lam du zhugs te/ 'gro'o snyam du bsams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa zhugs kyis mkhyen nas/ gseb lam de nyid du zhugs teg she/
372b3(dkon brtsegs): so// des rgyang ma nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas ma phrad par bya'i phyir/ lam gyi 'gram na ldan shing gi yal ga dang grib mar ldan pa'i thur du 'jol ba zhig gi drung du ga pa ste 'dug pa dang
372b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis ljon shing de'i yal ga gyen du brjes nas de'i lus mngon sum du snang bar byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo khyed gang nas 'ongs/ nga'i
372b5(dkon brtsegs): phyi bzhin du shog shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de yang skyengs ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zha 'bring du 'brangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dag
372b6(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'di chung ma la shin tu chags shing zhen par gyur pas/ de dang bral zhing phan gdags pa'i phyir grong khyer ser skya nas byung ste/ grong khyer mnyan yod du gshegs so snya
372b7(dkon brtsegs): du dgongs nas/ der byon pa dang / ri dag sa dgra'i ma sa ga'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du dga' bo blun po 'di ni rtag tu chung
372b8(dkon brtsegs): ma la chags shing zhen nas gtong bar mi byed pas/ 'di la thabs shig sbyar te/ sems nye bar zhi bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal
373a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ pa/ khyod kyis sngon chad dri ldan zhes bya ba'i ri mthong ngam/ gsol pa ma mthong lags so// gal te de lta na/ nga'i chos gos kyi gnas
373a2(dkon brtsegs): bzung shig/ des kyang na bza' grwa nas bzung ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin nam mkha' la lding ste/ dri ldan du gshegs nas tshe dang ldan pa dag
373a3(dkon brtsegs): bo dang thabs gcig du g.yas g.yon su gzigs pa las/ shing drung cig na spra mo mig la cig zhar ba cig gdongs btegs nas/ mi g.yo bar rtse gcig du bcom ldan
373a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la bltas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis spra mo zhar ma 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//
373a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ji snyam du sem/ spra mo zhar ma 'di sund ri ka dang bstan na/ gang bzang zhing khyed par du 'phags/ gsol pa sun da ri ka 'di
373a6(dkon brtsegs): ni shag kya'i rigs lags ste/ lha'i bu mo dang 'dra bar byed bzhin mchog tu gyur cing / 'jig rten ni zla ma mchis pa lags pas/ spra mo 'di dang bskrun par gyur na/ brgya'i
373a7(dkon brtsegs): char yang nye bar mi mchi/ stong gi cha dang / khri'i cha dang / bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan
373a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dis kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis lha'i gzhal me khang mthong ngam/ gsol pa ma mthong lags so// 'o na yang chos gos kyi grwa nas zung shig/ des kyang na
373b1(dkon brtsegs): brje gra nas bzung ba dang / rang ba'i rgyal ba bzhin du na mkha' las mngon par 'phags nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas su gshegs ste/ che pa ldan
373b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dga' bo khyed song la/ lha'i gzhale me khang khyed par du 'phags pa'i gnas rnams la ltas shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang dga'
373b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshal dang / shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal dang / rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal dang / 'dres pa'i tshal dang / kun 'dus pa'i tshal dang / chos bzang khang la stsogs pa lnga rnams
373b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi kun dga' ra ba na/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rdzing dang rdzing bu dang / rtsed mo rtse zhing dga' mgu'i gnas rnamasu song ste/ kun tu khyab par bltas nas mthar rgyu
373b5(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer rab snang du zhugs pa las/ gzhan rnga dang / pi bang dang / rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sgra snyan pa la stsogs pa 'byin pa dang / gnas de dang de dag du lha'i bu mo
373b6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mdzes pa dang / lhan cig rtse zhing 'khod pa dag mthong ngo // dga' bos kun tu brtag pa las/ gnas gzhan zhig gi gzhal me khang zhig na/ lha'i bu mo 'ba'
373b7(dkon brtsegs): shig yod kyi/ lha'i bu med par mthong nas/ lha'i bu mo de dag la ci'i rgyus gnas gzhanan ni/ lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo 'dres par gnas nas bde ba rnams myong bar byed la/
373b8(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni gang gis sa phyir lha'i bu mo 'ba' shig lhan cig gnas shig/ lha'i bu mi sdang bar gyur ces dris pa dang / lha'i bu po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung
374a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung nas/ rtse gcig du tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyod pa cig yod de/ de dus
374a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i 'og tu 'dir skye bar 'gyur bas/ bdag cag ni 'dir de sdod pa yin no zhes smras so// dga' bos de dag smras pa de thos nas/ dgo' 'gu rangs pas/ myur
374a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis lha rnams kyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i dngos po dag mthong
374a4(dkon brtsegs): ngam/ gsol ba mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po ci zhig mthong zhes bka' stsal pa dang / des kyang ji ltar mthong ba rnams rgyas par bcom
374a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis lha'i bu mo rnams mthong ngam/ gsol pa mthong lags so// lha'i
374a6(dkon brtsegs): bu me de dag sun da ri ka dang bskrun na/ gang gzugs bzang zhing khyed par du 'phags/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sund ri ka lha'i bu mo de dag dang basman na/
374a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar dri ldan gyi spra mo zhar ma sun da ri ka dang stan pa bzhin du/ brgya'i chang yang nye bar mi mchi ste/ stong gi tshe dang / khri'i cha dang / 'bum gyi cha nas rgyu'i bar du yang
374a8(dkon brtsegs): mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi se bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyod na/ de lta bu'i phan yon khyed par du 'phags pa dang /
374b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'gyur bas/ dong khyod kyis tshangs par spyod pa bstan par spyod cig dang / lngar skyes nas de lta bu'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// des kyang de skad du thos nas
374b2(dkon brtsegs): dad mgu rangs ste/ cang mi zer bar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / thabs cig tu lha'i gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ mnyan yod
374b3(dkon brtsegs): na rgyal bu rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar gshegs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo yang lha'i gzhal med khang la bsams bzhin du
374b4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyod pa gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
374b5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ kun dga' bo khyod song la dge slong rnams la 'di skad du/ khyed su yang dga' bo dang lhan cig du stan gcig la ma 'dug cig/ 'chag sa gcig du ma 'chag
374b6(dkon brtsegs): cig/ rdang bu gcig la chos gos lhan cig ma gzhag cig/ gnas gcig du lhang ze dang ril ba ldan gcig du ma gzhag cig // gnas cig du ma do ste kla
374b7(dkon brtsegs): par ma byed cig/ kha ton 'don par ma byed cig ces sgo shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du dge slong rnams
374b8(dkon brtsegs): la bsgo ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'phags pa'i bka' bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo yang mang mo rnams kyis
375a1(dkon brtsegs): spangs par mthong bas/ shin tu ngo tsha zhing gnod par gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
375a2(dkon brtsegs): bo dge slong mang po rnams dang lhan cig du bkad sa nang / chos gos 'drub pa'i las byed pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos mthong nas/ 'di snyam du dge slong
375a3(dkon brtsegs): mang po 'di dag ni bdag yongasu spangs pas lhan cig du mi gnas na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ni bdag gi nu bo yin pas khA cis kyi smad par mi byed do snyam du
375a4(dkon brtsegs): bsams nas/ de'i thad du song ste/ lhan cig du 'dug pa dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang myur du langs te song ngo // des smras pa/ kun dga' bo dge
375a5(dkon brtsegs): slong gzhan rnams ni bdag spang ba'i rigs na/ khyod kho bo'i nu bo yin na/ ci'i phyir bdag spong bar byed/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa la yang dag par de lta
375a6(dkon brtsegs): bu'i don dang ldan mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni lam gzhan du 'gro la/ bdag kyang lam gzhan du 'gro bas/ de'i phyir na phan tshun 'byol ba yin no// smras pa gang ni
375a7(dkon brtsegs): kho bo'i lam yin/ gang ni khyed kyi lam yin/ smras pa khyod ni lhar skye bar mos nas/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// bdag ni mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su
375a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyer ba'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rab tu gsal ba yin no zhes de skad smras pa thos pa dang / shin tu mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis non par gyur to//
375b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis sngon chad sems can dmyal ba
375b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngam/ gsol pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba/ khyod kyis nga'i chos gos kyi gral zung shig/ des kyang na bza' la bzung ba
375b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de khrid de sems can dam la ba'i gnas su gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs gcig du bzhugs nas/ tshe dang ldan/
375b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod song la sems can dmyal ba rnams ltos shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang de bzhin du song ba a las/ sngar ni chu bo ce
375b5(dkon brtsegs): ha ra ni mthong ngo // de nas mthar gyis ral gyi lo ma'i nags dang / shang gci'i 'dam dang / me ma mur gyi gnas su phyin te/ de dag du zhugs te rnam par bltas pa
375b6(dkon brtsegs): las sems can dmyal ba'i sdug snga la sna tshogs myong ba dag mthong ste/ kha cig ni skam pas lce dang so dang / dmyig phyung ba dang / kha cig na sog le'i lus
375b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba dang / kha cig ni ste ris rka lag gtub pa dang / kha cig ni mtshon chas gshag pa dang / dgra sta sa gnyis pa dang / be rgas bsnun pa dang / kha cig ni
375b8(dkon brtsegs): lcags kyi tho bas 'chog par byas pa dang / kha cig ni lcags kyi thu lum khar bcug pa dang / kha cig ni ri rel gyi lo ma can dang / ljon shing ral gyi lo ma can la 'jog pa
376a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gtun gyis brdungs pa dang / rang thag gis 'thag pa dang / zangs kyi ka ba la 'jas pa dang / ljags kyi khri la 'dug nas sdug bsngal
376a2(dkon brtsegs): mi bzad pa rnams myong bar mthong ngo // kha cig lcags kyi me lce rab tu 'bar zhing khol ba dang / rab tu tsha ba'i 'od byung ba/ sems can 'tshod pas/ de lta bu'i
376a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal gyi dngos po myong ba dag mthong ngo // gzhan yang lcags zangs stod pa rang khol zhing me lce rab tu 'bar zhing tshab sems can med pa cig mthong
376a4(dkon brtsegs): be dang / shin tu skrag nas dmyal ba'i srungs ma la kye rgyu dang rkyen gang gi par/ lcags zangs gzhan rnams ni sems can 'tshod par byed la/ lcags 'di 'ba' shig ni
376a5(dkon brtsegs): stong par rang kho la zhes dris pa dang / des smras pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba lhar skye bar smon nas/ sem so rtse gcig du tshangs par spyod pa yang
376a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par sprad par/ lha'i 'jig rten du skyes nas/ re shig bde ba myong bar 'gyur yang / de shi ba'i 'og du lcags zangs 'dir 'jug par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir dor bdag
376a7(dkon brtsegs): cag lca gos zangs me sbar nas bsdad pa yin no zhes smras pa dga' bos thos nas/ shin tu 'jigs skrag pa skyes nas ba spu langs ste/ rdul byung nas 'di snyam du 'dis
376a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag dga' bo yin par shes par gyur na ni/ gson po kho nar zangs kyi nang du bor bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ myur zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
376b1(dkon brtsegs): logs su bros te song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba mthong ngam/ des kyang snying rje'i tshul gyis ma blags ste
376b2(dkon brtsegs): dus nas/ lce lkugs pa bzhin du skad phra mo phyung nas mthong lags so ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis dngos po ci zhig
376b3(dkon brtsegs): mthong // des kyang ji ltar mthong ba rnams rgyas par/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' be mar skye bar smon pa dang /
376b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i 'jig rten yongs su tshol bas/ tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par sred pa la nyes dmigs de lta bu yod pas/ de lta bas na deng khyod kyis mya ngan las 'das
376b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yongasu gnyer ba'i bsam pas/ tshangs par spyad pa bya'i/ lhar skye ba la dga' bas rab tu brtson par mi bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo de skad ces bka' stsa
376b6(dkon brtsegs): pa thos nas/ dor ba'i sems kyis cang mi zer por 'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i
376b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ slar rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nang gi dri ma ni rnam pa
376b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chag dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang yin pa ste/ de dag ni sbeng bar bya ba yin pas/ yongasu spong ba la rab tu brtson zhing bslab
377a1(dkon brtsegs): @bar bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bzhugs nas/ ring po ma lon par rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sems can
377a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i phyir/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig du yul tsam par gshegs nas/ garga'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
377a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs gcig du/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig du 'khod
377a4(dkon brtsegs): do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams phyogs gcig du 'khod par mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga la chos kyi rnam grangs
377a5(dkon brtsegs): thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba/ tshangs par
377a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyis rnam grangs yod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas deng khyod la bshad par byam/
377a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo ma'i mngal dang
377a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur kyang / mngal du 'jug pa 'gyur ba yang yod/ 'jug par mi 'gyur ba yang yod do// ji ltar skye ba len cing ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur zhe na/ gal
377b1(dkon brtsegs): te pha ma gnyis 'dod pa'i sems kyis lhan gcig 'khrig par yang spyod par gyur/ ma'i mngal yang yongasu gtsang bar gyur/ dus kyi zla mtshan yang ldan par gyur la/
377b2(dkon brtsegs): bar ma do'i phung po yang mngon sum du snang bar gyur na/ de'i tshe ma'i bangal du 'jug par rig par bya'o// de la bar ma do'i phung po'i dbyibs de yang rnam pa gnyis su gyur
377b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ kha dog sdug cing mdzes pa dang / kha dog mi sdug mi mdzes pa'o// sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi bar ma de'i srid pa'i kha dog ni mi sdug pa yin te/ 'di lta
377b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na/ sdong dum tshig pa 'dra'o// dud 'gro rnams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa'i kha dog ni 'di lta ste/ dper na du pa 'dra'o// yid dgas rnams kyi bar ma do'i
377b5(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i kha dog ni 'di lta ste/ dper na tshwa 'dra'o// lha dang mi rnams bar ma de'i srid pa'i kha dog 'di lta ste/ dper na gser gyi kha dog 'dra'o// gzugs kyi kham
377b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar ma do'i srid pa'i kha dog ni dkar por 'dug go// gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha rnams la ni/ bar ma do'i srid pa med de/ 'di ltar de na gzugs med pa'i phyir ro/
377b7(dkon brtsegs): bar ma do'i phung po'i sems can kha cig ni lag badra gnyis dang / rkang pa gnyis dang ldan no// kha gcig ni rkang pa bzhi dang / rkang pa bang po dang ldan no// kha cig ni
377b8(dkon brtsegs): rkang pa med de// sngon gyi las ji lta ba bzhin du/ yang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang dbyibs 'dra ba'i bar ma da'i srid pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ lha'i bar mam
378a1(dkon brtsegs): srid pa gang yin pa de 'go gyen du lta'o// mi dang dud 'gro dang / yi dag rnams kyi ni thad kar lta zhing 'gro'o// sems can dmyal
378a2(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyi bar ma do'i srid pa ni 'go thur du lta'o// bar mdo'i srid pa thams cad rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / lha'i mig bzhin du skye ba'i gnas
378a3(dkon brtsegs): thag ring po yang mthong bar nus so// de la dus kyi zla mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ zla mtshan gyi dus la bab pa gang yin pa'o// dga' bo bud med kha cig
378a4(dkon brtsegs): ni zhag gsum dang / zhag lnga dang / za ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig lon nas/ zla mtshan dang ldan pa yang yod do// kha cig ni rkyen las bltos pas yun ring shig lon
378a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ gdod zla mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba yang yod do// bud med lus kyi mthu stobs med pa dang / sdug bsngal mang po myong ba dang / khyad bzhin mi sdug pa dang /
378a6(dkon brtsegs): bza' ba dang / btung ba mi gsod pa dag/ zos shing 'thungs pa de dag ni/ zla mtshan 'ongs su zin kyang myur du 'chad par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sa skam po'i
378a7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs su chu chag chag btab pa'i tshe/ myur du skams par 'gyur ba bzhin no// bud med gang lus kyi mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu bde ba myang dang / khyad pa
378a8(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba gsod pa dag zos shing 'thungs pa de dag gi zla mtshan ni myur tu 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na se gsher ba'i phyogs
378b1(dkon brtsegs): su nus chag chag btab pa'i tshe/ myur tu skams par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no// ji ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur ce na/ gal te ma'i khu ba byung ba la/
378b2(dkon brtsegs): ma'i khu ba ma byung ba dang / ma'i khu ba byung ba la/ pha'i khu ba ma byung ba 'am/ gal te gnyi ga byung bar ma gyur na/ thams cad mngal len par mi 'gyur ro// gal te ma
378b3(dkon brtsegs): yongasu dag par ma gyur pa la/ pa yongasu dag par gyur pa 'am/ gal te pha yongs su dag par ma gyur pa la/ ma yongs su dag par gyur pa 'am/ gal te gzhi
378b4(dkon brtsegs): ga yongs su dag par ma gyur na yang mngal len par mi 'gyur ro// gal te ma'i mngal gyi gnas rlung nad kyis yongasu zin par gyur tam/ mkhris pa dang / bad kan
378b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su zin par gyur tam/ khrag gis non pas mngal mdud pa can du gyur tam/ shas gang bar gyur ta ma/ sman 'thungs sam/ 'byung gnas 'dra ba 'am/
378b6(dkon brtsegs): grog mo'i rked pa 'dra ba 'am/ mngal gyi sgo rnga mo'i kha lta bur gyur tam/ rkas shas ze gang bar gyur tam/ dpu shing rtsa ba mang po can lta bur gyur tam/ gshol mgo
378b7(dkon brtsegs): lta bur gyur tam/ shing rta'i tshogs bzhin sogs kar 'dug pa 'am/ rtsa za lta bur 'dug pa'am/ nas kyis gra ma skyes pa lta bur gyur tam/ mngal 'og du zab
378b8(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ steng du zab pa 'am/ mngal gyi snod du rung ba ma yin pa 'am/ rtag du khrag zag pa 'am/ chu zag pa 'am/ bya rog gi mchu ltar rtag tu phyi zhing btsum du mi btug
379a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ steng dang 'og dang / tha ma zhing che chung mi mnyam pa 'am/ mthon dman mi snyoms shing 'bar 'bur du gyur pa 'am/ nang srin bus
379a2(dkon brtsegs): btsags pa 'am/ rul zhing myags nas mi gtsang bar gyur pa gang yin pa ste/ gal te ma 'di lta bu'i skyon dang ldan par gyur na/ thams cad mngal 'jug par mi
379a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// gal te pha ma'i tsho rigs brdzun zhing bar ma do'i srid pa dman par gyur tam/ bar ma do'i srid pa cho rigs btsun zhing pha ma dman par gyur na yang mngal
379a4(dkon brtsegs): grub par mi 'gyur ro// gal te pha ma dang bar ma do'i srid pa gnyi ga cho rigs brdzun par gyur kyang / gal te las mthun par ma gyur na yang mngal du grub par mi 'gyuraro//
379a5(dkon brtsegs): gal te bar mdo'i srid pa mdun na snang ba'i yul lo// pha dang ma'i srid pa gnyis med par gyur na yang skye ba len par mi 'gyur ro// dga' bos par ma do'i srid pa ji
379a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar ma'i mngal du 'jug thob par 'gyur zhe na/ gal te ma'i mngal yang yongasu gtsang bar 'gyu ro la khar ma do'i srid pa 'dod pa'i bya ba spyod pa mngon sum du
379a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar gyur pa nas/ gong du bstan pa lta bu'i skyon mang po'i bar du yang med par 'gyur ro// pha ma dang bu yang phan tshun mngon par phrad pa'i las dang ldan par
379a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ 'dod pa'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bar ma do'i srid pa de ma'i mngal du 'jug pa'i tshe/ sems phyi ci logs du 'gyur te/ gal te po yin
379b1(dkon brtsegs): na na ni ma la ni chags pa skye bar 'gyur la/ pha la ni zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur/ gal te mo yin ni pha la chags pa skye bar 'gyur la/ ma zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur te/ sngon 'das
379b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus su mngon par 'das byas pa'i las kyi dbang gis drag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis log par shes pa'i bsam pa skyed par byed de/ grang ba'i 'du shes dang / rlung chen
379b3(dkon brtsegs): po ldang ba dang / char chen po bab pa dang / nam rmug pa'i 'du shes dang / skye ba'i sgra ca co thos pa'i 'du shes pa skye bar byed pas/ las kyi mtho dman ji lta ba bzhin
379b4(dkon brtsegs): du yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes rnam pa bcu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ deng bdag ni khang pa'i nang du 'jug go snyam pa dang / bdag ni khang pa brtsegs pa'i
379b5(dkon brtsegs): sdeng du 'jug go snyam pa dang / bdag ni gzhal med khang du 'jug go snyam pa dang / bdag ni khri la 'dzeg go snyam pa dang / bdag ni tsa'i skyil bur 'jug go snyam
379b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bdag ni la ma'i khyim du 'jug go snyam pa dang / bdag ni rtswa stug por 'jug go snyam pa dang / bdag ni nags kyi sa nang du 'jug go snyam pa dang /
379b7(dkon brtsegs): badrag ni rtsig pa'i bu gar 'dzul lo snyam pa dang / bdag ni sab ma'i gsapa du 'jug go snyam du sems pa gang yin pa ste/ dga' ba de'i che bar ba do'i srid pa
379b8(dkon brtsegs): de de snyam du bsams nas me'i mngal du 'dug par 'gyur ro// skye ba len pa de ni mer mer ba zhes bya bar rig byas/ don pa'i khu ba dang / ma'i chag yon to//
380a1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po gzhan ma yin/ yang pha dang ma'i khu ba dang / khrag 'dus pa'i rgyu dang rkyen dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen la bsten te/ lhan cig
380a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas par byed pas 'di lta ste/ dper na zho dang rdza ma dang srubs shing dang / skyes bu'i rtsol ba la brten nas mar 'byung gi/ gzhan las mi 'byung ba de bzhin du/
380a3(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mi gtsang ba'i khu ba dang / khrag las mngon par grub pa'i lus mer mer por yang de bzhin rig par bya'o// gzhan yang dga' bo dpe rnam pa bzhi yod kyis
