380a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod legs par nyon cig/ 'di lta ste dper na rtsa sngon po la brten te srin bu skye bar 'gyur ba/ rtswa sngon po yang srin bu ma yin/ rtsa las gud na yang srin bu med mos
380a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi/ 'od kyang rtsal brten pa'i rgyu dang / rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bu skyes nas/ lus kyi kha dog kyang sngon por gyur de bzhin du/ dga' bo pa'i khu ba dang / ma'i khrag
380a6(dkon brtsegs): gis lus mer mer po yang 'di ltar rgyud dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang gis skye bar rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na ba langs gi lci ba la brten
380a7(dkon brtsegs): nas srin bu skye bar 'gyur la/ ba lang gi lci ba yang srin bu ma yin pa lang gi lci ba las gud na yang srin bu myong mod kyi/ 'on kyang ba lang gi lci ba la brten pa'i
380a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang / rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bu skyes nas/ lus kyi kha dog kyang ser por gyur pa de bzhin du/ dga' bo pa'i khu ba dang / me'i khrag gis lus mer mer pa
380b1(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di ltar rgyud dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ba chen po'i dbang por skye bar rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya shug la brten nas srin bu skye bar gyur pa/
380b2(dkon brtsegs): rgya shug yang srin bu ma yin/ rgya shag las gud nas yang srin bu mod mod kyi/ 'on kyang rgya shu ga la brten pa'i rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa'i dbang gis srin bur skyes na/
380b3(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi kha dog nyid kyang dmar por gyur pa de bzhin du/ dga' rtsa'i khu ba dang / me'i khrag gis lus mer mer po yang 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen 'das pa las 'byung ba che
380b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i dbang po skye bar rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na zho la brten te srin bu skye bar 'gyur ba lus kyi kha dog kyang dkar por 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ rgyu dang rkyen 'dus
380b5(dkon brtsegs): pa las/ 'byung ba chen po'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ba'i bar du yang rgyas par sbyar ro// gzhan yang dga' bo pha'i migatsang ba la brten pa'i mer mer
380b6(dkon brtsegs): bo'i dbang gis sa'i khams mngon du snang bas ni sra ba'i bya ba byed do// chu'i khams mngon du snang bas ni gsher ba'i bya ba byed do// me'i khams mngon du snang bas
380b7(dkon brtsegs): ni dro ba'i bya ba byed do// rlung gi khams mngon du snang bas ni yang zhing g.yo ba'i bya ba byed do// dga' bo gal te pha ma'i mi gtsang ba'i lus mer mer po de sa'i khams 'da'
380b8(dkon brtsegs): shig dang / chu'i khams med par gyur na ni skems ste gyes par gyur pas 'di lta ste/ dper na lag pas phye dang thal ba skam po la stsogs pa bcangs pa bzhin du
381a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// gal te chu'i khams 'ba' shig dang ldan la/ sa'i khams med par na ni bo bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na 'bru mar ram/
381a2(dkon brtsegs): chu lta bur 'gyur ba zhig na/ chu'i khams kyi dbang gis ni sa'i khams gyes par mi 'gyur la/ sa'i khams kyi dbang gis ni/ chu'i khams bo bar mi 'gyur ro// dga'
381a3(dkon brtsegs): bo gal te mer mer po'i lus sa dang chu'i khams dang ldan par 'gyur la/ me'i khams med par gyur na ni/ 'dul zhing myags par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na dbyar gyi
381a4(dkon brtsegs): dus su shi'i gong bu grib ma la bzhag pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te mer mer po'i lus sa dang chu dang / me'i khams 'ba' shig dang ldan la/ rlung gi khams
381a5(dkon brtsegs): med par gyur na no/ 'phel zhing rgyas par mi 'gyur te/ 'di dag thams cad ni sngon gyi las kyi rgyus byas nas/ phan tshun gcig gi rkyen gcig gis byas pa'i dbang
381a6(dkon brtsegs): gis rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur bas/ sa'i khams kyis ni rten byed do// chu'i khams kyis ni sdud par byed do// me'i khams kyis ni yongasu min par byed
381a7(dkon brtsegs): do// rlung gi khams kyis ni 'phel bar byed do// dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khur ba mkhan nam/ de'i slob mas khur ba legs par bcos nas/ dbugs kyis
381a8(dkon brtsegs): bus nas/ rgya cher 'phel zhing nang khong stod du byed pa ji lta ba bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na pad ma'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin du nang gi lus kyis 'byung ba chen po sa dang / chu da
381b1(dkon brtsegs): me dang / rlung gi khams las las kyi stobs kyis 'phel bar byed pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// dga' bo pa ma'i migatsang ba las mer mer po'i lus 'byung ba yang ma
381b2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ mo'i mngal nas kyang ma yin/ las las kyang ma yin/ rgyu las kyang ma yin/ rkyen las kyang ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang rgyu rkyen mang po 'di dag 'tshogs pa'i dbang
381b3(dkon brtsegs): gis mngal mngon par grub par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sa bon sar pa rlung dang nyi mas nyams par ma byas pa sra zhing snying po dang bcas pa/ bug ma byung ba shin tu
381b4(dkon brtsegs): legs par sbas pa/ zhing gshin pa la btab nas rlan ni rgyu dang rkyen 'dus par gyur na/ gdod myu gu dang / sdong bu dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu
381b5(dkon brtsegs): rims kyi skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo sa bon de yang 'dus pa dang bral ba las/ myu gu las stsogs pa bskyed par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du/ pha ma 'ba' shig
381b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / las 'ba' shig dang / rkyen gzhan 'ba' shig las mngal du skye ba thob pa ma yin gyi/ pha ma'i khu ba dang / khrag dang / rgyu dang / rkyen las 'dus pa'i dbang gis
381b7(dkon brtsegs): mngal mngon par grub par rig par bya'o// dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na mig dang ldan pa'i skyes bus me yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ nor bu me shel khyer nas nyi ma la
381b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhag ste/ ba lang gi lci ba skam po de'i drung du bzhag na/ gdod me 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ pha ma'i khu ba dang / khrag dang / rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las brten pa'i phyir
382a1(dkon brtsegs): @#gdod mngal mngon par grub pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o// pha ma'i mi gtsang ba las mer mer po mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs
382a2(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ming zhes bya ste/ de ni ming dang gzugs shes bya'o// ming dang gzugs kyi bung
382a3(dkon brtsegs): po shin tu smad par bya ba srid pa rnams su skye ba lon par byed pa 'di la ni ngas phyogs chung zad tsam 'am/ skad cig tsam du yang bsngags pa brjod par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir
382a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ srid pa rnam su skye bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ sdug bsngal chen po yin pas so// 'di lta ste/ dper na skyugs pa ni ji ltar chung na yang mnam par byed pa de bzhin du//
382a5(dkon brtsegs): srid pa rnams su skye ba gang yin pa de ni/ chung na yang sdug bsngal yin par rig par bya'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po// gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
382a6(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'phel ba dang / nyams shing 'jigs pa dang ldan te/ skye ba gang yin pa de ni
382a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba yin no// gnas pa gang yin pa de ni na ba yin no// 'phel ba dang / nyams shing 'jigs pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi yin te/ de lta bas na dga' bo mkhas
382a8(dkon brtsegs): pa gang zhig srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'dir srid pa'i ro bskyed nas ma'i mngal na nyal zhing / 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang dag par nyams su myong bar byed/ gzhan
382b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dga' bo 'di ltar mngal du zhugs pa de'i grangs kyang mdor bsdu na/ zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad yod par rig par bya'o// zhag bdun phrag dang po'i che/ ma'i
382b2(dkon brtsegs): mngal mi gtsang ba thog ma'i gnas su nyal bas 'di lta ste/ zangs rab du tsha ba'i nang du bcos shing brdos pa de bzhin du/ lus kyi dbang po dang rnam par shes pa lhan
382b3(dkon brtsegs): gcig du sdug bsngal mi bzad pa gang yin pa de ni mer mer po zhes bya'o// de'i dbyibs ni 'di lta ste/ dper na 'bras bu'i khu ba 'am/ zho 'di bris ma dang 'dra ba
382b4(dkon brtsegs): zhag bdun gyi bar du/ bcos rab tu btsos pas na/ sa'i khams sra ba nyid dang / chu'i khams gsher ba nyid dang me'i khams dro ba nyid dang / rlung gi khams yang
382b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing g.yo ba nyid gdod mngon tu sdang bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag gnyis pa la/ ma'i mngal na myi gtsang ba'i gnas su 'di lta ste// dper na rangs
382b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang du bcos shing brngos pa bzhin du// lus kyi dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa lhan gcig du sdug bsnga' mi bzad pa myong ba na/ ma'i mngal nas kun tu reg
382b7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis rang byung nas/ mngal de la reg pa gang yin pa de ni nur nur po zhes bya'o// de'i dbyibs ni zho ska ba 'am/ mar 'khyags
382b8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dra ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du dang du bcos rab tu bcos pa nas/ khams bzhi po dag mngon tu snang bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag gsum pa la yang
383a1(dkon brtsegs): @rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ ma'i mngal nas mdzod kha zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis byung nas/ mngal de la reg pa ga
383a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni ltar ltar po zhes bya'o// de'i dbyibs ni 'di lci ste/ lcags kyi thur ma 'am/ srin bu grol ma 'ang ste/ zhag 'dun gyi bar du btsos rab tu bcos pa na/ khams
383a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po dag mngon du snang bar gyur to// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bzhi pa la yang rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbar te/ ma'i mngal na nang rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung sngon
383a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi las las byung nas/ mngal na gnas pa'i zug rngu rab tu 'bar ba 'bud par byed pa gang yin pa de ni mkhrod 'gyur zhes bya'o// de'i dbyibs ni bong ba 'am/ mchi gu 'dra/
383a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du zhes bya ba nas/ khams bzhi po dag mngon du snang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du yang snga ma bzhin no// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag lnga pa la yang
383a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar to/ ma'i mngal nas yang dag par sdud zhes bya ba'i rlung byang ste/ rlung des mngal de la reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma lnga po 'di lta ste/
383a7(dkon brtsegs): dpung pa gnyis dang / brla gnyis dang / 'go bo'i mtshan mngon du 'byung bar byed do// 'di lta ste dper na dbyar gyi dus su char bab pa'i tshe/ ljon shing dang / nags
383a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams yal ga dang lo rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa de bzhin du/ mtshan ma lnga po dag rab tu snang bar byed pa'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag drug pa la ni ma'i mngal nas rgya
383b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po zhes bya ba'i rlung byung ste/ rlung des ma'i mngal de la reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma bzhi po 'di lta ste/ dpung pa gnyis dang / pus mo gnyis 'byung bar byed de/ 'dra
383b2(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na dbyar char pa bab pa'i tshe/ rtswa shing yal ga skye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ mtshan ma bzhi po dag rab tu snang bar byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bdun pa la ni
383b3(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal nas khyil bar byed pa ces bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma bzhi po 'di lta ste/ lag pa gnyis dang / rkang pa gnyis 'byung
383b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na dbu ba 'das pa 'am/ nya lcibs bzhin du mtshan ma bzhi po dag 'byang bar byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag brgyad pa la ni ma'i mngal nas
383b5(dkon brtsegs): bzlog cing bsgyur bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma nyi shu po 'di lta ste/ lag pa dang rkang pa'i sor mo bcu bcu thog ma kho na
383b6(dkon brtsegs): snang bar byed do/ 'di lta ste/ dper na dbyar tshor pa bab pa'i tshe/ ljon shing gi rtsa ba dang po skye ba ji lta ba bzhin no// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag dag pa la ni/ ma'i mngal
383b7(dkon brtsegs): nas rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal nas reg par gyur pa na/ mtshan ma dgu po 'di lta ste/ mig gnyis rna ba gnyis/ sna gnyis/ kha dang
383b8(dkon brtsegs): bshang ba dang / gci ba'i bug gnyis sdang bar byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu pa la ni/ ma'i mngal na sra bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ des mngal na gan
384a1(dkon brtsegs): pa sra zhing brtan par byed do// zhag bdun pa de nyid kyi tshe ma'i mngal nas gzhan na yang kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung nas/ rlung des
384a2(dkon brtsegs): mngal gyi gnas bus nas rgyas par byed de/ dper na rkyal pa bus pa rgyas par gyur ji lta ba bzhin no// / bam po gnyis pa
384a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig pa la ni ma'i mngal nas bu ga
384a4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal la reg par gyur pa na/ mngal khong du byed pas bu ga dgu po dag rab tu snang bar 'gyur te/ gal te ma 'gro ba 'am/ 'greng ba 'am/
384a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba'im/ las dag byas par gyur na/ de'i tshe rlung des khyil pa nyid kyis khong stong du gyur nas/ khu ga rnams mthar gyis che bar byed do// gal te rlung de steng gi phyo
384a6(dkon brtsegs): su song na ni/ steng gi bu ga 'byin par byed la/ gal te 'og gi phyogs su song na ni/ 'og gi bu ga 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na 'gar ba 'am/ de'i slob mas sprad pas
384a7(dkon brtsegs): bus pas na/ steng dang 'og du rlung rgyu zhing / rlung gi bya ba byas nas/ 'gag par gyur pa ji lta bu bzhin no// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na yon po'i sgo zhes
384a8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal bus pas/ g.yas g.yos kyi nang grol gyi rgyu ba rnams 'byin par byed do// 'di lta ste dper na pad ma'i rtsa ba bzhin du lus la brten te
384b1(dkon brtsegs): snol mar gnas so// zhag bdun pa de nyid kyi tshe/ gzhan yang pu brgyus pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal gyi nang nyid du lhag chad med par tshigs brgya sum bcu skyed par byed
384b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang rlung de'i stobs kyis/ gnad brgya rtsa gcig 'byung bar byed de/ dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum pa la ni ma'i mngal nas snga ma'i rlung de nyid kyi stobs kyis bkres
384b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang skom pa shes par byed pas/ mas zos shing 'thungs pa'i ro ji snyed pa dag lte bar zhugs nas de'i lus la phan 'dogs par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi
384b4(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni ma'i mngal nas skud pa'i kha zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i rgyus stong bskyed byed de/ nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi mdun na gnas so// nyis
384b5(dkon brtsegs): brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi rgyab na gnas par byed do// nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi g.yas phyogs gnas so// nyis brgya lnga bcu ni lus kyi g.yon phyogs na gnas so// dga'
384b6(dkon brtsegs): bo zhag bdun phrag bco lnga pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas pad ma zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal na gnas pa de'i rtsar rgyu ba rnam pa nyi shu bskyed nas ro rnams bzhibs par byed de/
384b7(dkon brtsegs): de yang lus kyi mdun na lnga dang / lus kyi rgyub na lnga dang / lus kyi g.yas na lnga dang / lus kyi g.yon na lnga yod do// rtsar rgyu ba de yang mang sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs
384b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas/ ming nis gzhes kyang bya/ stobs zhes kyang bya/ bstan pa zhes kyang bya/ mthu dang ldan pa zhes kyang bya'o// kha dog ni sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dgra
385a1(dkon brtsegs): dkar po dang / sran ma dang / mar dang / 'bru dang / zho las stsogs pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang kha dog mang pe
385a2(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun 'dres pa gang yin pa'o// dga' bo rtsar rgyu ba nyi shu po de dag re re la yang yin lag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod pas/ gcig du bsdus na dbugs bzhibs pa'i rtsar rgyu ba
385a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyad brgya yod par 'gyur te/ lus kyi mdun dang / rgyab dang / g.yas dang / g.yon gyi phyogs re re la yang nyis brgya nyis brgya yod do// dga' bo rtsar rgyu ba brgyad brgya yod pa
385a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag re re la yang rtsar rgyu ba'i yan lag phan tshun 'brel pa brgya brgya yod pas/ gcig du bsdus nas stong phrag brgyad cu yod par 'gyur te/ stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi mdun na
385a5(dkon brtsegs): yod do// stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi rgyab na yod do/ stong phrag nyi shu ni lus kyi g.yas phyogs na yod do// stong phrag nyi shu lus kyi g.yon phyogs na yod do// dga' bo
385a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsar rgyud stong phrag brgyad cu po de dag la ya bu ga mang po yod pas/ bug gcig dang / gnyis dang ldan pa nas bug bdun gyi bar du ldan pa yang yod do// de dag re re yang spu'i khung
385a7(dkon brtsegs): bu ro re yang so sor phan tshun 'brel te/ 'di lta ste dper na pad ma'i rtse ba la bug mang po yod pa ji lta ba bzhin no// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu drug pa la ni/ bdud rtsi 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i
385a8(dkon brtsegs): rlung 'byung ste/ rlung de'i sbyor bas mngal na gnas pa de'i mig gi skye mched gnyis dang / rna ba'i mched gnyis dang / sna'i skye mched gnyis dang / kha'i sgo dang / ming ba'i bug
385b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / snying gi khor khror yug dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / ban pa dang / myang ba rnams 'jug par 'gyur ba'i gnas rnam par 'jog cing / dbu phyi nang du rgyu ba thogs pa med par
385b2(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rdzas mkhan nam de'i slob mas 'jim pa'i gong bu blangs ste/ 'khor lo'i steng du bzhags nas/ ji ltar mos pa bzhin du snod kyi rnam pa dbyibs tha
385b3(dkon brtsegs): dad pa spel zhing rnam par 'jog pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi dbang gis kyang / de bzhin du mig las stsogs pa'i skye mched ji ltar mos pa bzhin du rnam par 'jog cing dbugs
385b4(dkon brtsegs): phyi nang du rgyu ba thogs pa med par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun pa la ni/ me'i mngal nas 'bri gdong zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung de las mngal na gnas pa de'i
385b5(dkon brtsegs): mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / kha'i sgo dang / mid pa dang / snying gi phyogs dang / zas 'jug par 'gyur ba'i gnas rnams kun tu drang bar byed cing / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i gnas
385b6(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa med par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo mkhas pa zhig gis me long dkyil 'khor rdul gyis g.yogs pa blangs nas/ 'bru mar dang / thal ba dang / sa
385b7(dkon brtsegs): phye ma zhib mo dag gis byi dor byas na gsal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung gi dbang gis skye mched rnams rnam par 'jog cing thogs pa med par byed do// dag 'a zhag bdun
385b8(dkon brtsegs): brog bco brgyad pa la ni/ me'i mngal nas dri ma mod ces bya ba'i nong 'byung ste/ mang la na gnas pa de'i skyem ched drug pa dag yongs su dag par byed do// 'di lta ste dper na nyim
386a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin chen pos yongasu khebs pa/ rlung drag po langs nas bus ste/ phyogs bzhir gtor bar gyur na/ 'od dang lnga
386a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongasu dag par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dga' bo las kyi rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i dbang po drug yongs su dag par 'gyur ba yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o//
386a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu pa la ni/ ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i dbang po bzhi po mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce'i dbang po bzhi po dag mngon par grub par byed do// dang
386a4(dkon brtsegs): po ma'i mngal du 'jug pa'i tshe/ tho ma kho nar dbang po gsum 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang / srog dang / yid kyi dbang po gang yin pa'o// dga' bo zhag bdun
386a5(dkon brtsegs): phrag nyi shu pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i rkang pa g.yon pa la brten te/ sor mo'i rus pa nyi shu bskyed
386a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed de// rkang pa g.yas pa la brten te rus pa nyi shu dang / rkang pa'i rting pa'i rus pa bzhi dang / rje ngadar gyi rus pa gnyis dang / pus mo'i rus gnyis dang / brla'i rus pa gnyis
386a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rked pa'i rus pa gsum dang / glong bu'i rus gsum dang / skal tshigs kyi rus pa bco brgyad dang / rtsib ma'i rus pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi bskyed par byed do// gzhan yang lag
386a8(dkon brtsegs): ba g.yon pa la brten te/ sor mo'i tshigs kyi rus pa nyi shu dang / lag pa g.yas pa la brten te sor mo'i tshigs kyi rus pa nyi shu skyed par byed do// gzhan yang lag pa
386b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi rus pa gnyis dang / dpung pa'i rus pa bzhi dang / brang gi rus bdun dang / 'phrag pa'i rus pa bdun dang / gnye' ba'i rus pa bzhi dang / 'gram pa'i rus pa gnyis dang /
386b2(dkon brtsegs): so'i rus sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'go ba'i rus pa bzhi skyed par byed do// dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs mkhan nam/ gzugs mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas
386b3(dkon brtsegs): pas sngar ni shing sra ba la de'i dbyibs byas nas de'i 'og tu srad bus bcings te/ sa phyir 'jim pa rnams bskus nas/ gzug brnyan mngon par grub par byed pa de bzhin
386b4(dkon brtsegs): du/ las kyi rlung gi stobs des rus pa rnams rnam par 'jog pa de yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// de dag tu rus pa phra mo ma btogs par rus pa chen po skye ba'i grangs
386b5(dkon brtsegs): ni nyis brgya yod par rig par bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ mngal na
386b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa de'i lus la sha skyed par byed pas/ 'di lta ste dper na zhal zhal mkhan dang / zhal zhal mkhan gyi slob mas 'jim pa legs par sbyar nas/ rtsig ngos la
386b7(dkon brtsegs): zhal zhal byed pa de bzhin du/ las kyi rlung des sha skye bar byed pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas kun tu
386b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i khrag skyed par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gsum pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas yongasu dag
387a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i lpags pa skyed par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa la ni/ ma'i
387a2(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas kun tu phyogs pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i lpags pa rkyong zhing mdog dang ldan par byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu
387a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa lnga pa la ni/ ma'i mngal na grong khyer 'dzin ces bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i sha dang khrag rab tu dang bar byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phra
387a4(dkon brtsegs): nyi sha drug pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas skye ba mngon par grub pa zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi skra dang / spu dang / sen mo rnams bskyed
387a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed de/ de dag thams cad kyang rtsa rgyus rnams dang / phan tshun 'brel par blta bar bya'o// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa bdun pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas sman yon pa
387a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi skra dang / sen mo rnams mngon par grub par byed do// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de gal te tshe rabs
387a7(dkon brtsegs): snga mo la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas/ ser snas longs spyod bdog pa rnams 'phangs shing shin tu brten par mngon par zhen pas/ sbyin pa gte
387a8(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed pa dang / pha me dang mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas rnams kyi rjes su bstan pa dag mnyan par mi byed pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mi dang
387b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing nyin mtshan du 'phel bar byed pa cig yin na/ 'di lta bu rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur te/ gal te mir skye bar gyur na yang 'bras bu
387b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba thob par 'gyur bas/ gal te 'jig rten pa rnams 'di lta ring pos mdzes par gyur na ni/ de thung bar 'gyur ro// gal te thu dus mdzes par
387b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur na ni/ de ring por 'gyur ro// sbom pos mdzes par gyur na ni/ de phra bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'phra mos mdzes par gyur na ni/ de sbom por 'gyur ro// gal te yan lag
387b4(dkon brtsegs): dang nying lag phan tshun du thag nye bas mdzes par gyur na ni/ de thag ring bar 'gyur ro// gal te thag ring bas mdzes par gyur na ni/ de thag nye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mang po sa mdzes
387b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na ni/ de nyung bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyung ngus mdzes par gyur na ni/ de mang bar 'gyur ro// gal te tsho bar 'dod na ni/ ring bar 'gyur ro// ring bar 'dod na ni/ 'tsho bar 'gyur
387b6(dkon brtsegs): ro// zhan cing mnyen par 'dod na ni/ gshor bar 'gyur ro// bshor bar 'dod na ni/ zhan ning mnyen par 'gyur ro// dkar bar 'dod ni ni/ gnag par 'gyuraro// gnag par 'dod na
387b7(dkon brtsegs): ni/ dkar bar 'gyur ro// dga' ba gzhan yang sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa 'on pa dang // long ba dang / lkugs pa dang / glen pa dang /
387b8(dkon brtsegs): byang bzhin mi sdug pa dang / tshig smras pa rnams gzhan gyis mnyan pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ba dang / rka lag 'phye zhing 'gro ba dang / lus mi sdud cing yid gas 'dra bas/ nye shes
388a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang mthong bar mi 'dod na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyilas ji snyed pa bstsal ba dag gzhan
388a2(dkon brtsegs): kha smra ba na yang / gzhan gyis yid mi ches shing / yid la mi 'dzin pa dag mngon par grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i la
388a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis/ de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa thob par 'gyur bas so// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de'i rla bas snga ma la bsod nams kyi las mngon pa bsgru
388a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ser sna med par legs par sbyin pa btong zhing / 'phogs pa rnams la snying brtse ba dang / longs spyod rnams la phangs shing mngon par zhen pa'i sems med pa dang /
388a5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams nyin mtshan du 'phel bar byed pa cig yin na ni/ 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur te/ mir skyes par gyur na
388a6(dkon brtsegs): yang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba thob par 'gyur bas/ gal te 'jig rten pa rnams ring pos mdzes par gyur na yang de bzhin du ring por 'gyur ro// gal te tha
388a7(dkon brtsegs): dus mdzes par gyur na yang / de bzhin du thung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phra sbom ran cing yan lag dang nying lag 'tshams pa dang / mang nyung dang tshe ride dang / gshor mi bshor dang de
388a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du mdzes mi mdzes yid du mi 'ong ba med pa dang / dbang po drug tshang zhing byad bzhin sdug pas gzhan las khyed par du 'phags pa dang / tshig gsal zhing dbyangs snyan
388b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / skyes bu'i mtshan pun gsum tshogs shig gang gis mthong ba rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las ji snyed brtsal ba dag gzhan la/
388b2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyad pa na yang gzhan gyis yid ches shing / gus pas yid 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des tshe rabs snga ma la dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas
388b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbang gis/ de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa thob par 'gyur bas so// dga' bo mngal na gnas pa de gal te khyi'u yin na ni ma'i rtsi ba logs g.yas phyogasu tsog pur 'dug
388b4(dkon brtsegs): la/ lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs nas/ ma'i sgal tshigs logs su bltas te 'dug go// gal te bu mo yin ni na ma'i rtsib logs g.yon phyogs su tshog pur 'dug
388b5(dkon brtsegs): la/ lag pa gnyis kyis gdong gang g.yogs nas/ ma'i lto phyogs su kha bltas te/ ma zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni 'og zhu ba'i gnas kyi steng na/ ma zhu ba'i dngos pos ni thur tu mnan/
388b6(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba'i dngos pos ni yang 'deg par byed pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na gnas lngar bcings nas/ gsal shing rnon po'i khar btsugs pa bzhin du gnas so// gal te mas mang
388b7(dkon brtsegs): dri zos sam/ nyung ngu zos na yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// gal te shin tu snum pa 'am/ shin tu rtsub pa 'am/ shin tu grang ba'am/ shin tu cha ba 'am/ lan tsha bro ba 'am/
388b8(dkon brtsegs): mi bro ba 'am/ kha ba'am/ sbyar ba'os/ mngar ba las stsogs pa zas ji lta bu dag pos na yang / thams cad sdug bsngal myang bar 'gyur ro// gal te mas 'dod pa smad pa
389a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam/ drag du song ngas/ brgyugs sam/ nyam nga ba'i phyogs su 'dug gam/ yun ring du 'dug par gyur tam/ yun ring du nyal bar gyur
389a2(dkon brtsegs): tam/ mchongs par gyur na yang thams cad du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo ma'i mngal na gnas pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brjod kyis
389a3(dkon brtsegs): mi lang ba/ lus la nyon mongs par rig par bya'o// ma'i 'greng ba na yid sdug bsngal de lta bu myong bar 'gyur na/ ngan 'gro'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
389a4(dkon brtsegs): dpe bya ba ra rga ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bas na dga' bo mkhas pa gang zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho dpag du med pa na gnas par mos shing / sdug bsngal 'di
389a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu nyam su myong bar byed/ dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa la ni/ ma'i mngal na gnas pa de phyin ci logs kyi 'du shes rnam pa brgyad skye bar 'gyur te/ brgya
389a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ khyim gyi 'od shes dang / bzhon pa'i 'du shes dang / kun dga' ba'i 'du shes dang / khang pa brtsigs pa'i 'du shes dang / skyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes dang/
389a7(dkon brtsegs): khri la 'dug pa'i 'du shes dang / chu'i 'du shes dang / rdzing gi 'du shes te/ yang dag par 'di dag yod pa ma yin yang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyed par
389a8(dkon brtsegs): byed do// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag nyi shu dgu pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas me tog 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de'i lpags pa'i mdog kun
389b1(dkon brtsegs): du gsal zhing yongs dkar ba dang / yongs su dag cing dang bar byed de/ las kyi stobs kyis kha cig ni nag por 'gyur/ kha cig ni kha dog sngon por 'gyur te// gzhan
389b2(dkon brtsegs): yang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / kha cig ni rtsub cing snga ma med par dang / kha dog dkar ba dang / kha dog gnag pa dag kyang ci rigs par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/
389b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu pa la ni/ ma'i mngal nas lcags kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de bus pas skra dang / spu dang / sen mo rnams
389b4(dkon brtsegs): skye zhing 'phel bar byed de/ sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis kha dog dkar gnag la stsogs pa ci rogs par snang bar gyur pa/ yang gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o// dga' bo zhag dang
389b5(dkon brtsegs): phrag sum bcu gcig pa la/ ma'i mngal na gnas pa de/ mthar gyis cher skye bar byed de/ de bzhin du zhag bdun phrag sum cu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i bar du yang rgya
389b6(dkon brtsegs): cher skye zhing 'phel bar byed de/ dga' bo zhag bdun phrag su bcu lnga pa la/ ma'i mngal na gnas pa ni/ ma'i mngal du yan lag dang nying la ga thams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
389b7(dkon brtsegs): ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu drug pa la ni/ mngal na gnas pa de/ ma'i mngal na 'dug mi 'dod par 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu bdun pa la ni/
389b8(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa de'i phyin ci log ma yin pa'i 'du shes rnam pa gsum po de/ 'di lta ste/ mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang / dri mi zhim pa'i 'du shes dang / mun nag gi 'du shes skye
390a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni phyogs gcig gi dbang du byas te bstan to// dga' bo zhag bdun phrag sum cu brgyad pa la ni/ mngal nas ma tog sdud pa
390a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ rlung des mngal na gnas pa de/ lus bsgyur nas thur du phyogs shing lag pa gnyis brkyang nas/ skye ba'i gnas kyi sgo logs su phyogs par byed de/
390a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de'i tshe kha thur du lta ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ las kyi stobs kyi rlung des mngal na gnas pa bus pas/ 'go ni thur du lta zhing / rkang pa gnyis ni gyen du phyogs
390a4(dkon brtsegs): par byas nas/ skye ba'i gnas kyi sgo nas 'byung bar byed do// dga' bo gal te mngal na gnas pa de/ tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing /
390a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi mngal de ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pa shig yin na ni/ rgyu dang rkyen des mngal nas 'byung ba'i tshe/ rgal ga log cing snol mar gyur nas/ bsgyur mi nus pas ma'i
390a6(dkon brtsegs): mngal de nyid nga 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe shes pa dang ldan pa'i bud med dam/ sman pa mkhas pas/ ma ra dang / 'bru mar 'jam pa 'am/ shing sha la ma la'i shun
390a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khu ba dam/ gzhan yang dngos po 'jam po dag gis lag pa bskus nas lag pa'i sor mos kyi rnon po blangs te/ snabs phyis dang 'dra zhing mchog tu dri mi zhim pa/ skyug dri
390a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'dab khung / srin bu'i rigs brgya stong tshad med pa rtag tu gnas pa/ mi gtsang ba'i khu ba rtag tu 'dzag pa/ khu ba dang khrag rlang rnams rus zhing mags pa/ mthong
390b1(dkon brtsegs): na skyo bar 'gyur ba/ lpags pa srab mos g.yogs pa/ sdig pa'i las las byung ba'i lus rma dang bcas pa/ mi gtsang ba'i gnas der sor mo bcu ma ste/ der bcug nas
390b2(dkon brtsegs): gri rnon pos mngal na gnas pa de'i lus dum bu rabatubs nas/ ma'i mngal nas 'byin par byed pas/ des na yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzod cing / cha ba rtsub pa dag
390b3(dkon brtsegs): myong ba'i rgyus ma de yang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ gal te shi bar ma gyur na yang shi ba dang bye brag med do// dga' bo gal te mngal na gnas pa de dge ba'i las yongs su
390b4(dkon brtsegs): grub pa cig yin na ni/ gal te log par gyur na yang / ma la gnod pa med par bde bar bcas par 'gyur bas/ sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro// dga' bo gang bgegs
390b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu dang mi ldan pa de dag ni/ zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad 'das nas bcas par gyur pa'i tshe// ma sngag ba sAl chen po srog la bab pa myong nas/ gdod ma'i mngal
390b6(dkon brtsegs): nas byung bar 'gyur bas na/ dga' bo khyod kyis shin tu legs par brtags nas nges par 'byung ba yongasu btsal bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang de'i tshe/ tshe dang
390b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal dang / btsas pa'i sdug bsngal shes par byas nas/ so so'i skye bo'i mngal nas
390b8(dkon brtsegs): skye ba len pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ shin tu sdug bsngal ba yin par 'ag pa bya'o// dang po bcas pa'i tshe khye'u 'am bu mo yang rung ste/ lag pa'i steng 'am gos las
391a1(dkon brtsegs): stsogs pa'i steng du lhung nas/ nyi ma 'am/ grim ma 'am/ bskul ba'i shing leb 'am/ bstan nam/ bang ba'i steng du bzhag pa na/ rgyu dang rkye
391a2(dkon brtsegs): des thams cad sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ste/ dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na ba lang son por lpags pa bshus pa rtsigs pa
391a3(dkon brtsegs): dang nye bar gyur na/ rtsig pa la gnas pa'i srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gal te shing dang rtsa'i phung po dang nye bar gyur na/ shing dang rtsa la gnas pa'i srog chag
391a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis za bar gyur pa 'am/ gal te bla gab med par 'dug par gyur na/ bla gab med pa na srog chags kyis za bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de
391a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ dang po bcas pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dang po bcas pa de la yang chu dron ran pas bkrus na/ sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta/
391a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na skyes bu mdze can pags pa rul zhing myags pa/ rnag khrag zags pa la yang lhag gis bzhun na sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba dang / rtsub pa myong
391a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dang po bcas pa'i lus chu dron gyis bkrus pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dang po bcas pa'i lus de yang / phyis ma'i khrag gi dri ma mthu
391a8(dkon brtsegs): nas cher skye bar 'gyur te/ de la khrag gi dri ma zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la nu zhi nyid la bya bar bstan pas/ de lta bas na dga' bo 'di ltar shin tu mi
391b1(dkon brtsegs): bzad pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing bde ba cung zad kyang med na/ mkhas pa su zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho 'di la rjes su chags pa bskyed nas/ rtag tu
391b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i rgyun phyogs su 'dzin cing / rgyun chad pa med par byed/ dang po btsas pa de zhag bdun lon pa dang / lus de nyid las srog chags srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad
391b3(dkon brtsegs): cu byung nas lus la za bar byed de/ dga' bo srin bu'i rigs sgo la za ba zhes bya ba cig yod de/ skra'i rtsa ba la gnas nas rtag tu skra la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs khar ba'i
391b4(dkon brtsegs): mdzod dang / 'go sbom zhes bya ba gnyis yod do/ 'go la brten te gnas nas/ rtag tu 'go la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mig 'khor zhes bya ba cig yod de/ mig la/
391b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas rtag tu mig la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs ded pa dang 'bros pa dang / khang khyim dang / yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ glad pa la gnas nas
391b6(dkon brtsegs): glad pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs sa lu'i lo ma zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ rna ba la gnas nas rna ba la za bar byed de// srin bu'i rigs mdzod sgo zhes bya ba ga cig
391b7(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ sA la gnas nas rmya bar byed do/ srin bu'i rigs 'bel ba dang / kun tu 'phel ba zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ mnal gnas nas ma chul za bar byed// sra
391b8(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rigs sbrang rtsi'i lo ma zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ so la gnas nas so la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs shing gdong zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ so'i rtsa ba la gnas
392a1(dkon brtsegs): nas so'i rtsa ba la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs khab tu zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ lce la gnas nas lce la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs
392a2(dkon brtsegs): kha rnon ces bya ba gcig yod de/ lce'i rtsa ba la gnas nas lce'i rtsa ba la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs lag rdzogs zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ rkan la gnas nas rka
392a3(dkon brtsegs): la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs lag pa dra ba can dang / phyed sbyar zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ lag 'thil la gnas nas lag 'thil la za bar byed do// srin
392a4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rigs 'phyang ba dang / rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ log ngar la gnas nas lag ngar la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dpung pa dang / nye ba'i
392a5(dkon brtsegs): dpung pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ dpung pa la gnas nas dpung pa la bo byed do// srin bu'i rigs ming dang / nye ba'i med pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ med pa la gnas
392a6(dkon brtsegs): nas med pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs dbang po dang dbang po chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ brang la gnas nas bral za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs drung dang dung
392a7(dkon brtsegs): khwa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ sha la gnas nas sha la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha tog ldan dang stobs ldan zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ khrag la gnas nas khrag la za bar byed de/
392a8(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang / dri gdong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ chu la gnas nas chu ba la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mi mthong ba dang / khas bub ces bya ba yod de/ rgyab kyi sgal
392b1(dkon brtsegs): tshigs la gnas nas rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la za bar byed ro// srin bu'i rags tshil gyi kha dog ces bya ba gnyis yod de/ tshil la gnas nas tshil la za bar byed do//
392b2(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs mkhris pa'i kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de/ mkhris pa la gnas nas mkhris pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mu tig ces bya ba gcig yod de/
392b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhal ma la gnas nas ma khal ma la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mu tig chen po zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ rkyed pa la ga nas nas rked pa la za bar byed do//
392b4(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ mtsher pa la gnas nas mtsher pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs chu srog dang / chu srog den po dang / khab
392b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi mchu dang / mtshon cha nu zhes bya ba bzhi'i yod de// rgyu ma la gnas nas rgyu ma la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs zla ba rdzogs pa dang / zla gdong / bsil byed dang /
392b6(dkon brtsegs): gsil gdong dang / sor sor gaunas pa ces bya ba lnga yod de/ rtsib logs g.yas pa la gnas nas/ rtsib logs g.yas pa la za bar byed do// gzhan yang srin bu
392b7(dkon brtsegs): rigs gong ma dang mi thun pa lnga yod de/ rtsib logs g.yon pa la gnas nas rtsib logs g.yon pa la za bar byed do// gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs bdun du 'bebs
392b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rgyab du 'bibs pa dang / bstan par 'bibra pa dang / 'bibs te gnas pa ces bya ba bzhi yod de/ rus pa la gnas nas rus pa la za bar byed do//
393a1(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs cher dkar dang / chung zad dkar dang / sprin brtsegs dang dri mi zhim pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ rtsa rgyus la gnas
393a2(dkon brtsegs): nas rtsa rgyus la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs seng ge dang / stobs ldan dang / mgyogs pa'i mda' dang / pad ma zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ ma zhu ba'i gnas la gnas
393a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ ma zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs brtan pa dang / nye ba'i bu'i rten pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ zhu ba'i gnas la gnas nas zhu ba'i gnas la
393a4(dkon brtsegs): za bar byed do// srin bu'i rig so mu kha dang / phung pa'i kha dang / la dra ba kha dang / bye'u kha zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ bci bo'i lam la gnas nas pa'i lam la za bar
393a5(dkon brtsegs): byed do// srin bu'i rigs byed pa dang / byed pa chen po dang / dbyibs chung dang / pe ta ra ka zhes bya ba bzhi yod de/ bshang ba'i lam lag nas nas bshang ba'i wa
393a6(dkon brtsegs): la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs kha gnag dang / kha gnag chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod do/ brla la gnas nas rla la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mdze can
393a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / mngon can chu du zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/ bras mo lag nas nas pus mo la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs mos pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba gcig yod de/
393a8(dkon brtsegs): byin pa la gnas nas byin pa la za bar byed do// srin bu'i rigs 'go nag ces bya ba gcig yod de/ rkang pa la gnas nas rkang pa la za bar byed do// dga' bo khongasu skye
393b1(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i lus 'di 'dra ba ni/ srin bu'i rigs 'di lta bu stong phrag brgyad na rtag par nyin mtshan du za za bar byed pa na/ lus 'ang gdung ba dang / rab tu gdung dang / 16/
393b2(dkon brtsegs): chung zhing rma ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom par byed cing / gzhan yang sems kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / gdung ba dang / rab tu gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung ba dang /
393b3(dkon brtsegs): nad mang po rnams yongs su snang bar byed pas/ sman pa mkhas pa gang gis kyang / gso zhing brtsal bar mi nus ste/ dga' bo srid pa'i rgya mtsho chen po la 'khor ba 'dir
393b4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal de lta bu dang ldan pa yin na/ ci'i phyir 'di la rje su chags pa bskyed par byed/ gzhan yang gdon mang pos yongs su bzung ba 'di lta ste/ klu'i gdon nas/
393b5(dkon brtsegs): ko da bu da na'i bar gyi gdon rnams kyis yongs su zin pa dang / gzhan yang sems can gcan zan gyi gdon rnams kyis yongs su zin pa dang / gzhan yang nyi ma dang zla
393b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gza' dang rgyu skar gyi gdon la stsogs pas yongasu zin nas/ nad sna tshogs kyi lus dang / sems nyon mongs par byed pa yod de/ brjod kyis mi lang
393b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba 'dir ma'i mngal du 'jug par mos shing / sdug bsngal mi bzod pa myong bar 'gyur te/
393b8(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bcas shing de ltar cher gyur nas/ ma'i nu sho khrag dang 'dres pa 'thung zhing / bza' ba dang / btang ba rnams zos shing 'thungs pa na yang / yang dag pa pa ma
394a1(dkon brtsegs): @yin pa'i sems kyis zhim pa'i 'dra shes skyed par byed do// bzar gyis cher skyes nas lus badre zhing nad med pa dang / gos dang bza'
394a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / btung ba dang / ldan zhing / tshe lo brgya thub par gyur na yang / tshe 'di la gnyis kyis phreng 'bri bar byed do// dang po byis pa dang / de'i 'og tu gzhon nu nas/
394a3(dkon brtsegs): mthar gyis cher skyes par gyur pa'i bar du yang / nad rnams pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu gzir zhing sdug bsngal gyi reg pa brgya stong tshad med pa brjod kyis me lang ba
394a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis lus nyon mongs par byed pas/ lus kyi sdug bsngal dang du len par mi nus pa'i tshe/ gson par mi smon cing shi bar dga' bas na/ lus 'di ni sdug
394a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal mang la bde ba chung ba yin te/ re shig tsam du gnas par byed kyang / mthar 'jig par 'gyur bas/ dga' bo skye bo thams cad ni thams cad kyang 'chi bar 'gyur bas
394a6(dkon brtsegs): rtag par gnas pa gang yang med do/ gal te sran dang zas kyis gsos nas/ tshe ring por gyur na yang mthar mchi bdag gi rgyal pos gsod cing yul stong du skye bar 'gyu
394a7(dkon brtsegs): bas/ de'i phyir skye ba la rga ba ci yang med par rig par byas nas/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis ma 'ongs pa'i tsho gas bsags pa la bag yod par bya ba dang / tshangs par
394a8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa la brtson zhing le lo mi bya ba dang / don gyi spyod pa dang / chos kyi spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi spyod pa dang / dge ba 'ba' shig gi spyod pa la rtag par mos pas bsgom pa
394b1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// rtag par bdag nyid kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las rnam pa gnyis la so sor brtags nas sems la gtad de/ ma 'ongs pa na 'gyod pa chen po med par
394b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// rjes su chags par bya ba'i dngos po thams cad ni mthar bral bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las ji lta ba bzhin du che phyi ma la len par 'gyur ro//
394b3(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo tshe lo brgya thub pa de yang gnas skabs bcu dang ldan pa 'gyur te/ dang po ni ni byis pa'i gnas skabs ste/ nyams chung zhing gan rgyal du nyal bar byed do//
394b4(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa ni gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ byis pa'i rtsed mo la dga' bar byed do// gsum pa ni lang tshol bab pa ste/ 'dod pa'i bde ba rnams myong bar byed do// bzhi pa ni b+ha
394b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan zhi bar gyur pa ste/ dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa yin no// lnga pa ni dar la bab pa ste/ shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no// drug pa ni ye
394b6(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs pa ste/ legs par spyod pa la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin no// bdun pa ni mthar gyis rgas par 'gyur ba ste/ chos kyi gzhung lugs rab tu
394b7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa yin no// brgyad pa ni rgas par gyur pa ste/ bya ba mang po rnams la mthu nung bar gyur pa yin no// dgu pa ni shin tu rgas pa ste/ ci yang mi nus pa yin no//
394b8(dkon brtsegs): bcu pa ni lo brgya pa ste/ 'chi ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa'o// dga' bo gnas skabs chen po dag kyang mdor bsdus te bstan na/ 'di ltar zla ba bzhi zhing dus
395a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig du byas la lo// brgyal dus sum brgya yod par gyur te/ dpyid dang / dbyar dang / dgun gyi dus re re la yang / dus brgya brgya
395a2(dkon brtsegs): yod pas// lo gcig la zla ba bcu gnyis yod pas/ zla ba yang brgya phrag bcu gnyis yod par 'gyur la/ de yang zla ba phyed du grangs na/ zlang phyed kyang brgya phrag nyi shu
395a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi yod par 'gyur bas/ dus gsum po re re la yang zla ba phyed brgyad brgyad brgya'i yod pas/ mdor bsdus na/ nyin mtshan stong phrag sum cu drug du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nyin
395a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig la lan gnyis su za bar mdor bsdus na/ zas ni lan stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis za bar 'gyur te/ rkyen gyis bar chud byas nas ma zos pa'i grangs kyang der brtogs
395a5(dkon brtsegs): so// zas ma zos pa'i rkyen ni 'di lta ste/ khros nas ma zos pa dang / sdug bsngal myong nas ma zos pa dang / btsal te ma rnyed nas ma zos pa dang / gnyis log ste ma zos
395a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sdom pa blangs pa dang / rtse bas myos te ma zos pa dang / brel te ma zos pa dang / zos pa dang / ma zos pa gcig du bsdus na grangs de snyed yod de/ ma'i nu zho
395a7(dkon brtsegs): 'thungs pa yang grangs der btogs so// de ltar na ngas mi rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i che lo brgya'i lo dang zla ba dang / nyin mtshan dang / bza' ba dang / bzung ba zos pa dang / 'thungs
395a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i grangs yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa yin gyis/ khyod kyis 'di la yongs su skyo bskyed par bya'o// dga' bo de ltar bcas shing rker skyes pa'i lus la sa yang nad mang po 'ang
395b1(dkon brtsegs): lha ste/ grang pan pa dang / mi gan pa dang / rnaban pa dang / sman pa dang / ldan pa dang / son pa dang / rtog sa na pa dang / snying na pa dang / lto ban pa dang / lag pan pa dang /
395b2(dkon brtsegs): pa na bas gnod pa dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / smos pa dang / rkangs pa dang / lud pa dang / mkhris pa dang / ban ka na la stsogs pa nad mang po rnams kyis yan lag
395b3(dkon brtsegs): dang nying lag na zhing sdug bsngal med par byed de/ dga' bo mi'i lus la 'di 'dra ba ni nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs yod do// gzhan yang rlung nang rgya rtsa gcig dang / mkhris
395b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / bad kon gyi nad brgya rtsa gcig dang / 'dus pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig yod pas/ mdor bsdun nang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nang gi lus las skye bar 'gyur
395b5(dkon brtsegs): bas/ dga' bo lus 'di 'bras dang 'dra zhing zug rngu dang 'dra bas/ nad mang po las mngon par grub pa skad cig tsam du yang mi gnas shing / skad cig mar gyur pa rang
395b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / smod pa dang / bdag med par gyur pa/ 'chi ba dang nye zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can yid brtan du mi rung yin na
395b7(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo 'di ltar sems can rnams ni gzhan yang skye ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu yod par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ lag pa bcad pa dang / rkang pa bcad pa dang / mig
395b8(dkon brtsegs): phyung ba dang / rna ba bcad pa dang / sna bcad pa dang / lce bcad pa dang / 'gro bcad pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa'i sdug bsngal dang / gzhan yang gor
396a1(dkon brtsegs): ra bzhug pa dang / gagashing dang / lcag gis bzhu ba dang / brtseg pa dang / bcing ba la stsogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang / bkres pa dang /
396a2(dkon brtsegs): skom pa dang / ngal ba'i sdug bsngal dang / grangs pa dang / chab dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / sbrang bu chu rings dang / sha sbrang dang / gcan zan dang / sdig sprul las
396a3(dkon brtsegs): stsogs pa'i reg pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs chad med pa/ dpag du med pa/ brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa dag rjes su myong bar 'gyur te/ sems can
396a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di rnams ni rtag tu 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa brtsub pa/ yid 'ong ba la gnas shing rjes su chags pa dang / bying bar gyur yin pas/ 'dod pa rnams ni sdug
396a5(dkon brtsegs): rna bsngal gyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin yang / spang bar bya ba yin par mi shes shing yang yongs su gnyer bar byed pas/ nyin mtshan du lus dang sems yongs su gtu
396a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nang bsreg cing tshig par byed pa la yang rgyun chad pa med do// de bzhin du skye ba yang sdug bsngal yin no// rgab yang sdug bsngal yin no// napa
396a7(dkon brtsegs): yang sdug bsngal yin no// 'tsho ba yang sdug bsngal yin no// sdug pa yangang bral ba yang sdug bsngal yin no// mi sdug pa dang phred pa yang sdug bsngal yin/
396a8(dkon brtsegs): gang 'dod pa btsal te ma snyed pa yang sdug bsngal yin no// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga yang sna bsngal yin no// 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang /
396b1(dkon brtsegs): nyal ba'i spyod lam phan po dag kyang sdug bsngal yin pas/ gal te rtag tu 'gro zhing 'greng ba dang / 'dag pa dang / nyal bar mgyur na yang / sdug bsngal myong /
396b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing bde ba myong bar byed do// gal te rtag tu 'greng zhing 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar ma gyur tam/ gal te rtag tu 'dug la/ 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang
396b3(dkon brtsegs): nyal bar ma gyur tom/ gal te rtag tu nyal la/ 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug par ma gyur na yang thams cad sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong zhing / bde
396b4(dkon brtsegs): ba thob par mi 'gyur bas/ dga' bo 'di dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal ma spangs nas/ sdug bsngal yongs su gnyer bar byed pa yin pas/ sdug bsngal khon
396b5(dkon brtsegs): skye zhing / sdug bsngal kho na 'gag par 'gyur bas/ 'du shes rnams kyi rgyu dang rkyen rgyun chad pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'di dag
396b6(dkon brtsegs): thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams kyi 'khor ba'i chos 'du byed rnams ni mo rtag cing yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa ma yin pas/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos
396b7(dkon brtsegs): can/ yid bstan du mi rung bas/ mchog shes pa yongs su btsal nas/ shin tu skyo ba bskyed de/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis rnam par grol ba yongs su gnyer ba
396b8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// zhes gsungs pa yin no// dga' bo bde 'gror skyes pa'i sems can skye gnas mi gtsang ba dag tu/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang dag pa ma yin pa rnam pa sna tshog
397a1(dkon brtsegs): myong brjod kyis mi rdzogs nas/ ngan song gsum po yi dgas dang / dud 'gro dang / sems can dmyal ba rnams kyis song bar 'gyur
397a2(dkon brtsegs): nga'i sdug bsngal mi gzad pa bzod par rga ba/ yongs su rdzogs par brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bam po gsum pa ste tha sa'o//
397a3(dkon brtsegs): / gzhan yang dga' bo ma'i mngal
397a4(dkon brtsegs): du 'jug pa ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can kha cig ni yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug/ yang dag par shes bzhin du gnas/ yang dag
397a5(dkon brtsegs): par shes bzhin du 'byung ba yang yod/ kha cig ni yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug/ yang dag par shes bzhin du gnas la/ yang dag par shes bzhin du 'byung
397a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yang yod/ kha cig ni yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug la/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du gnas shing / yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba yang yod/
397a7(dkon brtsegs): kha cig ni mi shes bzhin du 'jug/ yang dag par mi shes bzhin du gnas/ yang dag dag par mi shes bzhin du 'byung ba yang yod do// su zhig yang dag par shes
397a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'di nas sa'i skye bo'i sems can lacig rang bzhin gyis tshul khrims srung ba la dag
397b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing / yang nas yang du dge ba'i phyogs la goms par byed pa dang / dngos po mchog la mos shing / bsod nams rnams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / shin
397b2(dkon brtsegs): tu yang dag par sdom pa dang / rtag par drang por sems shing / bag med par med byed pa dang / shes rab chen po dang ldan pas/ 'tsho ka'i dus kyi tshe//
397b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyod pa med par skye ba yang dag par len par byed pa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa skye ba lan bdun pa 'am/ rigs nas rigs su skye ba 'am/ lan cig phyir
397b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba'im/ bar chad gcig pa dag yin te/ gang zag dag gis sngar dge ba spyad pa'i phyir/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe/ sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba
397b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / tsha ba'i nyams su myong gyur kyang / sems la g.yeng ba med par yang dag par dran bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed de/ yang dag par dran bzhin du ma'i mngal
397b6(dkon brtsegs): du zhugs nas/ chos rnams las kyi dbang gis skye ba dang / thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skye bar gyur pas/ rtag tu bdun gyi gnas byas par gyur to zhes
397b7(dkon brtsegs): rab du shes so// dga' bo lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba thams cad kyi khyim yin pas/ rang bzhin rtag par gnas pa ma yin pa dang / glen pa'i rdos po yin pas
397b8(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa dag la sla bar byed pa yin no snyam du rig par bya'o// lus 'di ni rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor/ rgyus rnams phan tshun 'brel pa/ bu ga dang ga
398a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dod par gyur pa/ sha dang / tshil dang / rus pa dang / rkang phan tshun dkris shing / lpags pas g.yogs pa yin
398a2(dkon brtsegs): yang skyon du ma mthong bas/ rab tu gdungs pa'i phug du mi gtsang bas yongasu gang ba/ skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / so'i gnas skabs tha dad pa la/ bdag da
398a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gir bzung ba'i phyir/ rtag tu rang dbang med par khrid pa/ rtag tu mchil ma dang / snabs dang / mi gtsang ba dang / kha chu dang / dngul dang / mkhris pa dang /
398a4(dkon brtsegs): bad kan 'byung zhing / zhag dang / tshil rul zhing myags pa/ mkhal ma dang / mcher ba dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / rgya mche bra mi gtsang bas gang zhing skyug
398a5(dkon brtsegs): bro ba dang / srin bu'i rigs mang pos kun tu khyab par gang ba/ steng dang 'og gi bu ga rnams su mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa/ zhu ba dang / ma zhu ba'i gnas gnyis lpags
398a6(dkon brtsegs): bsrab mos g.yogs pas/ 'di ni snabs byis dang 'dra ba yin no snyam du khyod kyis so sor brtags par bya'o// ci tsam du bza' ba dang / bca' ba zos 'chos
398a7(dkon brtsegs): shing bltung pa na/ mchis snangs sa rmugs me pa du / di pa na 'dres nas/ 'gru ra 'gyur te/ 'di sa ste/ pan
398a8(dkon brtsegs): bskam po ldad pa la bur gyur pa yini yod/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis/ rnam pa'i 'dugs bskyed par byed pas/ zas rked pa nas ny-i gyi du smon
398b1(dkon brtsegs): byed kyang / slar med par byed do// dga' bo lus 'di ni dang po mer mer po dang / nar nur po dang / ltar ltar po dang / mkhrang 'gyur dang / rka lag 'gyus pa mi gtsang ba'i
398b2(dkon brtsegs): dngos po cher skyes nas byis pa'i tshe 'khor bar gyur pa nas/ rgas pa'i bar du 'khor zhong 'chings par gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na mun pa'i g.yangs dang 'dra'o// khron
398b3(dkon brtsegs): ba mnam po dang 'dra ba/ rtag par lan tsha ba dang / khab dang / tsha ba dang / sbyar ba la stsogs pa'i zas kyi ros yongs su gso ba/ gzhan yang ma'i mngal gyi mes lus
398b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang po yongs su bcos pa/ mi gtsang ba'i snod du rtag par rab tu gdung ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa/ gal te 'greng byam 'dug gam/ nyal bar gyur pa na
398b5(dkon brtsegs): bcings pa lngas bcings pa 'am/ mes gdungs pa gzhin du shin tu bzod par rga ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pas/ dper bya yang mi nus so// dga' bo mngal na gnas
398b6(dkon brtsegs): ba de/ de ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'dam du gnas shi sdug bsngal mang pos nyon mongs par gyur mas kyi/ 'on kyang dbang po nin pa'i phyir/ sems g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ro//
398b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang sems can bsod nams chung ba kha cog ni/ ma'i mngal na 'phred du nyal ba 'am/ 'og par 'dug par yang 'gyur te/ de yang sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang
398b8(dkon brtsegs): kyim sa rgyas/ ngagalas 'a la pa / yas sa
399a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byi sa/ yang chad las 'das padag 'thungams ma da gas sa dang mud dpa/ nad bucan du gyur la/ s+yA nam
399a2(dkon brtsegs): non tam/ brdegs sam/ brdegs par gyur na yang rkyen 'di dag gi dbang gis ma'i lus kyang yong su gdung bar 'gyur la/ yongs su gdung bar gyur pa'i phyir/ mngal
399a3(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa yang yongs su gdang bar 'gyur ro// yongs su gdung ba'i phyir ni sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal mang po myong ba'i phyir ni g.yo
399a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// g.yo bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ni/ lus log par 'phreng du nyal zhing 'byung bar mi nus pa la/ bud med mkhas pas mer ram/ 'bru mar gyis lag pa
399a5(dkon brtsegs): bskus nas/ ma'i mngal du bcug ste/ bags kyis bags kyis mngal la myangs nas/ sngar ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du 'jog par byed pas/ lag pas reg par gyur pa na/

399a7(dkon brtsegs): rnon pas lpags pa dngag bcang nas de'i steng du bal bas gtod na/ do rkyen gyis sbu bsngal chen pa byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal ma

399b3(dkon brtsegs): be mo bzed pa myong nas/ ma'i ming yi nas 'byung bar 'gyur la// lus kyi yan lag thams cad sngon por gyur te/ 'dis ste dper na/ gsar du spangs pa la
399b4(dkon brtsegs): reg par mi bzod pa bzhin du bkres skom gyis gdungs pa dang / snying dpyang bzhin gdung ba dang bcas bzhin du las kyi rlung gis rgyu dang rkyen gyis bus nas mngal

399b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// lag pa deng gos kyis reg par gyur pa'i tshe/ yang / thams cad sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i sdu bsngal
399b7(dkon brtsegs): myong bar gyur kyang / dbang po ba tun pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pas rnam par g.yeng ba mi 'gyur te/ ma'i mngal du shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang / gnas dang 'byung
399b8(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad kyang sdug bsngal ba yin na/ dga' bo mkhas pa su zhig 'di 'dra ba'i mngal du 'jug pa la mos par byed/ dga' su zhig ma'i mngal du yang dag
400a1(dkon brtsegs): par shes bzhin du jug tsapa/ gnas la yang dag pa lags pa byung ba gyur zhes/ dga' ba rda la na 'dams ma

400a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gis sngar dge ba sprad pas/ 'chi ka'i dus kyis che/ sdug bsngal nye bar 'ongs shing na ba dang / tsha nyams su myong bar gyur kyang / sems la g.yeng ba med
400a6(dkon brtsegs): par yang dag par dran bzhin du ma'i mngal du zhugs nas/ chos rnams las kyi dbang gis skye ba dang / thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las rab tu skye bar shes so zhes bya ba nas
400a7(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal nas byang nas zhes bya ba'i bar du yang snga ma bzhin du rgyas pa'i ste/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa che zhing rtsub pa rnams myong bar gyur kyang / dbong /
400a8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'bring dang ldan pa'i phyir yang dag par shes bzhin du 'jug cing gnas la/ yang dag par ma shes bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mkham pa su zhig 'di
400b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mngal du 'jug pa la gnas par byed ces bya ba'i bar du yang snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyarar// dga' be su zhig yang dag par shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug la/
400b2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mi shes bzhin du gnas shing 'byung bar byed ce na/ dga' ba ji ltar 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sems can kha cig rang bzhin gyi tshul khrims bsungs pa la dga'

400b7(dkon brtsegs): pa la mos par byed ces bya ba las stsogs pa yang snga ma bzhin rgyas par sbyar ro// dga' ba su zhig yang dag par mi shes bzhin du 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung
400b8(dkon brtsegs): bar byed ce na/ 'di ltar 'di na se so'i skye bo'i sems can kha cig tshul khrims yongs su dag pa 'dra ba la dga' zhing / dge ba'i phyogs bsgrub par mi byed pa rtag tu dngos po
401a1(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa la mos shing / sdig pa rnams spyod pa/ sems kyi rang bzhin mi drang zhing pag med par mang ba/ shes rab dang mi ldan padag
401a2(dkon brtsegs): long spyod la mngon par zhen cing ster sna byas pa dang / rtag tu lag pa bsums nas/ gzhan dag la lag rkyong zhing gtong bar mi byed pa dang / rtag tu re ba dang bcas shing
401a3(dkon brtsegs): sems rab tu 'dul bar mi byed pa dang / lta ba dang spyod pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe/ 'gyod pa dang bcas shing sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnams
401a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon du gyur pas/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa che ba dang / rtsub pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba dag gis rab tu gzir zhing / de'i sems rnam par g.yeng
401a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pas/ sdug bsngal gyi dbang gis bdag ni su zhig gang nas 'dir 'ongs du gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes rab tu mi shes pas/ dga' bo 'di ni dus gsum du yang
401a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par shes bzhin med pa zhes bya ste/ rgyas pa gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro// dga' bo sems can de dag mir skyes nas/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal chad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur
401a7(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dgani gnas ga chog tu gyur pa yin pas/ skal pa bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du yang mi lus shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin no// gal te mthe ris
401a8(dkon brtsegs): su skyes par gyur na// rtag tu ltung bas 'jigs pas/ sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan te/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ lha gzhan rnams kyis 'di skad du/ khrod pa
401b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul / // nga ga ga ga// ma dag na na khe sa/ ma nan pa zhed par rna
401b2(dkon brtsegs): no shes // rnye pa // na ga she// 'di sa sa nas gsus pa dag ga na sa/ sems cand rgyam
401b3(dkon brtsegs): ba ni rtag tu sdug bsngal mi bzed pa/ shin tu yid du mi 'ongs parab tu cha zhing rtsub pa dag myong bar 'gyur bas/ dper byar yang mi nus so// ya dgas kyi 'gra ba ni rang ba ni/
401b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis zhe sdang mang ba/ rab tu mnyen zhing dul ba'i sems med pa g.yo sgyu dang bcas pa/ gsod cing gnod par byed pa/ lag pa khrag gis bskus pa/ byams pa dang snying
401b5(dkon brtsegs): rje med pa/ byad bzhin mi sdug pa mthong na 'jig su rung ba/ gal te mi dang nye bar gnas par gyur na yang / bkres pa dang skoltas pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar byed pas/ rtag par

401b7(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa dang mi ldan pa/ chos kyi spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ dge ba'i spyod pa dang mi ldan pa/ dran pa'i spyod pa dang ma ldan pa/ phan dun gcig la gcig za ba dang mthu dang ldan pa rnas
401b8(dkon brtsegs): mthu chung ba dag la za bar byed pa dag yin no// dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa kha cig ni mun par spyi mun por nas mun par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing / mi gtsang ba'i gnas gcin gyi
402a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang du gnas shing / res 'ga' snang ba dang bcas pa yang yod de/ 'di lta ste phyi ma leb dang / spangs dang / sro shig dang / tral taH
402a2(dkon brtsegs): bu rnams so// gzhan yang rtag par mun pa'i nang du skyes/ mun pa'i nadu rgas par gyur pa chad med dpag tu med pa dag yod de/ de ni tshe rabs snga ma la rir gyur pa na/
402a3(dkon brtsegs): glen zhing gti mug pas chos yang dag par ma mnyam pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid la rangs su gtong zhing / 'dod pa lnga la mngon par zhen par gyur pa/ sdig pa mi
402a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas pas/ de'i rigs su skyes nas glen zhing rmongs pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa dag yin no// dga' bo gzhan yang dad
402a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gros kyi skye gnas pa'i sems can chu'i nang du skyes nas/ chu'i nang du rgas/ chu'i nang du dus byed par 'gyur ba/ tshad med dpag tu med pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ nya dang /
402a6(dkon brtsegs): ru sbal dang / sbal pa dkar po dang / ba lu ka lta bu skams te/ thams cad kyang tshe rabs snga ma la lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi dge ba'i dbang gis zhes bya
402a7(dkon brtsegs): ba las stsogs pa yang gom bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// dga' bo gzhan yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can bshad bapa dang / gci ba'i dri tshor nas myur du dar
402a8(dkon brtsegs): sang nas/ baba' dang / bdung bar byed pa tshad med dpag tu med pa srid yod de/ 'di lnga ste/ 'og dang / lug dang / khyim bya dang / khri dang / wa dang khya rgod dang / na
402b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sngang dung spung ba dang / brgyan ldan pas de khams ca kyung / rangs sngam ldag pas da pa mas kyi bang gis de nas par srid pa myong ba
402b2(dkon brtsegs): ro/ sa dga' bo gzhan yang dung 'bro'i skye gnas pa rtag tu tu dang shing dang / mi gtsang ba'i dngos po rnams pazhing 'byung bar byed pa/ chad med dpag tu med pa snyed
402b3(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ 'di lta ste/ glang po che dang / dang / rnga ma dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / dre'u la sogs pa rnams te/ de dag thams cad kyang che rabs rnga ma'i las mi
402b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i dbang gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dga' ba kye ma kyi hud srid par 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'di ni 'bar rab tu
402b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bar rog mchog tu 'bar ba/ shin tu mchog tu 'bar ba yin pas/ sems can 'ga' tsam yang des pa bsregs shing ma bcos pa med de/ g.yang mig dang / rna ba dang
402b6(dkon brtsegs): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mi rab tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pa mngon tu snang ba'i yul gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos yongs su
402b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyer ba'i dbang gis de ltar gyur pa yin no// dga' bo 'bar rab tu 'bar bar byed pa'i me yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi
402b8(dkon brtsegs): me dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i me dag gis
403a1(dkon brtsegs): / rtag tu bsregs shing 'bar bar byed pas/ 'ga' tsam yang de las thar pa med do// dga' bo le lo la rab tu gnas pa dag ni sdug bsngal
403a2(dkon brtsegs): mang po mya nganang / nyon mongs pas kun tu dkris nas/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos mngon par 'dus byas pas/ 'khor bar 'khor yang nye bar zhi zhing rgyun chad par mi
403a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus brtsams pa gang yin pa de dag bde ba mang du myong zhing / dul ba'i sems bskyed par byed pas/ nyon mongs pa yongs su bsalan/
403a4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos bsgom par rab tu brtson pa mi gtong ba la rgyun 'chad pa med do// de lta bas na khyod kyis lus 'di pags pa dang / sha dang chu ba dang / rus pa dang /
403a5(dkon brtsegs): khrag dang / rtsa rgyas dang / rkang rnams ni ring por mi thogs par gyes shing 'jig par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor brtags nas/ rtag par sems rtse gcig du le lo
403a6(dkon brtsegs): mi bya bar mngon sum du byas pa/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir/ nan tan brtson 'grus kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// dga' bo nga ni 'jig rten pa rnams dang rtsod/
403a7(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed na/ 'on kyang 'jig rten pa rnams na nan gyis pa dang rtsod pa byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos pa rnams ni gzhan dang rtsod par mi byed do// bdag
403a8(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba yin na/ su dang ldan cig rtsod par byed de/ 'on kyang mthong ba dang shes pa med pa dag yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'dzin pa skyed par
403b1(dkon brtsegs): byed pa 'byor/ ngas yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par phyir/ yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di skad du ngamacas nam
403b2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang mi shes pa med do zhes smras pa yin no// dga' bo ngas de skad smras de la tha dad du gyur pa yod dam/ dga' bos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
403b3(dkon brtsegs): mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de skad gsungs pa la gzhan du gyur pa ma mchis lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legaso legaso//
403b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la gdon mi za bar tha dad du 'gyur ba med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par gsungs pa/ bde bar gsungs pa/ de ba
403b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid du gsungs pa/ tha mi dad par gsungs pa/ bslu ba med par gsung ba/ 'jig rten pa rnams yun ring por phan pa dang / bde ba dang / phan yon chen po thob par
403b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad la/ lam mkhyen pa/ lam dngag lam sto/ paM/ lam 'byed pa/ las 'dren pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabatsam pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa margya
403b7(dkon brtsegs): zhi sa sa nas 'a ma sa ga ga sa / kha e d+d+ha ba/ das ldan
403b8(dkon brtsegs): mas rgyas sa na mam grams she/ 'ag na pa nam sa rigs pa med pa/ mig par gi sa pa /
404a1(dkon brtsegs): la na la ga sa pan da ldan pa la ma sa/ mapas bsgru ba pa rgyu khyed pa na
404a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo shes rab dang ldan pa'i spyod yul 'di ltar re shig zhog la/ deng khyod kyis sha'i mig gis lta bas/ shes pa dang mthong ba ji snyed pa dag yang bar ma yin pa/
404a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par so sor brtags nas/ de nyid rnam par thar pa zhes bya bas/ dga' bo khyod nga la dad pa'i phyi ma 'gro shig/ nga la 'dun pa'i phyir 'brang bar ma byed cig/ nga
404a4(dkon brtsegs): tshig la rton par ma byed cig/ nga'i mtshan la rtog par ma byed cig/ dge sbyong gi lta ba dang / shes pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing / dge sbyong la gus pa ma skyed cig/ de skad du dam
404a5(dkon brtsegs): spong ko'u ta ma ni bdag gi ston pa chen po yin no zhes ma zer bar ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa de gcig pu dben par song la yid la/
404a6(dkon brtsegs): bosams ste 'jal bar gyis shig/ so sor rtogs shig rtag par mang du bsgoms shig/ sems rtse gcig tu chos rnams so sor brtags ste/ chos des dag las
404a7(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa'i 'du shes yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ yang dag pa'i dran pa la gnas nas// bdag nyid kyi gleng byos shig/ bdag nyid kyi gnas dang / skyabs byos shig/
404a8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gleng byos shig/ chos kyi gnas dang skyabs byos shig/ de las gzhan pa'i phreng dang / gnas dang / skyabs med// dga' bo ji ltar na dge slong bdag nyid gleng du hU~Mr
404b1(dkon brtsegs): / du da nas dang / mas nga/ sa dang / ma nas dang / rgyangs su gyu mnams gan ga nga / byabs ma
404b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba ma chen/ dga' ba de ra dge slong gang la la zhig bdag nyid kyi gi lus la lus kyi rjes sprulta ba la rab tuganas nas/ brtson 'grus kyis na na
404b3(dkon brtsegs): drus pas/ yang dag pa'i shes bzod nas/ 'jig rten pa'i khrang khra ba ji srid bdag rtag tu yi la sems shing rab dul bar gyur pa gang yin pa de na/
404b4(dkon brtsegs): go khrus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba zhes bya ste/ gang gis phyi rol gnyis ka'i lus la rjes su lta ba yang de bzhin na// dga' bo de'i 'og tu kun 'byung ba'i chos la lus su
404b5(dkon brtsegs): bltas nas/ rab tu gnas pa dang / 'gog pa'i cho su bltas nas rab tu gnas par yang byed la/ gzhan yang kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa'i chos gnyis la lus kyi rje
404b6(dkon brtsegs): su lta zhing gnas par byed pa nyid kyis/ lus 'di la yang dag par dran par byed pas/ res 'ga' ni shes pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni mthong ba kho na dang ldan
404b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni dran pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / rten med par gnas par gyur pas/ 'jig rten 'di na blang bar bya ba ci yang med par rab tu shes par
404b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ de ltar na dga' bo 'di ni dge slong bdag nyid kyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ phyi rol gyi lus dang / nang dang phyi rol gnyis
405a1(dkon brtsegs): / ma pas sa/ nan 'dadang / rna pa dang / byar lag na 'am
405a2(dkon brtsegs): tu gnas pa dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi rol gyi sems dang / nang dang phyi rol gciga'i sems su lta ba la gnas pa dang / nang ga chos dang / phyi ral gya chas dang / nang dang
405a3(dkon brtsegs): phyi rol gciga'i chos su lta ba la rab tu gnas nas/ brtson 'grus kyis drad ba rtse gcig du byas pas// dag pa'i shes pa thob nas/ 'jig rten pa'i khrong khro ba ji snyed pa dag
405a4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu yid la sems shing / rab tu dul bar gyur nas/ kun 'byung ba'i chos su bltas nas/ rab tu gnas pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos su bltas nas rab tu
405a5(dkon brtsegs): bas par yang byed la/ gzhan yang kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa'i chos gnyis la chos bltas nas/ rab tu gnas par byed pa nyid kyis lus 'di nyid la
405a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par dran par byed pas/ res 'ga'i ni shes pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur/ ches 'ga' ni mthong ba kho ni dang ldan par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni dran pa len
405a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ 'jig rten 'di la blang bar bya ba ci yang med par rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na 'ga' bo 'od ni dge slong bdag nyid rdzing du bya
405a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / bdag nyid gnas dang skyabs su gyur pa dang / chos gleng du gnas pa dang / chos gnas dang skyabs su gyur cing / de las gzhan pa'i thos meng bdapa mas
405b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas dang / skyabs med pa zhes bya'o// dga' bo skyes bu rang bzhin drang zhing g.yo skya spangs pa gang la la zhing snga dro dus kyi tshi nga'i thad du 'ongs pa langs dbang ba dz+ra la
405b2(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos de la rjes su bstan pa de/ phyi dri'i dus kyi cha bdag nyid thos pa dang ldan par smra bar 'gyur la/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe chos rjes su bstan pa na yang
405b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid thos pa dang ldan par smra bar byed pas na/ dga' legs par bstan pa'i chos ni mthong / chos la mngon sum du rtogs pa/ rab tu gdung pa sel bar byed
405b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dus dang dbang po dang rab tu 'jam par gyur pa/ thabs dang ldan pa/ rang gis rig pa'i chos legs par skyob par byed pa yin pas/ gang gis nga'i mngon sum du chos
405b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa thos par gyur na/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su mthun par 'gyur zhing / byang chub la zhol bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni nga'i mkhyen pa yin te/ de lta bus na deng
405b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don dang / gnyi ga'i don de lta bu mthong nas chos 'di la rtag par yang dag par bslabs te/ rab tu byung ba'i chos bag yod par bsgrub
405b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ chung migasan cing 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba thob par byas nas/ gzhan gyis byin pa'i chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / lam
405b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / nad kyi gsos sman la stsogs pa blang bar bya zhing / sbyin bdag rnams bsod snyoms kyi phan yon chen po thob pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par smin pa khyad par du 'phags pa
406a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs shing rgya ba dag thob par 'gyur ba de ltar/ dga'ag khyed kyis bsla ba par bya'o/ gzhan yang dga' bo gzugs 'ga' ma ya
406a2(dkon brtsegs): chags pa bya ba'am/ 'am 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med de/ de ni gnas med do// ga la yang mya ngan med/ smre sngags 'don pa dang /
406a3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa mi bskyed pa gang yang med pa de ni gnas med do// dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci gzugs de rtag pa cig yin nam/ 'on te mi rtag pa cig yin/ btsun pa de ni
406a4(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa lags so// dga' bo gal te rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa yin na/ ci de bde ba zhig 'am/ 'on te sdug bsngal cig yin/ btsun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lag
406a5(dkon brtsegs): so// gang mi rtag pacing sdug bsngal ba de ni/ rnam par 'gyur zhing rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin na/ nga'i nyan thos 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag/ ci gzugs
406a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni bdag yin no// bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no// gzugs ni bdag gi yin no// bdag ni gzugs la gnasas zhes khab len par byed dam/ gsol ba bcom
406a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// 'a co snum du sems/ phyi mor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa de dag rtag pazhig yin nam/ 'on te ma rtag pa cig
406a8(dkon brtsegs): yin/ btsun pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa yin na/ ci bde ba cig yin nas/ 'on te sdug bsngal ba cig yin/ btsun pa sdug bsngal ba lags sa/
406b1(dkon brtsegs): gang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'gyur zhing 'dzag pa'i chos can yin na/ nga'i nyan thos 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag/ ci tshor ba la sogs pa
406b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni bdag yin no// tsher ba la stsogs pa ni bdag gi yin no// bdag ni tshor ba la stsogs pa la gnas so zhes khas len par byed dam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
406b3(dkon brtsegs): lag so// de lta bas na ji tsam du gzugasu gyur pa 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi rol gyi 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ bzang
406b4(dkon brtsegs): po 'am/ ngan tham/ thag ring ba 'am/ thag nye ba yang rung ste/ ci tsam du gzugs su gyur pa thams cad kyang bdag ma yin la/ bdag kyang gzugs dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang /
406b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyang bdag gi ma yin la/ bdag kyang gzugs la gnas pa ma yin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji tsam
406b6(dkon brtsegs): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes par 'gyur ba/ 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/ nang gi'am phyi rol gyi 'am/ rags pa 'am/
406b7(dkon brtsegs): phrab 'am/ bzang ba'am/ ngan pa'as/ thag ba'as/ bag pa yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang bdags yi la/ bdag kyang de dag dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang /
406b8(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang dag sa yin pa/ bdag par de dag la gnas pas yin par legs par sa sar brtag par byas// deg na dul dag pa srid padape gnanas tha
407a1(dkon brtsegs): shes dpang byed da/ rnam par shes pa las sang brtags nas/ mas su su bskye bar 'gyur// yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis/
407a2(dkon brtsegs): thos 'phags pa mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dag ni/ 'di ltar gzugs la so sor brtags nas/ yongs su skye ba skyed pa dang / gal te skyo bar gyur na mngon par zhen par ma byed
407a3(dkon brtsegs): do// mngon par zhen pa med pas/ rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro// rnam par grol nas rnam par grol lo snyam du shes pas/ 'di skad du bdag gi skye ba ni zad do//
407a4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad do// bya ba byas pa yang srid pa phyi ma len par mi 'gyur ro zhes sgrogs par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor brtag par bya'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'ad
407a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral nas chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to// dge slong lnga brgya
407a6(dkon brtsegs): po rnams ni/ zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba thob par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigasu bcad de/ dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gang la
407a7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam bzhag sems med pa// rnam dag ye shes med pas na/ zag pa rnams na slong mi 'gyur// de bas khyod kyis nan tan bsgrubs// khyod kyis rnal 'byor rtag
407a8(dkon brtsegs): bsnams su// phung po skye 'ga' ges par gyis// rnam dag gal te rdzogs 'gyur na/ lha rnams kun ni dga' bar 'gyur// mdza' ba shes lhan cig 'brel dga'
407b1(dkon brtsegs): snru nga rgyun chus ni chags bdu/ d+hA chags pa gags pa// gas kun smrangs na/ rnam pa dang byung la/ @
407b2(dkon brtsegs): shes ni ma byed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya ma che 'da' soms la// sdug bsngal lapa phyin par byas// dang po meng mer po las ni// ga'i na bur skye bar 'gyur/
407b3(dkon brtsegs): las ni sngar ldar ste// lngar lngar po las mkhrang bar 'gyur// mkhreng ba rnam par gyur nas ni// 'ag dang yan lag bzhi skyes pas// rus pa bdun nas lus
407b4(dkon brtsegs): grub pa// thams cad las ni rgyu las byung // 'go thod rus pa dgu 'dus shing // 'gram pa'i rus pa gnyis 'brel te// so ni sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan/
407b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i rtse ba de bzhin no// rna rtsa gnya' ba'i ras pa dang // dkan dang sA'i rus pa dang // brang dang med pa'i rus pa ni// bsdus na rus pa nyi shu yod// mig la rus pa bzhi
407b6(dkon brtsegs): yod de// 'brag pa byin pa zung gnyis yod// lag pa gnyis dang sor mo rnams// bsdus nas rus pa lnga bcu yod// lhag rgyab rus pa brgyad yod de// rgal
407b7(dkon brtsegs): tshigs la ni sum cu gnyis// 'di dag kun la rtswa yod las// 'di'i grangs ni rtsa bzhir 'gyur// rtsib logs g.yas pa'i rus pa ni// phan tshun 'brel
407b8(dkon brtsegs): pa bcu gsum yod// rtsi ba legs g.yon 'brel skye ba'i// rus pa dag kyang bcu gsum yod// rus pa lu gu rgyud 'di dag/ gsum gsupa dag ni phan
408a1(dkon brtsegs): rkun thal// gnyis gnyis dgan cig ldan te/ lcags gzhanan la pa med// galas gsan ban gtas pa
408a2(dkon brtsegs): bsdus nas rus pa la bcu yang// lus dang 'brel ba'i rus pa ni// bsdus na sus brgya drug cu yod// rus tshigs pan nun 'brel pa ni// sems can
408a3(dkon brtsegs): ni grub yin zhes// yang dag sangs rgyas mkhyen pa zhes// bden chags du ni gsungs pa yin// rkang mthil nas ni 'go'i bar// mi gtsang 'dres shing
408a4(dkon brtsegs): mi brtan pa// de dag lhan cig lus bsgrubs pas// nyam chung 'das du khyam dang 'dra// rus pa 'ba' shig gzer bu med// sha khrag kun tu bkrus pas/
408a5(dkon brtsegs): shing mi 'khral 'khor rab 'dra zhing // sgyu mas sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'dra// lus 'di rtsa rgyas dkr-is nas ni// pags pa gsher bas g.yogs pas na/
