408a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas dgu rma'i sgo yod par// de lta bu ni blta bar bya// kun nas gcin rkyag mi gtsang ba// rtag tu gang zhig 'dzag pas na// dper na bang ba dod rnams//
408a7(dkon brtsegs): bathunams sna tshogs dkang bskur// lus 'di yang ni de bzhin te// mi gtsangs tshogs rab tu gang // rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor g.yo bas na// tam chu
408a8(dkon brtsegs): slong ba ci meng med/ khyim pa'i skye ba rgyag tu chags// mkhas pa dag ni len mo byed// mchil skabs dral ni rtag tu 'bag/ na khrag dag ni rgyan tu
408b1(dkon brtsegs): sa 'dus/ sa / ga nga// / chung // dang na dang ma thunan/
408b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas da / pags pa dang // sang dang / brel mam tshal dang / 'di la skyugs pa'i rdul mag mi dang // ma ga ca rnams dang ldan cigagams
408b3(dkon brtsegs): sreg pa'i lus ni 'jigs rung bas// 'di nyid bdag ni dgra yin na// shes med 'dod bzhen pa'i// blun po rtag tu phangs par byed// 'di 'dra'i mi gceng lus
408b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dinakhye khyer rnyi pA bas ni// nyin mtshan nyon mongs rab gzir cing // skad cig mi gnas kun tu khyam// rus pas grong khyer rtsig par byed// sha dang
408b5(dkon brtsegs): khrag gis zhal zhal bskus// 'dod snang gti mug mtshon bkye nas// ci rigs par ni brgyan par byed// rus pa'i grong khyer skrag bro ba// sha khrag 'brel
408b6(dkon brtsegs): cing 'dus pas na// rtag tu sdug bsngal grogs po yin// phyi nang sdug bsngal gdung bar byed// dga' bo khyod kyis shes par byos// ngas ni ji skad bstan
408b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin// nyin ma tshan rtag tu drin byos la// 'dod pa'i yul la sems mabyed// gal te 'dod pa slong 'dod na// rtag tu de bzhin rab bsgoms la// rnam
408b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshor bar gyis// myur bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skams// bcom ldan 'das kyis mngal du 'jug pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ tshe
409a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dga' bo dang // dge slong lnga brgya po de dag rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la
409a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'brog dgon pa las yang dag par 'das te/ mthar thugs pa'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das
409a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gnas su phyin nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pas// bdag nyid shin tu dga' bar gyur nas// tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gus sems 'khrus
409a4(dkon brtsegs): ni bsdams pa dang // chu gtsang byug spos phul ba dang // bsod nams rnams ni bsgrubs pasan// rnam smin mchog 'di thob pa yin// de nas 'khor mang po rnams de
409a5(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal thos nas/ thams cad the tsom du gyur nas// the tshom bcad pa'i phyir// ston pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dag
409a6(dkon brtsegs): bo 'dis sngon sug las ci zhig bgyis na/ de'i rnam par smin pa lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur la/ mtshan sum cu dang ldan pas/ bdag nyid brgyan cing //
409a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi skabs sor bzhis thung bar gyur/ ci'i slad du 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu zhen pa las/ ston pa chen pos thugs brtse bar dgongs pa'i mthus
409a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral te/ thabs kyi shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa bkas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
409b1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag/ dge slong dga' bos// sngon las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i 'bras bu yongs su smin pas na/ thams cad mngon du gyur pa yin no zhes/ gzhan bstan
409b2(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du rgya cher bka' stsal nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gal te bskal pa rgya lon yang // las byas zlar mi 'gyur te// rgyu dang rkyen ni cho gas pas na/
409b3(dkon brtsegs): lus can nyid la 'bras bu smin// dge slong dag khyod nyon cig/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon rol na/ skye dgu rnams tshe lo
409b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri thub pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jigs rten
409b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i/ skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gzigs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten
409b6(dkon brtsegs): du byung ste/ dge slong gi dge 'dun stong phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang thabs gcig tu ljongs rgyu zhing / grong khyer gnyin ldan rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du gshegs nas/
409b7(dkon brtsegs): gnyin ldan gyi tshal na bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i g.yas khyim gyi bcung zhig yod pa de/ 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu mngon par zhen cing chags
409b8(dkon brtsegs): pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs des// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir/
410a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung bar bskul nas/ thabs kyis mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rnam par gzhag
410a2(dkon brtsegs): go/ de'i tshe yul de'i bdag po gnyer ldan ces bya ba rgyal po byed de/ 'di ltar chos kyis mi rnams 'dul ba/ me dang skye bo mang pos rgyas pa/ lo legs shing bde
410a3(dkon brtsegs): ba/ g.yo sgyu dang / chom kun med cing nad dang bral ba/ ba lang dang / ra lug dang / sa lu dang / bu rab shing kun tu gang zhing rgyas par gyur te/ rgyal po de'i g.yas
410a4(dkon brtsegs): khyim gyi nub cig yod pa yang / shin tu 'dod pa la mngon par zhen cing chags par gyur to// rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas ste/ gnyen ldan gyi
410a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan na bzhugs par thos pas/ btsun mo dang bzhon nu dang / blon po dang / skye bo mang po'i tshogs dang lhan cig du/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gdong ste/
410a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la shin
410a7(dkon brtsegs): btu gya nom pa'i chos kyi gtam kun bstan cing gzeng bstod pas/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur to// de'i nu bo 'dod pa la zhen cing / khyim
410a8(dkon brtsegs): nas 'byung du ma btu pa dang / de'i tshe de la blon po'i bu dang / gzhan yang phyi nas lhan cig rtse ba'i grogs dag gis/ kye grogs po shes par byas shig/ 'di
410b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar rgyal po ni gzhon nu dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang blon po dang / skye bo mang po dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba der dong ste/ gus
410b2(dkon brtsegs): bas dam pa'i chos mnyan pas/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar khyod kyang mi lus shin tu thob par rga ba las/ deng thob par gyur
410b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ ci'i phyir 'dod pa la mngon par zhen cing chags nas sgor yang 'byung du mi btub ces smras pa dang / des kyang de skad du skye ba thos nas/ shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur
410b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de dag gi rjes su 'brangs nas/ lhan cig dong ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i bcung dge slong de dag lhan cig tu 'grogs te/ dong ba mthong nas/ kye
410b5(dkon brtsegs): khyod ci'i phyir mi 'di gcig pu khrid nas/ lhan cig tu 'grogs te 'gro zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis kyang ji ltar gyur pa bzhin du smras so// dge slong des smras pa
410b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung lags ste/ sngon khyim na gnas pa'i tshe/ 'dod pa'i yul rnams la shin tu mngon par zhen cing chags pa las/ ston pa
410b7(dkon brtsegs): chen pos thugs rjes dgongs nas/ mthus 'khor ba las bslus te/ mthar thug pa'i mya ngan ras 'das pa la bzhag pa yin no// gzhan yang skyes bu
410b8(dkon brtsegs): glen pa pa ga dang 'dra ba 'di lta bu yod pa las khyed kyis snying brtsi nas/ lhan cig khrid de 'ongs pa shin tu legs so// der bla na med pa'i ston pa chen pos ma
411a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / snangs da pa ma smra pas
411a2(dkon brtsegs): cig grogs nas/ bcom ldan 'dasag pa dong padang / bcom ldan des gang de dag la gtsigs das/ dbang pa dngams pa ji ltab brgyan/
411a3(dkon brtsegs): mang dag par rnas bstan pas de dag gis thos par gyur nas/ shin tu dang be skyes pas/ 'dug pa'i sman las langs nas/ pra dgas phrag pa gcig tu
411a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ston pa chen po 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu
411a5(dkon brtsegs): gi gdugs la bdag gi sdum par bsro gang du khrus la gshegs par ci ga nang zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang cang mi gsungs par gshegs par
411a6(dkon brtsegs): zhal gyis bzhes so// des kyang zhal gyis bzhes par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te song ngo // de nas rgyal po ga la der song
411a7(dkon brtsegs): ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po la gus pas phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mchis na/ chos thos par
411a8(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dang ba skyes nas/ 'dod pa'i yul rnams la yongs su skye ba'i sems skyes pas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par gi gdugs
411b1(dkon brtsegs): la bdag gi sdum par bgro la nga khrus la gshegs par gsal pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen pos kyang thugs rtse bar dgong shas/ gshegs pa
411b2(dkon brtsegs): nal gyis bzhes te// bcom ldan 'das deni lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod par bgyi ba'i 'os su gyur lags na/ lhas kyang grong khyer gyi shul dang srang rnams
411b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag dar bgyis nas chag chag btab ste mdzes par bgyi ba'i rigs so zhes smras pa dang rgyal pos 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs na/ bdas
411b4(dkon brtsegs): gis grong khyer mdzes par bya mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gi nu bo 'dod pa la mngon par zhen nas/ bzod par bka' ba las/ deng bcom ldan 'das kyis thul bar gyur pa
411b5(dkon brtsegs): ni/ yang dag par ngo mtshar che'o snyam du bsam nas/ nu bo shin tu legs kyis khyod song la/ khrus kyi yo byad ci dgos pa sbyor cig dang / ngas kyang ci nus kyis grong
411b6(dkon brtsegs): khyer brgyan par bya'o zhes smras pas/ rgyal po'i nu bo yang shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ rgyal po la phyag byas te/ sa las langs te song ngo // de nas rgyal pos hA
411b7(dkon brtsegs): bo rnams la bsgo ba/ kye khyed cag deng la grong khyer du dril chen bsgrags te/ phyogs su 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang
411b8(dkon brtsegs): khyer du gshegs kyis/ grong khyer na/ snga nas gnas pa dang / yul so so nas lhag pa'i skye bo rnams/ so so nas ci nus kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la lam
412a1(dkon brtsegs): dang sa rnams phyag dang byas te/ chag chag bta nas/ me tog dang / sras dang / dri rnams thogs so/ snyan pa
412a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po gshegs pa sus shig ces sgo shig/ blon pa rnams kyis kyang lha de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes rgyal po'i bkar khyer nas phyogs su go bar bsgo zhing / dril chen
412a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi sgra bsgrags pas/ skye bo mang po rnams grong khyer der rdo dang gyo mo dang / bong pa rnams bsal te/ spos kyi chus kun tu khyab par chag chag btab nas/ bdug pa dam pa
412a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang bsregs/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang bdan mang po yang btsugs te/ me togs rnams mngon par gtor bas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi skyed mo tshal dga'
412a5(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin du byas so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i nu bos kyang spos cu dang / spos mar la stsogs pa sbyar te/ sro gang mdzes par byas nas/ khri ba shams te bdan yang bting ngo /
412a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs mthar gyis grong ma khyer du gshegs su nye ba dang / rgyal po dang rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo dang / slas dang skyed
412a7(dkon brtsegs): mang po rnams grong khyer nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsus nas/ rgyang nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ zha 'bring nas/ grong khyer du gshegs pa dang / de'i
412a8(dkon brtsegs): tshe rgyal po'i na bo des kyang / bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs par spyan drang ste/ spos cha la stsogs pa phul nas/ sku bsil bar gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
412b1(dkon brtsegs): sku gser gyi mdog can/ mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byed bzang po brgyad cus yongs su brgyan pa mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' nas shin tu dang ba'i dad pa skyes
412b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// sku bsil nas na bza' mnams pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'go bos phyag byas nas/ 'di skad du deng bdag cag gi bsod
412b3(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi zhing mchog dam pa la mchod pa chung zad bgyis pa 'di dge ba'i rtsa bas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dang tha dad pa'i med pa'i gser gyi kha dog
412b4(dkon brtsegs): can gyi lus thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar bcom 'das 'di'i gcung 'dod pa'i yul mngon par zhen cing chags pa las/ mthus yongs su bzlas ste/ shin tu mthar
412b5(dkon brtsegs): thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud du gyur nas/ gsar gyi
412b6(dkon brtsegs): mdog can gyi lus thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar bdag 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags par gyur na/ yang mthus sred pa'i chu bo zab mo las yongs
412b7(dkon brtsegs): bzlas te/ mya ngan las 'dres pa'i bdeb la gzholas gyur cig ces smon lam pa la 'o// dge slong dag byed kyis de'i / san rgyal po gnyen
412b8(dkon brtsegs): cu bo dod pa la mngon par zhen par gyur ba/ de gzhan yin ma ma mas na/ de ltang me la ste// de ni ni slong dga' ba 'di nyid yinano// 'dis kyin
413a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs bsro gang du gshegs par gsol nas/ spos rdul stsogs pas
413a2(dkon brtsegs): sku bsil te/ shin tu dang ba'i dad pas smon lam btab pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus de de bzhin gshegs ga cung du gyur nas/ lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur
413a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'dod pa'i yul la mngon par zhen cing chags pa las/ ngas mthus phyung ste/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das
413a4(dkon brtsegs): pa shin tu bde ba'i gnas sa gyur pa yin no// de nas 'khor mang po rnams the tshom du gyur nas/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon las ci bgyis na/ skyes bu
413a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'dis las mngon par 'dus byas pas na zhes
413a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba las stsogs pa rgya cher snga ma bzhin te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus su ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba yo byad kyis brel pa med pa zhis
413a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa de la skyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu rgyas shing / chu mig dang / 'bab chu dang / ljon shing dang ldan pa rab tu byung ba'i dben gnas su 'os pa ci zhig
413a8(dkon brtsegs): yod de/ de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas sems can la snying rtse ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten du byung nas/ dben pa na gnas pa yod yod pas/ nam 'jig rten du sangs rgyas mi 'byung
413b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe/ 'di 'ba' shig bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur te/ de nas rang sangs rgyas gzhan zhig ljongs rgyu zhing ri brag gi grong der phyin nas/ phan tshun kun tu brtags te/
413b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas btsal ba las/ de'i skyed mo tshol du phyin pa dang / skyed mos tshal bsrung ba'i mis 'phags pa de mthing nas/ bde bar gshegs sam/ gnyel gau sho pa'i slad
413b3(dkon brtsegs): du 'phags pa 'dir bzhugs su gsol zhes smras so// des nam gyi gung thun la/ me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / skyed mos tshal bsrung ba'i mas
413b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong nas 'di snyam du btsun pa chen po 'di ni 'di lta bu'i spyod pa mchog 'grub po snyam du bsam nas/ de nas nub mo langs ste/ khyim po dag ga la ba der song nas 'di
413b5(dkon brtsegs): skad du khyim bdag chen po deng dga' ba chen po skyed cig/ skyed mos tshal na 'phags pa cig bdag gi thad du gsheg gas nas mtshan mo gnas pa las/ de ni spyod
413b6(dkon brtsegs): pa gya nom pa dang ldan zhing / rdzu 'phrul chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ 'od gzer chen po bkye nas/ skyed mos tshal gyi nang kun tu gsal bar byas so zhes
413b7(dkon brtsegs): spras pa dang / khyim bdag gis thos nas myur zhing rings par skyed mos tshal du song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad du 'phags pa ni bsod snyoms
413b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhed pa lags la/ bdag ni bsod snyomasa'i tshal ba lags na/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ skyed mos tshal 'dir bzhugs su gsol/ bdag gis rtag par
414a1(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms sbyar ro zhes smras pa dang / des kyang de'i gus pas gsol ba btab pa mthong nas khas blangs te/ skyed mos
414a2(dkon brtsegs): tshal gi nang du gnas nas/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa mchog la snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba rjes su myong bar gyur to// des gzhan zhig na de 'di snyam
414a3(dkon brtsegs): du bdag gi lus rul pa 'di ni 'khor bar 'khor ba las bdag gis gang bya ba de ni thob par gyur pas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i zhi ba'i dbyings su zhags nas/
414a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan du mi skye ba mngon sum dbye ba'i rigs so snyam du bsams nas na mkha' la mngon par 'phags ste/ me'i khams la snyom par zhugs nas/ rdzu 'phrul rnams
414a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstan te/ 'od bzer chen po bkye nas steng du 'bar ba dang / tsha ba dang / 'og tu chu 'bab pa la stsogs pa bstan te/ lus 'di spangs nas rnam par
414a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa skye bar mi 'gyur ba/ lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas khyim bdag des de'i rus bu blangs nas/ dri zhing thams cad
414a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsregs te/ 'o mas me bsad nas/ rus bu lhag ma lus pa bsdus te/ bum pa sar pa'i nang du bcug nas mchod rten brtsigs te/ gdug dang rgyal mtshan
414a8(dkon brtsegs): dang ba don rnams btsugs nas/ shin tu gdung ba'i dad pas/ dri chu gya nom pa sum cu gtor te/ mtshan bzang po rnams grub par shog cig ces smon lam btab
414b1(dkon brtsegs): po// dge slong dag legs par nyon la/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag tu gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems/ de ltar mi lta ste/ de ni dga' bo 'di nyid yin no//
414b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dis mchod pa mchog byas pa dang / gus pa dang / shin tu dang ba bskyed pa'i las kyi dbang gis deng 'dir mtshan mchog khyad par 'phags pa sum cu mngon par
414b3(dkon brtsegs): grub pa'i rnam par smin pa myong bar gyur yin no// de nas 'khor mang po rnams yang the tshom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa tshe dang ldan
414b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dga' bos las ci bgyis na/ gal rab tu ma byung zhing khyim na gnas par gyur na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar stobs kyis 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i blo 'dis bgyis par 'gyur lags/
414b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dga' bos tshe rabs snga ma la las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i
414b6(dkon brtsegs): tshe/ gdon mi za bar bdag nyid kyis myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la stsogs pa dang / rgyas par gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de dge slong dag nga sngon byung ba skal pa bzang po 'di nyid la
414b7(dkon brtsegs): skye dgu rnams che lo stong phrag nyi shu thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od bsrungs zhes bya ba/ mtshan sum cu dang
414b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ 'jig rten du byung ste/ yul ba ran se drang srong lhung ba'i gnas ri dgas byin ya'i tshal na bzhugs so// de'i tshe khrong khyer de na rgyal po byed de/ 'di ltar
415a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'jig rten 'dul bar byed pas/ chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do// zhes bya ba la stsogs pa yang rgyas par gong ma bzhin du
415a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ro// rgyal ba de la bu gsum yod de/ 'di lta ste/ rab dang / 'bring po dang / tha chungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
415a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'od srungs sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar byon nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du lhag ma med pa'i dbyingasu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / rgyal po dgus
415a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung blangs te/ dri'i shing tsan dan dang / go shi sha dang / lha'i spos kyi shing la stsogs pas bsregs ste/ 'o mas
415a5(dkon brtsegs): me bsad nas ring bsrel bsdus te/ rin po che'i bum pa'i nang du bcug nas/ mchod rten chen po rin po sna bzhi las byas pa/ kho ra 'khor yug ni dpag tshad gcig/
415a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phangs du ni dpag tshad phyed yod pa brtsigs nas/ 'khor lo 'jugs pa'i rgyal po'i bu 'bring po des/ bdag nyid stong du 'dzegs nas/ 'khor lo bar ma btsugs so//
415a7(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i bu 'bring por gyur pa de bzhin yin snyam du sems/ de ltar mi lta ste/ dga' bo 'di nyid yin na// 'dis sngon 'das pa'i
415a8(dkon brtsegs): dus na/ gus pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas pa dang / 'khor lo bar ma btsugs pa'i dge ba'i las de'i tshe rabs nyis stong lnga brgya'i bar du rtag par gling
415b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig la dbang ba'i stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po byas so// tshe 'di la gal te rab tu byung bar ma gyur na/ de bzhin du stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal
415b2(dkon brtsegs): po dbang phyug chen po la dbang sgyur bar byed pa 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor mang po rnams the tsom du gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
415b3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon las ci bgyis na/ nyan thos kyi nang na dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu bka' stsal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
415b4(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ 'di ni sngon gyi stobs las gyur pa yin te/ dge slong dga' bo 'di sngon de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi
415b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa las/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba las/ de'i mkhan po bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa las/ dbang po'i nub tu sdom pa'i mchog tu bsngags pa
415b6(dkon brtsegs): rjod par gyur to// des ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyad kyang / tshe de nyid la mngon par rtogs pa ci yang thob par ma gyur pas/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ 'di skad
415b7(dkon brtsegs): du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyad kyang / tshe 'di nyid la mngon rtogs pa ci yang med pas/ bdag gis
415b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dir tshangs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis/ mo 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bram ze'i khye'u bra ma zhes bya ba 'di yang dag par
416a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/ mtshan yang shig kya thub pa zhes bya bar gyur to zhes lung bstan pas/
416a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa las/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa rnams spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te/
416a3(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bdag gis mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das 'di'i bstan pa las dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog du gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das
416a4(dkon brtsegs): de'i bstan pa las dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur cig ces smon lam bdab pas na/ smon lam de'i stobs kyis/ deng 'dir nga'i bstan pa las nya
416a5(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi nang na dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin no// 'di ltar dge slong dag gcig du gnas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang dag cig tu gnag go/
416a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gcig tu bkar ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkarar// las 'dren ma gang yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres ma myong bar 'gyur te/ de lta ba
416a7(dkon brtsegs): na khyod kyis gcig pu gnag pa dang / 'dres pa'i las spongs la/ gcig tu dkar ba'i las bsgrub par bya'o// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i
416a8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnams grangs stong phrag rgya pa las// mngal na gnas pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa bcu bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho//
416b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ !ar+ya man dzu shrI bud d+ha k+ka tra gu Na byA han nam mahA ya na sutra/ bod skad du// 'phags pa 'jan
416b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
416b3(dkon brtsegs): bam po dang po//
416b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na ba rgod
416b5(dkon brtsegs): phung po'i ril/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / ngan song sel dang / spyan ras gzigs dag
416b6(dkon brtsegs): phyug dang / mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgya khri bzhi stong la 'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
416b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha bye ba phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag pazhugs rnam
416b8(dkon brtsegs): da lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhug pa'i tshangs pa bzhi khri gnyis
417a1(dkon brtsegs): stong dang yang thabs gcig go// 'di lta ste/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang
417a2(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi dbang po phrag brtsub dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dga' dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi thams cad kyang g.yog lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma
417a3(dkon brtsegs): yod pa dang tha ba gcig go// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nyer dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po brgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyi me thub
417a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ri ba dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud las rgyal lanas pa dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba'i bla ma
417a5(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang / 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /
417a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po mgo mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi thams cad kyang g.yog brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin kum
417a7(dkon brtsegs): b+hi ra dang / 'brog gnas dang / khab spu dang / yid bzangs dang / blo gros bzang po dang / dbyibs bzangs dang / kun nas kha dog dang / gnod sbyin mi 'khrugs pa dang /
417a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang gnod sbyin gzhan brgya stong dang yang thabs gcig go/ yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por nye bar gnas shing bzhugs te/ lha dang
417b1(dkon brtsegs): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yi ni dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lnga gyi chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag dang / 'khor bzhi rnams kyi sti
417b2(dkon brtsegs): stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ mchod par byas/ rims 'gror byas nas/ mchod cing gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / na bza'
417b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / zhal zas dang / gzim cha dang / snyun kyis gsos sran dang / yo byad bzang po mang po brnyes so// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thab
417b4(dkon brtsegs): dang chos gos gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su dkor cing 'dun brdar
417b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos/
417b6(dkon brtsegs): me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po'i chen chen po mngon par 'bebs/ sil bsnyen brgya stong ni dkrol nas/ rgyal po che'i khab kyi grong
417b7(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen por rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs te/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tu phyung // de nas de'i tshe/ bcom
417b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/ zhabs gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der/ pad ma shing rta'i 'phang la/
418a1(dkon brtsegs): tsam/ 'dab ni gser/ chub ni dngul/ ze ba ni bai dur/ snying ni nor bu bzang po dang ldan pa rnams byung ste/ pad ma
418a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug pa dag 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par
418a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la lan bdun du bskor ba byed cing / tshigs su bcad
418a4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di dag smras so// skye bo rnams la phan mdzad ded dpon gang // yon gyi gnas gang dge ba rnams mdzad ma// shag kya khyu mchog blo ni bdag nyid che// 'jig
418a5(dkon brtsegs): rten mgon po de ni grong du gshegs// lha'i gnas su gang rnams rtson pa dang // de bzhin dga' dang 'chi las thar 'dod pas// bdud kyi bde rnams 'pham par ga
418a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa// des ni shag kyi seng ge mchod par bgyis// 'gro ba rnams la phan zhing thugs rtse'i phyir// bskal pa bye bar spyad pa rnams spyod pa// thub pa
418a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sgra yang rnyed par dka'// thub pa de deng rgyal po'i khab gshegs bzhed// zas skom de bzhin gos dang gzhon pa dang // bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams
418a8(dkon brtsegs): dang ni// smin pa dpag med bsam yas gang btang ba// kun mkhyen de ni rgyal po'i khab du gshegs// lag pa rkang pa mig dang ne ba nang // rna dang yan lag
418b1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa mgo btang ste// kun dang yon tan ldan pa stong 'phad pa// des ni kun mkhyen ye shes mchog brnyes so// sprin dang dul dang sdom pa gang brlabs shing //
418b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims ma nyams pa// bzod pa'i bdag nyid yon tan mchog ldan pa// zhi ba'i thugs te gong du dang gshegs so// sdug bsngal
418b3(dkon brtsegs): byeng pa'i 'jig rten rab gzigs nas// brtson mchog bskal pa bye bar gang spyod cing // bsam gtan mtha' yas nyams pa med dang ldan// tshangs dbyangs de ni
418b4(dkon brtsegs): de ring grong khyer gshegs// drang srong chen po de'i shes rab ni// mtshungs med na mkho'i khams ltar dpag tu med// der gshegs de'i yon tan gzhan dag kyang // spyod
418b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ni rnam par smin pas spangs// blo ldan gang gis bdud kyi bde bcom zhing // mi g.yo'i go 'phangs ma ngan med pa brnyes// chos kyi 'khor lo tshul bzhin rab bskor ste/
418b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbang phyug de ni grong khyer gshegs// mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rgyan pa'i sku// bde gshegs 'gyur bar su dag 'dod pa ni// snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub
418b7(dkon brtsegs): sems zhog ste// mchod pa'i phyir ni de'i thad du song // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spangs pa dang / de bzhin nyon mongs gzhan las rgyal 'dod pas// de ni bsngo/
418b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i thad du nyer song la// mchod pa rnam mang mtha' yas myur du bgyis// tshangs pa dang ni lha'i dbang phyug dang // brgya byin nyid ni thob par su 'dod cing // lha'i bde
419a1(dkon brtsegs): @#/ pas rtag tu rtse dga' ba// de ni thub pa mchog phyir nye bar song // gling bzhi bdag po rgyal por 'gyur bya zhing // rin chen mchog
419a2(dkon brtsegs): bdun rang gis thob pa dang // bum mchog stong sogs rnams ni gang 'dod pa// sems can mchog la des myur mchod bgyis// khyim bdag tshong dpon rnams kyi
419a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang g.yog 'khor dam pa dang // longs spyod 'phel ba'i mchog rnams gang 'dod pa// de ni ded song thub la mchod par gyis/
419a4(dkon brtsegs): gang su rnam par grol dang grol ba kun// thub pa rnams kyis chos mchog thos nas te// 'dren pa rnams kyi sgra yang 'dir bkod kyis// de phyir chos nyan du ni der myang
419a5(dkon brtsegs): dang // de nas rgyal po'i khabs kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag tshigs su bcad pa dag gis skul nas skyes pa dang /
419a6(dkon brtsegs): bud med dang // khye'u dang // mo rnams me tog can dang // gdug spos dang // 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma phur ma thogs/ gser dang / dngul gyi
419a7(dkon brtsegs): me tog gi pur ma thogs// gdug dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs/ rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / pi'ang rgyud cig pa dang / sgra snyan dang / k+Shing bu dang /
419a8(dkon brtsegs): khar dkrol dang / kim pa la dang / na ku la dang / pi bang thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la sems te/ sangs rgyas
419b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa yid la byed pas/ dga' ba dang mchog dga' ba thob cing 'khod pa gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khabs kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs te// bcom
419b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs yas pa sgo'i thim pa la bzhag ma thag tu// de nas grong khyer thams cad kyang / rnams pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ lnga dang mi yisi la snyan brgya stong yang
419b3(dkon brtsegs): ma dkrol bar dag phyung / lha'i me tog gi char kyang rab tu phab ste/ sems can long ba rnams ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong // sems can 'on pa rnams ni rna bas
419b4(dkon brtsegs): sgra thos/ sems can smos pa rnams ni dran pa thob// sems can yid 'brel pa rnams ni rtse gcig pa thob// sems can gcer bu rnams ni gos snyed/ sems
419b5(dkon brtsegs): can dkris pa rnams ni zas snyed/ sems can dbul po rnams ni nor snyed do// de'i tshe na sems can gang yang 'dod chags kyis gzir ba med de/ zhe sdang gis ma yin/
419b6(dkon brtsegs): phra dog gi ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ khong khro bas ma yin no// da ltar kyis ma yin no// de'i tshe na/ sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /
419b7(dkon brtsegs): phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas skyes bu seng ge zhe stobs cu grong khyer nang du gshegs/
419b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i mod la skye bo rnams// bde ba brgya chen dri med thob// long ba mi rnams mthong bar 'gyur// 'on pas thos pa'i mthu dang yang skye// myos pa dag ni dran pa snyed//
420a1(dkon brtsegs): @yi 'brel rtse gcig de bzhin no// gcer bu dag ni gos snyed de/ dkres pa dag gis zas thob bo// skyes bu gang su dbul po yang
420a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar nor rnams snyed par 'gyur// lha rnams bye ba mang po yang // mkha' la gnas shing stobs kyis mchod// smra ba'i seng ge mchod pa'i phyir// me tog
420a3(dkon brtsegs): char kyang rab tu 'bebs// rnga dang rdza lnga sil snyan dung // nyams dga' byed pa dpag med pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni bsod nams kyis// grong khyer kun tu
420a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug che sgra yang byung // grong khyer kun kun tu rab g.yos te// de tshe nyams dga' mnyam par gnas// skye bos ngo mtshar 'di thos nas// dga' ba shin
420a5(dkon brtsegs): tu rgya chen thob// 'dod chags kyi ni mo gzer zhing // de'i rje khro blun ser sna med// nga rgyal la sogs nyes pas kyang // gzir bde che ma lus med/
420a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas khyab cing dang ba ste// mi rnams pa mar 'du shes 'gyur// gang sangs rgyas stobs bcu'o// skye bo bde phyir grong gshegs che/ mi yim
420a7(dkon brtsegs): yin sa la ston rnams/ ma dkrin par desku yang 'byung // 'jig rten min lnga mar bcas/ bde gshegs 'ad kyis rgyas par gang // de ltar
420a8(dkon brtsegs): gang tshe sangs rgyas ni// 'gro la phan phyir grong gshegs pa// de tshe ngo mtshar rmad byung ba// rnams pa mang po rab tu dga'// de nas bcom ldan
420b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das rgyal po'i khab kyis grong khyer chen por gsheg pa dang / tshong dpon shings la chen po lta ba'i sdig bcom zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim par
420b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ grong bar zhig na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom kyis/ bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dngos po zhib
420b3(dkon brtsegs): thugs zhi ba/ dul ba/ zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu 'byor pa/ bsdams pa/ glang po ltar dbang po thul ba/ mtsho ltar dngas te rnyog pa med cing gsal ba
420b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgya bcus sku legs par brgyan pa/ kha dog bzang po brgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/
420b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dad par gyur to// de sems shin tu dad pas/ bcom ldan 'das
420b6(dkon brtsegs): ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig
420b7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
420b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// chos du dang ldan na/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag pa/
421a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chu mngon par rdzogs par chung rgyan/ ngas rgyas kying ya la rgyas sa rgyas gong po
421a2(dkon brtsegs): dris bu yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sdug bcom pa thugs brtse ba dang / skye ba tshogs chen po 'dul ba'i dbang sa
421a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ grong bar gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so// phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ srog chags brgya stong mang po dag kyang lpags
421a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// bar snang las kyang lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'al
421a5(dkon brtsegs): do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
421a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
421a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bkod pa ji ltar bu 'dod pa de lta bu 'dzin to// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sos can thas
421a8(dkon brtsegs): cad la snying rje zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o// de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong du chud par bya ba
421b1(dkon brtsegs): / gas tshas thugs sa sa drug gru sams bsgyu / ba pa las ga ma sa byung pal/ snru
421b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags pa spyong/ zhe sdang ma spyad ga'i mug pa spyod / khyim pa'i rtags sreg par mi skyed parab tu byung nas kyang med pa dang bkur to dang / tshigs su bcad pa
421b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod cing / gang rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa de la gnas pa yin no// de la rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lnga ba bzhin du rab
421b4(dkon brtsegs): tu rtogs pa'o// chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ phung po dang / khams dang /
421b5(dkon brtsegs): skye mched dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so// phung po lnga rab tu rtogs pa ji ltar rab tu rtogs she na/ phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang /
421b6(dkon brtsegs): dben pa dang / stong pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mi 'gags par rab tu rtogs ste/ ji ltar rab tu rtogs pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar rab tu
421b7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa'o// gang gi tshe yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi shes rlom sems su mi byed mi rtogs rnam par mi tog pa de'i tshe/ rtogs pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni phung
421b8(dkon brtsegs): po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po rab tu rtogs de chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa zhes bya'o//
422a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des
422a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bdag gis chos de dag yongs su shes par gyung ba/ de ltar sems can thams cad la bston kyang / sems can dang chos kyang mi dmigs te/ rigs kyi bung
422a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig po 'di dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'chang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
422a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su sbyong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
422a5(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dga' ba dang / mchog tu
422a6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba des shing ta la bdun srid tsam du bar snang la mngon par 'phags so// 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags nyis stong gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
422a7(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems bskyed do// lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i srog chags khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// de nas
422a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dus pa mdzad/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gis tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i bcom ldan nadas
422b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba 'di lta ste/ ser po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang
422b2(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ slar log ste/ bcom ldan
422b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug du nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas/ bla
422b4(dkon brtsegs): phrag pa cig tu bzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcug nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
422b5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin// 'dren pa khyod ni rgyal po'i stobs la mnga'// khyod ni 'jig rten
422b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen par 'jig rten grags// ci'i slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs// thub pa chen po 'das pa ma lus mkhyen// de bzhin ma 'ongs ma lus
422b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang mkhyen// de ltar dag kyang mkhyen pa ma smad pa// ci srad khyod kyis 'dzum pa 'di mdzad gsungs// rab 'bring tha ba'i sems dang ldan pa yi
422b8(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa mkhyen// chags grol srid pa'i 'du shes pha rol phyin// mi 'dul kha lo bsgyur ba lung bstan gsol// lha rnams
423a1(dkon brtsegs): @#bye ba khrag khrig kun lhags te// skyon ma mchis la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing // skye ba ches spyod 'di dag kun bsdod kyis//
423a2(dkon brtsegs): thub pa chen po chungs med gsol// khyod ni ye shes pha rol phyin// khyod la 'khrul pa yongs mi mnga'// spyod pa'i bye brag kun mkhyen pa// ci zhig slad du 'dzum
423a3(dkon brtsegs): ba bstan// bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong lha 'di dag/ chos rnams mtshan mi slad du 'dir lhags te// de bzhin dge slong tshogs kyang mang po dag/ dam pa'i chos rnam
423a4(dkon brtsegs): nyan par mtshal ba mchis// khyod la mchod pa'i phyir ni sil snyan rnams// rab tu bzang zhing mang po gdung bar bgyid// skye bo mang po the tshom 'tshal ba kun/
423a5(dkon brtsegs): thub pa dang 'dir the tshom myur bcad gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces pa bka' stsal pa to//
423a6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di/ shing ta la bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol
423a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo byang chub sems
423a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig com 'di skal bgrangs med pa brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'chang brgya par
423b1(dkon brtsegs): ke 'gyur te/ bskal pa rims nad med pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
423b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ sa dga' bo dper na de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon pa
423b3(dkon brtsegs): naga' na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bar/ bcom ldan
423b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yang mi lhag pa'i thub par
423b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs de nas gshegs te/ mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes sgra'i khyim ga ba der gshegs nas byon pa dang //
423b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga dan bshams pa la bzhugs so// dge slong gi dge mdun rnams kyang stan ci 'os pa dag la 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan
423b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas/ bdag nyid lag pa gdar te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba bzang po mang pos/ de bzhin gsheg
423b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs te tshim par byas so// bstabs te tshim pabyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bshos gsol pa dang / lhung bzed bzhag
424a1(dkon brtsegs): @phyag bcabs par riganas/ bcom ldan 'das la ras bcom bu'i bzung rin thang med bskul gsol to// sru la gsol nas kyang
424a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal te/ stan ran pa zhig blangs nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po ma
424a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sems dang / thab dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa gang nas byung ba lags/ mi
424a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa ci las skyes lags// mi shes par ji ltar 'gag pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ce
424a5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to// rgyal po ngar 'dzin pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa las gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngar 'dzin pa dang /
424a6(dkon brtsegs): nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pas/ yon tan dang / nyes dmigs shes te/ de bas na mi shes pa zhes bya'o// gang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa de yang dag par
424a7(dkon brtsegs): blta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de la ni shes pa 'am/ mi shes par zhes gdags par mi nus so// de bas na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad
424a8(dkon brtsegs): lagar yang pra ba dang / ga gas kya bar m-i ga dgas pa de ga slab par byam/ rgyal pa can po gang yang mi na/ gags kyang sralas nas ces gangs
424b1(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am 'ong ba med do// gang la 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba med pa de la skye ba med/ 'gag pa med do// gang mi skye mi 'gag de shes pa'o// shes pa ji lta bar mi shes pa 'ang
424b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nges par 'byung ba'am/ nges par 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa'i phyir ro// gang gi tshe nges par 'byung ba 'am/ nges par 'byung
424b3(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yang mi shes pa de'i tshe/ ye shes can zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol
424b4(dkon brtsegs): go bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ legs par gsungs pa ngo mtshar to//
424b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal te/ bdag par skabs 'dir kho nar 'gum pa'i dus bgyis brnyan ni// bdag nyid mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
424b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs stod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/
424b7(dkon brtsegs): gdan las gzhengs te gshegs nas phyi dro'i dus kyi yang chos kyi sbyin pa 'du bar 'gyur ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das zas phyis len pa spangs te/ lhung
424b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos gos bzhag nas zhabs dkyus te nang du yang dag par 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang du gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byi dro'i dus kyi tshe
425a1(dkon brtsegs): nang du yang dag 'jog pa las bzhengs nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ 'di lta
425a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ chos yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gdan gshams pa la bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / nyan thos
425a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du nang du yang dag par 'jog las langs nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod phung po ga la bde dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la der song te
425a4(dkon brtsegs): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
425a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/ lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing
425a6(dkon brtsegs): mdun du bdar nas/ lhan gcig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig
425a7(dkon brtsegs): tu 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' stong tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ lhan
425a8(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// byang chu sems
425b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge btsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra yang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam gyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du brdar nas/ lhan
425b2(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rgyal po
425b3(dkon brtsegs): ma skyes dgra yang dpung gi tshigs yan lag bzhis yongs su bskor cing mdun du brdar nas/ lhan gcig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom
425b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
425b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po nas kyang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po du ma/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod phung po'i rig pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhag
425b6(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stan la
425b7(dkon brtsegs): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
425b8(dkon brtsegs): nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i grong bar du/ byang chub sems dpa'
426a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom kyis gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi
426a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las btsams te/ yongs su zhus pa de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo tsam zhig bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das da yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs
426a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'grub pa de las btsams te/ ji ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
426a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi sde rnams pham par bgyid pa dang / gzhan mu rtogs rnams
426a5(dkon brtsegs): tshar bcod par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / smon lam yongasu rdzogs pa/
426a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang /
426a7(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ba dang /
426a8(dkon brtsegs): sems can dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa'i don bgyid par 'gyur ba de ltar chos legs par rab tu bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na/ rigs kyi bu dang
426b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba 'dus shing mchis pa/ gang rnams bcom ldan 'das la chos mngon sum du thos nas/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba brgya chen po thob
426b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas/ ji ltar thos pa bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub par 'gyur ba dag mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam
426b3(dkon brtsegs): du dgongs ste/ 'di lta bu'i chos bstan par bya na/ 'khor 'di lta bu ni mi mdzes kyis/ ngas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas phyogs bcu'i kun
426b4(dkon brtsegs): tu phyogs re re yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po kye la/ 'od zer re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po snang bas khyab par byas te/ sangs
426b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang zhing / de dag 'od zer de dag gis zil gyis mnan nas/ phyir mig gi dbang po la snang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyis 'od
426b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi mngon/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / nor bu dang / klog dang me dang / skar ma'i gzugs dang / sems can gzhan gang gis 'od kyang mi mngon par 'gyur ba dang / gang
426b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams mtha' yas su med pa'i 'khor yug dang / 'khor yug chen po dang / gtang bzung dang / gtang bzung chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po
426b8(dkon brtsegs): ri rab dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri'i rgyal po nag po dag dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag bdag dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad 'od zer de dag gi thal
427a1(dkon brtsegs): / byung du snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du dgongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i 'od zer bkye nas
427a2(dkon brtsegs): gsung gsal ba'i sgra mdzad pa dang / gsungs gsal ba'i sgra des/ phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag sgras go bar gyur to// yang de'i tshe na shar
427a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung brgyad bcu'i rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'od ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin
427a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal rtsegs rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas
427a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ming yang mi grag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' shig gis yongs su gang ngo //
427a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'i tsho gas re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldogs pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya yod do// sangs kyi zhing /
427a7(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhes bya ba zhig gnas te ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags zhes bya zhe sa byang chub sem
427a8(dkon brtsegs): de bcom ldan 'das dpal rtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de/ byang chub sems pa'i dge 'dun gyis bskor cing chos bston pa'i spyan dan/ shing ta la bdun srid tsam du
427b1(dkon brtsegs): bar snang la 'phags ste/ yus mi snang bar gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdo rje tshig gi gzungs kyi chos bston to// de nas byang chub
427b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni sgra tsam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di'i lus mi snang mod kyi/ bshad pa yang
427b3(dkon brtsegs): grag la sgra yang byin te/ gzugs yongasu grub pa yang mi snang ngo // sgra ji ltar bar gzugs kyang de bzhin no// gzugs ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no snyam mo//
427b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rab tu shes pas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa thob ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' de chos 'phags shes bya'o// byang chub
427b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos 'phags des/ snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang mthos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po
427b6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyog gcig tu 'dug nas
427b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du 'byung zhing gsung / gsal ba'i sgra chen po ya
427b8(dkon brtsegs): gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan bya pa ba zhig / 'das snang ba 'di lta bu ni sngon chad ma mthong ngo // de skad ces gsol pa dang /
428a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal rtsegs rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa'
428a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la 'di skad bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung brgya bcu rtsa bzhi
428a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba
428a4(dkon brtsegs): da ltar bzhugs te mtsho'o bzhes so// de bzhin gsheg pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag nas/ byang
428a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrags par bya ba'i phyir/ bas spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag btang ste/ gsung stsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo // de nas bcom
428a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
428a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la bltab dang / phyag bgyi ba dang /
428a8(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag la yang lta ba dang / chos de yang nyan du 'chi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rig kyi bu khyod de'i dus
428b1(dkon brtsegs): khabab par shes nas ngacig pa de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen pa chos 'phags byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug khri sum snang gas yongs su bskor cing mdung/
428b2(dkon brtsegs): bad nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs po ches lag pa bkum pa las sbyang ba dang / smyung ba las bskum pa tsam gyis skad cig zang cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas
428b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thas
428b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags gting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par bzhug ma thag tu/ donas skad
428b5(dkon brtsegs): gcig de nyid la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog gi tshogs chen pos pus nub tsam du gang bar gyur to// sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra yang byung ngo //
428b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bdugs dang / brgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to// spos mchog gis kyang yang dag par bdugs te/ gzhan
428b7(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i longs spyod dang khyad par med par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rdzu 'phrul kyi cho 'phrul
428b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa 'di lta bu bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang lhan gcig du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhag nas
429a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon las ji lta ba bzhin
429a2(dkon brtsegs): du/ byung ba'i pad mo dag la 'khor dang bcas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khad do// yang de'i tshe lho phyogs su sangs kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang ga'i klung
429a3(dkon brtsegs): dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brdul med pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i
429a4(dkon brtsegs): brtsal gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba/ da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor cing chos bsto/
429a5(dkon brtsegs): to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams med do// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin
429a6(dkon brtsegs): che zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i de ci'i phyir/ lag na rin po che zhes bya na/ yang rigs kyi bu de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du sems can rnams la
429a7(dkon brtsegs): chos ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ lag pa g.yas brkyang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed lag gis byugs nas/ lag pa de las
429a8(dkon brtsegs): sang+yas rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // chos rin po che'i spa dang / dge 'dun rin por che'i sgra byung ngo // sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dpa bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /
429b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan dang / shes rab rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // de dag dang gzhan yang
429b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rin po che'i sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'byung ste/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu lag na rin po che 'i zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' la ga na rin po ches snang
429b3(dkon brtsegs): ba yang mthong / gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa ga la ba der
429b4(dkon brtsegs): song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
429b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa seng ge'i brtsal gyis skyid pa de la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten tu
429b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung zhing / gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po yang bdang ba 'di'i rgya gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
429b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang gi klung dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi brjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
429b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shak+Sha thub po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang bston to// de bzhin ga gegs pa des gang 'di phyogs dri
430a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste dam pa'i chos bsgrags pa'i phyir ba
430a2(dkon brtsegs): spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing / gsung gsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo // yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
430a3(dkon brtsegs): tan bkod pa zhes pa bya'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed de/ der byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu 'dzin
430a4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po log na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to//
430a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
430a6(dkon brtsegs): de la lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen kur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de la yang blta ba dang / chos bstan bu de yang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das
430a7(dkon brtsegs): des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod der song te ni rung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis khyabs pa'i sems can rnams dang / phrad pas
430a8(dkon brtsegs): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni sdug bsngal ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin pa ches/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
430b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/
430b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shAkya thub pa des/ don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag kyang mchis bzhin du/ de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
430b3(dkon brtsegs): ngan pa yongs su 'dzin/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des nga ci nas sem/
430b4(dkon brtsegs): can ngan pA kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas te/ chos bstan par bya'o zhes yun ring po nas smon las btab par 'gyur te/ rigs
430b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni de ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyid pa de la/ byang
430b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
430b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa shakya thub pa de la lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'chi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thugs rje chen po bskyed de// de tsam du sangs
430b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su bzung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub de bka' ba mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
431a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bu ni 'byung ba dka'o// de mthong bar khang sbed par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/
431a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song la/ rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rab tu bsgrims par gyis shig sbas gyur ta re/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang sangs
431a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni bsred par dka'o// de na sems can gzhan dag kyang gtum zhing khro ba dag go// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang byang chub sems
431a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang
431a5(dkon brtsegs): rjesu chags pa dang / khrod 'khro bar 'gyur ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der smras pa 'gyur gyi bcom ldan 'das bdag la ni rjes su chags pa yang ma mchis/ khong khro yang ma mchis na/
431a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag ci'i sla du smras pa 'gyurabacom ldan 'das bdag seMs can tham cad kyis phyi mi mtha'i bskal par she shing stong te/ bsdigs shing btsogs na sa bod pa dang / mtshon gyi sa btab
431a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang bzod par smos te/ sems can gang la yang gnod par bgyi ba'i sems mi skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyid pa des/ rang gi sna
431a8(dkon brtsegs): rta sems dpa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed las gang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin pa spro ba de rig kyi bu 'di
431b1(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyis khams mi 'jed der deng shig/ bcom ldan 'das des tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i de'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
431b2(dkon brtsegs): dgu khri nyis stong gis/ dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar/ bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin pa spro te/ 'jig
431b3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi 'jed der 'chi'o// zhes gsol te// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lan rin po che/ byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis yongasu
431b4(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan gcig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sang+yas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gnas so// de na byang chub seMs dpa
431b5(dkon brtsegs): seMs dpa' chen po lag na rin po che 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag 'dzu 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro zhing / sems can tshad med pa la ji ltar bde ba
431b6(dkon brtsegs): bya snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ de'i tshe ji de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi steng chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa g.yas pa bkang
431b7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ lag pa de las bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba byung ba dang / btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / de bzhin du gzhon pa dang gos dang / gser dang dngul dang / bai dur+ya da / mu tig dang /
431b8(dkon brtsegs): dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / su dag ci 'dod par gyur pa thams cad de las byang bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang chos don tu gnyer zhing / chos 'dod pa de dag gis kyang lag pa de las
432a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ chos thos par 'gyur ba dang / de na sem can dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gang nad rnam pa
432a2(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyi btab cing sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de lta bu rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas//
432a3(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang ldan
432a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
432a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe nub phyogs su
432a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba dag na/ de bas
432a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa nor bu rtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang bston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni
432a8(dkon brtsegs): bai dUru bzang ba 'ba' zhig las mngon par grub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam pa bzhag med de/ sangs kyi zhing de na/ bya
432b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yongasu gang ngo // yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams grol yang rung / 'ong yang rung 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang
432b2(dkon brtsegs): rug ldang yang rung / 'chag kyang rung ste/ de dag gis bai rur+ya'i sa chen po de las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rtsegs pa'i rgyal po de mthong ngo // 'di lta ste
432b3(dkon brtsegs): dper na shin tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la/ bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bai dUr+ya'i sa chen po de las de bzhin gsheg
432b4(dkon brtsegs): bde mthong ngo // mthong nas chos kun 'dri ste/ de bzhin gshegs de yang de dag la lung ston to// de dag kyang chos thos nas bzod pa thob bo// 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das
432b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i smin 'tshams kyi spu'i dbus su yang / nor bu rin po che mngon par 'grub ste/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
432b6(dkon brtsegs): de thams cad snang bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na me tog kha zum pa dang / me tog kha bye ba las nyin mtshan bgreng ba ma rtogs par/ nyi ma dang / zla bar mngon par yang
432b7(dkon brtsegs): med de/ nyin mtshan du mngon pa yang med do// yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad
432b8(dkon brtsegs): par blo gros shes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyi snang ba chen po de yang mthong / sems dang gsung gsal ba'i
433a1(dkon brtsegs): kya/ sgra yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rtsegs pa'i rgyal po ga la ba deng
433a2(dkon brtsegs): song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
433a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo glos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rtsegs pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
433a4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing / gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po yang bda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/
433a5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang gi'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das/ 'jig rten
433a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams mi 'jed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te// 'tsho
433a7(dkon brtsegs): shing bzhes la chos kyang bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig chad med grangs med pa dag nas pa
433a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sdu ba dang / 'di lta ste chos bsgrags pa'i phyir spu'i khung bu thams cad nas/ 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra byung ngo // de skad ces
433b1(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' smon la khyad par gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams
433b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba
433b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang lta ba dang / chos ston pa de yang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu des de'i dus la bab
433b4(dkon brtsegs): par shes na song shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par glo gros byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su
433b5(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir gnas
433b6(dkon brtsegs): sa// byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad pa blo gros 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bus/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
433b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro babu sa mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis de'i tshe ji
433b8(dkon brtsegs): ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par kyang
434a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi sems can
434a2(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba'i me yang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang dag bkres pa dang / skom pa nyan pa yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can
434a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad bkres pa dang / skom pa dang bral zhing bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong bsam
434a4(dkon brtsegs): gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te/ skad gcig de nyid la sems can de dag bde ba rnam pa 'di lta bu skyes nas/ skad gcig de nyid/
434a5(dkon brtsegs): la sems can gang yang 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gam/ 'khro ba 'am/ 'chab pa 'am/ 'tshig pa 'am/ phrag dog gam/ ser sna 'am/ ga
434a6(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ tha ba 'am/ gnod sems kyis gzir ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad gcig de nyid la byams pa'i
434a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / phan tshun tu pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas te/ ni lta bu'i
434a8(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dibaste/
434b1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/
434b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
434b3(dkon brtsegs): ba byas nas/ smon lan ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog rtsegs pa chen po
434b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya// / bam po gnyis pa// / yang de'i tshe
434b5(dkon brtsegs): bang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung drug bcu rtsa gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu rgyan pa zhes
434b6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ de bzhin gshegashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA le'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang
434b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos
434b8(dkon brtsegs): dur srog 'chang ba gastag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing den bud med kyi ming yang med cing / mngal gyi gnas kyang mi shes sa// byang chub sems dpa' di dag thams cad kyang/
435a1(dkon brtsegs): kya/ gos ngur smrig gyon cing dkyil mo dkrung bcas par rdzus te 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs rgyas
435a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi rigs kyi phyag zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bston to// de la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di byang chub sems dpal
435a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dang po skyed de/ de ltar byang chub sems bskyed nas// sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa byang chub dra pa'i sde snod la 'jug pa/ gzug kyi rtsa ba'i gnas/
435a4(dkon brtsegs): sems me g.yong pa gtong ba rjes su gtang pa/ stong pa nyid rjes su 'jug pa/ mtshan ma med pa yang dag par sgrub pa/ spen pa med par tshal ba/ rang bzhin gyi 'dod chags dang
435a5(dkon brtsegs): bral dang / phung po dang / khams/ skye mched rab tu rtogs pa/ 'dun pa'i bya ba rgyun chags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa de la mngon par dad pa/ chos thams cad tu
435a6(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa/ de dag la yongs su rtogs pa me dag / rtog pa yang dag par chad pa de yang mi mthong ba de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
435a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de'i smon lam gyis khyad par ni la
435a8(dkon brtsegs): da lta bu ste/ sems can ji snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthong ba de dag thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
435b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyan par 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa paskar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal bas/ snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thas
435b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das sa la'i dbang po rgyal po 'gyung ba de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo
435b3(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
435b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po re mtshan gyi rgyan pa/ skar ma rtsegs pa'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po 'byung ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to//
435b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di dang / gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po 'di 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i sgra gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bco ldan
435b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba des/ rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ rigs kyi bu lho phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ sang rgyas kyi
435b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing gang ga'i klung drug khri gsum stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
435b8(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang bstan to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
436a1(dkon brtsegs): des/ gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas/ byang chu sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste chos skrag pa'i phyir/ spu'i
436a2(dkon brtsegs): khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag rab tu bskye zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo // gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams de mi 'jed ces bgyi/ bcom ldan
436a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ sems can 'dod chags la mi 'jed/ zhe sdang la ma 'jed/ gti mug la mi 'jed/ sdug bsngal la mi 'jed
