436a4(dkon brtsegs): de/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed ces bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag las/ la la smyos pa dang / mi snyan par brjod pa dang / sdigs pa dang / bsdig pa bzod
436a5(dkon brtsegs): cing dang du len par bgyid pa mchis sam/ 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel tam/ de bzhin du zhe sdang gi sems dang / gti mug gi sems sel ba ma mchis sam/ bka'
436a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can de dag las gang yon tan 'di dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can de dag las phal cher ni gnod sems
436a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / tha ba dang / zhes sdang mang ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhes snang dang / gti mug gis kun tu dkris so// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mi 'jed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma ba
436a8(dkon brtsegs): gal te sems can de dag bzod par gyur na ni/ de'ang rung na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi bzod pas na/ de'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'jed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma
436b1(dkon brtsegs): bsas/ bka' stsal pa rigs kyi thasangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu sa byang chub sems dpa' theg pa ldan gyi rgyal ba las lhag par byang byas
436b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas rgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bzod pa dang dul ba dang / nges pa dang ldan pa dag yod do// de dag ni sems ca
436b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi spros bsdigs/ mngon kyib pa kyang / ji sum mi 'jed de/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis mi 'phrogs so// rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa de dag
436b4(dkon brtsegs): gis/ ming gi 'jig rten kyi khams de mi 'jed ces brjod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yang de na sems can kha cig sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa/
436b5(dkon brtsegs): su cor smra ba/ khro ba gtum// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol ba/ ngan 'gro'i spyod yul ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mi gus pa/ pra
436b6(dkon brtsegs): dog la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag gis de tsam du skyes shing smad de gnod pa byas shing skur kyang / bcom ldan 'das de snying rje bas bzod cing dang du len te/ sa dang mnyam pa'i
436b7(dkon brtsegs): sems rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pas de sti stang du byas kyang khengs par mi byed/ sti stang du ma byas kyang 'dud par mi byed de/ de skyes shing brgyab kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/
436b8(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur/ mi 'phrogs/ ma'i chags/ bskye ste de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de mi 'jed ces byas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la khya
437a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis rgyan pa bskar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag 'jig
437a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams der/ de tsam du smad pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du ma skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed par legs par rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de
437a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang dang shar gyi 'tsham na/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas zhing de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/
437a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa dbang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems
437a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu bde ba dang ldan no// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te/ sems can rnams kyang bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no// yang rig
437a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan der lo bye ba brgya stong du tshad par spyod pa spyad pa bas ni/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed du/ tha se gol gtogs pa srid tsam du
437a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can la byams pa'i sems bskyed na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du bskyed na/ gang nyin mtshan du yong su dag par gnas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan
437a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma rtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad
437b1(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
437b2(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa de la lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de lta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du 'chi'o// bcom ldan 'das
437b3(dkon brtsegs): des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi rgyan pa skar ma rtsegs pa'i rgyal po// byang chub se
437b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing / lhan cig du sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir gnas
437b5(dkon brtsegs): so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bus/ bcom ldan
437b6(dkon brtsegs): 'a ba na gshegs pag phru pa mad du 'tsham sa/ 'a ma sa kyi rdzu phrug sa pa gyus na pa dus pas/ ngags kyi ngas pa
437b7(dkon brtsegs): na gyi khabs seMn pa 'i dugs nacag gis khyis par bya das na pa gdu las gas pasnarnags tu ga pa
437b8(dkon brtsegs): mas su cig gi rgyan 'akyi rgya bang ya ga par byung gdugs dang / rgyams can dang bdag ma gang ma sa pa kyang dang ma ldams
438a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang dge snyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
438a2(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
438a3(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par shes pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyi brgyan
438a4(dkon brtsegs): pa skar ma rdzogs pa'i rgyal pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang ldan gcig tu bcom ldan
438a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sad rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
438a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor dbyas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du 'byung ba'i pad ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de bzhin
438a7(dkon brtsegs): tu sbyar te/ phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag tu yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad
438a8(dkon brtsegs): med grangs med pa rnams kyis/ snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas/ rang rang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te/ 'jig rten/
438b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir lhags nas/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
438b2(dkon brtsegs): thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
438b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang
438b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po 'jig rten skyong ba dag / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung gsal ba'i sla
438b5(dkon brtsegs): yang thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la be der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
438b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pas/
438b7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa ji snyed pa de dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa/
438b8(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag gi ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag cad med cing khyad
439a1(dkon brtsegs): ma zhugs par mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku kha dog dang / chu zheng ci 'dra bar bcom ldan
439a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das shakya thub pa'i sku yongs su grub pa yang de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so na mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'
439a3(dkon brtsegs): phun sumo tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / nyan thos chen po phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'dir yang byang chub
439a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dag gis so so nas shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad
439a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mngon par mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ba rgya chen po de mthong nas/ stan las langs
439a6(dkon brtsegs): te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha sa la brtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
439a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsal to// phyogs bcu rnams su grags pa mtha' yas blo/ 'jig rten ltar bcas 'dir ni lam me ste// thub pa'i thugs ni se
439a8(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyis// tshad bzung mi nus de phyir khyed bsam yas// phyogs bcu dag nas rgyal sras dpag med pa// chos tshol slad du de ring 'dir lhags shing //
439b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la kun kyang gus bcas gnas// smra ba'i mchog gis chos rnams rab tu gsungs// phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa// tshul khrim brtson
439b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus ting 'dzin blo rnams kyis// seng ge ltar ni 'jigs khyod mdzes ste// nam mkha' dag la nyi ma bzhin du gsal// lha dang klu dang mi rnams gsang ba la// dge ste
439b3(dkon brtsegs): pho mo dge slong dge slong ma// thams cad gus bcas thal mo sbyar gnas kyis// bcom ldan phan bzhed chos ni bshad du gsol// khyod ni 'das mkhyen de bzhin ma
439b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs dang // da ltar yang ni shin tu nges par mkhyen// lus can mos pa ji bzhin khyod gzigs la// the tshom chen po sel ba'i chos gshad gsol// thub pa rgyal
439b5(dkon brtsegs): sras ji ltar sprad pas na// zhing rnams dag la rdul med thob par 'gyur// ji ltar smon lam 'grub pa thob 'gyur ba// de ni 'dren pas bdag la nyur bshad gsol//
439b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar ser sna dri mas mi gos shing // ji ltar tshul khrims ma nyams 'gyur ba dang // bsdigs pa dang ni de bzhin skur pa dang // brnyas pa dag kyang thub pas ji ltar brna
439b7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir pa'i/ 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal bzlog slad du// bskal pa byed mang por rgyal sras rnams// ji ltar brtson 'grus bcom zhin
439b8(dkon brtsegs): skyed par 'gyur// rtag tu sems ni rtse gcig mnyam pazhagaso// bsam gtan gnas paspyad yul nam dag ste// padam chu'i drims mi gos ltar// ji ltar 'dod pa
440a1(dkon brtsegs): #gis gos ma 'gyur// thub ba ji ltar zab mo'i chos smra zhing // mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i blo ldan 'gyur// brtan pa ji ltar bdud sde bcas bcom
440a2(dkon brtsegs): nas// byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/
440a3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa spyod pa la
440a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa bsgrub pa dang por bsam zhing nan tan bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grang bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di
440a5(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs nas/ bdog gdan 'dings su bcug ste/ gnas gtan kun dga' bo dang / me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la
440a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan 'dings su bcug pa las/ gtam 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gi brtsams nas/ nyan
440a7(dkon brtsegs): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su spangs pa'i gtam zhig 'byung ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni chos bsten pa 'di'i snod ma yin pa lta ba zhig snyam mo//
440a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'di bya ba mngon par byas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri 'phang du
440b1(dkon brtsegs): dpag chad bzhi 'bum pa rin po chems sbas pa lnga'i ras bcos brgya stong du ma gting ba/ shing bal 'jam zhing reg na bde ba bshams nas/ khri de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong
440b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das khri snga ma las bzhengs te/ seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri
440b3(dkon brtsegs): de la bzhugs ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la
440b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi
440b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang / dge ba'i bshes bsnyen la bstan pa ste/ sha ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang
440b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sha re'i bu gzhan yang chos gcig dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
440b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems
440b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing 'dod pa dang / 'dun pa bskyed pa ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sngon bya
441a1(dkon brtsegs): / chub sems dpar gyur pa na tshig 'di skad ces gal te bdag skye ba thams cad du rab tu ma byung na/ sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur gcig/
441a2(dkon brtsegs): ces spras ste sha ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems
441a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de ltar bslob pa ni/ skye ba thams cad du rab tu 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung yang rung ma byung yang rung / gdon mi za bar khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ngo // de ci'i
441a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon 'byung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brnyed pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par
441a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgon pa'i gan sa la dga' ba
441a6(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yang mthong ba dang / de chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos la bstan pa dang / sngon
441a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa thob pa dang / de la lha rnams dga' ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur
441a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ sha ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu de lta bas na/
441b1(dkon brtsegs): byang du ba sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad dgrol bar 'dod pa dang / rgyun turab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'bya
441b2(dkon brtsegs): bal shin tu dga' bar bya'o// gara'i bu chos gcig pa de dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang
441b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu cho su gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de
441b4(dkon brtsegs): lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa mi 'dod// nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam la mi dga'/
441b5(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa dang mi brten/ nyan thos kyi slab pa la mi slog nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mi bston/ gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par 'dzin du
441b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jug cing / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang de bzhin pa dang / gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
441b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o// shA ri'i bu de la gzhan dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gnas bcu yongs su 'dzin to//
441b8(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gi dge 'dun rab tu rnyed pa dang /
442a1(dkon brtsegs): @#de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongs su sgrogs shig chos bstan pa dang /
442a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ de brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid kyi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rgya chen po bskyed pa dang / mir gyur na yang 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / sangs
442a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mthong ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lnga dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / g.yog 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs
442a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o// sha ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa'i
442a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gcig yang dag par rdzog
442a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// sha ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas skyes pas ni/ sangs rgyas
442a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rigs me 'chad mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod na/ sangs rgyas kyi ri/
442a8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'chad cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems la rab tu dgod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas
442b1(dkon brtsegs): bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to// sha ri'i bu chos gnyis po de dag dang ldadan/ byang chub ses dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod/
442b2(dkon brtsegs): baji lta bur 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub ses dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yin
442b3(dkon brtsegs): tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa ji lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/ gsum gang zhe nasha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa dang / zang zing med par chos
442b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrigs kyi sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'o// sha ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu thob ste/
442b5(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhon/ gang 'di mi 'jig par grong du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par 'khor la chos bston pa dang / mi 'jigs par kha zas za ba dang / mi 'jigs pa gtsug lag
442b6(dkon brtsegs): khang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jig par dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jig par lung 'bog pa dang / mi 'jig par bsro dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang / mi
442b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig par byams pa dang ldan pas 'khor la rjes su bston pa dang / mi 'jigs par gos dang zas dang mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad la spyod pa dang / des
442b8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa gzung bar 'gyur ba ste/ sha ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu po de dag thob po// sha ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i
443a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu yongs su 'dzin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di de sdig pa
443a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod pa yin/ de shes kyi khyi mi 'dod pa yin/ de grags pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de khyim yongs su mi 'dzin pa yin/ de khyim la ser sna med pa yin/ de gos dang zas dang mal
443a3(dkon brtsegs): cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ngan ngon tsam gyis mchog shes pa yin/ des smras pa gzung bar 'os pa yin/ lha dag kyang de drung du 'gro ba yin/ de tshul bzhin ma yin
443a4(dkon brtsegs): par rnam par rtog pa yid kyi byed pas bskyed yin/ de sangs rgyas kyi sems la sems bskyed pa yin te/ sha ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i
443a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to// sha ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi phan yon
443a6(dkon brtsegs): bcu yongs su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na gang 'di 'du 'dzin rnam par spong ba dang / rab tu dben pa la rten pa dang / de bsam gtan la sems dmigs par 'gyur ba dang /
443a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnam 'dod pa dang da'i lus bde ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / de'i tshangs par smod pa par chang du mi 'gyur ba dang / tshegs chung ngus ti
443a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin thong pa dang / des ni bu dang mi ge bstan pa rnams chud mem pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don rab tugs pa ste/ gari'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa l+h+wa
443b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag yongasu 'dzin to// sha ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams
443b2(dkon brtsegs): shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems smon lam las
443b3(dkon brtsegs): mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shar ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba yin/ ji skad
443b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de bzhin byed cing / nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ nga rgyal tshar bcad pa'i phyir zhugs shing phra dog dang / ser sna yongs su spangs pa yin/ pha rol 'byor pa la yang yid dag
443b5(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ sha ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bden par smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri ngad 'byung ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yid
443b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing / tshig 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung phun sum
443b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa te/ sha ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba'i phan yon no// sha ri'i bu bzhi pa 'di dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa
443b8(dkon brtsegs): phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gang 'di ngan 'gror skye ba rnam par spong ba ste/ 'di lta ste rnga mo dang / bgrang dang / bong bu dang / ti'i skye gnas dang / de bzhin du gzhan spad par skyes/
444a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par spong ba dang / mi smad par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan phyir rgol ba dang / mi 'ja ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i
444a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'gyur ba ste/ sha ri'i bu bzhi po dag ni/ nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shi'i'i bu bani po 'di dag ni phra dog dang ser sna dang yongs
444a3(dkon brtsegs): su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de stong pa'i sems la mi rmongs pa dang / mu ge 'byung dus na sprin bdag du 'gyur ba dang / de tshul khris
444a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'ongs nas/ khrim gyi sgo bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i stong pa dang / len pa la su yang pra dog mi byed pa dang / shi ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni phrag dog dang ser sna yod
444a5(dkon brtsegs): su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
444a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ste/ bdag 'di dag gi ched du go cha dgos nas/ 'di la bde ba sbyar bar bya ba yin na/ sems can 'di dag rang gi mthus sgrub pa'i longs spyod
444a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bde bar 'tsho ba'o zhes dga' ba bskyed pa dang / de'i longs spyod rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / chu la sogs pa dang / bgo skal la spyod pa mi 'dza' ba rnams kyis mi
444a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phrogs par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi che bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum chags pa dang / longs spyod byan sum tshogs pa bsnyed pa de'i tshe/ de la rgyal po yang
444b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur na/ sems canagazhanas sras kyang cigs/ de langs spyad dang / kun spyod pa brgyachen po la sems 'jug pa ste/ sha du bani bde dag na pa ral 'a
444b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// sha ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las yongs su mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas
444b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta yongs su 'dzin to// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing /
444b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi shing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su stong ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
444b5(dkon brtsegs): tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kun tu tshol zhing / de gang la chos nyan pa de la byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar yon tan 'di dag
444b6(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bsgrub pa de dag kun 'dri zhing / des chos de thos nas/ de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang
444b7(dkon brtsegs): su dag par skye bar ston cing / de tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ de tshul khrims yongs su dag pas gang dang gang du smon pa de dang der skyes te/ de der skyes
444b8(dkon brtsegs): nas rnaMs kyi rgyas kyi ning yongasasu dgapa la sems gas ma mas dzin sumachags pa sa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dran su ma tshogs pa
445a1(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod kun spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin te/ des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas/ gus pa dang bcas/ shes dang bcas shing
445a2(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar spyad na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa brgya chen po
445a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin ces kun zhus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang / de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen to/ gang rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
445a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya chen po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gnas dag pa ston cing / yang dag par rab tu 'chad de de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang
445a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan zhing / bya ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de mi shes pa yongs su sbyong zhing bya ba ma yin pa yongasu spong ngo // de la ye shes ni gang /
445a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni gang zhe na/ ye shes zhes bya ba ni gang dmigs pa la mi dmigs pa ni ye shes te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o// bya ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar
445a7(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'o// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de la rgyu ni gang / 'byung ba ni gang ni//
445a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyu zhes bya ba ni gang 'di tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtogs pa ste/ gang las phyin ci logs bzhi las sems can rnams gnas par 'gyur //
445b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin te/ de la tshul bzhin sbyor ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste/ 'byung ba de yang de nyid yin no// sha ri'i bu
445b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes/ zhing gi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes so// de la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang / zhing gi
445b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid ni gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam mo// zhing gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de yang ming tsam mo// gang ming tsam pa de dben par shes shing //
445b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar chos gang yang mi dmigs par de ltar shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las mi g.yo zhing / sangs rgyas
445b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongasu sbyong ngo // sha ri'i bu gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mur du bla na
445b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang brgya zhing / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/ drug
445b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa po sbyin bdag du gyur pa te/ dngos po gang phangs pa yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'dod par 'gyur ba de dag yongasu
445b8(dkon brtsegs): gtong yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / yid dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'di ltar gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
446a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub las mngon par smon pas/ yang zhus par mi 'gyur zhing / bdag gis sbyin pa chen po dang / leg pa chen po dang / bya ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par
446a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// kun 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par mi nus so snyam du rtog go// des de ltar brtags nas/ bdog pa thams cad
446a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ des rang gi lus dang srog yongs su gtang yang / yid ma bde bar mi 'gyur na/ gzhan nor gyi rnam pa dang / chung ma dang / bu pho dang / mu mo lta
446a4(dkon brtsegs): mos kyang ni dgos/ sha ri'i bu 'di la ji snyam du sems/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i tshigs 'di bstan pa de lta bu zhe na/ sha ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa'
446a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod cing / bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba yin te de'i phyir de byang chub thob pas na/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya//
446a6(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa yang rung / rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/ tshul khrims kyi bsdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la rab tu gnas
446a7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin te/ de srog gis phyir yang bslab pa las mi bda'o// gang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par bzung ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas nas/
446a8(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ bdag ni tshul khrim dang ldan pa'o zhes dga' ba rnyed cing mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ mngon par dga'
446b1(dkon brtsegs): bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/ de tshangs par spyod cing bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do// de bde bar chos mngon sum du 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul dang ldan par yang dag par
446b2(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par so sor rtog pa la gnas pa ni zab mo la bzod pa skye'o// zab mo la bzod pa skyes pa ni/ lta ba drang por 'gyur ro// nan tan byed
446b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyu ro// yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas pa ni khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bor 'gyur// de khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bas skrag par 'gyur ro//
446b4(dkon brtsegs): skrag pas 'byung ba tshol lo// 'byung ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bdag sdug bsngal ba ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ bdag gis sems
446b5(dkon brtsegs): can de dag thams cad kyi khur khyer la/ nye bar zhi ba ma gtog pa 'di dag gi bde ba'i rgyu gzhan med do snyam// de de ltar so sor rtog pa na snying rje chen po thob po// de cher snying rje ba
446b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob kyi bar du/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus mi 'dor ro// sha ri'i gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzod pa'i go cha
446b7(dkon brtsegs): gyon cing / bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin gyi/ nga rgyal gyi stobs dang ldan pas yin no// de spyod brgyad brdags/ brdegs kyang bzod pa sgrub ste/ pha rol la ma 'khrug
446b8(dkon brtsegs): gnod par mi sems so// de 'di ltar sems skyed de/ gal te bdag la sems can de dag gis ri rab tsam gyi thobs brtags shing / bskal pa bye ba'i bar du rgyud mi
447a1(dkon brtsegs): par gage yang / bdag gis gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pa ni mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni ma//
447a2(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pa/ bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la slob par 'dod pa'o snyam nas/ de ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyis bcos pa dang / brgyad pa
447a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / brdegs pa de lta de lta bur snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag bskyab par bya'o// bdag sems can 'di dag gi don du go cha bgos nas/
447a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ba yin te/ bdag gis 'di dag 'khor ba las/ yongs su thar par bya'i/ bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems dang / zhe sdang
447a5(dkon brtsegs): gi sems bskyed par ni mi bya'o snyam mo// de de ltar bzod pa'i go cha bgos pas/ phun sum tshogs pa bcu thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di rigs phun sum tshogs
447a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
447a7(dkon brtsegs): nga'i gshes gnyen phun sum tshogs dang / chos phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos la la nan tan byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas phun
447a8(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs parnyed pa dang / mthos nas kyang dad pa thob te/ sha ri'i bu bzod pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems ni/ phun sum tshogs pa bcu de dag thob bo/
447a9(dkon brtsegs): dpa'
447b1(dkon brtsegs): shi ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams shing yid dam la bstan pa yin no// de 'di
447b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gal te bdag gis sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang phyi ma'i mtha'i skal pa bye bar yang 'khor bar bya'o// zhes tshul 'di dang / brtson
447b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtsom pa 'di dang / spyod pa 'di dang / sems zhi ba 'di dang / yid dam 'di dang / dge ba'i bsam pa 'di dang / snying rje ba'i sems 'dis sems can tham
447b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi chad du/ skal pa de snyed du 'khor bar bya ste/ de ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag yongs su mi gtong ngo snyam nas/ brtson 'grus brtsom mo// yang
447b5(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gis klung gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing / rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te/ sems
447b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa rnam la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa sbyin te/ tshul 'di dang / stobs bskyed pa 'dri/
447b7(dkon brtsegs): phyi mo'i mtha'i skab pa bye bar sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang lhags pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'di
447b8(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi go tsho'i sems bskyed na/ de de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// sha ri'i bu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems
448a1(dkon brtsegs): / yon tan chos bcu 'thob te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ des byis pa'i spyod pa spangs pa yin/ des sangs rgyas spyod pa
448a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzung ba yin/ des 'khor ba la nyes par 'du shes bskyed pa yin/ des snying rje chen po yongs su bzung ba yan sngon dam bcas pa las mi 'gyur ba/
448a3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ nad nyung ba yin/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' bzhin byas pa yin/ 'dod chag dang / zhe
448a4(dkon brtsegs): sdang dang / gti mug chung ba yin/ ji ltar bstan pa'i tshig dang / yi ge rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa yin/ nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa yin te/ sha ri'i
448a5(dkon brtsegs): ru brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag thob bo// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas btsa
448a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni thugs rtse gcig pa/ rtag mnyam par bzhag pa/ bsnyel ba mi mnga'
448a7(dkon brtsegs): kha dang ldan pa'o snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa'i rjes su 'gro bar bya na/ sems g.yeng ba dang brjed nges pas ni/ gang
448a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas te/ gnas 'di thob par mi nus so// snyam nas de chags pa thams cad dang / yongasu 'dzin pa thams cad dang / thob pa dang / bkur
448b1(dkon brtsegs): ster thams cad dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong brdal la chags pa thams cad dang / grogs po dang / gA mi dang / khyim la sred thams cad yongs su btang ste sems
448b2(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ sems can thams cad ni bdag gis yongs su mi gtong ngo mnyam nas/ dgon pa rab tu dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ bse ru
448b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar gcig pu spyod cing de dgon pa rab tu dgon pa dag tu gnas nas/ phyogs gcig tu sems can rnams la byams pas khyab par byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te phyogs
448b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu kun gyi bar tshod med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do// byams pa la gnas nas/ bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa
448b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// yang sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang gis gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnam
448b6(dkon brtsegs): la// gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi skal par bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyi sti stang du byas pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba nang/ rab tu dben pa 'dod cing dgon pa la
448b7(dkon brtsegs): logs su phyogs te/ gos pa bdun por na 'di ni bsod nams ches mang du bskyed de// ches myur du byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// sha ri'i bu bcu po 'di dag ni dben pa na gnas
448b8(dkon brtsegs): shing / bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chu sems dpa'i phan yon te/ dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ blo gros dang ldan pa yin/ rtog pa dang ldan pa yin/ mos pa dang
449a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yin/ myur du spongs pa rab tu thob pa yin/ bzungs sgrub pa yin/ skye ba dang 'jig pa la mkhas pa thob pa yin/ tshul khrin
449a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po las mi nyams man/ lha rnams kyang de la rims gro byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi 'byor pa la mi 'dod pa yin te/ sha ri'i bu bcu po de dag ni dben pa la gnas shing /
449a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mkhas
449a4(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de 'di ltar shes rab gang nas byung snyam du nye bar rtog cing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa'i gnas la byung ste/ shes rab
449a5(dkon brtsegs): byung ba las chos dkar po thams cad rnam par 'phel lo snyam nas/ de shes rab la slob te/ gang 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang / sngags
449a6(dkon brtsegs): kyo gnas dang / sman gyi gnas dang / gang bya dka' ba dang / bsgrub dka' ba'i las deg thams cad la slob po// bslab nas kyang de 'di ltar sems bskyed do//
449a7(dkon brtsegs): gang 'jig rten pa'i shes rab 'di ni yid 'byung bar ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar ma yin/ 'gog par ma yin/ zhi bar ma yin/ mngon par shes pa ma
449a8(dkon brtsegs): yin/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par ma yin/ dge sbyong du ma yin/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyis/ 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab gang gis shin tu/
449b1(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar 'gyur ba'i bzo'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang / sngags rnam pa 'di lta bu dang / sman rnam pa 'ang lta bu dang / shes rab rnam pa 'di lta bu yongs su btsal lo snyam nas/ de chos tham
449b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi thog ma yongs su tshol lo// de chos thas cad kyi tho ma yongasu tshol ba na/ chos gang yang chos gang la yang nye bar 'jog pa'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yang dag
449b3(dkon brtsegs): par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rab tu zhi ba la gnas par 'gyur ro// rab tu zhi bar spyod pa la gnas nas yongasu yi mi gcod do// yongasu yi mi gcod pas/ de seMs can rnams kyi do/
449b4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ bsams bzhin du srid pa 'dzin pa ste/ sha ra ri'i bu chos drug po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stsa
449b5(dkon brtsegs): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya zhing / smon lam las mi nyams la 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas
449b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / rgyan
449b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong ngo // bdun gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongasu btong zhing / sbyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyang skyon med
449b8(dkon brtsegs): la/ tshul khrims de la rlom sems kyang med pa dang / bzod cing des la sems can de yang mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyang brtsom la lus dang ngag dang sems de yang mi dmigs pa dang /
450a1(dkon brtsegs): / ga [] ma sa/
450a2(dkon brtsegs): dodonam pa me pa da / gams thamasas pas de nas ya sa pa ste/ pa dus pa de dag dun nga chub thams dpa sngo pam la
450a3(dkon brtsegs): nga / s+'u sa kyin rgyun rnam cad kyis brdzun pa yang ma pa 'dzi / chos sbyin dang ldanan/ byang chupa sems ma na mamam
450a4(dkon brtsegs): ki sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs spyod ste/ brgyad gang zhen/ drug dag med pa dang / rgyan sbyin pa dang / sems brgya che ba dang / chos smrab la sti stang byed pa dang / gus pad
450a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa dang / 'tshob rnam par dag po dag dang / kun 'gad pa'i dang tshul can dang / bdag la mi stod cing gzhan la mi smod pa ste/ sha ri'i bu chos brgyad pa de dag nang ldan/
450a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su spyong ba 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen pa 'chos kyi rnam grangs lan
450a7(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag brgya ga// bam po gsum pa/
450a8(dkon brtsegs): ga'i bu chos dgu dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi ning yang yongs su dag par byed do// dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus
450b1(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa dang / ngag sdom pa dang / yid sdom pa dang / 'dod chags bsal ba dang / zhe sdang bsal ba dang / gti mug bsal ba dang / slu ba med pa dang / mdza' ba bstan pa
450b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brnyas pa med pa ste/ sha ri'i bu chos dgu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
450b3(dkon brtsegs): yang yongs su dag par byed do// sha ri'i bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// /
450b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thos nas/ mi 'jig shing snying rje ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying
450b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzob dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / lha rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / mi rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs snying rje
450b6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dbul ba dang / mu ge dang / rkun po dang / rang rta dang / dmag gis gnod pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba ste/ de 'di snyam ci nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
450b7(dkon brtsegs): na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yid dgas kyi yul med cing bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba phun sum tshogs
450b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can rnamam kyang tshe dpag tu med par gyur te/ nga yi ba med cing yong su 'dzin pa med la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa de lta
451a1(dkon brtsegs): bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas kyi bar du brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo // snyam du sems bskyed pa ste/ sha ri'i bu chos bcu pa
451a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las kyang mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
451a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' me tog khyer zhing / de bzhin gshegs bla'im/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten kyi drang du song nas 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ me tog 'di ji ltar dri zhim
451a4(dkon brtsegs): la/ kha dog bzang zhing lta na sdug ste/ yid du 'ong ba dang mdzes pa de bzhin du/ bdag byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang me tog sna tshogs kyi yongs su gang
451a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pas rab tu brgyan par gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ phye ma dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang khrang
451a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / byug pa dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / mu tig
451a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dung dang / man shel lam bye ru'i bar du gang ci dbul kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bsgrub pa'i don du yongasu bsngo zhing / tshu
451a8(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa de'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub par 'gyur// sha ri'i bu gzhan
451b1(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni su la yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig brjod cing / yid du 'ong ba'i tshig sha stag brjod de/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/
451b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang gis kyang yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos te/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sha stag thos par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brna
451b3(dkon brtsegs): gi bde ba yongasu mi tshol zhing / gzhan bde bas dga' bar 'dzin te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i dam pas chis
451b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bde ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par blangs shing bsgrubs ste/
451b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngos te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sad
451b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing 'byung ba'i shes rab can du 'gyuraro// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yu
451b7(dkon brtsegs): ga 'dun ru ste/ skul der skyes pa'am/ bud med pag/ khye'u / bum 'am/ sems can gang ji srid gcig des sa zang ba de thams cad nga
451b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag por ba dzi du 'jug kyis/ bral yong can thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi mig pa'i ga mi brjod cingag / bzhan dun sangs rgyas pa yig pa'i ga lasas /
452a1(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang ji snyed gcig skyes pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
452a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yong su gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thob par 'gyur ro//
452a3(dkon brtsegs): sha ri'i bu gzhan yang 'dri la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi snyed pa mi 'phrog cing / gzhan gyis thob na dga' bar 'dzin te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
452a4(dkon brtsegs): der sems can gang ji snyed gcig skyes pa de thams cad mi 'phrog pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos kyi thob pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang
452a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ su la yang rung ste/ nyes pa byang bas mi rgol la bdag nyid kyang dam pa'i chos la sbyor te/ de byang chub
452a6(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyes pa'i ming yang ye med par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni nyes pa med pa'i chos can yongs su dag
452a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shi ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos 'dod cing / chos don du gnyer la yongasu yi 'chad pa med pa'i rang gzhin can yin/
452a8(dkon brtsegs): te/ ji skad thos pa'i chos la nan tan byed pas/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa de gra thams cad chos 'dod cing chos don/
452b1(dkon brtsegs): gduganyer ba dang / yongs mi chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ ji skad du bas pa'ichos rnams la nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// sha'i tugazhan ma 'di la byang chu/
452b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' che dang / dung dang / rdza dang / 'khang dza dang / bi lang rgyud gcig pa dang / spya man dang / khar dkrol ba dang / gling bu dang / bi lang dang / khal la zhi dang /
452b3(dkon brtsegs): kim pa ka la sogs pa rol ma'i snyil snyen gyi yo byad yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
452b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sgrub pa'i don du yongasu bsngo ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyis zhing de na sil snyen brgya stong ma dkrol ma rdungs pa
452b5(dkon brtsegs): sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjed ngas pa'i sems can rnams la/ dran par 'gyur ba'i gdams ngag gis 'dem te/
452b6(dkon brtsegs): de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams bsam gtan gyi zas can du 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum
452b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa lnga brtsamA te/ bskal pa'am skal pa la lhag par chos bstan kyang / de bzhin bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa la mtha' thug pa med mod kyi/ mos pa dang lhag
452b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs bu mo dag gis gang thos na/ de yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba mdor
453a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan to// sha ri'i bu chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
453a2(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas zhing / ji ltar bsams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing / mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bag yod par gnas pa dang / ji skad du thos
453a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa dang / smon lam gyi khyad par te/ sha ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
453a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya zhing / ji ltar bsams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
453a5(dkon brtsegs): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi/
453a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni bag mchis pa la gnas so// byang chub ni nan tan la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa ni smon lan zhi gyi
453a7(dkon brtsegs): khyad par gyis 'grub po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni bag yod pa la gnas so// byang chub
453a8(dkon brtsegs): ninan tan la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyi 'grub po// sha ri'i lungs sngon ji ltar smon lam bta ba zen
453b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su grub bo// sha ri'i bu ngadag yod pa la gnas pas/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs so// sha ri'i bungs nan tan byas pas byang chub
453b2(dkon brtsegs): thob bo// sha ri'i bu bag med par gnas shing tshigs gi las lhur len pa dang / nan tan med pas ni/ nyan thos kyi sa yang sgrub par mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
453b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub lta ci smos te/ sha ri'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i ming du gdags par dam bca' bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas byang chub
453b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bslab par bya'o// de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong so so'i stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/
453b5(dkon brtsegs): kun gyis kyang 'grin gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bsla
453b6(dkon brtsegs): par bgyi'o// nan tan gyis yongs su 'grub par bgyi'o// bag mchis par gnas par bgyi'o// smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun
453b7(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// ji ltar bsams pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//
453b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoM ldan 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu
454a1(dkon brtsegs): gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di skad du seng ge'i sgra spogs pa'i rigs
454a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'di dag thams cad bskal pa brgya zag/
454a3(dkon brtsegs): stong 'das nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu dper na seng zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sha stagasang
454a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang / gzhan du 'byung bas ngas gzigs pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs de dag kyang / ming smon lam bkod pa zhes bya ba sha stag tu sangs rgyas
454a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzhan dang / gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
454a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med par 'gyur te/
454a7(dkon brtsegs): tshad ni ma rtogs so gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi tshe'i tshad ji rtsam zhig tu 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa
454a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag che re zhing yang / de'i tshe'i ched bskal pa bcu bcur 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ming ge'i stsal gyis mngon par grags
454b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra zhes byag 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo grayas pa'i lha ngas la
454b2(dkon brtsegs): rmugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das
454b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jal dpal gzhan
454b4(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa 'di yun ji srid gcig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ji lta bu
454b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig tu 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i stsal gyis mngon par sgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka'
454b6(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i stsal gyi mngon
454b7(dkon brtsegs): bar spags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ji srid gcig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
454b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chungs da par rdzogs par 'ayang brgya bar 'gyur/ 'das dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi pa khyod kyim la bol mi yod can med pa yang dag par rdzo
455a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gyung chub tu yang dag par zhugs sa ma 'on te ma zhugs zhes dris shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe// rigs kyi bu gal nye la ba byang chub tu yang dag par
455a2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs na ni/ de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'chang yang brgyan/ kho bo yang dag par zhugs pa med pas/ mngon par 'chang brgya par ji ltar 'gyur smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod sems
455a3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi don du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ma zhugs sam/ sbas pa rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can
455a4(dkon brtsegs): dmig su med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gal te kho bos sems can zhig dmigs na ni de'i phyir kho bo yang de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' 'jug na/ rigs kyi bu ga
455a5(dkon brtsegs): gi phyir sems can yang med/ srog kyang med/ gang zag kyang med pa de'i phyir/ kho bo 'jug pa med de// ldog pa med do// smras pa 'jam dpal khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos la ma
455a6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs sam/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhus pa ste/ chos gang zag pa med cing khongs su
455a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa med la mtshan ma med cing / mtshan nyid med pa de ni sangs rgyas su zhugs pa yin te/ chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas su zhugs pa de dang 'dra bas/ sangs rgyas
455a8(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa de dang 'dra ba med do// rigs kyi bu gang yang khyod kyis 'di skadadu/ khyo sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don du ma zhugs zhes smras pa// de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar/
455b1(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa bzhin du lung ston gcig/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs byang chub tu smon tam/ 'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam gzugs de bzhin nyid dam/
455b2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub tu smon/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs byang chub mngon par rdzog
455b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang brgya'am/ 'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi da
455b4(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'am/ smras pa 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ gzugs byang chub tu smon pa med do// garma/
455b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang / gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi chos nyid ni byang
455b6(dkon brtsegs): chub tu smon pa med do// gzugs ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi brgya ste/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o//
455b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnams par shes pa byang chub tu smon tam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du
455b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di byang chub tu sman tam/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji sum du sems/ rnams par shes pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang brgya'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi
456a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngan par rdzogs bya 'chang brgya'am/ sbas da'adam dpal ni ma yin te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'dubyed rnams dpan
456a2(dkon brtsegs): bar shes pa'i byang chub tu smon pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'angabyang chub tu smon pa med do// rnam par shes pa ni byang tub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi brgya
456a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ma brgya'o// smras pa rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po dag las phyi rol tu bdag
456a4(dkon brtsegs): gam/ bdag gi zhes bya bar ba dgas par nus sam spras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar yin na/ byang chub tu smon pa'i chos de gang zhig yod
456a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ma ngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa yang gang zhig yod/ smras pa 'jam dpal khyod lta bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gis dbang du gyur
456a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ tshad mar gyur pas kho bo byang chub tu smon pa med do// kho bo mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi brgya'o zhes bshad na/ bstan pa de thos nas byang chub sems dpa' las da
456a7(dkon brtsegs): bo rnams skrag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni drug pa med pa ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni skrag pa med pa'o// skrag sa med bya ba
456a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'ang chos ston te/ gang skrag pa de ni skyo bar 'gyur ro// gang skyo bar 'gyur ba 'i ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gang 'dod chags dang bral ba /
456b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol lo// garnam par grol ba de ni bcings pa med par 'gyur ro// gabacings pa med pa de ni chags pa med par 'gyur ro// gang chags pa med pa de ni 'gro ba med do//
456b2(dkon brtsegs): gang 'gro ba med pa de ni 'ong ba med do// gang 'ong ba med pa de ni smon pa med do// gang smon pa med pa de ni smon lam 'debs pa med do// gang smon lam 'debs pa med pa de ni ldogro
456b3(dkon brtsegs): ba med do// gang ldog pa med pa de ni phyir ldog te/ ci las phyir ldog ce na/ bdag du 'dzin pa las phyir ldog go/ sems du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag
456b4(dkon brtsegs): du 'dzin pa dang / chad par 'dzin pa dang / rtags par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa las phyir mi ldog go// rnam par rtog pa las phyir mi ldog go/ rnam par rtog pa
456b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ldog pa de'i tshe/ 'gyur ba med pas phyir mi ldog ste/ gang las phyir mi ldog ce na/ stong pa nyid las phyir mi ldog go// mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
456b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog go// de la gang las phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bral ba med pa ni sa
456b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnam so// khongs su rtogs pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// dmigs pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// len pa med pa ni sa
456b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnapas// dor ba med pa ni sangs rgyas chos rnam so// rgyu ba med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa dang / mang tsam du zad pa dang / snang ba dang / ma skyes pa dang /
457a1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'gags pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rdul
457a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / rdul dang bral ba dang / bdag gi ba med pa dang / yid la bya ba med pa dang / mi ldan pa med pa dang / zad pa med pa dang / blangs pa med pa dang / mnyam pa dang /
457a3(dkon brtsegs): mi mnyam pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa de dag ni chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin
457a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag las gang las 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// zhes bya bar brjod pa ni gnas mi dmigs so// rigs kyi bu byang chub
457a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' las dang po pa gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ 'jigs par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
457a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o// gang 'jigs par ma gyur pa de dag ni/ ci'ang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang brgya par mi 'gyur ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal
457a7(dkon brtsegs): ci las bsams shing de skad du snyan/ smras pa rigs kyi bu gang 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni rnam par rtog par 'gyur te/ gang rnam par rtog pa de dag ni 'di snyam du/
457a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par bya'o snyam pas/ de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa ji snyed du
457b1(dkon brtsegs): skyed par 'gyur ba de snyed du mngon par rdzogs par 'chang brgya'o// gang dag de lta bu'i sems mi bskyed pa de dag ni/ byang chub tu dmigs pa med cing sems kyi rloms
457b2(dkon brtsegs): sems su mi byed de/ byang chub kyi sems su dmigs pa med pas rnam par rtog pa med do// gang dag go tshe rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe ci yang mngon par rdzogs pa
457b3(dkon brtsegs): 'chang brgya pa med do// ci'i phyir ci yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya ba med ce na/ byang chub de mi dmigs pas de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'chang brgya ma
457b4(dkon brtsegs): med do// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ na mkha'i khams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya 'am/ smram pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no//
457b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam par bstan mod/ smras pa 'jam dpal de de bzhin
457b6(dkon brtsegs): no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ na mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin byang chub ji lta bar na mkha' yang de bzhin te/ nam mkha' dang byang
457b7(dkon brtsegs): chub de ni/ gnyis su sod de gnyis byud med// gang gis de lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid shes pa de ni cung zad kyang shes pa med la/ de ma shes pa gang yang med do//
457b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong nyis stong nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha dang mi khri bzhi stang chos
458a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi ming rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go// srog chags dgu khri drug stong gis sngon ma skyed pa las bla na med pa yang
458a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri nyos stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas
458a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
458a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid gcig nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs
458a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu kha rog chos rnam ma skyes pa la bdag rnams ngar rtog tu gzhug/ rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bdag gi
458a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyir spyad par bya'o zhes zer na de nyid de'i log par lta ba chen por 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis sems gang gis sems gang byang chub tu bskyed
458a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ de ltar bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir sems de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ byang chub tu yang sems ma skyed
458a8(dkon brtsegs): do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal rjes su ma mthong zhes bya ba tshig de'i don gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhes/
458b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid bstan par/ smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir mnyam pa nyid ces bya/ smras pa rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni gang la tha dad pa med pa ste
458b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid des chos thams cad 'di lta ste dben pa'i tshul du chul gcig tu bstan pas gcig tu brjod cing / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par bya
458b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag pa dang / nga yi ba med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i phyir
458b4(dkon brtsegs): chos bston cing / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos de lta bu mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang /
458b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos khong du chud pa de ni/ khams la tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi thong / gcig tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ni mnyam
458b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid do// mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa'o// mi mnyam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa nas dag pa'o// de na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sem
458b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po seng ge'i stsal gyi mngon par sgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni/ 'di ji srid cig nas ngas
458b8(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de zhes bgyi bar mi bston te/ 'khor 'di dag ni nyan par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam
459a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni/ zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ de yang ji tsam du byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ sem/
459a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi dmigs pa de tsam du zab pa'i bzod pa dang ldan te/ des byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs pas/ ngas 'di ji srid gcig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do// /
459a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar mi bston/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yun ring po ji srid cig nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
459a4(dkon brtsegs): par bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs pa brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag bdun 'das pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches
459a5(dkon brtsegs): pha rol de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug snga'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su
459a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams bston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig
459a7(dkon brtsegs): byung / sangs rgyas kyini 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyonang ga ga'i bu bye phrag dgu bcun gnyis kyi khyim snyed 'das pa na/ 'ag rten ci
459a8(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba bzang po zhes bya bar gyur te/ de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba de chos ston to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos
459b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brgya bcu rtsa bzhir 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa ni de'i nyis 'gyur du 'gyur de de rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi
459b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/ rigs kyi bu rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya ba de'i bu dang / chung ma dang / gnyen 'dab dang / 'khor/
459b3(dkon brtsegs): du bcas pas las gzhan med cing skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang
459b4(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa de la/ lo brgya khri bzhi stong du zhal zas kyi rnam pa kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / na bza' sar pa sar pa gzhan dang gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / pho grang
459b5(dkon brtsegs): khang pa rtsegs sar sar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / rims gro pa kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / bde bar sbyar pa thams cad kyis rim 'gror byas par
459b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de ltar lo brgya khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu de gcig pu dben pa na gnyis su med par 'dug 'dug pa'i yid la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems skyes pa 'gyur
459b7(dkon brtsegs): te bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang ba mngon par 'dus byas kyang / de dag nges par med pa'i sems kyi 'dus byas na/ de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang yongs su bsngo bar/
459b8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o snyams nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du bsngongam/ tshangs par bsngo'am/ 'khor los sgyur bar bsngo'am/ nyan thos su bsngo'am/
460a1(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas su bsngo'am/ gang du bsnga snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu rgyal de'i sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu/ steng gi bar las lnga mang pos sgra/
460a2(dkon brtsegs): sbags pa rgyal po chen po de ltar dma' ba'i sems ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyed kyis bsod nams kyi phung po yangs pa byas kyis/ rgyal po chen po bla na med pa
460a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems skyed gcig ces byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal po na mkha' de dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes par 'gyur te/
460a4(dkon brtsegs): des 'di snyam du bsamaso// bdag ni byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha rnams kyis bdag gis sems yongasu shes te/ sgra bsgrags so snyam mo// rig kyi bu de
460a5(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyal po na mkha' de srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya bcu sa yongs su bkor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyang
460a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyog gcig tu 'dod//
460a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan
460a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshig su bcad nas gsol ba/ khyod kyi spyan ngar dam chos zhu// skyes bu'i dam pa mchog skye ba// rnam gang gis 'gyur ba de// rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsungs// rnam 'dren khyed
460b1(dkon brtsegs): la mngon sum du// mchod pa yangs pa bgyid bgyid kyang // mangs sems kyis bgyis gyur gyi// gang yang yongasu bsngo ma bgyis// bdag ni gcig pu dben gnas tshe// 'di 'dra'i
460b2(dkon brtsegs): sems shing skyes par gyur// bdag gis bsod nams cher bsags na// ji ltar yongasu de bsngos snyam// tshang par bsde 'am brgya byin nam// gling bzhi'i dbang phyug thob par ram//
460b3(dkon brtsegs): 'on te nyan thos dngos por ram// rang rgyal thob pa'i phyir bsde snyam// de ltar sems ni skyed ma thag/ lha rnams sgra 'byin brjod pa ni// dma' ba'i sems kyis bsod nams
460b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di/ rnam par chud bsod ma byed gcig/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// smon lam brlabs can gdab par gyis/ byang chub sems rab skyed byas shing / 'jig rten rnam
460b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi don kyang gyis// de bas chos kyi dbang phyug gtso// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag zha ste// thub pa ji ltar sems bskyed na// rdzogs pa'i byang chub skye bar 'gyur// ye shes de ni gang
460b6(dkon brtsegs): gis 'thob// don de bdag la bstan du gsol// byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyis shing // thub pa khyod 'dra bdag kyang smon// de'i tshig de gsan gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pas
460b7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po shes par gyis// rims kyis khyod la bstan par bya// chos rnams thams cad rkyen bzhin te/ 'dun pa'i rtsa la rab tu gnas// rang gi smon la
460b8(dkon brtsegs): btab pa// de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// rgyal po ngas kyang sngan chad ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed gyur// sems can kun la phan don du// ngas ni smon lam
461a1(dkon brtsegs): dam pa btag// smon lam ji ltar btab tshul tu// ngas ni 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// byang chub dam pa ngas thob pa nga'i bsam pa rdzogs par 'grub
461a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bstan gyis la// mi 'gyur sems na bskyed par gyis// gal te spyod pa spyad byas na// khyod kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur// thub pa'i gsungs de thos gyur
461a3(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rgyal po de ni dga' bar gyur// 'jig rten kun gyi mngon sum du// seng ge'i nga ri'i tshig 'di brjod// 'khor ba'i tha ma med pa yi// sngon gyi tha ma ji srid pa/ de srid sems ma
461a4(dkon brtsegs): phan don du// spyod pa dpag yas spyad par bya// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga 'dir// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// 'gro ba thams cad 'gron gnyer te// dbul zhing phod
461a5(dkon brtsegs): las dgrol bar bya// de ring phan chad gal te yang // bdag gis 'dod chags sems bskyed na// phyogs bcu gang na gzhug pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad smras par 'gyur//
461a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub nam zhig thob bar du// tha ba'i sems dang gnod sems dang // phrag dog dang ni ser sna yang // de ring chud mi bya'o// tshangs pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad// sdig pa'i/
461a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa yongasu btang // tshul khrims bsdom dang nges pa la/ sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bya// bdag ni byang chub rings tshul du// 'chang rgyar mos shing spro bar byed// phyi
461a8(dkon brtsegs): mthar thug gi bar du yang // sems can gcig phyir spyad par bya// tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing ni sbyang bar bya// phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad du//
461b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi ming ni thos par bya// bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te// sangs rgyas 'gyur bar dogs pa med// bdag gis lhag bas ma rnam par dag/ bdag dbang 'din
461b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa rnams// lus dang ngag gi las rnams kyang // rnam pa kun tu bdag gis spang // yid kyi las kyang sbyang bar bya// mi dge ba'i las ni spyad mi bya// ma 'ongs
461b3(dkon brtsegs): dus na sangs rgyas te// 'jig rten mgon du gyur zhe na// bden pa des nas 'di yang / rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur gcig/ bdag gis bden tshig gang brjod pa/
461b4(dkon brtsegs): ma nor yang dag smra shes na// bden pa des ni mkha' dbyings las// sil snyan dag gi sgra sgrogs shog/ bdag la gal te g.yo med cing // de bzhin thab med ce na/
461b5(dkon brtsegs): man dang ba'i me tog bzang // bden pa des ni char du phog/ yang dag don du nges pa yi// tshig bden de skad brjod pa de// phyogs bcu mtha' yas thams cad kyi//
461b6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// de yid mod la mkha' dbyings nas// sil snyan bye ba'i sgra yang byung // me tog man der po dag/ mi 'greng bdun srid bab par 'gyur/
461b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po de'i rjes brlabs te// srog chags bye ba nyi shu yi// 'dren par bdag cag 'gyur smod ces// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang sgrags// de ltar srog chags bye ba khrag/
461b8(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu po rnams thams cad kyang / rgyal po mchog gi rjes slob cing // byang chub tu zhugs par gyur// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe des dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
462a1(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' zhes bya ba/ byung ba de bzhin zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal/
462a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rna mkha' zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis byang chub tu sems
462a3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed phyin cad/ skal grang ga'i klung grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das par gyur to// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas kyang / skal pa gang ga'i
462a4(dkon brtsegs): klung drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das par gyur to// de nas nye bar bzung nas 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongasu rdzogaso// 'dis byang chub sems
462a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa bcu yongasu rdzogaso// 'dis sangs rgyas kyi sa yongasu rdzogaso// 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs te/ bar 'ga' yang des bdag
462a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang brgya par 'gyur ram/ mi 'gyur snyam pa'i sems cig kyang bskyed pa ma gyur to// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
462a7(dkon brtsegs): 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar/ rgyal po de dang lhan gcig tu byang chub tu se so bskyed pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu po de dag thams cad kyang bla na
462a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don tu yang
462b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas nas na sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das su/ de dag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
462b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dis/ sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud do// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la yang dag par btsud do//
462b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la yang bsnyen bkur dang / yongs su spyad par byas so// thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos bzung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ma rtogs pa ni sangs rgyas
462b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi'i klung bzhi khri bzhi stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod do//
462b5(dkon brtsegs): de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshad me pa dang / sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par gzhugs pa ste de da ltar yang gzhugs zhing
462b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshol bzhes so// sngon 'byung lde'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas
462b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gal te de ltar khyod
462b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang yongasu rdzogs/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang yongs su rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kyis yang yongs su rdzogs/ sangs rgyas
