463a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs na/ ci'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi brgya/
463a2(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par sgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs
463a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs na/ yang dang khang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des byang chub thob par gyur pas/
463a4(dkon brtsegs): thob zin pa ni bzod pa thob par mi bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs shes bya ba ji lta bu/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs pa
463a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs pa'o// na mkha' yongasu rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs pa'o//
463a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na mkha' dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyisu dbyer med do// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yong su rdzogapa
463a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yin/ zhes de skad zer ba la/ gang gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gang tshe ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang rnam par shes pa yongasu rdzogs pa de
463a8(dkon brtsegs): ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gzugs yongasu rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
463b1(dkon brtsegs): gang rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu/ smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gzugs kyi rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa/
463b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de ni ma mthong ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos gang rtag pa yang ma yin/ mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa de la yongs su rdzogs pa 'am
463b3(dkon brtsegs): 'grib par 'gyur ba yod dam/ smras pa 'jam dpal de ni med do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos gang yongasu rdzogs pa yang med/ 'grib pa/
463b4(dkon brtsegs): yang med pa de ni yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// smras pa ci chos yongasu rdzogs shes bya/ smras pa des chos ji ltar shes pa de ltar ye shes 'jug par 'gyur te/
463b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe ye shes 'jug par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mi rtag rnam par mi rtog go// gang che mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe/ yongasu rdzogs pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa med
463b6(dkon brtsegs): do// gang yongasu rdzogs pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa med de// gang yongasu rdzogs pa 'am/ 'grib pa med pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ gzugs
463b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mnyam pa nyid
463b8(dkon brtsegs): bcod pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa yong su rdzogs pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rgyal gyis mngon par spags pa'i skas
464a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de ltar khyod yun ring po nas bzod pa thob kyang // bdag
464a2(dkon brtsegs): gis byang chub thob par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang skye ba med na/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis/ ji ltar sems can gzhan dag byang chub la yang dag par
464a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzud par bya/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can gang yang byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// sems can med pa dang / sems
464a4(dkon brtsegs): can dben pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gang gis sems can dmigs pa des ni/ byang chub kyang dmigs/ gang gis byang chub dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub la sems
464a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams yang dag par 'dzud par byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis mchi byang chub kyang ma dmigs/ sems can kyang ma dmigs pas/ de ltar byang chub la
464a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams 'dzud par mi byed do// mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub tu smon pa byed pa yang med/ de las ldog pa yang med do// de phyir zhe na/ monyam nyid la
464a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog pa med pas/ de ltar mnyam pa nyid la smon pa med/ ldog pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed rnams la gang nas kyang 'ong ba dang / gang du yang
464a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba med de/ de ni mnyam pa nyid do// rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bye ba 'di ni/ stong pa nyid kyi tshig ste/ stong pa nyid la smon pa gang yang med do// rigs kyi bu
464b1(dkon brtsegs): gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ da ltar yun po nas bzod pa thob nas/ ci'i phyir bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par bya'o zhes bya bar sems
464b2(dkon brtsegs): mi skyed ces zer ba ni rigs kyi bu khyod sems can dag gi byang chub thob par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa 'jam dpal de ni ma mthong ste/ de ci'i
464b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ sems la gzugs med cing bstan du med pas/ byang chub kyang ming tsam ste/ yid las 'byung ba ma yin pas/ byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ sems can shes
464b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni ming tsam ste/ ming gang yin pa de ni dben zhing byed pa med pa'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bus de las bsam nas/ bdag gis byang chub ji ltar thob par bya snyam
464b5(dkon brtsegs): du sems skyed pa med do// zhes smras pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems de ni ma skyes pa ste/ ma skyes pa la skye ba med do// gang skye ba med pa de la thob pa dang /
464b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rtogs par bya ba gang zhing yod/ smras pa 'jam dpal mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ smras pa rigs kyi bu gang chos thams cad la rlom sems
464b7(dkon brtsegs): med cing mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa 'di ni/ mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar rdul tsam gyis 'du shes kyang mi bskyed mi 'gog pa de ltar rtog pa de ni mngon pa
464b8(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni rnam par mi rtog ste/ de ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba zhug te/ mnyam pa nyid la tshwa gang yang mi dmig zhi
465a1(dkon brtsegs): yid dgas pas gcig pa 'ag/ 'dud par byad sa rnam sems su mabyed pa ma man par rtogs pa zhes byar/ chom thams
465a2(dkon brtsegs): cad gang 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing shes kyang lus la yang mngon par zhen pa med/ sems la yang mngon pa zhen/
465a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa 'di ni/ mngon par rtog pa thob pa zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal thob pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ni rgyu ba med pa'i tshig ste/ de'i
465a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir thob pa zhes bya'o// de'i rgyu ba khams gsum na tha snyad du 'di yin no// zhes stan du med de/ 'phags pa rnams kyi thob pa gang yin pa de ni brjod par mi nus
465a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na chos de ni gnas med cing rgyu ba med pas na/ de'i phyir brjod par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de ni thob pa med pa las/ thob pa'i sgra
465a6(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa ste/ de ni chos gang yang thob pa yang ma yin pas/ de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o// 'phag pa dkon mchog rtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong
465a7(dkon brtsegs): brag brgya pa// bam bzhi pa ste tha ma// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub ses sadapa'
465a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par spags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di yi sa
465b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
465b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par sgrags pa
465b3(dkon brtsegs): sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur
465b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang byang chub la mngon par dga' ba de la dris shig/ smras pa 'jam dpal khyod byang chub la mngon par dga' ba ma yin nam/ smras pa/
465b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang mngon par dga' ba de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni sred pa'o// sred pa gang la yod pa de ni skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba
465b6(dkon brtsegs): zhab pa yod pa de la nar ba yang / gang ma tshor ba med pa de la 'byung ba med de/ rigs kyi khri lta bas na kha ba byang chub la mngon par dga' med de/ byang chub
465b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa med pas// de'i phyir mngon par dga' ba med do// rigs kyi bu de lnga mang kyi/ 'on kyang gang khyod kyis 'di skad du khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi nang ga
465b8(dkon brtsegs): tan pakod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ de la bdag gi bdag bsnyen par mi nus te/ deci'i phyi zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsas thams cad thugs su
466a1(dkon brtsegs): chud pa mngon du bzhugs bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bdag nyid kyi brjod na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
466a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po'i bdag stong du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jas dpal khyod kyis khyod nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkad
466a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i smon lam ston gcig de bzhin gshegs pas gan no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod las smon lam de dag thob nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzha
466a4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang / sprod pa de lta bu yongasu rdzogs par byed do// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la slar mi ldog ste/
466a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi thus bstan par bgyi'o// de nas 'jab dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i
466a6(dkon brtsegs): ngas la gtsug nas/ bcom ldan 'das dro gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
466a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don tu gnyer ba dag bdag la nyan cing smon lam de dag thos nas kyang yongs rdzogs par bgyid la/
466a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid na/ bdag gis bstan par 'byol// de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ldangs la gcugs ma thag tu
466b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas skad gcig de la phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khas gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal
466b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag brgya stong ma mchis pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
466b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis smon lam btab pa ni/ nam bdag gis phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas bltas na/
466b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdag gis byang chub la yang dag par btsud pa dang / bdag gis byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa dang /
466b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud pa dang / de bzhin du bdag gis tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab
466b6(dkon brtsegs): kha yang dag par btsud pa dang / bdag gis bskal ba dang / bdag gis rjes su bstan par gyur par ma mthong ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
466b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang brgya bar mi bya'am/ nam bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcur rnam par ltas kyang /
466b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid la ma bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu gang yang mthong bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
467a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'dang brgya'o// zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab po// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas/ byang chug
467a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' la la 'di snyam sems par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed gcig mthong bar/
467a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sems kyi rtogs thugasu chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
467a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i stsal gyis mngon par skyugs pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper ka skyes
467a5(dkon brtsegs): gang la la zhig skyes par gyur te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdul phrag rab tu blags shing gshag ste/ thal
467a6(dkon brtsegs): bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems rdul phrag rab kyi rdul de dag rtsis shes pa'am/ rtsis la shin tu mkhas pa dag gis/ brgya phrag
467a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyed mod do zhe 'am/ stong phrag 'di snyed gcig yod de ge 'am/ brgya stong phrag 'ad snyed gcig yod do zhe'am/ bye ba phrag 'di snyed cig
467a8(dkon brtsegs): zhe'am/ bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed gcig yod do zhe 'am/ bye ba brgya stong phrag 'di snyed gcig yod do zhe'am/ bye ba 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhes
467b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'am/ bgrang ba'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ tshad bzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni
467b2(dkon brtsegs): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ sangs rgyas kyis spyan sgrib pa med pas rnam par ltas na/
467b3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
467b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig la gang ga'i klung du ma'i bye ma snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas
467b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing tsam gyis mtha' gru yangs par yongs su ma gru cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i phyir ni rin po che brgya stong 'bum phrag du ma las grub pa dang / rin
467b6(dkon brtsegs): po che brgya stong 'bum phrag du mas smras pa/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam du ma gyur kyi bar du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
467b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'chang brgya par smon lam btab po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
467b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams phyogs bcu'i tshad tsam gyi byang chub kyi shing skyes te/ byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad rgyas zhing khyab par gyur cig ces
468a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi bar smon las de skad btab bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gis byang chub kyi shing de'i drung na 'dug 'dug pa'i tshe// bu med pa/
468a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du/ byang chub kyi shing drung des nas ma langs
468a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang kha dag gi sprul pa phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos paste/
468a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur gcig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
468a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi ming tsam yang ye med par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang dang / tha ba dang / 'chab pa med tshangs pa'i smod pa yongasu dag par spyod pa sha stag gis
468a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gang la sangs rgyas rgyas kyi zhing de na/ bud med kyi ming yang ma grag cing / mngal du skye ba med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kya
468a7(dkon brtsegs): gos ngur srig gyon cing / dkyil mo dkrung bcas pas rdzus te byang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de shin tu dag par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa phyogs bcu
468a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag grangs med par gshegs shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa de dag theg pa gsum lnga
468b1(dkon brtsegs): brtsams te/ mos pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston pa ma rtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas med cing
468b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas yongasu gang bar gyur gcig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
468b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub mngon
468b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs kun tu gzigs
468b5(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin bzhin gshegs pa de ci'i phyir kun tu gzigs pa zhes zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshe
468b6(dkon brtsegs): pa kun tu gzigs pa des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa kun gyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
468b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de dang / sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
468b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu da ltar byung ba'i dus sam/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
469a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan gang gis thob pa de dag ni/ mi 'gyur ba la zhugs pa dang /
469a2(dkon brtsegs): mos pa chung ba'i gang zag rnams ma rtogs par/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pas de'i
469a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
469a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni de bzhin gshegs 'od dpag med kyi dga' ba'i zas dang ldan par 'gyur bar smon lam mdzad pa lta bu'ang ma lags ste//
469a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi kyang zhing der/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag/ kha zas kyi 'du shes zhig skyes
469a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na de ma thag tu skad cig de la de dag gi lag pa g.yas par ro bro ba brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyis gang ba'i snor mngon 'byung bar 'gyur la/
469a7(dkon brtsegs): snod de dag byung ma thag tu/ de dag 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lam phul/ sems can dbul
469a8(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'phongs pas sdug bsngal ba dang / mgon med par gyur pa dag dang / yis dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa gang dag lo stong phrag du mar 'chil ma
469b1(dkon brtsegs): thal ba dga' yang mi snyed pa de lta bu nga yongs su tshim par ma byas par bdag nyid kyi bza' ba ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o// zhes bgyi bar dran pa thob par gyur
469b2(dkon brtsegs): cing / de'i mod la de dag mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su grub par 'gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing na mkha' las 'chi ba dang / rlung ltar thogs pa ma mchis
469b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten na dkon la/ sngan chad ma mthong zhing mi srid pa sha stag ste/ de dag gi mi brjod na yang lo bye ba brgya stong thogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
469b4(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin po che dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongasu gang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la byang chub sems dpa' la la zhigasangs rgyas
469b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhi dwe ga ser las grub par mthong bar dga'o snyam na yang de gser las grub par mthong ba dang / dngul las grub par mthong bar dga' bo snyam na yang / dngul
469b6(dkon brtsegs): las grub par mthong la/ gzhan gyis gser las grub par mthong ba ma mchis par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bai dUr+ya las grub pa dang / shes las grub
469b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / mu tig dmar po las grub pa dang / rdo'i snying po las grub pa dang / spu las grub pa dang / de bzhin du rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las grub pa dang / can dan
469b8(dkon brtsegs): las grub pa'am/ a ka ru las grub pa 'am/ ta ga ra las grub pa 'am/ ta ma li'i lo ma las grub pa 'am/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las grub pa'am/ tsan
470a1(dkon brtsegs): dan dmar po las grub pa 'am/ su rnam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa de dag gis de bzhin du mthong ste/ phan tshun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha
470a2(dkon brtsegs): dad par mthong ba yang ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub kyi shing de las 'od byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rang dang las 'od byung bas
470a3(dkon brtsegs): snang zhing gsal ba ma rtogs par nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi mngon/ skar ma dang / rin po che dang / zhugs dang / klog gam sems can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi
470a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon pa dang / gang ji tsam du 'od kyi khyab par dga' ba/ tha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag de snyed du de dag gi 'od kyis gsal bar 'gyur te sa
470a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyed par gyis/ me tog kha bye ba dang / kha zums par 'gyur ba dang / gang dus dang / tshod rnam pa ji lta/
470a6(dkon brtsegs): bur yongs su spyad par 'tshal ba de bzhin du de'i 'grub pa ma rtogs par nyin mtshan gyi ming ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de grang ba dang / tshab ma mchis
470a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba ma mchis te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du/
470a8(dkon brtsegs): 'chi zhing dga' ldan gyi gnas su tshe bas par bgyis nas/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i steng gi bar snang las se
470b1(dkon brtsegs): snyan ltar mi 'da' ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sgra 'byin pa dang / sil stan de dag las kyang 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sgra mi 'byung gi
470b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / sang+yas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi
470b3(dkon brtsegs): sba 'byin par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bur mos pa'i sgra de lta bu thos par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshes/
470b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de la lta bar 'tshal na/ 'chag gam/ 'gro 'am/ 'ong ngam/ sdod dam/ mchis kyang rung ste/ gang dag der sangs rgyas lta ba'i yid la bgyi ba'i sems skyed
470b5(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzig pa byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa te/
470b6(dkon brtsegs): de nyid na gzhugs par mthong bar 'gyur gcig/ mthong nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das ma thag tu/ de dag gis the tshom 'am/ nem nur ram/ yid gnyis
470b7(dkon brtsegs): sa ma/ chos kyi som nyi gang ci mchis pa yongs su chad par 'gyur te/ bstan mi 'tshal bar chos kyi tshig de'i don shugs kyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
470b8(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams grangs dang chad ma mchis pa dag tu phyin nas/ kha zas de las de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang phul/ sems
471a1(dkon brtsegs): can phongs shing ldogs pa dang / mgon ma mchis pa rnams dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams kyang yongs
471a2(dkon brtsegs): tshis par bgyis nas de dag la chos bstan te/ skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyis zhing der slar mchis par gyur ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad
471a3(dkon brtsegs): btab po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis ni bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'
471a4(dkon brtsegs): gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag gos rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod dang ldan par gyur te/ bsams pa tsam gyis ci la dga' ba'i gos rin po che ge sbyong gi chu
471a5(dkon brtsegs): dang mthun par rung ba dog byung bar gyur la/ gos rin po che de dag byung ma thag tu 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis gos 'di lta bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
471a6(dkon brtsegs): ma phul bar bdag cag nyid kyis yongasu spyad pa ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o snyam pa'i dran pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag gi sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams chad ma mchi
471a7(dkon brtsegs): grangs ma mchis pa dag tu mchis shing gas de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par dka' ste/ slang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mchis nas ci dga' ba'i gos rin po
471a8(dkon brtsegs): la spyod par gyur gcig ces bgyi bar smon de skad btab po// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi longs spyod pa
471b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyod pa gang ji snyed gcig mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas bdag la phul nas/ slad kyis bdag
471b2(dkon brtsegs): cag yongasu spyod par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni mi khos pa brgyad ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni mi dge 'i sgra mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
471b3(dkon brtsegs): de na sdug bsngal gyi sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na skyon du 'gyur ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang /
471b4(dkon brtsegs): ro dang / reg pa yid du mi 'ongs pa ma mchis par gyur cig ces bgyi ba smon lam btab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
471b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par sgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang du gshegs bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshogs pa
471b6(dkon brtsegs): kun tu gzigs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ce zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ smon lam ji lta ba ba
471b7(dkon brtsegs): du yongs su rdzogs shing dag la rdul med pa brtsams pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams/
471b8(dkon brtsegs): de phyogs gang logs shig ces 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de ni lho phyogs logasu 'byung
472a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'di nyid kyang de'i nang du 'dus shing khongasu chud par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam
472a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni smon lam 'di ltar btab te/ bdag gi sangs rgyas
472a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de rin po che'i bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gang zhing nor bu rin po che du mas spras pas nor bu rin po che kun tu bstan pa 'dra la rin po che de//
472a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang phyogs bcu'i yongasu 'tshal bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam btab po// de na 'khor de byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag
472a5(dkon brtsegs): du mas 'grin gcig tu smras pa/ gang 'di kun gzigs pa zhes bya ba mtshan de ni tshul dang 'dra ba ste/ sems can gang dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
472a6(dkon brtsegs): pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag kyang snyed pa legs par snyed pa yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ gang dag
472a7(dkon brtsegs): gas khung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nun gyur pa'i ming thas pa de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas mngon
472a8(dkon brtsegs): du mthong bar lta'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag
472b1(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu gang dag gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi mtshan brjod pas ni/ gang gi 'jam dpal gzhon
472b2(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa'i ming brjod na/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan brjod
472b3(dkon brtsegs): ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bskal pa re re zhing sems can gyi don ji snyed du byas pa'i sems can gyi
472b4(dkon brtsegs): don de ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum kyis kyang ma mdzod do// de nas 'khor de'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin da/
472b5(dkon brtsegs): namakha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas 'grin gcig tu 'di skad ces smas so// 'jam dang
472b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad ces brjod pa dang / de'i mod la srog chags
472b7(dkon brtsegs): byeb khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya bcu brtsa bzhis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// sems can tshad med pa dang /
472b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon
473a1(dkon brtsegs): sdigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams ma rtogs par
473a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis na 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
473a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhugs rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
473a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyan dang / smon lam gyi rgyan dang / mtshan nyid dang / mtshan ma dang / spyod pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa'i brgyan gang ji snyed gcig mthong ba las nyan
473a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bkod pa dang / de dag thams cad bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi nang du 'dus pa dang khongs su chud par bya'o// zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab
473a6(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'tshal na/ bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las brtsams te/
473a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis sug las gzhan ma mchis par bshad dam/ de bas kyang ring du bshad kyang sangs rgya
473a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag mthur thug par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam kyi rnam pa gang ci 'dra bde la/ de bzhin gshegs
473a9(dkon brtsegs): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma rtogs par dbang du gyur pa gzhan gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal
473b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pas thugasu chud do// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
473b2(dkon brtsegs): la ni thogs pa med de/ dus gsum kun tu 'jug go// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha gcig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'jam
473b3(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de brjod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi
473b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na/ sangs kyi zhing yon tan pa de gnyis yod pa 'dra 'am/ 'on te mi 'dra snyam pa dang / de nas bcom
473b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyi thugasu chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyi mngon par sgrags pa'i sgra
473b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i mchi ba rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs
473b7(dkon brtsegs): na rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu blangs pa de dang phyin las pa de gnyis gang mang par 'gyur/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das blangs pa ni nyung / slad
473b8(dkon brtsegs): nas lus pa ni che da ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' sA la pa/ rigs kyi bu mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i tshis brgya mtsho chen po las/
474a1(dkon brtsegs): chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa de tsam du ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs
474a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par lta'o// brgya mtsho chen po na chu'i lhag ma ji snyed gcig yod de ba tsam du ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/
474a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par lta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
474a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par sgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gnas
474a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan la la la mngal bar gyur tam/ mngal bar 'gyur ram/
474a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar la la na de lta bu mngal ba ste/ yang gzhugs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'din/
474a7(dkon brtsegs): shar phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi'i klung bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams smon lam slub du
474a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kun nas 'od zer yon tan
474b1(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu mang brgya mtsho'i rgyal ba zhes bya ba/ sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pas da ltar bzhugs te mtsho zhing bzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs tshad med pas yongs su/
474b2(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing mdun gyis ltas te chos bston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur
474b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa dang / da ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba brgya mtsho
474b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa de gnyis mtshungs te lhag chad med do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gos pa/
474b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa chen pos zhugs pa/ gang 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa de nyid la gnas pa zhig yod do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
474b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bkod pa 'di dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ma bstan du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang na ma mchis
474b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag/
474b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bstan du gsol// de ci'i slad du zhe na// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu yongasu 'dzin par
475a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rags kyi bu de'i phyir nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi du byang chub
475a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gcig ni 'od kyi rtog ces bya ste/ shar phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug
475a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa ni ye shes bla ma zhes bya ste/ lho phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go// gsum pa ni/
475a4(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ nub phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab brtsigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go 'azhi pa ni smon lam
475a5(dkon brtsegs): blo gros zhes bya ste/ byang phyogs legs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na'adug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul
475a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'du mdzad pa 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de mngon par mdzad pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer
475a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mA tu mang ba rgya mtsho rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang kun tu snang bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi kun nas bskor cing mdun
475a8(dkon brtsegs): gyis byas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sngan chad ma thong ma thos shing / bsams kyis mi khyab la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa de dag kyang 'di
475b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pa'i lag na skyu ru ra'i 'bru 'dug pa mthong ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas kun tu snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de
475b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang brgya mtsho rgyal po de yang / sku tha mal par dpag tshad rgya khri bzhi stong mang ba ste/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser gyi ri ba
475b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dpag tshad bzhi khri gnyis stong tsam du gyur pa sha stag gis
475b4(dkon brtsegs): skor cing mdun gyis byas te/ byang chub kyi shing yon tan bkod pa du mas rab tu rgyan pa'i drung na/ seng ge'i khri la gzhugs shing sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon
475b5(dkon brtsegs): par sprul pa mdzad de/ sprul pa de dag kyang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrig khrag brgya stong mang por dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos bston
475b6(dkon brtsegs): ba mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/ sangs rgyas
475b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngam/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas/ byang chub sems brgyad khri bzhi stong
475b8(dkon brtsegs): stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar ste/ kun gyis kyang 'grin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan bdag cheg gis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa ci 'dra spyod
476a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de la bslab par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu sgrub pa bgyi'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
476a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa du ma ldan pa/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang //
476a3(dkon brtsegs): dmar po dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu mang po mthon par gyur ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas su med pa dag
476a4(dkon brtsegs): snang bar byas nas/ slar logs ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
476a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po byam pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lag/ bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal
476a6(dkon brtsegs): / byas pa sangs kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di snyan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgya khri bzhi stong / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
476a7(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'grub pa'i phyir sems bskyed de/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las
476a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa bcu drug gis ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pas tshig brjod de/ de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas
476b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de bzhin du gyur te/ lhag ma rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni de ltar mi 'gyur yang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
476b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu mngon rdzogs par 'chang rgya ste/ de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten
476b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams bde ba can na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med par 'gyur ro// byam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi wa
476b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa gces spras byed la ltos// tshig tu brjod par 'dra yang gang gis lhag pa'i bsam pas bsam thag pa nas/ tshig tu brjod pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon/
476b5(dkon brtsegs): tan bkod pa dag ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bzhin du gyur to// gang gis dma' ba'i sems dang / dad pa tsam gyi tshig
476b6(dkon brtsegs): du brjod pa de dag kyang la sa dma' ba des/ skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcur 'khor ba phyir bsnyil te/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur//
476b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po 'od kyi rtog dang / ye shes bla ma dang / zhi ba'i dbang po dang / smon lam blo gros dag kyang phyog bzhi nas/ khang partsegs pa bai dUr+ya'i ma
476b8(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dug pa mtshungs pa med par bzung ba dag gi nang du zhugs te/ lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
477a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed de/ me tog gi char chen pa na rab tu 'bebs/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum ni sgra 'byin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi
477a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul sna tshogs kyi 'ong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
477a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das ci'i slad du 'jig rten du dgos cher g.yos par gyur pa dang / phyogs bzhi nas khang brtsegs pa bzhi mchis pa bda' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
477a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag de bzhin gshegs pas bskul nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ong
477a5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ ring por ma lon par de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag lhags te/ lhags nas kyang khang pa rtseg
477a6(dkon brtsegs): pade dag nas babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la bai der song te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
477a7(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khong ma thag tu tham
477a8(dkon brtsegs): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phyogs bzhi nas snang ba chen pos snad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa
477b1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'ongs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i gos gyon/ 'jug pa chen pos yang dag par zhugs pa yin gyis/ rigs bu dag khyed kyis skyes
477b2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa 'di dag la rim gro skyed la chos dris shig/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam nyon gcig/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam ni
477b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang su dag gi bdag cag mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa
477b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur 'khor ba phyir snyil bar gyur cig/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongasu rdzogs par gyur
477b5(dkon brtsegs): cig/ bud med gcig gis bdag cag gi ming thos na yang / myur du bud med rnams kyi lus las 'gyur bar shog shig ces bya ba de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pa dag go// de nA bcoM ldan 'das kyis
477b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bstan te/ rdzu 'phrul de dag phyir rtul bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
477b7(dkon brtsegs): bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i sprul pa yang bgyid// sgyu ma mchis par la bgyid
477b8(dkon brtsegs): de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang skye yang skye la 'gag kyang 'gag ste/ gal skye ba dang 'gag pa mi mchis pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
478a1(dkon brtsegs): #mnyam pa nyid la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
478a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'chang brgya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa li 'di skad smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub ji lta bu zhig mngon
478a3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang sus kyang ma thob pa bshig shig/ gang la yod pa 'am/ med par chags pa dmigs su med pa'o//
478a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas smras pa 'jam dpal byang chub de ci tsam du yod pas kyang mi 'thab med pas kyang mi 'thob 'am smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dede/
478a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa ste/ yod par ma gyur mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'thod par 'gyur ba med de// smras pa 'jam dpal
478a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pas kyang / de skad du ba ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyi smras pa/ rigs kyi bu tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba gang yin smras pa/
478a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gang phung po rnams kyang mi mthong / khams dang skye mched rnams kyang mi 'thod la/ dmus long yang ma yin/ sha'i mig can yang ma yin zhing / chos
478a8(dkon brtsegs): gang la yang mi rtog rnam par rtog pa dang / chos gang yang 'phel ba dang / 'grib par mi mthong ba 'di ni chos rnam gyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya'o// de nas byang
478b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' seng ge'i snal gyis mngon par spags pa'i sgras smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid dang mi 'gal zhing chos nyid 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'di dag
478b2(dkon brtsegs): ni so so'i skye bo'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bya bar tha dad du mi 'byed cing / gang 'di
478b3(dkon brtsegs): dben pa'i tshul tu tshul gcig la 'jug pa 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig du bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid la yang zhugs la/
478b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su mi byed cing / 'di na zab pa zhes bya bar mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pas
478b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mi zad pas smras pa/ chos thams cad kyi zad pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu zad pa te/ gang chos thams cad mi zad par chos bston pa de'i/ chos
478b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid las 'gal bar mi byed pa ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshul gyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o byang chub sems dpa' bas ma legs par sem pas smras pa/ gang
478b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pas bsam du med pa la yang 'jug la/ bsam du med pa des kyang rlom semasu med cing / mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan
478b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// byang chub sems rdul dang bral bas sbas pa/ gang 'dod chags dang shin tu bral ba de ni/ mtshan ma thams cad la 'dod chags pa yang med/ 'dod chags bral ba
479a1(dkon brtsegs): yang med/ rjes su chags pa yang med/ khong khro ba yang med/ rmongs pa yang med// gcig tu byed pa yang med/ gnyis su byed pa yang med/
479a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yang med/ mi byed pa yang med/ len pa yang med/ mi len pa yang med/ 'dor ba yang med de/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chu
479a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ba rgya mtshos smras pa/ gang brgya mtsho lta bur zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos la zhugs pa de/ chos la'ang mi rtog la/ ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du chos bcwa
479a4(dkon brtsegs): cing bdag dang gzhan du rlom sem su mi byed pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// zla ba'i bla ma gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ gang sems can than
479a5(dkon brtsegs): cad la mnyam pa'i seMs kyis zla ba lta bur gyur kyang / sems can de dag la rlom sems med pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de na chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub
479a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ gang mya ngan thams cad rgyun chad pa de ni/ mya ngan med cing zhum par 'gyur ba med do// sems can rnams
479a7(dkon brtsegs): ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'o// de la mya ngan gyi rtsa ba gzhen/ gang 'di ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa ste/ gang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas she/
479a8(dkon brtsegs): chos bston pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med pas smras pa/ gang 'dod pa'i khams la yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi khams dang /
479b1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs med pa'i khams dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o//
479b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu lta bas smras pa/ gang chos bston na gang 'di stong pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid du bston la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed/
479b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam nyid kyang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas
479b4(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ gang chos bston pa'i tshe/ 'khor gsum dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'khor gsum gang zhe na bdag mi dmigs pa dang / chos mnyam pa mi dmigs pa dang //
479b5(dkon brtsegs): chos la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// 'di ni 'khor gsum yong su dag pa'i chos bston pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan
479b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba grub pas smras pa// gang chos thas cad 'du ba med par yang shes shing / ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du ston la 'di lta ste/ chos thams
479b7(dkon brtsegs): cad brjod du med pa'i phyir/ yi ge cig kyang mi brjod pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul cig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' za
479b8(dkon brtsegs): mor spyod pas sbas pa/ gang chos thams cad kyi zab pa nyid kyang shes la chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthob/ gang ston pa dang / gang la bstan pa
480a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang la bstan pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu sman pa'o// de ba ni/
480a2(dkon brtsegs): du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po gang gis so so nas rang rang gi spogs pa bston par gyur to// tshul gcig tu bstan pa
480a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sgo bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag bdun bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
480a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya bcu rtsa bzhi ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sos skyes par gyur to// dge slong bdun stong ni nye bar len pa med pas zag pa rnam las semanas
480a5(dkon brtsegs): krol lo// lha dang mi bskye dgu las khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos kyi pi rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sem
480a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrag pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i di/
480a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dun rdo srinagacig tu 'gyur// de'i sku tshe'i ched ni ji tsam gri tu 'gyur/ 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur pa na ji srid gcig na/ bla na med pa med pa yang dag par rdzogs
480a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang brgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la
480b1(dkon brtsegs): dris shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par sbags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'ang
480b2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces smraso// 'jam dpral khyod ji srid gcig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya/ 'jam dpal gyis
480b3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe namakha'i khams gzugs can du gyur pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang brgya'o// gang gi'itshe sgyu ma'i
480b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang brgya'o// gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa zag pa zad
480b5(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang gyi'o// gang gi tshe rmi lam gyi skyes bu dang / brag cha dang / mig yo
480b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / chu zla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang mngon par 'tshang brgya'o// gang gi tshe nyi ma'i
480b7(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyis mtshan mor gyur pa la/ zla ba'i 'od kyis nyin mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu da lta yin gyis su
480b8(dkon brtsegs): chub tu smon pa de la dris shig/ smras pa 'jam dpal khyod byang chub tu mi smon tam/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ma yin ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal nyid kyang bya
481a1(dkon brtsegs): @#// chub la byang chub nyid dang 'jam dpal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang 'di byang chub ces pa 'am/ 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo// ming gang yin pa
481a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni dben zhing byed pa med pa ste stong pa'o// stong pa nyid gang yin de ni byang chub po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen chen po seng ge
481a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsal gyi mngon par spags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems
481a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa mthong ngam/ thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong ngo // thos so bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sem/
481a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// bde bar gshegs pa de ni bgrang du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
481a6(dkon brtsegs): dper na/ yul ma ga ti'i til gyi dong nas til gyi 'bru gcig gcig blangs na/ rigs kyi bu til gyi 'bru gcig po de ji lta lta bur ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med
481a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus par lta'o// phyi nas til gyi lhag ma las pa ltar ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon par rdzogs sangs
481a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus par lta'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thal bar rlab te/
481b1(dkon brtsegs): rdul phrag rab tu byas pa de la rigs kyi bu rdul phra rab ji snyed gcig yod pa de snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de bzhugs pa byas kyang /
481b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya'i char yang smos par mi 'gyur ro// stong gi cher dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grang dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / rgyur yang
481b3(dkon brtsegs): spos par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu rnams grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe'i
481b4(dkon brtsegs): tshad ni tshad med par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul
481b5(dkon brtsegs): phra rab tu blag te/ thal bar byas pa la de la skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phrag rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi/ stong gsum gyi stong
481b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ der rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bzhag ste/ skyes bu des tshul de bzhin du shar phyo gas logasu rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams
481b7(dkon brtsegs): cang zang zad du bkod par 'gyur la/ de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/ des kyang lce phyogs logs su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re nas tshul de bzhin
481b8(dkon brtsegs): bor te/ de bzhin du phyogs bcur skyes bu de lta bu re res tshul de dang 'dra bar de snyed kyi rdul phra rab zang zad du re re nas bor na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems// stong gsum
482a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rgyu phrag ni 'di snyed gcig yod do// stong phrag ni 'di snyed gcig yod do// 'bum phrag ni 'ad
482a2(dkon brtsegs): snyed gcig yod do// bye ba khrag ni 'di snyed gcig yod do// bye ba rgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed gcig yod do// bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed

482a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phrag ni 'di snyed gcig yod do// zhes bya bar tshad bzung bar nus sam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so// bcom ldan
482a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu bcu po de dag gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / gang dag tu phyin te/

483a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ shes chen po de lta bu'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i mtha' mur thug par/ sems can dmyal ba chen por

483a7(dkon brtsegs): ste ma bor ba de dag thams cad rdul phra rab tu blag pa de dag bas kyang / mang ba'i skal par/ da dung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro// de ci'i
483a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam ni bsam gyi mi khyab/ yang dag par 'jug pa ni bsam gyi mi khyab pas// de byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i

483b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du zhag dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus dang / lo skal pa brgya dang / skal pa stong dang / bskal pa bye ba dang / skal pa khrag khrig dang / skal pa bye ba khrag

483b8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba nas snga ma nas bzhin du lo 'di snyed gcig 'das par gyur to zhes rnam par mi rtogs go// de ci'i phyir zhe na// chos gang la yang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do// rigs
484a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha'i khams ni skal ba gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed pas lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang skyo zhing yongasu yi chad pa

484a4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gang la na mkha'i khams shes bya ba de la ni/ tshigs pa med/ skyo ba med pa/ yi chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho

484a6(dkon brtsegs): med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ 'chi ba med 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming de shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro//

484b1(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang gis thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher ba ston pa lta smos kyang ci

485a1(dkon brtsegs): @#la snyoms pa'i sems kyis/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams skang dag par blangs pa la gnas te/ phyi ma'i mthar thug gi bar du sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang
485a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'jug par byed dam/ gzhan dag la
485a3(dkon brtsegs): yang brgya cher bston tam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjesu bslab par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i bar du/ sems bskyed cing gom pa bdun 'dor na/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga
485a4(dkon brtsegs): mA/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gre'o// stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar ma 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang nye ba

485a7(dkon brtsegs): da ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ ting nge 'dzin de la/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed gcig 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis
485a8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi
485b1(dkon brtsegs): spyan snga na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug cing / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bston par mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'jam dpal gzhon
485b2(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa 'di/ de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por gcig car du/ snang bar gyur pa ni smon lam dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi khyad par ngo mtshar
485b3(dkon brtsegs): che'o snyam du ngo mtshar gyi 'dus shes skyes par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byam pa/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad
485b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de'i phyir de bas na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming / sangs rgyas rnam
485b5(dkon brtsegs): par rol pa zhes bya bar yang bzung shig/ smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang bzung shig/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa/ bstan pa zhes bya bar
485b6(dkon brtsegs): yang bzung shig/ byang chub kyi sems yang dag par dga' byed pa zhes bya bar yang bzung shig/ de nas de'i tshe/ 'khor der phyogs bcur dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa/ 'dus pa
485b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gsheg pa dang / chos kyi rnam grang 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ me togs gi cher chen po phab nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhab gnyis la phyag 'tshal te
485b8(dkon brtsegs): rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dong zhing / 'di skad du/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ deng ni bdag cag gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i seng ge'i sgra dang / bkod pa bsam gyi mi khya
485b9(dkon brtsegs): pa thos zhes ched du brjod pa/ ched du brjod// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzog pa'i byang chub las bya phyir mi
486a1(dkon brtsegs): @##ldog par gyur to// sems can tshad mod pa yang dge ba'i rgyab yangs grub par gyu
486a2(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sem pa/
486a3(dkon brtsegs): byam pa dang / byang chub seMs dpa' seng ge'i stsal gyi mngon pa bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i
486a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dang seMs dpa' chen po de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha rkang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
486a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bco ldan 'das kyi gsung ba la mngon pa bstod do// 'phag pa dkon mchog rtseg pa chen po'i tshwa kyi
486a6(dkon brtsegs): nigrang le'u stong phrag rgya ba la/ 'phag pa 'jam dpal gyis ng+yas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/
486a7(dkon brtsegs): lnga ba rdzog so// rgya gar kar gyi mkhan po shi len dra bo dengang/ 'dzin mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes de sgyur cing zhus/
486a8(dkon brtsegs): skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos nas btan la phab pa'o// / sarba mang+ga la// dga'o//
